I've only had this a few months but the picture is the most clear and sharp, and, amazingly, I could even hook it up and go through the installation process alone (I'm a mature grandmother).  I'll buy another Samsung without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!
Reviews.Author: A. Reinehr
Reviews.Content: Great smart tv! Beautiful picture! Very good price and the 1080p quality is amazing. Definite must buy! I am very happy with this product

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my parents
Reviews.Author: J. Hutchins "book nerd"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a present for my parents this year.  They had been watching an old tube style TV for over 20 years and I really wanted them to experience a nice High Def picture.  Both of my parents are not technically savvy (probably not a shocker considering what they were watching before), but I was pleasantly surprised that after only a few quick lessons, they were able to use the "Smart TV" features, watch High Def channels and switch from TV to VCR (yes they still have one of those) pretty easily.As far as the technical specs,They really couldn't care less. From my standpoint, I agree with the other reviews here that its a great picture and Samsung seems to be a reliable brand according to Consumer Reports.  I love the TV, and so do my parents.  It was an affordable gift that made a big difference.  Now when I go to visit them, I can enjoy watching it with them :-)

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased and would buy another
Reviews.Author: LDL "LDL"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as my first "smart tv"  and am very pleased with the picture, sound and the ease of installation of the wifi connection.  I'm loving Pandora and the Amazon/Prime free access.  My only setback on the install; I did not recognize the "colored icon" at the center of the remote as a button. I thought is was simply a symbol-- Duh.--  It is the Smart TV access button.

Reviews.Title: terrific
Reviews.Author: Denise Leader Stoeber
Reviews.Content: all fine.  it is a great pain to have to write so much. not that much to say about this product

Reviews.Title: Love it! Overall, the product was what I was looking for.  Thank you very much, again, for the this product.
Reviews.Author: LUKE P HOVEY
Reviews.Content: Love it! Overall, the product was what I was looking for.  Thank you very much, again, for the this product.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: pat 69
Reviews.Content: I love my t.v.Very clear, great HD picture, sounds wonderful, It works perfectly. The internet is fantastic. IT was a great buy, we saved about a hundred dollars !

Reviews.Title: I should have gotten a larger set
Reviews.Author: Arnï¿½r Heiï¿½ar Sigurï¿½sson
Reviews.Content: I got the 32" version. Works really well so far, but only one week in. Picture quality is great, and it's super light weight. Easy to turn around etc. Works well with my Chromecast too.The sound quality is also surprisingly good. Not thin sounding at all.Smart TV is a usability mess, but you get over it. Works well enough.

Reviews.Title: Good Smart LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Stu
Reviews.Content: This is a good-value 46 inch LED LCD Smart TV.  The smart TV functions work well, and I especially like the full-featured web browser to watch videos while exercising.  The picture is moderately good--not as good as a comparable plasma, but with essentially no glare.  No problem so far with motion blur.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Raul martinez
Reviews.Content: Just got my tv and i gotta say it was the best decision ever made. I had my Magnavox for 5 years and which I have no complaints about that tv but it was time to upgrade. Going from a 32 to a 50 inch was a big difference and Samsung is a very good brand . I would definitely recommend this tv and brand to anybody looking to get a great product without spending too much

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Evelia
Reviews.Content: I have this TV since June 2013 and it has worked perfectly. I have to tell that I was afraid of making this purchase because since I live in Venezuela and I was worried about the item suffering any damage during its long journey to my country (Amazon delivered to my courier company in Miami and they take in charge) but it arrived in perfect condition.I'm proud of myself for doing this smart purchase.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Hambone
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN50EH5300 50" LED HDTV is very easy to use right out of the box. It is lighter than you think for a TV this size, I replaced a Phillips 47" with this and that is about twice as heavy as this TV.One thing I will tell you is never trust the factory settings for the picture. You need to spend about 15 or 20 minutes minutes adjusting brightness, sharpness etc... Any bad revue about the picture quality is probably because they never spent any time adjusting the settings.The controller is very easy to use and to change inputs is also easy. The smart button on the remote brings you to the smart feature that is easy to navigate. I was able to put in my Netflix info and Amazon Prime info within a few minutes and I was watching movies within minutes. At start up the TV asks for your wifi password if you have one.The stand is nice but the part that connects to the TV is thin plastic (reason for 4 stars) so I would recommend mounting it to the wall if there is any activity or small children around the TV.Overall this has a great looking picture once adjusted and I would recommend this to anyone looking for a Beautiful LED TV. 60Hz looks amazing! Movies look great as well as fast paced football.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: D. M. Crane
Reviews.Content: Have had this a little over a week so am still learning all it's abilities, but the picture is just gorgeous and I have gotten on the Internet easily enough and watched a couple movies from Amazon Instant Videos.  All worked like a charm.  I loved that I could pause the Amazon Instant Videos and come back and resume without a hitch.  Great TV.  Still having a problem with it connecting to my desk top computer.  I can see the TV app on my computer, and see the computer listed on my TV, but haven't been able to get the two to work together yet.  I'll call Samsung and see if they can help me get properly connected.  My TV says it has AllShare but I couldn't find AllShare on Samsung to download the app to my computer until I talked to them and found it is now called LinkShare on the site. I downloaded it to my computer from there and, as I said, they show they are connected but I still can't get them to link properly.  Have a feeling it's Operator Error (me) so I think that's fixable with some setting adjustments.  I have a Samsung Galaxy 10.1" Tablet and it cannot connect, although Samsung told me the 7" and 8" tablets can connect to this TV.  Rep at Samsung said they are "working" on an update so that the 10.1" can connect, so I'll just keep checking.

Reviews.Title: Great price for the value
Reviews.Author: shaaban
Reviews.Content: I chose a smart TV to watch netflix, amazon prime & hulu without the use of a streaming device. I have an HDTV connected to a streaming device and the smart TV connection is better, faster & easier to use and that alone is worth buying a smart TV.The best part I did not count on is all the loaded apps & hubs and now I can do more than just watch TVThe Samsung LED SMART TV has a great picture & the sound is very good for TV speakers. The remote is user friendly and you can very easily navigate between the TV & the SMART HUB (Fitness & Daily Burn Hubs, Kids Hub, Media Hub, Samsung Apps Hub, Social TV Hub, Movies &TV; Shows Hub and many apps)Another surprise is the PIP (Picture in Picture) feature, I though PIP is long gone but not in Samsung SMART TV. PIP is great for watching your favorite show while exercising or watching 2 games at once.Navigating the web with the remote is easy but cumbersome when using the keyboard on the screen. You're better off with a wireless keyboardI had this TV for a week & I'm still exploring Samsung SMART HUB. I was going to give it 4 stars but the PIP made it 5.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: It's my first smart tv.  It has a karaoke app, news app, yoga app, fish tank app.  I'm floored at all the things you can do!  And if you have netflix, hulu, or whatever else, cable isn't necessary anymore.Just to warn you, it has no flash player plugin.  Some movie and tv websites requires you to have a flash player.  If anyone know's how to bypass this, I'd greatly appreciate it if you left a comment.I'm wondering that if I get an apple tv and hook it up to this smart tv, maybe it will play flash player movies?  I can't find the answer anywhere on the net.

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: JoeGW
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up. Easy use.  Great picture.  I especially like the Wi-Fi access and ability to stream Pandora and Netflix. Very Satisfied

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: The picture is super clear, and it's just the right size. Easy to use the smart part of it. I can watch Netflix or listen to pandora on it. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: very satisfied!
Reviews.Author: John Redmill
Reviews.Content: Having owned one Samsung HD set I was expecting an exceptional picture and I was not disapointed. This was a unique installation that required a precise size and this set worked great!

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Hoss
Reviews.Content: Great LED screen! Nice internet options for Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Video and Redbox. Great TV for the price. A+ A+

Reviews.Title: Wireless access to the internet TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph j Ricca
Reviews.Content: This set has a wireless connection to the network.  It allowed me to easily update the firmware and register the TV.  The picture is great and the smart TV function is really special.

Reviews.Title: So happy with it!
Reviews.Author: L. Strode
Reviews.Content: We were purchasing our second flat-screen and this deal was wonderful, so we got the Samsung.  It is a wonderful television and the set-up was so easy!  We love the ease of getting any and all of the connected services.  We do wish that the wireless keyboard would work within the various applications instead of just with the browser.  But we are very happy with the TV!

Reviews.Title: My first "smart tv"
Reviews.Author: Maxwell
Reviews.Content: SAMSUNG 5300 Review:  Set was received a week ago.I assembled the stand and attached it to the set with moderate effort.  [(1) Stand Instructions did not include a step listed in the Set’s Inst.s (2) The stand must be directly slid into the set; if not, the set leans backwards (3) Inst.s call for two people to move/erect the set]  Four small screws assemble the stand and four more attach it to the set.  It works but appears a little “tippy” front-to-back. (Inst.s include steps for connecting a separately purchased anchor; if you have small kids….)Connecting my satellite box was as easy as plugging in an HDMI cable (not included; purchased separately).  I could not get it to work, however, without a call to Samsung’s support which explained the process for selecting it using the remote’s “Source” key.  My DVD I connected with an AV cable I had but could not get it to work.  (Inst.s were not clear.) I defaulted and purchased another HDMI cable; problem solved.Turning on the set started initial set-up.  (I have a wireless router so internet connection was as easy as entering the password (which is not totally easy, you have to use an on-screen keyboard, moving the selector from key to key gets monotonous; also, some other screens time out if you take too much time). I did not find the Inst.s completely clear about the set-up.  You have to let the Samsung software download/update.I was pleased to find the set was then able to wirelessly connect to my computer (after I realized/learned I had to change a setting on the computer).  I can now review pictures stored on my computer.  My videos, though, bring up “The file you’ve selected is not currently supported.” (I’ve not asked Samsung if/when that will change.)I was able to login (slowly, using the on-screen keyboard) to my Netflix account and play videos.  The second time I tried, I found I had to enter all the login info. again.  A call to Samsung support and I was told it is necessary to set up a Samsung account on the set before it would remember my logins. (A second review of the Inst.s does not find that.)  After setting up the acct. (on-screen keyboard again), the process is pressing the remote’s button for Samsung’s “Hub”, moving the selector to the Netflix icon and selecting it.Samsung’s support has been very good.  (Though one call had me in a queue for 8-10 minutes; right after the Dec. & New Year holidays that may be expected.)  That is a real help because the Instructions are basic.  They seem to assume a “smart tv” knowledge-level.  [I have 7 yrs. advanced education and have used computers since before the mouse but this is my first “smart tv”.]  I foresee more calls to support to make use of all the set’s capabilities.  There is an “e-manual” you can access on the set; so far it has not been very useful.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: r3vi3ws4u
Reviews.Content: Ugh, I spent waaaay tooooo much time reading reviews and looking for a TV.  Missed out on some really sweet deals waiting for even sweeter deals.  In the long run I got pissed and just bought this one.I'm pleased, it's big, it's smart and it was cheap.I thought I cared about black levels and refresh rates but after comparing at Best Buy (by the way Best Buy thanks for building that huge showroom I can go look at all the stuff I buy on Amazon and get a hands on first!!) I decided that spending thousands on a TV wasn't necessary for what I consider a great picture.Effortless setup and controls.  Some of the reviews I read must be written by really technically challenged people because getting it setup and navigating the controls and features is really really easy.Amazon Prime works flawlessly and HD quality is great.  Same with Netflix.  Apps are easy to search, install and delete. I was surprised at the amount of apps available and I actually liked some of them.  Web browser is OK as memory is an issue sometimes but it's not a high end TV so that's OK. Sites like wimp and reddit display fine and play videos fine.  For six fiddy I'm not complaining about anything.

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: nancy caputi shnider
Reviews.Content: There is a dimming and flickering problem with this TV.  Now that I look online it is infamous for these problems and going to be a royal pain to solve.  It is intermittent but impossible to watch something when it does occur. Don't take on this problem.

Reviews.Title: Seamless transfer from a pc to Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Stuart Reider
Reviews.Content: I expected that watching a film on my pc could easily be watched on my new Samsung Smart TV.  This was not the case.  The support provided by Samsung focused on what could not be done; instead I expected advice on a procedure to achieve what I needed.  Samsung offers a phone number for technical support.  I phoned and waited an hour without any indication on the number of calls and expected time.  Samsung also offers a "live chat" which is slow and staff has limited knowledge, but quick to provide e-mail links that provide no help.  After much effort I was told I needed a mirroring device - their Galaxy product. This would ensure easy interface, but it was altogether unclear their Samsung AllShare could not do the job.  Had their engineers just overlooked this important feature?

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Ronald Mendenhall
Reviews.Content: FANTASTIC TELEVISION WITH MORE THAN WE NEED, EASY TO INSTALL AND PICTURE IS GREAT. WE PUT IN A CONDOSO DONT EVEN NEED A SOUND BAR

Reviews.Title: samsung UH46EH5300 46-inch 1080p  LED HDTV (black)
Reviews.Author: Robert Vanderbeek
Reviews.Content: IT HAS GOOD COLOR AND SOUND. I'LL NEED SOME HELP GETTING ON THE INTERNET.  IT DOESN'T RECOGNIZE MY WI-FI NETWORK , AT THIS TIME.

Reviews.Title: Best TV in the house
Reviews.Author: John Mojica
Reviews.Content: Have it in the den, works really well with everything and the features are awesome. I will only buy samsung TV's now. the color is on the money and the HD quality is awesome compared to other non-samsung TV's in my house. Once I figure out how to turn the auto-dim feature off, which is very annoying, the TV is perfect now.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Warranty
Reviews.Author: Abigail Rollins
Reviews.Content: When I received the television at my house, the screen was cracked internally.  I called Samsung directly since I paid extra for the warranty, and they told me the warranty only covers parts and services, of which this issue was not considered one.  Luckily Amazon provided a refund, but instead of ordering a replacement, I went with a different tv brand.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV and good price
Reviews.Author: Deepa
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV two weeks back and so far I am enjoying it. I bought Amazon prime also so watching prime videos and youtube videos on the TV.No issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Excellent television!
Reviews.Author: paul streby
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended.  Very good picture quality and easy to set up and get started.  We (the family) like it very much.

Reviews.Title: "Picture Off" function
Reviews.Author: Gerard Gibson
Reviews.Content: The only thing I can say about this TV that I don't like is the fact that while using the smart hub (internet apps), you can not "turn off" the screen. I would use a streaming player like Roku or the likes, to stream pandora at night in my children's room. I would just turn down the brightness, contrast, etc... and the music would play without flooding the room with light.  This TV has a "picture off" function but it is not available for use while in the smart hub. This is a good television however, the one reason I bought this tv doesn't work for what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: Best TV in the market!
Reviews.Author: James Kaefer
Reviews.Content: The tv has a beautiful picture and the other features like the smart hup and the WiFi all worked perfectly the first time I tried it. I really like streaming movies it's so easy to do. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Best smart TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Roy Couch
Reviews.Content: Shipping was perfect and right on time.  This television is all anyone needs unless they are adamant about 3D viewing.  Use the recommending settings as stated in other reviews for the best picture quality.  I watch sporting events and action films, and have not seen any blurring from this 60 Hz television.

Reviews.Title: Best, Better than the rest.
Reviews.Author: ELIZABETH SYDNEY
Reviews.Content: This is my second samsung smart tv, use to love sony products but not anymore after these samsung experiece and will recomend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: smart hub is a disaster
Reviews.Author: Aussie girl "Jayne"
Reviews.Content: The Smart Hub (access point for apps and browser) often fails to launch. After today's update we are unable to access the Amazon store. I think that the "Smart" part of the product is seriously lacking, it all feels like a failed beta version.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Diane A. Reen "dianer137"
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung 32 " 1080p 60 Hz SMART LED HDTV.  I have a lot to learn about it, but it just about everything.  The price was right and I wanted a larger HDTV.  I gave my husband my 19" Samsung for a monitor for his computer.  He loves the bigger screen.  My son also brought the Samsung 32" above and he is enjoying his also.We can get Netflix, Pandora, ITunes, YouTube etc.Just Love it.

Reviews.Title: 40" Samsung Smart Tv
Reviews.Author: Mtn Girl "Life is Good"
Reviews.Content: Just such a treat to be in the 21st Century.  Great picture and the ease of installing was just amazing.  We - who are behind the times - needed to call Samsung with a question and they were immediately responsive and answered the question.

Reviews.Title: Quality product
Reviews.Author: Quinton Peaslee
Reviews.Content: Tv is great everything I expected and does everything I need it to. I've had Samsung TVs in the past and always been satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied!!
Reviews.Author: Harvey
Reviews.Content: Great tv.. Better than I could have ever imagined! The quality and the vast amount of things able to do with this TV is  just incredible! Very satisfied!!

Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: Dustin Stelzer
Reviews.Content: Didn't need the cable connection just needed the smart functions like netflix etc. The wifi was iffy at best. For some reason it wouldn't stay connected so went to a wired connection and bam done. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected!
Reviews.Author: Sherice M.
Reviews.Content: I am a Netflix fiend and the fact that this connects directly to Netflix is AWESOME! The picture is clear, sound quality is amazing, and the apps are quick to open. It even comes with a bunch of free apps that are useful, including the exercise app that tracks your progress! It's just an awesome TV. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: FIrst FLat Screen
Reviews.Author: Carmella Chessen
Reviews.Content: Great price, clear picturelearning about the "smart" aspect. Samsung is helpfulWas nervous about getting this but am happy I did.Not a techie: Once you get used not that difficult to control

Reviews.Title: This TV is smart!  Very smart!
Reviews.Author: BJ Reynolds "Scout"
Reviews.Content: Am I the only person left on earth who didn't know smart TVs existed?  I ordered this TV, wanting a 40-inch screen, and was I ever surprised at the features it has.  First, it's a Samsung, and I find Samsung products to be better made than anything else I have tried.  This TV lives up to the Samsung reputation. The picture is gorgeous.  And then there are the "smart" features.  I love them!  Netflix, Hulu and Amazon are available right from the smart page.  And, so are Facebook and Youtube.  This TV has the internet programmed into it.  All you do is fill in your internet password, and you can call up Facebook and Youtube.  What fun to see your favorite Youtube videos on a 40-inch screen.  And there are so many more features that I haven't even tried yet.  I highly recommend this TV.  The only problem is that I think it is smarter than I am.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Kennedy "ProNuke"
Reviews.Content: Got this TV as a black friday purchase and have been happy with it so far. All the APPS work as expected and the picture is very good. I have it mounted on the wall in my bedroom and it was a snap to set it up out of the box. Only downside is that i cannot get the Pandora app to work. Otherwise great TV and just what i needed.

Reviews.Title: So thrilled with this purchase!
Reviews.Author: Mandi D Hartzell
Reviews.Content: I was l little worried about the 60 hz but this is an excellent product and we have no complaints.  HD still looks great and we love the smart tv feature.  You just can't go wrong with a Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: The first TV that was shipped arrived broken, looked like a returned unit. Amazon picked up damaged unit and next day air shipped a replacement that arrived fine. a really nice TV, grat looking picture good speakers built in, an overall nice unit. Great if you are an Amazon Prime member as well as this unit links to your account so you can stream Prime video content.

Reviews.Title: good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Fredrik
Reviews.Content: Good TV for the money, nothing extra, nothing missing. Easy to install and the apps works all right even though the load a bit slow now and then.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal for the price!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Souza
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the purchase.  Excellent value for the price.  Easy set up and it's nice to access Amazon video without going through an add on device.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Rorig
Reviews.Content: Beautiful, clear, crisp picture. The remote even lights up so you can see in dark! I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup, Picture sharp, easy to navigate.
Reviews.Author: Kevin D. Myers
Reviews.Content: I have both a 55" 2012 model with EVO kit (to 2013 Smart), as well as this 32" 2012 model.I bought this 32" because I love my Samsung Smart TV's. Setup is guided by a wizard and takes you through identifying the Cable box, wifi/wired connection, & updates downloaded from Internet. I use the smart TV to watch Netflix & Amazon Plus. They are quite easy to setup and the Smart TV remembers the awkward logins. Occasionally re-login may be required, but its rare. The remote is the "many button" kind and is easy to navigate. I suggest going through the menus to get acquainted with the TV features.

Reviews.Title: My new Smart TV from Samsung
Reviews.Author: marilyn j. gillette
Reviews.Content: My new TV is better than I expected..I had read the reviews and on the fence about buying the product..but..now that it's up and  running I'm glad I made the purchase because all I did was hook it up and now I'm enjoying great TV at a great price that I received from Amazon..once Gin Amazon delivers..Thank-You

Reviews.Title: happy with tv but speakers are very weak
Reviews.Author: Rex Wilcox
Reviews.Content: Gret picture and happy with SmartHub layout and functionality.  As compared to our 46" Samsung smart TV the speakers on this TV are very poor.  We have to pump the volume up to 30-40 vs. 15-20 on the 46" tv

Reviews.Title: The tv it self is very good, but not for international costumes.
Reviews.Author: Guerlian Gougon
Reviews.Content: Great tv but the smart part is not for outside the US. I also would recommend a keyboard for web browsing, since the remote takes a lot of time to enter the phrases.

Reviews.Title: With SMART who needs DVD?
Reviews.Author: User
Reviews.Content: Love the TV and recommend it.Has ability to artificially upgrade old standard resolution DVD movies to a something that looks better on the screen but is a step down form actual Blue-ray.The menus are easy to navigate and reasonably fast. It takes about 3 minutes from turn on to actual streaming.With streaming I got rid of my DVD player and am doing without the blue-ray player. I like a minimalist lifestyle so I like everything tight and clean looking. The money I saved by not buying a player will rent me a lot of movies on Amazon Prime.I hooked up a Dell USB keyboard and mouse and they work on some apps but not all. The browser is worthless as it does not support video streaming nor web-mail.My WIMAX cellular internet connection is slow but it streams fine 99% with an occasional buffer issues.I really like the 40-inch and was going to go with a 32 because I have a small area but I am glad I went with a 40-inch. I recommend it.The TV speakers sound is poorly adequate, so I hooked up a pair of black powered laptop speakers and they work great. However, the remote will not change the volume on the headphone line out port so I have to get up to make the volume adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Great...when it works
Reviews.Author: Opinion123
Reviews.Content: It's a nice tv. Good quality picture and sound. However, I've had to call for service on it twice in the first six months because it won't connect to the wireless. Both times have required replacement parts. Samsung service is pretty bad so this has come with some frustrations although it was covered under warranty which was nice. Hoping this is a fluke for this model, but there you have it.

Reviews.Title: great functionality and quality for the price . . . .just exceptionally slow
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Scott
Reviews.Content: I have only had the tv for a month or so now, but all included points should still be applicable.  The picture looks very nice and I was very impressed with the number of built in programs, and the ability to download new ones.  My main issues is that everything related to the smart tv functionalities is incredibly slow.  It is often not clear if the tv has frozen or is still loading.  When playing youtube playlists it will often stop and not recover for a 30 seconds to a minute. . . great way to bring a party to a screeching halt.  For the price I paid I couldn't expect any more though.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Thrilled With This Purchase
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: After a lot of thought I decided we were in need of an upgrade to the family's television.  I did a lot of research before settling on this product.  Honestly, I haven't looked back.  I'm really happy with the performance, color, and, to a point, the audio of this television.  That's not to say the audio can't be enhanced with a soundbar (since my wife bought one for us for Christmas to go along with this).The controls are pretty easy to get along with, learn and use.  After awhile, like all other remotes, you'll be handling it without even thinking of what you're doing.I did use one of the reviewer's guide in setting the video up in the manual mode and have to admit, that was a darn good choice.Having bought and used this television since before Christmas, I figure any glitches or problems would have occurred by now.  Thus far, nothing's happened in the negative side and I'm really happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED 32
Reviews.Author: saleem
Reviews.Content: I got two of these the first was last year 2012, I got it for my bedroom which it was the perfect size due to the space I had, the other I bought for my dad this year.I bought these TV's during Christmas sale which was a deal. The picture quality is great, it has picture presets which you can adjust or fine tune and audio as-well. The only negative is doesn't have an RCA audio output, only headphone and digital connectors. I have no regrets so far...

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Kemil
Reviews.Content: Love the TV, though the remote is something to be desired.  The remote of my other TV, an older Vizio is much more user friendly.  Just on account of the remote, I would  have purchased another Vizio instead of the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: David Tang
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. This is the first smart TV I've purchased and I enjoy it very much so. I don't watch TV much nowadays, it's just streaming Netflix and Youtube on my Laptop/Computer  and socializing on facebook. Now I can do that easily on the TV. You could use the remote to navigate, but I simply just plug in my mouse and keyboard to navigate easier. I haven't tried streaming videos on other websites like worldstar, dailymotion, or free stream sites. I doubt they would have the flash player, and I don't want to risk getting pop ups or virus' on my TV. But overall watching TV, playing video games, Netflixing and Youtubing on this TV is great. Saves me money on electricity and gives me convenience of having to switch over media players.

Reviews.Title: Hubby's Christmas Gift!
Reviews.Author: Debi Kirschten
Reviews.Content: A definite Keeper!  Right on! We love it.  Yes we would recommend it to friends! Definitely at an awesome price!

Reviews.Title: Overall good buy
Reviews.Author: Debnarayan
Reviews.Content: The tv is good. Video is crisp and clear. Did not notice any ghosting, however that depends upon taste.The only problem i faced is the smart hub is slow to load, and the external keyboards do not work within non-samsung apps. Unfortunately, youtube, netflix, amazon are all third party apps

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Theodore Neros
Reviews.Content: Flawless!.  Very happy with this set. I am still learning how to connect it to everything in the house network and outside. I had heard that 'smart' TVs had problems but I had not noticed any so far.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous
Reviews.Author: ZackyV
Reviews.Content: This TV is gorgeous, the 1080p picture looks astounding and playing video games on it has been so visually pleasing. I enjoy switching from playing to watching netflix with just the push of a button instead of having to quit the game and waste time. Overall for 250 how could i resist such a tempting offer. :P

Reviews.Title: This is a great TV!
Reviews.Author: Pirie
Reviews.Content: A smart TV for under $400 that has a great picture and the set up was a breeze.  It is light and easy to mount to the wall.  No cons at all.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Danny W Allen
Reviews.Content: The things you can do with this TV is amazing.It was easy to set up and start using.I think it is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a good price
Reviews.Author: Peggy Plummer
Reviews.Content: We weren't planning on a smart TV but since there wasn't a lot of difference in price we went ahead with it.  So glad we did.  It's very user friendly and the picture is great!  I used settings that other reviewers suggested and was glad I took the time to read the reviews.

Reviews.Title: Works great with the Sonos PLAYBAR
Reviews.Author: Robert "rob_squared"
Reviews.Content: I was recommended one of these by a friend (he got the 40 inch version).  We both have Sonos PLAYBARs and most TV's have annoying nag screens when you turn off internal speakers or don't properly pass Dolby 5.1.  This does both and it's a smart TV, plus of course it's a samsung.

Reviews.Title: AT TIMES DOES NOT POWER ON
Reviews.Author: P. Martinez
Reviews.Content: AT TIMES DOES NOT POWER ONI really like this TV. GREAT, crisp picture. I own six flat screens of varied sizes and brands. I like TV!  However, ithis smart tv sometimes fails to turn on when I try to simply turn it on with the remote.  I Have Directv and the"Sansung Smart TV" icon will come on and then disappear and the screen goes black. Even though my directv client box is on and lit up - this happens. After several attempts (7-8 sometimes) it comes on and then works great. It has happened about five times total approximatly every few weeks. Disheartening. Disappointing. When it works, its great, When the screen is black and wont power up it sucks.  Wondering if this happens to anyone else. .??..... Wondering if I should return it and exchange before time escapes me and time runs out. I hesitate to return cause I love it when it works!

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: Shannon McCarty
Reviews.Content: Very easy to operate and setup and a great picture. This TV has all the great things that the more expensive ones. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Quality tv
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel A
Reviews.Content: I love this tv with all my heart, the pictures are clear and very sharp, having used other products from before this, am so impressed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: KOSMOS
Reviews.Content: This TV is great with one small complaint... It doesn't have an S-VHS port for my old (but cherished) S-VHS video player. It also only has 1 set of component in port. I don't imagine this will be a problem for most people nowadays though.The Smart TV menu is easy to navigate and I prefer this better than the LG TV menu that I have in my living room... at least for the Amazon Prime application.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but slow browsing experience!
Reviews.Author: killercolors
Reviews.Content: First off let me say, I'm glad I bought this when I did because the price has since skyrocketed. I only purchased the 40-inch for $397. Now it's doubled in price. whoa.Now that, that's said, it's a great TV. Once I got my settings right where I wanted them I was good to go.But I had to shut off it's screensaver...which it has strangely enough... otherwise I'd turn it on to find the blank, black screensaver on and no cable. I'd have to shut it back off and make sure the logo appeared when I turned it back on. Now that the screensaver is off it no longer stays on even after the TV's been turned off and back on again. Aside from that It's got great sound and picture quality! The apps are great also, but the browsing experience sucks. It's terrible!The remote control is not enough unless you change it to jump to links otherwise it's very slow going. Even spelling out an address took way too much time and effort. It's not like you're, say, clicking left and it's jumping from one letter to another...no...it's clicking left several times just to get the mouse to move. Yeah it's like that.If you get this TV for the browser, I'd suggest a wireless keyboard and mouse duo. They need to get the signal from the same USB otherwise they cancel each other out. How do I know this? Because I tried it with a Microsoft mouse and a Logitech keyboard. It was a no go as they are on different USB receivers. So I then grabbed my old duo mouse and keyboard from Logitech, both on the same receiver and they worked perfectly. So in the end, if you plan on browsing the web from the TV itself for those shows you can't find anywhere else except online... use a dual mouse and keyboard set. Otherwise enjoy going slower than a turtle.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: C. Patterson "Online shopper"
Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV during 2013 pre-Black Friday sales for $497, and haven't seen it cheaper!I was a little worried about going with a 60Hz instead of 120Hz, but we haven't noticed any problems when watching tv or movies.  After doing some research, we ended up with this model because we read that a 120Hz+ refresh rate doesn't add value unless you're using the TV to play video games.  We've watched a couple of HD NFL games, and there's absolutely no lag with the picture.As far as the Smart TV is concerned -- Samsung seems to offer one of the better Smart TV platforms.  So far we've streamed Amazon Prime videos and streamed videos from our home network (my husband's computer) with Samsung Link.  Samsung Link has some flaws, but we were able to figure it out.  It has a hard time loading videos and music from our network to the point the TV has restarted on us, but maybe that's because my husband added over 300 GB worth of material to the shared folders.  Our wireless router is also at the opposite end of our house and in the lower level, and we notice signal interference, so I think that has a lot to do with it., too.  It may be worth our while to invest in a new wireless router.If you're using an audio receiver, then the only option for audio out on this TV is an optical audio cable.Picture quality seems great, but it helps that we didn't compare this TV side-by-side in the stores.  I've read a few reviews where people manually changed picture settings and that dramatically increased picture color, etc. compared to the factory defaults.  We just haven't explored this yet.  My husband didn't like the energy saver mode, where the TV automatically dims and brightens based on the ambient lighting, but I didn't mind it.The TV arrived in a brown box, so it wasn't obviously a TV that was delivered to our house.  I appreciated that.  We also had to sign for the TV, so I'm glad we were home to receive it.  Set up was easy, and we mounted it to a tv stand.  This is a great upgrade from our 5 year old 32" LG (which is still a great TV).

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: shruti
Reviews.Content: I simply love this tv...there was an issue in the start up for updating the hub...but once passed it...it was awesome!!!!I would highly recommend this tv....with the price I got it for...its totally a steal!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed by receiving broken set and no replacements available
Reviews.Author: Tex Colorado
Reviews.Content: Similar experience to many of the recent reviews here over the holidays. Received a 40" version of this TV via 2-day shipping. TV screen was broken on setup. Wasn't apparent until it was actually turned on. Amazon claimed over the phone that no replacements were available. I ordered the TV to have in time for friends visiting over the holidays. I can't comment on the quality of the TV, but I will say that if you are purchasing this TV to use for a particular event, then go find one in a local store.Have been an Amazon Prime customer for almost six years now but had never ordered a television from them. Learned my lesson that shipping + large delicate electronics items = bad idea. Will go back to making these kinds of purchases in physical stores.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic center piece of a home network entertainment system, great quality, and good apps.
Reviews.Author: David W.
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing.A little background. We have the ASUS RT-N66U Dual-Band Wireless-N900 Gigabit Router hooked up to Comcast Cable via the ARRIS / Motorola SurfBoard SB6141 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem and coupled to the Synology DiskStation 2-Bay (Diskless) Network Attached Storage (NAS) DS213. With this home network, we run multiple smartphones, tablets, computers, Apple TV, Roku, and a home entertainment server.The TV facilitates almost *all* of these devices (ok, not really the phones too much), seamlessly connecting to the NAS for movies and music (the music being usually accessed via the Apple TV) and to the internet directly. We regularly use Amazon Prime on the TV to watch movies, the connection to the NAS to watch movies we already have downloaded, and the facilitation of multiple streaming devices (Apple TV and Roku) for other random media.I have focused on the central role the TV plays in our home network entertainment system, but it would be remiss not to mention the fact that this TV has excellent picture quality as well. I have to say, I have probably not fully tested this aspect, as I have primarily watched streamed movies and somewhat less than HD-quality video files on our home network, so I am probably not in the best position to comment on just *how* superior the quality really is.I have to say that *some* of the apps are not all that. They're good, but for example, the Samsung Link app that I usually use to connect to the Video server on the NAS requires that you essentially enter a separate menu in order to significantly advance in a movie, rather than (for example) using the usual page advance button on the remote. Anyway, these things start to be details.Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Odnel
Reviews.Content: This is a awesome TV for the price. It does everything you would want it to do. It does more than my Chromecast!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Love Shopping "Happy Buyer"
Reviews.Content: I really love this TV. I was happy to get almost 100 dollars off the price, during Black Friday, thanks Amazon. It was very easy to connect and to set up. Wonderful picture and sound. I also love being able to go online.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful television
Reviews.Author: Paul J.
Reviews.Content: This tv is  beautiful  just got it  today so I will  give another review later  on,  but  it was easy to connect to the internet and set up the tv.  connected Two  of the  the 3 hdmi  ports  with my cable and Xbox and it made my Xbox 360 look wayyyyy  better then my old Westinghouse tv. the games looked beautiful in 1080p. so far so  good

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: tagreader
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is OK.  Setup was pretty easy and sound quality is pretty good.  Overall it is good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Definitely a great TV
Reviews.Author: Douglas C Hahn
Reviews.Content: Large screen TV features with a small screen with a crystal clear picture! Recommended for any small room, especially a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: 5stars samsung still makes awesome tvs
Reviews.Author: Renee Thapa
Reviews.Content: Will write a follow up review but so far so good.highly recommend buying.awesome quality and superb internet I got mine cheap thank you amazon for wonderful experience.huge screen picture quality is impressive but not stunning,you get what you paid.internet pandora netflix they all work well.at least  better then I thought.sound is good as wellAwesomeShould buy

Reviews.Title: Great hardware, great picture, mediocre smart tv
Reviews.Author: Robert B
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smart tv at a reasonable price and i found this to be the ticket. Personally I usually only buy Samsung TV's unless it's just for my bedroom but this is replacing my old living room projection TV.The picture is great on it once you tweak the brightness accordingly as is almost any Samsung. I have found myself not really ever using the smart Tv part of it because typing is so slow! I usually just hook up my laptop to it, but there are some great features to it nonetheless. It has apps from Samsung,Netflix amazon movie streaming as well as some other fun apps to check out from Samsung. It's a really nice size and I can't tell the difference between the 40" and 42" in a room the size of a living room.  It has plenty of ports to connect HDMI competent etc. All in all amazing TV for the picture, smart tv aspect not really advanced enough on this model to be relevant for me.PS: it looks really great!

Reviews.Title: A great flatscreen at a very good price, beat the price everywhere locally.
Reviews.Author: David Lapinsky
Reviews.Content: We are VERY p[leased with this tv.  Like others have said the original factory settings for viewing are not the best but with a little adjustment this tv is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Everything and more
Reviews.Author: John Smith
Reviews.Content: You do have to play with the setting to get a perfect picture when switching between TV, HD, blueray, and DVD. The recommended setting work well for everything besides a couple DVDs If you are not like me and want a perfect picture all the time.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Love it. Really enjoy the Smart TV aspect. Can access internet and email. Easy to set up and get running

Reviews.Title: Great color, lightweight, and easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Richtrojan
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly in my bedroom television cabinet, where it replaced my old CRT style 32" monitor.  The audio is best enjoyed with either a sound bar or a surround sound system.

Reviews.Title: I have had this TV for a week and I am pretty happy with it for the price. the 5 HDMI jacks are awesome and the smart tv options
Reviews.Author: SY
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a week and I am pretty happy with it for the price. the 5 HDMI jacks are awesome and the smart tv options like netflix are pretty well. I highly recommend this item!

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: T Lex
Reviews.Content: Samsung is a solid product. Used to buy Sony but I seem to like the Samsung picture quality better lately.

Reviews.Title: Graet Deal!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Teacher"
Reviews.Content: Samsung is the best! Picture is tremendous, Smart part is great and they are reasonable. Better picture then Sony at almost half the price.

Reviews.Title: good product, but possibly not new
Reviews.Author: K Rue
Reviews.Content: the product is very good with nice sound sharp picture and black blacks., however i question whether it is brand new as there are fine scratches on it :/

Reviews.Title: The best 40" LED Smart TV
Reviews.Author: techno
Reviews.Content: My new Samsung 40" 5300 series offers high resolution and the sound is great. We mostly only use the built-in speakers when we watch TV, but even then the sound is very crisp and clean. The picture quality and depth is the best that I have seen. Best of all it is only 36.5" wide so it fits nicely in our entertainment center. The Smart tv features are pretty nice. Watching all sorts of YouTube videos on this tv is completely awesome. I have it connected to our high-speed broadband via a wired connection which was incredibly easy to setup. This tv comes with a nice remote that is simple and easy to navigate with. I would highly recommend this Samsung Smart TV

Reviews.Title: Outstanding experience so far
Reviews.Author: Tod Bohlmann
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to set-up, connected easily to wireless network and updated immediately. The picture settings that others have provided were helpful. I just tweaked them for my taste. But so far so good. Great picture, good sound, nice size for a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: And Boom Goes the Dynamite!
Reviews.Author: Hunter Williams
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV. Use it in our medium sized bedroom and it fits the room perfectly. The SmartTV function allows for you to wirelessly connect to Hulu, Netflix, etc.. Although is has an HBOGO app, our cable provider doesn't match with Samsung. Whatever. Quality picture after you mess with it. Pretty good sound. Nice TV.

Reviews.Title: excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael King
Reviews.Content: Excellent feature set and performance for the prices. Integrated nicely with my DirecTV receiver. Haven't really figured out what the "Smart" features are good for - fluff bells and whistles, but the rest is good. My second Samsung and both are 5-star.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Chris Larimer "GrknDeacon"
Reviews.Content: This has surpassed all my expectations. The only real complaint I have is with the paucity of apps offered. A lot of them advertise as Feee but can't be used without fee-based content. I'd like to see a usable keyboard for this. Hint: install AllShare ASAP for the best streaming media experience.

Reviews.Title: This was my first smart tv and now i have 4.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Carter Leftwich
Reviews.Content: This was my first smart tv and now i have 4. the fitness tracks are great! getting passwords and such set up are annoying because you have to work it through the remote, so there is a ton of scrolling. but once its set up, it works great! I stream my netflix and watch youtube. and i didn't need my husband to show me how to set anything up. very simple.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: LauraAnn
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I am looking for in my game room. Sounds great, picture is clear and sharp. The other good reviews were very helpful and acurate. Great product. Looking forward to getting another one for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Is Great
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: 5 stars because of it's awesome features and the way you can watch two things at once and I love how I can use my note 10.1 and note 2 with it.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Debra Jobin
Reviews.Content: The picture is wonderful and it's easy to navigate. A good value for this tv. I have recommended to other and they haven't been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice TV. Huge clear screen.  I love the sound system on this TV, it is  Surround system. very loud.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews before I bought it, I expected the TV to be difficult to set up. Seriously... It took 5 minutes and looks great. I love the Smart TV. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Visa "book yv"
Reviews.Content: I recomend Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch  is wonderful  excellent definition and very useful because you can navigate in internet and share with socials networks, share videos a and photos via wifi

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: D. Patel
Reviews.Content: Nice TV Arrive on time easy to set up & working good. I like all Smart TV & my Kids also love it

Reviews.Title: Best TV purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: Andre Harris
Reviews.Content: Awesome features, good sound!!! Great purchase!!! First Samsung product. Would buy another, in the near future! Would recommend to friends .

Reviews.Title: Perfect smart tv
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: Perfect smart TV. Shipped on time. Good packaging. Value for money.Netflix running great. YouTube app is fav.Need more app upgrades for better user experience.

Reviews.Title: works with amazon prime - great picture - limited apps
Reviews.Author: BREA
Reviews.Content: I like this tv.  The picture is great, & having a cheaper option smart tv is great too.It has quite a few apps available - but it would be nice to have access to the google play store and ALL android apps - not just the few hundred samsung gives us.My kid loves the Angry Birds tv channel app.I love that I can access my amazon prime on it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this because of the Smarthub that would let me use it with Netflix and Amazon Prime, but the picture even using the Comcast digital adapter is very good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung rocks!!
Reviews.Author: Monster Junkie
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung products and this tv is no exception. I like the smart features especially when comparing it to my other samsung smart tv which is a 2011 model, this tv is much faster loading stuff

Reviews.Title: Good TV.
Reviews.Author: Claude St-Arnaud
Reviews.Content: This tv is simply amazing. You get all the connections you might need and the picture quality is very good. The sound quality is pretty good for the price. All in all a solid 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: I am happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: CHERI
Reviews.Content: I like it to watch netflix etc. I can see a great picture and now want to get key board for it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Walter B. Windus
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for a very reasonable price.  Glad I bought the SMART version.  Excellent picture and sound.  No problems with shipping.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: J. Decker
Reviews.Content: Out of the box the image needs to be adjusted so it's not so washed out but after that it looks great.  Only downside is that the screen shows a lot of glare from lights and windows.  I have not tried any of the "apps" since I use my boxes for those features.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Darren
Reviews.Content: This TV is wonderful. The picture quality is great, the remote is easy to use, the sound is VERY loud when you want it -- something some tvs really lack - and overall I'm quite happy with this.  I recently was in the market for a 2nd tv for another room and after researching the latest TVs and not feeling confident I would like them, I went ahead and bought a second one.The only minor complaint was that on the SMART TV applications, it seems like you can't get access to the very latest Samsung apps since maybe those are only available on the most recent tvs, but I could be wrong on this.  There are some apps that I think really could be added to improved experience like Flixster and Showtime Anytime (SHO) but I'm not sure if these are even available so may have nothing to do with Samsung.  There are a few Samsung-only apps that only work with Samsung devices (phones/tablets) that I wish I could use but since I don't have a Samsung phone/tablet I can't.  This just feels like I've been cheated but such is life.  Overall...this is a really nice TV and the pricing isn't bad.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but not very smart.
Reviews.Author: J. L. Ennis
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have said, once you adjust the settings this is a beautiful TV. AnyNet+ is nice because I can change the input to my PlayStation 3 with the TV remote, and it will change the input on my Onkyo receiver and turn the PS3 on, and let me control the PS3 with the TV remote. This is important because the Netflix app on this TV is terrible, so I have to use my PS3. The Netflix app constantly deactivates, and I have to log in again. I don't have this problem on any other device. The SmartHub as a whole doesn't feel very polished. Sometimes when I turn the TV on, and then try to start the SmartHub, it will say that's it's updating and to try again later. It will also display this little progress bar, which would be handy, except it disappears and I can't bring it back to see when the update will be done.It's also kind of annoying that the TV seems to want to default to TV/CD on my receiver. It would be nice to be able to change the default, since nothing is actually hooked to TV/CD at the moment (because it's not an HDMI port), so I just see static.

Reviews.Title: A great handy-size TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lufkin
Reviews.Content: This set replaces a 20-year-old, 200-lb, 19-inch CRT set that fit into a built-in cabinet. It was a perfect fit in the cabinet, easy to set up, excellent display, good sound and fair price. The Netflix interface is easy to understand and use, the WiFi reception is stable and sensitive. The color balance is less forgiving of poor TV news rostrum camera adjustment than the CRT set was, but the rock-solid HD display is much better overall. It works perfectly with our Direct TV satellite receiver and remote control. All in all, I'm 100% satisfied and can recommend this set without any reservation.

Reviews.Title: Just the right size
Reviews.Author: Terrie Kelley "gottaquilt2"
Reviews.Content: Moved into an overcrowded apartment. This TV is small/slim enough to not take up too much room, and large enough that it can be easily seen. We do not have cable/dish service and are only using the TV to watch YouTube, Netflix, and HuluPlus, and it works great for that.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Frances "FRAN"
Reviews.Content: This TV has the quality I expected; Good working smart T.V.  But it does not have a headphone jack.  This is bothering me when I watch movies between midnight and 3 a.m.  I should have read product description carefully.  So far, I am satisfied with this.

Reviews.Title: An amazing TV for the wireless generation
Reviews.Author: buru buru piggu
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smaller TV for my bedroom and bought this unit based on the positive reviews and my experience with the Samsung brand. This is my 3rd Samsung TV but first LED. I am thoroughly happy with my purchase.In the 5 years since I last purchased a TV, the technology has come such a long way! This TV is incredibly light and can be managed easily by 1 person. There are 8 screws to screw in to connect the pedestal. A minor complaint is that the base doesn't swivel, but it's light enough that the entire TV can be positioned at a different angle without much effort. A lot of attention went into the details, down to the low profile wall plug that has grip grooves. The bezel is very thin and almost non-existent. Best of all, the TV consumes very little energy. The sticker estimates $7/yr.The remote is well-designed and almost identical to my other Samsung remote. I do wish that the SmartTV button was bigger however as it's the one I use most. Also, the arrow buttons should've been made bigger and more prominent as that's the only way to navigate the menus. Setup was very easy and I didn't have any trouble at all connecting to my WiFi.The feature that I love the most is Amazon Prime. I had no problem getting it to work. After unboxing a TV or any device, I always update the firmware as soon as I'm connected to the internet. If you experience any issues, be sure to update the firmware. The TV shows a 4 digit code and all you have to do is go to Amazon's page to authorize the device. No login or password entry required on the TV. It took all of 2 minutes before I was watching a movie on my Prime membership. With the Smart TV, I don't need my Roku anymore. There are literally hundreds of apps and games you can download from the Google store so you are getting quite a lot of value from this unit. Some apps, for example, allow you to watch international content from Dish Networks and other cable providers (with a subscription).The web browser is also capable, although navigating with the remote control is a giant pain in the butt. I have a laptop and don't plan to use my TV for internet browsing, but recently my friends have taken to streaming in YouTube videos whenever we get together and this is a great way to enjoy internet content w/o having to hook up the laptop to the TV. Flash works, so no problems there. I tested a few video sites. I haven't tested with a mouse and keyboard to see if they work.All in all, I'm very happy with this TV and wholeheartedly recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Great picture.  Lousy sound.
Reviews.Author: DJP
Reviews.Content: Boots up fast and picture is great.  Internet funcrions are slow but work well.  Like so many other modern tv's, the speakers are terrible.  I am now running sound through my home theatre system and sound is greatly improved.

Reviews.Title: great tv but the smart tv is quite.. stupid
Reviews.Author: Richard B. Clarkson
Reviews.Content: After my inital excitement when I first bought the tv, it quickly hit me that samsungs development of apps for these last year model tvs is dying. Im just upset because I can honestly tell that its smart now but sooner than later,  the apps will become too dated to work! :( not to mention that I constantly log back into netflix. -_-

Reviews.Title: Can you feel the brightness?
Reviews.Author: oliver neal
Reviews.Content: The picture is very clear in the day and night. Lights on, lights out! There's nothing that can shake this amazing picture. If you love sports, then this One is for you.

Reviews.Title: Fast Delivery - Box Damaged - Smart HUB not working but read on for the FIX!
Reviews.Author: siouxzie
Reviews.Content: So it was delivered by Fedex I was not home they left a note and redelivered the next day which was great!Box was damaged, I took pics and checked the tv for damage but nothing so farset up was easy, plug n go, hdmi cable to tv to directv box and you are good to go.when you first switch it on tv will go through set up with you - change source to hdmi or however you are connected.So Smart Hub did not work, connection to internet was fine, home wifi worked well, after hours on the phone with my ISP and then samsung tech support they finally put me through to Remote Management Tech SupportTurns out most tv's bought though Amazon don't have the country code configured, after tech support accessed my tv and changed the country code to USA, it automatically did Smart Hub updates and then it worked. Problem solved.

Reviews.Title: 40-in flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: Rosanne Vancleve "Rosanne"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this, our 4th Samsung HDTV for our new seasonal home because we've been so pleased with the others.  Can't beat the price or the quality.  I do prefer the solid base on this model to the several legged model.  It's more solid and I think looks better.

Reviews.Title: Excelent TV to see movies and videos in HD
Reviews.Author: Cedeno Johanna "Leonardo Villarroel"
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent TV! It has an enlarged picture quality, many useful and practical functions! And besides, it is very advantageous to be able to connect to internet via wifi, and access multiple online applications, and even to watch movies and HD quality videos without having to use a Bluray player or any other device.

Reviews.Title: Good Smart TV, But Updates Often
Reviews.Author: Nikhil
Reviews.Content: This is the first SMART TV I've owned. We don't have cable and only watch Netflix, Hulu Plus and DVDs on our TV. We have another Samsung (non-SMART TV) and love it so figured we'd stick to what we knew. I bought this Samsung through Amazon's refurbished/damaged store because it was much cheaper and the description said the only thing wrong with it was the packaging it came in. The TV arrived, though, and actually had a small crack in the back of the unit. Amazon ended up knocking off even more $$$ so I was VERY happy. The TV was easy to hook up and get the SmartHub set up (less than an hour). I was able to start downloading apps like Netflix, Hulu Plus, Spotify and BBC News right away. The picture is very clear when watching DVDs or streaming from Netflix or Hulu Plus (especially compared to streaming over the Wii on our other TV). My only complaint is the interface of SmartHub is kind of annoying and they force you to download updates pretty often. We did have an issue with it the other day where it just shut off and then wouldn't turn back on but it only happened that once and we haven't had any other issues with it. For the price (remember, we bought it at a discount), I am more than happy with it. Hopefully they'll start adding more apps so we can browse more videos, but it's great for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300
Reviews.Author: 5string
Reviews.Content: Item was well packed. Easy to assemble and set up. TV's are just getting better all the time and this one is no exception.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Samara McDonald
Reviews.Content: We placed this in my 4 year olds room to replace an old CRT model that was going out.Now my 4 year old can watch Netflix, Amazon Prime and YouTube from his bedroom.Main complaint is that the remote doesn't have a QWERTY keypad, so you have to take extra time to move the cursor around while trying to spell out names to search in the various apps.We also get some connectivity issues between the built in wi-fi and our wireless router, but I'd bet that is more a function of having so many other devices fighting over the same resources at one time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV -- highly recommended
Reviews.Author: marybobvilla "marybobvilla"
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV -- excellent price -- excellent choice!! I wanted a smart TV for my bedroom and glad I purchased this one.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV Rocks!
Reviews.Author: granfran60
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 5 yr old Vizio, which I wall mounted. I waS able to eliminate the DVR player to stream movies, so this TV fir perfectly on the 12" wall shelf I built. Streams movies much faster with one click. Picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: drkstar82
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about a month ago and couldn't be happier. Only complaint was the first one sent to me was broken out of the box so I called up amazon and they had a new one to me the very next day. Great picture good sound. I play a lot of video games and watch a lot of movies and its been perfect for both those uses. I would recommend

Reviews.Title: Great TV and picture. Smart tv feature is awesome
Reviews.Author: Vince Phillips
Reviews.Content: Bright, easy to use, light weight. Has a good temperature and humidity rating range and is mounted outside under a covered screened in porch.

Reviews.Title: A good HD set for the money.  Not a great one, but a good one.
Reviews.Author: Alan Joseph
Reviews.Content: I chose 4 stars instead of 5 because it doesn't deserve 5 stars.  The picture quality is good, not great.  The brightness and sharpness fall off when viewed anywhere besides straight on.  Volume cannot be raised or lowered simply by holding the volume controls down.  It has to be individual adjusted (press, release, press, release).  Sound quality is fine.  For the money, it's a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Best tv and has everything
Reviews.Author: Kory Bawden
Reviews.Content: Great would recommend it to anyone bought for a gift and it was well recieved  would order again for sure

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: aZZo
Reviews.Content: TV and Picture look great! It works very well in our bedroom and with all the bells and whistles that come with it being a smart TV, my wife and I really enjoy it!  We also bought a wireless keyboard/track pad (Logitech Wireless Touch K400 Keyboard) to use with it  and it works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: easiest setup... Nice pix and apps works well.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Flo"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Samsung TV.. One just died after a short 4 years.... the other is a more high end version but surprise this one's set up and use is MUCH easier...  Getting the picture to the right color is a bit of a hit and miss.. NO instruction of any kind.. minimal paper instruction manual to show how to attach cords.  I found it strange they they provided a QRC code for you to scan w you smart phone in order to watch VIDEOS  for set up.. ? what would you do if you didn't' have a Smart phone ?  Updates were waiting as soon as I turned on the TV.. and within a hour all was current.Remote is exactly the same as for my other Samsung TV...So far.. Ok...  sounds is decent.. nothing special and limited options to adjust it .May have to add a sound bar to get some decent sounds out of it.This is a decent TV.. but you can tell what the left off  to reduce the price... but for me it is fine... works well in a family room setting.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Terry Frair
Reviews.Content: This television has met and exceeded all my expect ions.Very easy to set up. Perfect size for my room.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Sledman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an upgrade to an older 32" LCD TV in the bedroom. I originally wanted a 42" TV but could not find one in the $400 range that was from a reputable manufacturer. I also have a 55" Samsung in the family room and have been very happy with the picture quality and performance of that TV. It also has built in WIFI for updates and apps which is an added bonus.SIZE:Since I have the TV wall mounted I wanted an LED tv to keep the bulk and weight down. Also since we would be viewing this from 10 feet away I wanted a screen that was big enough to see easily and 32" was just a little to small. This 40" screen is perfect for my application and comes in almost 10lbs lighter then the 32" it replaced. Now although this is an LED tv, it is deeper then other LED models. It is my understanding that this has to do with the placement of the LED lights behind the screen opposed to on the sides of the screen. Not an issue for my application but others might want to take that into consideration.PICTURE:Out of the box the picture was terrible. You NEED to adjust the settings to get it looking great. Once you get things right it looks fantastic, truly stellar. The blacks are deep and dark, colors are vibrant and with an HD 1080 or 720 connection it is all you want a modern HD tv to look like, crisp and clear. Viewing it in a totally dark room I can say the blacks are truly black with very little if any light leak.SOUND:Surprisingly good sound quality for a flat screen. Not great by any means but better then others I've had. I found that setting the sound to enhance voices made a huge difference. The volume increments are very subtle. On my old TV level 10 was suitable at night to not wake my wife is she was sleeping. This TV you need to have on level 30 to hear clearly. 30 is actually not very loud on this unit, just mentally takes a little getting used to. There is also a noticeable nice bass tone to everything. Not room shaking or anything, but it's not the tin-ey tone I am used to on similar TV's. I'd say that compared to other TV's of this size and type that the sound quality is superior. For family room use you would probably want to get a sound bar or similar,especially if you have kids.APPS:*** UPDATE***After using the Netflix app more then expected I found one night that the Media Hub was reporting a network error upon loading. Although WIFI was working and I had a strong internet connection I could not launch Netflix, Hulu, Amazon etc. Some research online pointed out that in order to use any app the TV must first talk with Samsung's network servers. This sounds fine (although odd) however the servers have a tendency to fail often. When this happens you are unable to use most of the apps on the tv, particularly the streaming apps. Additionally the error message is very cryptic and suggests you check your WIFI and Internet connection (which I did several times), alas that wasn't the problem, it was Samsung's servers that were down. Keep this in mind if this will be your method of viewing online content. It completely ruined a planed Netflix night for me. Why you would need to "check in" with Samsung to use Netflix is beyond me, but it seems with this setup it is necessary. Because of this we will definitely be getting another AppleTV/Roku for the bedroom.One of the TV's selling point is Internet apps. I have experience with this on one of my blue ray players. I also have 2 Apple Tv devices. I can say the apps are excruciatingly slow to load. Moving between menus is painfully slow. To really take advantage of this you need some sort of keyboard as the remote is not the best interface when trying to type things in. I will give a few app reviews of the items that I would use the most.Netflix/Hulu:After setup which thankfully was quick, it works great. Shows take a little longer to load then on the AppleTV but acceptable. The interface for Netflix is lacking a lot, certainly not as robust as on the AppleTV but acceptable for my limited use (being this is in the bedroom). The picture quality was as great, no complaints.Web Browsing:Well, I didn't expect much. I have experience with seeing the web on tv and have never been impressed. This was slightly better then I expected, However.. Trying to surf the web using the remote was a painful frustrating experience. I wanted to pull up a few sites to see what it was like. The sites looked good, no issues there, just the interface is terrible. I don't blame Samsung for this, aside from including a keyboard there is not much they can do. This is the biggest issue with web surfing via TV. I think Samsung deserves credit for giving it a great effort but if your looking for a "Web TV" this is not it, and honestly I would recommend getting a tablet for that. There are some great tablets for under $200 (Google Nexus) that will give you a far better internet experience.Other Apps:There are apps for Twitter, Facebook and just about anything you can think of. Again, a TV is really not meant to be a computer replacement or even a tablet alternative. It's a great bonus feature that can come in handy but DO NOT buy this TV for those features thinking it will be amazing (in theory yes, reality no so much). You will be much happier (and save yourself lots of frustrating time) with a nice tablet.BUILD QUALITY:I must say, I love the looks of this TV. It has a very narrow bezel, surprisingly thin. There is no obnoxious labeling and the branding is subtle. There are no protruding buttons so when mounted on a wall it looks more like a picture frame then a TV. Very clean minimalist look. It is light weight (about 30lbs) and just looks fantastic. Plenty of ports on back and they are easy to read and use. Extremely happy about this. Pictures just don't do it justice, it's a beautiful unit. It comes with a very nice sturdy stand that requires a few screws to install (it comes with all the hardware for that).OVERALL:I am thrilled about this purchase. The size is perfect for my application. The picture quality is stellar and the sound is very good for built in speakers. The apps are a great add-on but I would not buy the TV for that. I do like that the TV is able to upgrade it's firmware via the internet, so any bug fixes or software upgrades are actually possible. I may buy another AppleTV for this unit just because of the interface and ability to stream from my iTunes library but that is a personal choice as Netflix and Hulu work great once you get them to load using the TV's Apps. Overall I highly recommend getting this TV for those who need a great 40" screen.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with it.
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for 3 months now, for the most part I'm really happy with it. It does everything that it was advertised to to pretty good.Had no problem connecting to my home network with the built-in WiFi, it streamed movies without skipping from both of my computers. I put movies on thumb drives and a external hard drives and it played them without a hitch either. The color look good to me.  Played around with some of the apps and they all work as advertised, even watched a couple of movies on Crackle. The only real drawbacks for me are the way the apps screen is. You can't delete the unwanted catagories that are on it and add your own. I don't need the kids section or the health section and wish i could get rid of them and add my own. It's a little slow at responding to the remote, but not unbearably slow. For me it was worth the moneyEDIT: Almost forgot, I also bought the Gigabyte GK-KM7580 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo Set from here to see if it would work with the tv, it does! Makes it a lot easier to enter text than by using the remote

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy!
Reviews.Author: William M. Smith, Jr. "Dr. Smith"
Reviews.Content: We use this system as a monitor for our Samsung Blu-Ray disc player. Set up was simple, with only minor adjustment to "darkness" for a perfect image. Well recommended.

Reviews.Title: Very poor manual.  Very poor customer support lines.
Reviews.Author: Richard C Martiny
Reviews.Content: The TV works good.  To use the Smart TV features is very hard.  I have been unable to get Samsung customer support or a good manual.  Have tried every lead they offer to reach them. Even the Samsung account sytem is tempermental.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: James Daniel Weddle
Reviews.Content: I was thoroughly  impressed by this Television.  I definitely would recommend this television to anyone that was in the market.

Reviews.Title: Please read!!!
Reviews.Author: JUDY NGUYEN
Reviews.Content: Love the product! Love the price!  Didn't like how they drop off my huge tv infront of the house. Someone could have steal it!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Phinehas
Reviews.Content: Best TV I have ever had. Great picture. Love that it can connect to my wi-fi and cuts out the need for a roku. Watched Iron Man 3 on this TV via amazon video's.And I've been playing Halo 4 on it. I've never had a screen this big and it's very cool how much more detail you get. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: leo
Reviews.Content: The internet oprtions are too hard to use with the samsung remote control (I have a LG tv Wi-fi built with a remote control that works like a mouse device), so navigate through the internet with that samsung remote control it's almost imposibble!!!Overall the tv it's pretty good but the internet options and fuctionality are poor!!

Reviews.Title: It's like a 46" Galaxy S4 !!!
Reviews.Author: Rubab Khan
Reviews.Content: I had very high expectation before the units arrived, but it easily met and beat all my expectations easily.First, the packaging was great. The usual TV box was put in a much lager brown box and packed very carefully and with a lot of protection. Not a scratch anywhere inside.Next, setting up was quick and easy. After connecting to the net, the TV took about half an hour to update everything, and I had to access most of teh features in Smart Hub one at a time to update everything, but that's okay. It is not much different than first time turning on a laptop or Smart phone.Then, it paired without any complaints with both my HTC one and my wife's S4 without any complaint. In fact, my friend brought over an iPhone just to see if Apple plays well with Samsung here, and it did! All you have to do is to search for "Samsung smart" in any app store for all the great free apps.Finally, cough up a few bucks for a  few extra apps, and your world will become perfect.Two more points -I don't really see why anyone would pay hundred bucks more for the slim design.
