This one has a classic design and goes well with any room.Although getting a wireless keyboard may seem like a good idea, since the on screen keyboard is annoying, you shouldn't bother about that if you have a smart phone.=====Verdict:Best smart TV and Best value. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV beat my expectations
Reviews.Author: KungPoo
Reviews.Content: I used the video settings given here and it does look nice. The sound actually is far better than my 40 inch panasonic i got a year ago. So no sound bar needed so that saved me 100 to 200 bucks.The web apps work nice so far and for the price I fully recommend this TV for like me a bedroom/guest/office. Not sure about a living room though.

Reviews.Title: My teenage Grandsons love it
Reviews.Author: Boomer "TP"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my college student grandsons. They love them. They spend hours playing games online with others.

Reviews.Title: Great picture at a great price.
Reviews.Author: sdm77
Reviews.Content: Great picture at a great price. I found the picture to be very crisp and the App Store is quite expansive, as well the ability to surf the net is cool but woul recommend a wireless keyboard if you plan to surf with the tv very often.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Royda Briceno
Reviews.Content: I love amazon's services when it come to electronics. The t.v sound , claritie and the images are amazing! This was a gift for my sister we love it so much that we will get one to our home.

Reviews.Title: OMG! best TV ever!
Reviews.Author: Cristina Fonseca
Reviews.Content: This has been the best thing I have bought and that I have in my apt! I'm soooooo glad I bought. Totally worth the money. You can see Netflix and Hulu plus if you have them, although for good quality you might need to have a good internet connection.Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: For the Price great TV
Reviews.Author: Leonievr
Reviews.Content: The settings do need some adjustments, (see other reviews for settings) Great picture and decent sound! overall very happy with this tv! The Amazon price Match was great! as the price dropped 1 week after i bought it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tommy R Mathis III
Reviews.Content: It exceeded my expectations thx for the chance to give a great revue of a great product and quality television .

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV. Died shortly after warranty ran out.
Reviews.Author: Rockwell
Reviews.Content: This was a wonderful TV. It doubled as an amazing gaming computer monitor. Amazon Prime and Netflix built-in were fabulous. It had perfect synergy with our Samsung Blu-Ray player where all the settings we automatically set and the picture was perfect when watching Blu-Rays. Couldn't be happier with this TV. All the inputs/outputs you could ask for, compact footprint, and LIGHT!Then, it broke. I went to Samsung's site to find a repair company and the closest ones were 70 miles away and 700 miles away. No joke, they suggested a repair shop 700 miles away to BRING my broken TV to. Also worth mentioning is how difficult it was to send the service request on their half-broken service request site.I was a big Samsung fan, but after this experience with terrible service, I won't be buying another Samsung TV.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying it
Reviews.Author: Maine3k2
Reviews.Content: This television is a great size for a bedroom or college dorm. I tested out a few of the applications available for installment and so far so good. I tested the youtube app and it plays all the videos unlike the android phones and tablets version of the youtube application which cannot play certain videos. The wifi connection is strong, so far I have noticed one small downfall which is that at certain volumes the speakers sound as if there is to much bass and that the speakers may blow. The picture is very clear and if you have one of those streaming programs (tversity) installed on your pc the wifi will pick it up and you can stream video, picturesand music directly onto your tv without the use ofa streaming device such as your xbox360 or ps3.Feel freeto reach out to me with any questions.feel

Reviews.Title: I read all reviews before buying this TV. Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Saad Shamsi
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before buying this TV and once I received it and started using it, I loved it! Very easy to use and operate. It has new and updated software and apps. If you are looking for specifics on this TV, read other reviews because they are very accurate and helpful.

Reviews.Title: lovin it
Reviews.Author: Alaskabudgirl
Reviews.Content: It is almost like watching movies at the theatre. The sound is great. I hear sounds in movies that I never heard begore. I watched all 300+ of my movies because they are all better on this tv. I would recommend buying this t to others. It dlivered right away and right to my front door. Its having a computer in your tv. I can surf the web on the tv because of the built in wifi feature.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV interface is slow with frequent streaming freezes - lousy video
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had previously owned two Samsung lcd TV's and was very happy with them - great picture.  So when it came time to replace one of them I chose the Samsung Smart TV.  The quality of the picture is terrible.  I setup up the tv with a Video Essentials dvd and the picture improved in terms of color however the image still remains too soft and the flesh tones are off.  The Smart TV isn't too smart and is very slow.  The home page has many fixed apps which cannot be removed.  I have had the set for two weeks and now the streaming frequently freezes.  The only way out of it is to exit the Smart TV interface and re-enter it with many remote control operations to get back to where you are.  Once this starts freezing it will keep freezing every few moments.  This is with a wired Ethernet connection on a gigabit lan.  All other devices on the lan keep working correctly while this is happening on the Smart TV so I know that it is not the lan connection.  My advice is stay away from this tv!

Reviews.Title: So happy I spent the little extra for this!
Reviews.Author: C. Miller
Reviews.Content: I was really hoping this turned out to be an excellent TV, especially since I'm on a tight budget and saved my money for one. We have really enjoyed this TV! The kids love it and can navigate easily themselves (9 & 5yrs). The apps are great, the sound is really good and picture quality is great. We spend more time watching shows and movies together than ever before, instead of running TV's in multiple rooms.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Renee Ligman
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  it has been wonderful.  Using it now for a bedroom tv and it is the perfect size and does what we need.  great apps, quick moving and reliable SOFAR!!  have since bought another Samsung due to being so happy with the smart tv apps and screen.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but poor handling by UPS
Reviews.Author: James Stevenson
Reviews.Content: When I first got this TV, I pulled it out of the box and the LED screen behind the glass was smashed to bits. I immediately packed it all back up and went on Amazon to return it. Amazon immediately shipped me a new TV, and UPS came to pick up the old one to send it back.  The second one was perfect, but the box was still a little beat up which had me worried. Just understand that it is a television, yet the people at UPS seem to throw it around just like any other package.  The TV has great picture quality, and the "smart TV" is actually not half bad. I run spotify, Hulu+ and Netflix off of it all the time.  Great purchase overall.

Reviews.Title: Worst TV I ever had and terrible Customer Service
Reviews.Author: GKT
Reviews.Content: I had given this product 5 star as it worked well for about 6 months. After 6 months of use I started seeing lots of vertical lines on screen irrespective of what channel, program I was watching. And was really annoying a just 6 months old TV perform like it, however worst part was yet to come. I contacted Samsung, told them about problem, they created a ticket and told me someone will contact me in 48 hrs. I waited patiently for 4 days and no calls from them. I reached out to them they said please wait for another couple of days and someone will call you. This time someone really called me after about a week or so, this guy asked me to send some details and photos of problem I was facing with my TV. I did that, post which he told me he has received the details, he will be ordering the parts to repair my TV and will get back to me in few days. I waited for quite some time to be precise a month, and when I inquired him when do he plan to come, no response. I then reached out to Samsung and to my dismay, they told me ticket has been closed as I did not send them TV for repair. That was some blatant lie as I still have text messages from this repair guy where he mentioned that he will call me once he receives the parts. Anyways they again created a ticket for my, it again took 2 weeks and multiple followups with them to finally find out who's in God's name will repair my TV. Now they are telling me to co-ordinate with this repair system to get it repaired. They also told me to pay for the Shipping cost to get it repaired. After all this I sometimes think was it worth the money i spent on this Sub-standard product? Answer is a BIG NO!! Last but not least Samsung you SUCK big time and your Customer Service the worst i have ever seen in my life.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: D. M. Edinger
Reviews.Content: So I finally replaced an aging 36' Panasonic tube circ 1999 with the 46' LED. I read all of the other reviews and was a bit hesitant on color and viewing angle but took the chance. Given the quality of my Samsung LCD I was confident in the brand.I have HD through DirecTV and the picture is excellent, if you don't have HD get it otherwise you will not get the best picture. I learned this the hard way on another set.Did a little playing around with the color settings as others suggested, this was very helpful and I tweaked it to my preferences. I found the auto light adjustment a annoying so I turned it off. Viewing at direct and side angles, no issues at all. Enough connections for HDMI but could have used 1 more component hookup as I still have an old DVD play and a WII, I'll need to get a BlueRay player at some point.Now for the smart features, after the inital load its works well. I use Amazon Prime and Netflix both work well. I have played with the youtube, I like the iPad/iPhone connection, its pretty cool. It is a little tedious entering text but is fine for my needs as  I don't plan on surfing the net on my TV. I have a dedicated line running to my router and have activated the wireless, both work well.Sound is the only disappointing feature on the TV itself. It works OK, not great. But seriously if you're purchasing a set like this I would expect that you would be connecting to a stereo or surround sound. If you just want a simple connection to a stereo you will need a 1/8 to RCA adapter to run the audio out. Cables I purchased one with the set along with an HDMI which plugged right into my DirecTv receiver.No issues with the set after 90 days. If something is going to go wrong it is usually in the first 30 so I didn't go for the warranty, although the square deal is much cheaper than those you purchased at retail.Finally don't worry about shipping. The set is securely packed by Samsung. Amazon adds another layer of a box and packing to keep it secure. I'm told UPS just about threw it on my porch, no issues when I opened the box.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Carlos Gomez
Reviews.Content: excellent product, high quality picture, good connection to the network and sound great at a fair price, recommended for the whole family

Reviews.Title: Sound is an issue
Reviews.Author: rahul rajagopalan
Reviews.Content: The postiveGood smart TV for the price...Excellent service by amazon. After being delivered 2 broken TV's by Luckydog Electronics on ebay, I was really happy to see a perfectly good TV being delivered by a web merchant.I like the TV for its clarity, functionality and off-course its smartness. For the price its a good smart TV.The negativeThe sound is really disappointing. Its not very clear at lower volumes.They should provide a better way to type, its really frustrating when you want to type something in the web applications.It doesn't come with a built in Camera for Skype. Only one brand fits the TV and its expensive.

Reviews.Title: Follow the settings others have posted
Reviews.Author: Judy Lyons
Reviews.Content: Just set up the 50 inch model.  Absolutely follow the "fine tuning" settings others have given - it makes such a huge difference.  Set up very easy once I figured I had to change the source from the preset source.  This is my 2nd Samsung.  Have loved the picture quality.  Looking forward to watching my Ravens on this tv!

Reviews.Title: On time and easy
Reviews.Author: keysspringer
Reviews.Content: Received the TV on time and with a little help from Directv I was up and running in no time.  Easy wi-fi connection along with adjustments to color/contrast, etc. I will be enjoying this TV for a very long time...

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Denise Clover
Reviews.Content: It works great!!!!!!!!  We have no problems with this tv whatsoever and was easy to set up.  We are enjoying it very much.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great, software is irritating
Reviews.Author: A. Monteith
Reviews.Content: Okay, when the TV works, its great - good picture, no problems with sound, energy efficient, etc. However, the software needs CONSTANT handholding when it comes to updates, and it frequently has problems running Netflix. The number of times this TV has claimed that my netflix account was "deactivated" (it wasn't) and insisted that I re-enter all of my info is staggering.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Low Price
Reviews.Author: Jason Wang
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. It has plenty of Apps which come in handy because we do not have cable, we only have netflix and hulu plus. The picture looks really good. Super lightweight and easy interface.Has 5GHz wifi band. Very good price and Amazon Prime is always a very nice plus.There are some things that are not great about it:120Hz CMR does not really make that much of a differenceVideos will freeze when watching very high quality 1080p youtube videos.After watching a couple of videos, the TV might start messing up (probably due to lack of ram) so you have to turn it off and on again. I wish it would always turn on to the smart tv screen.Speakers are actually really nice. Can't beat it for the price/quality level

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: saloumeh jazayeri
Reviews.Content: Light in image goes dark and light sometimes. While watching TV, it can get dark for no reason. Other than that it's nice, sleek, shiny frame and good stand. Easy setup with power.Setup internally is not very user friendly. I had to call costumer service to setup my online accounts because it deleted my information every time i turned the TV off. I had to update the software right away.Not a good setup with Comcast remotes (they have issues with this tv)other than that happy

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUT ...
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Matthews
Reviews.Content: I wish I could find a keyboard that would work with this TV. It's got internet but it's hard to navigate with the remote. I did get a keyboard but you have to plug in a usb thing and the TV's usb port doesn't fit standard usb devices. I've tried to get help from Samsung but they can't seem to understand my problem. I think I need some kind of adaptor, but they don't know what I'm talking about. Also the owner's manual doesn't even mention the TV's usb port. Why would it have a usb port and not mention it at all in the owner's manual? Very frustrating!

Reviews.Title: Excellent first HDTV
Reviews.Author: Echoleaf
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and it lives up to expectations in a big way.  The image is fine with one of the default profiles, I haven't felt the need to customize the settings.  I haven't noticed any leakage either.  I tested with a few bluray movies & hd documentaries and I can't believe the detail - clearly with an old tv I was living in the dark ages.The audio is better than a regular tv, I'm sure it would be better with a soundbar & subwoofer but it's acceptable.  Of course, since I graduated from a crap 28" tv, my expectations may be lower than yours.Netflix, Amazon & YouTube work extremely well with the built-in wifi is nice (the tv is 10ft from my router).  Pandora is a nice touch, though I don't see using it that often.The DLNA action is a BIG bonus - I installed the free version of Serviio on my pc and playing movies off the shared hard drive is a piece of cake.  It's a much, much better experience than the one on the Xbox.All in all, a great first hdtv, highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: A true Plug and play.
Reviews.Author: B. Onat
Reviews.Content: I have FIOS at home and installed this in my house upstairs where I did not have a cable (or cable box) connection. I just plugged in the power, setup the WIFI and I was connected to the internet. This "smart TV" has a FIOS app such that you can watch live TV over WIFI. No cables <other than power> necessary! I am also Amazon Prime member, so that app lets me watch movies. It is definitely worth the extra money to get a Smart TV if you are planning to buy a flat screen.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN50EH5300 50-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: VIRGINIA
Reviews.Content: 100% satisfied with my purchase I loved is A TV THE ATTENTION WAS EXCELLENT AND I RECOMMEND IT CAME FAST

Reviews.Title: All around good choice
Reviews.Author: marttim
Reviews.Content: I wanted a 32" for our bedroom.  And this TV was the best deal I found meeting my requirements, had to be 1080, and had to be a smart TV.  I feel this TV was the best bang for the buck!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Very functional and easy to use, can't beat it for the price, and size was just what we needed in the fitness room and the basement bar (bought two).

Reviews.Title: Full of win.
Reviews.Author: Ryan McCullough "medicatesleep"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great price, ok sound. all the SMART TV features you want for a great price. almost bought a Vizio instead but the electronics assistant at Costco talked me out of it and showed me it really is worth it to put a few bucks more down for Samsung or Panasonic because they are made well. He also said that the new Vizios are pretty on the outside but garbage on the inside. Says they get more returns from the new Vizo LEDs than any other brand.Anyway, don't want to spend the whole review bashing vizio. This is a great tv and I got it for a great price. i will need to invest in a sound bar because if you turn it up past 30 on the "movie" sound setting it sounds like the speakers are going to blow. Would have given it a 5 star rating if the speaker were better.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: Lila Bushaw
Reviews.Content: This has to be the easiest device ever to set up and use.  The price is reasonable and the movie service is great.

Reviews.Title: excellent smart tv
Reviews.Author: far
Reviews.Content: After researching smart tvs, this Samsung was the most for the best price. The CR review for this tv was spot on...excellent picture,wifi ready and smarter than I. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I can access Amazon Prime as well as Netflix right through the TV with an Internet connection. No other device is required. It works great. The picture is so clear. Delivered in perfect condition and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture and a crisp clean look.  The only shortfall is the smart TV functions. The DNLA function is a little sketchy.  My home network is fairly advanced, however the connection between my server and the TV is a bit dubious.  Both the TV and the server have IP reservations i.e. they have the same IP address all the time.  This has helped, however the shortcuts to recently watched programs is sometimes lost.

Reviews.Title: Great smart tv
Reviews.Author: Jxt024
Reviews.Content: Have had this tv for 3 weeks now and love it. Sharp picture and great smart tv function. Screen is a little small, but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: A very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Sinhaji
Reviews.Content: This is a recent purchase but seems to be very nice TV for the price. It has wireless setup and you can get Netflix and other connections. Picture quality is good too.

Reviews.Title: Simple All in One
Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: This TV is my first Smart TV but 4th Samsung. It is easy simple and all in one. That's all I need. The updates do take a while but I don't see any problems because the updates to the software are not that frequent. the TV works well with my Samsung Galaxy 4 and Tab.

Reviews.Title: Budget Smart- TV
Reviews.Author: Hari M.
Reviews.Content: Excellent Picture quality , good TV , worth for the price. But I can see flaws with it , typing on internet browser is very complicated, since its using pointer to move on the screen. Every time you need to use the remote to move the pointer on the screen, Audio is ok, not much impressed like Video.Audio - 6/10Video - 9.5/10Overall - 8/10

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Michael Mele
Reviews.Content: I am a huge fan of Samsung electronics and this TV is wonderful for a nice size smart TV for smaller rooms.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: dbluesband
Reviews.Content: Initial set up was quick and easy. I had to disable the ECO-mode setting as the picture on the TV kept dimming for no apparent reason. Fortunately the owners manual listed disabling the ECO-mode setting as a fix and it worked like a charm. I was able to get the wireless internet connection working in about 1 hour. This was due to the fact(as I discovered thru trial and error) that I needed to disable the "hide network" function on my wireless router. Just purchased the Logictech K400 wireless keyboard as recommended by other reviewers. Will see how easy that will integrate. Apparently something has to be enabled via remote to be able to use the wireless keyboard. All in all , excellent picture quality,sound and lots of features for the money. I would tell a friend to get one of these.UPDATE: YouTube application is experiencing video and audio freezing . Very disapointing. Will try upgrading firmware as reccommended in some onlie discussion groups. Should not have to do this w/ YouTube.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Alberto"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Picture and sound. The smart feature facilitates the use of apps like Netflix and Facebook. The Remote control is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV for my parents
Reviews.Author: R. Harmer
Reviews.Content: My parents need simple and functional and this TV does not disappoint.  It's bright, it's light, and the Smart functions are stellar.  We bought the Samsung camera (VG-STC3000) for the TV and used it for Skype and that was awesome experience for my parents.  One touch answer no matter if you are watching TV or listening to music.  We loaded the Skype, Pandora, and Amazon video applications and all of them worked flawlessly.  I'd consider it for my next TV for sure.  One oddity was the Skype bandwidth/wifi meter was pretty low on some calls and higher on others.  We couldn't figure out if it was their DSL connection or the Wireless connection.  We switched wireless routers to a dual-N 5ghz setup and had the same results.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 1080p LED TV is an engineering breakthrough!
Reviews.Author: Tommy Blake
Reviews.Content: When our 32" flat TV bit the dust, we began looking for a replacement unit. Our old TV served us well for many years as it set ona shelf on the wall across from our bed. We have a huge Samsung 1080p plasma TV over our fireplace in the den, and weredetermined to try to duplicate the excellent picture that this state-of-the-art set provided.We began our search on 'Amazon' and clicked on 'Samsung' TV sets. We had a limited space on the shelf over our bed so webegan by looking at models which fit the available. We were delighted to find that there was a 40" 1080p unit that would fit with lessthan an inch to spare. The "bad news" was that there were no plasma units available, only LED technology was used! We hadno idea that the LED process has now far surpassed the wonderful performance of the plasma method.Every single source we "Googled" (LED v. plasma) rated the LED process now produces by far the best picture available!For a few bucks more, we included the Amazon Basics High-Speed HDMI cable in our order. It replaced a huge bundle of wires.

Reviews.Title: Dead pixel.
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I pretty much like the t.v. except it has one dead pixel that bugs me. It just sits there and stays red. It really pops when a dark color appears where the pixel died.

Reviews.Title: First HD/Smart TV and it's awesome
Reviews.Author: A. Lau
Reviews.Content: After doing lots of research on the various TV's, I decided on this one, 50".There are lots of review's and settings for the TV and they are true.Mode: DynamicBacklight: 18Contrast: 85Brightness: 50Sharpness: 80Color: 70TInt: G/R 50/50With some minor adjustment depending on what is playing on the TV.The quality is great and I had no dead pixels.The setup took about 30 minutes.  A couple minutes to screw the base onto the TV and the rest of the time to do the initial setup, including updating the TV to include the default apps.It has the option to watch two shows at once and you can switch between the two for sound.I bought this TV as I wanted to watch my Amazon Prime shows on it.  Works fine, just need to place what I want to watch on my watch list on the computer so it isn't as much of a hassle to look for what I want to watch on the TV with the remote.Youtube videos are awesome on this TV and there's even a 3D option as well for videos that are 3D compatible; though I don't watch in 3D but it is good to know.I use the speakers on the TV and think the sound quality is great, though I can switch to surround sound on my speakers when I want to.I was thinking the other day if I could watch videos that I have stored on my external hard as there are USB's on the TV. So I plugged in my WD Elements 3 TB USB 2.0 Desktop External Hard Drive and it works!  I was a little worried as I read that there might be a problem with external's that are larger than 1TB.  This is great as I don't have to load a majority of my video's onto my laptop to connect to the TV via HDMI connection. I say a majority as some of the TV said it couldn't play the video due to it's format, although it had the same extension as others; might just be a encoding thing.  Plays ISO's as well.If you connect the TV to your laptop/computer via HDMI, you can also do a split screen so you can watch something on one screen (probably your TV) and still work on your project at the same time on your computer.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Miller
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase.  The picture quality is excellent.  It was easy to set up.  I would recommend this product to other buyers.

Reviews.Title: As good as it gets
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There is nothing I dislike about this item. I have had it for 3 weeks and every thing has been great.

Reviews.Title: excellent TV
Reviews.Author: JESUS VALDEZ
Reviews.Content: This Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black) in an excellent TV provides high quality images and has internet connectivity is very good I recommend

Reviews.Title: Blue Line and Slow
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture, sounds great, and looks great but....................The TV when in Smart TV mode seems very sluggish when going through the apps.  I actually think the ROKU devices that we have for our other TV's are more responsive when going through the options.....Also, Just over a month after owning this TV a vertical thin blue line appeared on the right side of my screen.  I sent a message to the seller and they quickly just told me to call Samsung no concern that the product broke just over a month after purchase.  Luckily Samsung has their 1 year warranty and after talking to them and finally getting them to believe there was indeed an issue they got a local repair company to fix it.  Currently the TV is in the shop hopefully it'll come back soon.  The guy said this is common with these luckily it happened now, just curious when the new one will decide to do the same.........

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: Uhhhhhh
Reviews.Content: I love almost everything about this TV! As other have mentioned, the settings will need to be changed to your preference. With all of the technology on this TV, you would think there would be auto picture adjustment. But hey, what do I know?

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: gramps
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV two weeks ago, and it performs pretty much as advertised.  I read the reviews on Amazon and agree with the general pros and cons:Pros:Great picture; sharp with true color.Easy set up.Good customer service, both phone and e-mail.Decent sound.Cons:When I couldn't find the apps, I called customer service.  Turned out that their servers were down.  The service rep told me to try again in a few hours.  Just a few minutes on hold and got the right answer.  Pretty good.  Apps were easy to install.When I couldn't stream from the web app, I wrote an e-mail and got a response in a day.  Streaming from the web app generally doesn't work.  The service rep told me that this problem is because Adobe doesn't support the flash player for the TV.  Seems lame for a "smart" TV.  Is the Samsung business plan to channel all streaming through the five standard services (Netflix, HuluPlus, etc.)?  I note that those apps cannot be deleted; others can.Since I can't stream any programs from the web browser, it's pretty much useless to me.  As many reviewers have noted, typing from the screen keyboard is painful.  Although I have a wireless keyboard, I haven't tried to hook it up since I won't be using the web app.Overall, this is a great TV in this price range.  I primarily use the "smart" part to stream from Netflix.  Although I stream Netflix from my laptop through through an HDMI to my dumb TV, the built-in feature is more convenient.  The cost differential to get the "smarts" is only around $50, which is worth the price.  My rating went down a star for the poor web browser.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: MATT FROTTEN
Reviews.Content: Completely happy with every aspect of this television, would recommend it to anyone. Great sound, visual quality is top notch. Really enjoying Netflix and Youtube directly on the television. Gaming has been much better. Haven't had a single problem, or seen it for less anywhere. No complaints once so ever.

Reviews.Title: love thisTV
Reviews.Author: penny massey
Reviews.Content: this was the best no brainier decision i have made in a long time  price was right and i can so fast... i just bought another one for my guest bedroon

Reviews.Title: beautiful TV with excellent quality
Reviews.Author: jamielynn
Reviews.Content: this is the deal of a lifetime my husband and I very much enjoy this television it's a smart TV you may not be able to imagine everything that comes with it its amazing. extremely happy 5 stars

Reviews.Title: love it really love it
Reviews.Author: Faheem
Reviews.Content: that's very good buy and its exactly the one that i wanted, it has built in WiFi that's great i love it , very clean and fast shipping , no damage no problem , i got a great deal , good sound , but i also bought a sound bar E450 that's work perfect , the good thing is that i do not need to put any cables in TV to watch net flex or HULLO  or YOUTUBE everything in it you just have to have internet WiFi ,

Reviews.Title: Great TV lots of nice features.
Reviews.Author: Randall Piplica
Reviews.Content: TV took a little bit of adjusting but is a great picture. Love being able to stream from my PC. If you have network storage NAS make sure it is compatible. Does not play WMV files works great on all other formats.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality
Reviews.Author: ianski31
Reviews.Content: I needed a new TV for my bedroom and having purchased other Samsung TV's and after reading the reviews went with the Samsung UN40EH5300 Smart TV.  It's easy to set up and use and the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Sara Denny
Reviews.Content: Super easy to set up. I really have no complaints. The reason I gave this 4 stars and not 5 is that when it went through to program the channels it picked up over 200 that do not exist, so then I did have to go back in there and use the "Clear Scrambled Channel" option under the menu button. It did take quite a while though to do the channel programming, and then of course about the same time to clear all the channels that should not have been there. Otherwise, it is a very good TV, and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Picture
Reviews.Author: D. Cullum
Reviews.Content: Using in our small RV in hopes to use our MiFi WiFi to get some minimal internet while out in the boonies.Would suggest downloading all the updates at home before hitting the road as it took quite a while to update the "Smart" part.Picture quality is outstanding and controls are easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV only if you are lucky enough to have one without any issue
Reviews.Author: Edward Farkas
Reviews.Content: This TV is really goo in terms of Picture Quality, clarity, contrast, colors etc. Don't have any complaints with this model. The problems i observed with this series of TV's are the same as experienced by other users and after few exchange of TV via samsung i observed that these issues are quality control related.....1. In first set i got dead pixels which were only visible from 6 to 10 inch of the screen, ofcourse no one watch from that closer but hey i paid for perfect condition brand new TV then why should i take one with defect. Best way to check dead pixel is to connect laptop, open browser in fullscreen by pressing F11 and then notice pixels closely throughout the screen by having background color as BLACK, WHITE, RED, BLUE and GREEN. reason of trying with all colors is sometimes these dead pixels only visible on specific color background2. After warrenty repair still dead pixels were there as instead of changing screen they replace the complete motherboard/circuit of the TV. No issues as i can again send it for repair under warranty :( and wait for 2 to 3 weeks to receive the repaired TV back with issue still exists. Don't lough its true'the repaired TV i got was now not having the dead pixel but one more defect.....Connect coaxial cable from your TV box to TV open any channel and go to the menu of TV under settings theres option called caption ON/OFF (Menu of the TV remote not the cable box) and then see the creen it will be filled with some special characters running on whole screen they looks like something which i can't even type but they are computer coding characters which won't allow you to have glimpse of picture you are intended to watch.one more defect :-( it was when you play Netflix it wont play any movie and keep displaying error message we are having trouble connecting please try again later untill you keep pressing OK button for at least 10 times.3. So here come's my replacement TV from Samsung with at least the dead pixel was not there as it was replacement not repair and also Netflix working fast (i compared using netflix on both TVs together in hand before returning older one) but still with Caption issue i told in step 2 above still existsAfter having so much trouble and wait time for TV and then headache to send TV by dropping to UPS as they don't do home repair for 32 inch TV, i decided to keep it with caption issue existing as it only happens while watching cable box and then too by using samsung TV's caption option. I can still use cable box caption option enable and watch everything perfectly.Overall this TV is best in its class in terms of features it provide, really cheap as compare to other brands,, Also Its the smart TV which support applications to watch VUDU or HULU or facebook etc. As i said in review heading TV is good if you are lucky enough to have one without these quality control related Samsung issues otherwise all the very best with Samsung warranty support.I went through this lengthy cycle/hassle as i just crossed the amazon return period before i discovered first issue in my TV and i ended up going through warranty.Samsung - If you are reading this, please improve your quality control methods before delivering the products to consumer. I know you are the largest LCD/LED panel manufacturer in the market and first in the market to introduce next generation panels for the TV. I also know dead pixels are common in TV's and most manufacturer even don't cover them under warranty until they are large enough in number to bother your watching experience. but I'll still suggest to have better customer feedback and quality product manufacturer brand in your bucket, you need to be little ahead in the mkt trends. why to deliver the panel to consumer if you know its faulty and just wait for the complain until customer discovers and if not then you saved small bucks as customer don't even know he has dead pixel.Buyers - Please check your screen Panel thoroughly within return period of Amazon to have screen without dead pixels. there are plenty of googled articles to explain how to check them easy enough.

Reviews.Title: great tv, great shipping, great price
Reviews.Author: Martha L. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I love that i ordered it on a sunday and had it at my house on tuesday.  Great picture, lots of extras and easy set up.

Reviews.Title: TV's great - arrived in perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I can't add much in terms of the TV's performance compared to the other reviews.  In terms of shipping, this was the largest/most fragile purchase I have made to date on Amazon (I bought the 40" version of the TV).  The package arrived with some slight damage to the outer box, but the box that the TV was in had zero damage.  I was pretty worried that I would have to deal with a damaged TV and the return process but it turned out great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome. TV is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Works lovely but my only complaint is that it does take a little while to execute commands and typing on it using the remote is tedious. Luckily there's an app for that on Google's play store so you can use your Smart Phone to control your TV over the internet. The remote works only on line of sight while a phone or tablet using the app is able to control it from any where. Picture is awesome. Deep blacks. Vivid colours. Comes with 1GB app storage but lets see you try and fill that up.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tv
Reviews.Author: pc6 "pc6"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't expecting to be as impressed by the tv as I am. It is light and easy to carry, easy to set up (hardest thing was attaching the stand), and has incredible picture. Really, stunning. The blacks are pitch black, the whites blaze. Color balance is good, and the picture is sharp. I've been going through my DVD collection to look for the movies that I think will have the most amazing cinematography so I can really enjoy the amazing picture.Netflix setup was ridiculously easy. Pandora setup pwas retty easy too.The sound isn't as great as I'd like, but that's not the tvs fault. I have it in an old tv armoire, and the rear facing speakers broadcast into a cave. Am thinking that getting some aux speakers will take care of that, no problem.

Reviews.Title: Ok for The money
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The TV is great for a low-priced smart TV. The "smart" part is worth having if you don't have a smart tv. However, the color and other tv functions are merely ok. Not great, but good

Reviews.Title: This TV is WOW!
Reviews.Author: Renee Cortright
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of bells and whistles with this tv.  It will take awhile to learn them all but it was reasonable and the size we needed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Frank J
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV 5/2/13 because I had to replace a busted TV. It arrived quickly and I immediately went about setup; which I found easy. The color and tint will always require fine tuning to suit ones eye but there are plenty of options to find what suits one best.Finding all of the controls is a bit fuzzy but the colored cube in the middle of the remote takes you to an array of controls to setup just about everything that are not included on the Menu button.The USB connections are easy to use; plug it in and the selection comes up. I tried a USB HDD but that didn't do too well but I believe that was because the external drive is old and doesn't work too well to begin with but it did come up to be used, occasionally. My Flash drive worked flawlessly.I have yet to try the internet connection because my router and other connections are too far away at this time but I’ll get to it eventually when I can afford more equipment. I have a 50” in the living room that does not have all of the options that this TV has. This TV is just for the bedroom.The picture is great and the sound is good enough for my use. The max will run you out of the room if you're not hard of hearing. If you want booming sounds connect an amplified speaker system.I'm not completely satisfied with the price but when you buy Smart devices the price smarts but the price was fair.My rating on a 1 to 10 is a 9.5 because it is almost completely operated by the remote. There is a button on the bottom right that allows selections but I found it annoying to use so DON'T LOSE OR DAMAGE THE REMOTE.I would recommend this TV for all buyers at this point.

Reviews.Title: Perfect tv perfect price
Reviews.Author: One Stop Central
Reviews.Content: easy set upclear pictureinternet readyawesome all aroundi would recommend for the pricesize is good for bed room

Reviews.Title: absolutely awesome.
Reviews.Author: L. JOURNELL "bULLETT"
Reviews.Content: got this to replace a 32' Vizio Smart Tv which i purchased from Amazon and returned it the next day...this Tv INSTANTLY found my Wifi, password put in and im surfing the web...awesome. set up was really simple and instructions were clear and precise...the 'smart hub' aspect of this tv is awesome and works great. it took about a hour to program all my apps...amazon, pandora, netflix, crackle, etc....but it was really easy. prob. best to have a laptop handy for this...the picture as it comes is OK...i looked at the first review here and used their guides and now it rocks....not sure of the sound, i use external speakers...the remote is OK...laid out well but not a fan of the layout but thats a personal preference...universal remote will be used.shipping and packaging was great.if anything should happen to change my review i will change it, but as it stands...i cannot recommend this tv enough. my first big boy tv and im glad i spent the extra money on a Samsung...the quality over the Vizio is without comparison, especially with the picture....this thing looks amazing.completely recommend, absolutely.p.s. dont try to adjust your tv setting whilst Nancy Grace is on...that lady has so many filters on you can never get it right.....lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product! Excellent Seller!
Reviews.Author: rupesh k nanjunda
Reviews.Content: Great product! Needs some tweaking before getting the best output. Google around to get different recommendations for the settings for high-quality picture/sound.Great Seller! Item arrived on time and matched the description provided. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart 32" TV - Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Rebekah Hills "Beka"
Reviews.Content: User Interface is great - very friendly, easy to navigate, love that all my accounts can be accessed from one place. The eco-mode realizes the room is dark and reduces screen brightness (awesome!) Very happy with this purchase. Would definitely use this brand again for future TV purchases.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love!
Reviews.Author: Kimmie Duong
Reviews.Content: This TV is even better than I expect. The shipping was fast. I'm watching so many things on this TV that I didn't know was possible. ^_^. The quality is nice and the sound is clear.

Reviews.Title: A Good Smart Tv For A Good Price
Reviews.Author: Bob Edelson "photo artist"
Reviews.Content: it was everything it was supposed to be...good picture & controls & wireless internet. And Samsung has great help line

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I bought this originally to just use as a monitor. Well, with the purchase of a $40 Trek antenna, I'm using it for more then just that.This TV has an AWEsome  picture, It's so clear. If you look at the reviews, you can see the best way to set-up the picture quality for these TV's by Samsung. Some guy, who seems to know his stuff, gave step by step information on best picture quality,http://www.amazon.com/Samsung-UN40EH5300-40-Inch-1080p-120Hz/product-reviews/B0074FGR74/ref=dp_top_cm_cr_acr_txt?ie=UTF8&showViewpoints;=1He should be the first review, He got these stats from another guy on Amazon, but I don't know his link.Some people say the sound is ho hum, I don't think it sounds bad at all, It's not a stereo system, it's a tv, If you want true stereo sound, just buy a Soundbar for it.As far as a Smart TV. It took forever to update, I was getting frustrated with it, Once done, I cooled off. hehe. As far as navigating is concerned, it's not much different then your smart phone or using your laptop I guess. I'm not a tech nerd, so, I'm not going to try to act like one. I will use the browser and type in what I want to see, other then use all the apps, I don't really care about the apps at all to tell you the truth.The only thing that puzzles me, and if you know how to do this. PLEASE let me know, When I use my wireless keyboard, the virtual keyboard keep showing up on screen, How do you disable this thing, I'm sick of seeing it. And using this TV without a wireless keyboard will send you over the edge. Trust me, don't buy this UNLESS, you plan on buying the wireless. Using a remote and going letter by letter, number by number will drive you insane, and you'll send it back. )The TV. looks good, the picture quality is perfect. and for the price, well. honestly, I don't think your going to get much better.Just make sure you click below where it says,  ?New, ? Refurbished. because the price was much cheaper then shown above, at least for me. It was a $32 difference.If you choose free shipping, make sure you have a few weeks to get this tv. if not, then you will have to pay for shipping to get it sooner.

Reviews.Title: Coolest TV ever!
Reviews.Author: DTMP
Reviews.Content: This is the coolest T.V ever! The screen fits perfectly in the room and make the room look bigger! The features are remarkable and it came in a short amount of time. Another great product!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV King and Smart
Reviews.Author: EJM "EJM"
Reviews.Content: Giving this five stars because its awesome- the big (king size) is exactly what I need- the size fits perfectly in our living room- the black color is very neutral and doesn't get dirty-  smart technology is good, we don't use it as much because of apple tv- having the wifi is a really great nice to have- looks very promising as far as reliability is concern- style is very simple and great- does the job 100%- this one is the tv! the best in its size and price range

Reviews.Title: Sleek & Functional - Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Peter F Lobravico
Reviews.Content: I mounted my Samsung Smart TV on my bedroom wall and had it up and running within minutes. All you need to do is plug it into a power outlet and you're ready to go. It already has all the most popular apps embedded in it (i.e. Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, Vudu, HBO Go, ESPN, MLB) and there are dozens more available for download. It literally took me two minutes to get the TV setup on my home wireless LAN network and I was able to immediately start streaming movies and TV shows. The picture and sound were already at ideal levels for me so I didn't need to spend hours tinkering around. I highly recommend this TV as it certainly  meets the high standards that Samsung has set for their products. After buying and using this 32" for my bedroom I'm now planning to buy a larger one for my living room.

Reviews.Title: love smart tv's
Reviews.Author: shelbyv
Reviews.Content: this thing is absolutely awesome after only having a tube, sound is great, picture quality is amazing, and love the smart hub!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but it could be smarter
Reviews.Author: W. F. Borman "Former Web Editor, SW Indiana P...
Reviews.Content: I hardly watch TV at all. Mostly the 5-o'clock news, and that's it. But I like to watch DVD movies that these days are mostly in wide-screen format and don't show up well on an old 27" analog set. So I went looking for a 32" LCD TV. After considering all the options and prices, combined with valuable reviews by users, I settled on this Samsung TV. I noticed that it referred to itself as being "smart," but not knowing what that meant just wrote it off as marketing hype. After ordering the set I realized that it would be WiFi capable, and it intrigued me to realize that I was getting a built-in computer as well. Not that I needed that, but you never know...The set arrived promptly on the scheduled date. Setup was easy and after plugging in the power and connecting the cable it played just fine. The picture was maybe not as great as I had expected, but much better than my old set.Later that evening I set out to explore the new toy. I had already programmed the available channels (20-30 minutes) and started looking for the weather channel. It came back with an error message: scrambled channel. Huh? Most other channels did not work either.I called the WOW! Cable help people at 10 pm. I promptly got an assistant, but after trying all kinds of suggestions, nothing worked. Took 2 aspirins and called back in the morning. Same scenario, so I was scheduled for a visit by a technician. I was worried that the set had a bad tuner and would have to be returned, although Amazoin would have made that as easy as possible.The technician showed up on time and walked in the door with a plasticized card with cable numbers in his hand. He knew the problem before he arrived: changing from the old analog TV with a cable D/A converter to a direct cable connection resulted in different cable numbers! Problem solved. While he was there, the technician checked my connections and that was that.Now the picture quality was true digital HD and absolutely marvelous. Beyond my best expectations.So why the 4 stars? In short, because of the limited features of the remote control that make using the Internet features of the set a torture.After familiarizing myself with the set, I connected it to my old Netgear 802.11g type router. I had been using the older WEP security protocol - good enough for my purpose. Its problem is that it uses a long string of hexadecimal numbers, based on a pass phrase that the router understands, but none of the peripherals do, Entering all those letters and numbers from an on-screen keyboard, without errors, using the TV's remote control was torture. I finally got it to work. After touching the "Smart" button, a screen popped up with all sorts of Apps useful in the TV context, such as Netflix. Getting around on it with the minimal remote controls is painful. One helpful hint: you can connect a keyboard and mouse to USB ports that are hidden behind the right-hand rim of the screen, helpful with the Browser App.The set comes with the usual minimal printed manual, and refers you to the electronic e-manual for more instructions. It is helpful, if you can find what you need. It has an index that you access by pressing the 'D' function key on the remote. Than you can scroll through the alphabet and hope to find what you need. I finally downloaded the manual as a pdf from the support section of the Samsung Web site.In summary: great TV set, useful WiFi connectabiliy to download movies or so, but forget using the browser for email or such.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly
Reviews.Author: Heisenburg
Reviews.Content: Have been using this TV since last 6 months. I read extensive review of the item before purchasing it. So far it has been perfect. The only thing that I wish could be improved was the UI which is a bit clunky esp. when you want to type something in your browser. But since I have the Samsung Galaxy S3, the All Play Android app has been extremely useful to input the text in the browser URL. But before purchasing I knew this drawback and hence still giving it a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous picture at a good price
Reviews.Author: Mary Miller
Reviews.Content: I needed to upgrade my 26" TV for HD and to get two HDMI ports.  This slightly larger screen fit into my credenza with room to spare.  This TV offers a  nice combination of features at a reasonable price and should adapt to changing video offers for the next few years (I had my Sony for LCD for eight years).  I am not one to constantly get the latest as long as something works well and serves my needs.  But a lot has changed in 8 years, and I need to get more connectivity.  I have been using the TV for two weeks and have no issues.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: A. HECKMAN
Reviews.Content: Set-up was easy. Picture is great. Don't much care for the "smart screen" with all the pre-configured icons, but I imagine I could change that if I really want to. Since I never use any of the apps other than Netflix, it's not a screen I access often. Wi-fi is really nice...no more Roku box. Sound is good. Menus are easy to understand and settings are easy to adjust. I think it's a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: Carrie08
Reviews.Content: Quality is superb and it was a very easy setup without any trouble. It's also very handy for USB usage and that was a plus since my fiancé and I watch a lot of shows from our portable media devices. I additionally like the auto adjust of brightness feature at night because it allows me to enjoy television without an excess of brightness when I'm tired. The Smart TV apps are enjoyable and makes it easy to link your accounts like MLB TV or premium music/movie subscription services. All in all, I couldn't imagine getting any other brand because I have all been impressed by Samsung electronics and this television purchase is not something I will regret buying!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: G. Michel
Reviews.Content: Samsung is the only TV (and cell phone) I will buy. Easy setup. Once you learn how to work one, the next time you buy one they are virtually the same product as far as volume, picture, child block, etc.Excellent TV for the money. Just be sure to get a wireless keyboard and mouse so when you use NetFlix, FaceBook or Amazon you don't have to use the remote to "type".

Reviews.Title: Streaming Problem
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: I ended up returning this to Amazon because it had a problem with the streaming. The auto was not in sync when using WiFi, and the color was odd even though I adjusted it. I'm going to miss this TV though! I just wish it worked better. I'm going to save for a plasma.Edit: I forgot to clear my Netflix account off this device before returning it and they started using it. I think I got them signed out now, but before returning anything to Amazon be sure you don't have any account info on it. I contacted Amazon after I sent it out and they assured me they would clear it off, but they didn't. They resold it with the information on the TV.

Reviews.Title: 5 for the picture, 1 for the web experience
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Absolutely great picture for this size TV (and I have a gorgeous 50" Pioneer Elite downstairs, so I do want something nice).  What I really don't like is the internet access/web browsing experience. We have another tv that has a remote with a pointer which is soooo much easier rather than holding down the "enter" button until the pointer gets to the letter you want to select. Then God forbid, you select the wrong button and exit and you're back at square one. I just don't like the internet experience on this tv.But overall the setup was a breeze, anyone can do it.  The picture out of the box was great (I'm sure someone with more technical skills could make it better, but it's good enough for a bedroom tv), sound is totally fine.  I love the TV for every day viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, smart hub okay
Reviews.Author: Chris I
Reviews.Content: Very good picture and good sound. The initial Smart Hub/internet connection setup is quite easy, probably 15 minutes, you must navigate an on-screen keyboard using the remote control for the setup. The usual input is required: date, time, router password, etc. Connection speed thru the hub to establish a stable, wireless link is often slow, 10-20 seconds, not as fast as the typical laptop takes to log on to the internet. Once connected, streaming is quite good with our cable internet provider, maybe a few pauses during a full length movie. I think there can be multiple reasons for an intermittent wireless link, and wireless download speed can be quite variable depending on traffic, so I can't fault the TV for the pauses. We've been using the TV since Christmas 2012, and so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy at an excellent price!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Marsh
Reviews.Content: Great reception on TV, when I took the advice of one of the reviews on how to set the picture settings. I also took the advice of one of the reviews to buy a Logitech keyboard to work the web browse! Believe me when I say that it is much to tedious to use the remote that comes with the tv!!! I'm still just learning all the great apps that come witn it! Between the excellent quality of the tv reception,  web browseing and huge selection of helpful and enjoyable apps, this is an excellent buy at $599 dollars! !!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price!
Reviews.Author: Maximus
Reviews.Content: The new models are coming out in the next month or so, that made this tv a great bargain for the bedroom!  We're using it in the living room now, cuz the main room tv died on us a few weeks ago.  This is a 40 inch, smart tv.  The key here is 120 hz.  Make sure you get minimum 120 hz to avoid the motion blur.  The picture quality is fantastic to excellent.  The sound quality is not that good, but it was my understanding that that is the standard for these flat panel tvs.  I've got it hooked up to my receiver for the home theater blu ray experience anyways.  My first smart tv, we're still exploring this new area of tv land.  Internet on the tv, streaming video works great!  I was afraid that there would be problems here, as my broadband dsl service is pretty slow, but the streaming video has worked great, no delays.  The only delays we've seen is youtube.  That's stop and go to the point of being unwatchable with some videos--the lower quality videos are fine, the higher quality videos are stop and go unwatchable.Just two cons:  1, At first, the tv would periodically dim and get really dark.  I read the troubleshooting, and found this was the Eco Sensor, the tv automatically adjusts to the lighting in the room.  It didn't seem to work too well, and got annoying.  I turned off the feature and now the picture is perfect 24/7.  2.  The other thing I would mention--it's too small for the main tv.  It will be moving to the bedroom when we purchase a larger version 2013 model for the main room.Great tv for the price!

Reviews.Title: Good tv for money
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for the price point. I looked for over a year for a smart tv that was 40 inches and under $500. Smart tv apps and Internet work great. Picture and colors of the tv look very authentic. My only issue with the tv and it is pretty minor is that the sound on it isn't great. I'm in a small apartment so it doesn't bother me too much but in a larger room you may need to invest in some larger speakers.Also, if you have an iPhone download the samsung tv remote app. Communicates with tv wirelessly so you can change channel and volume from another room without having to point remote phone directly at tv. Pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: Great TV once you adjust the picture settings
Reviews.Author: Carls Jr.
Reviews.Content: The settings can be found in a ton of other reviews.  I think this TV is great and the internet connectivity is pretty slick.  I connected the TV, it updated its software and the smart hub software right away. Menus are easy to understand and there are a lot of settings.  This TV is BRIGHT! The Youtube app works pretty well, my wife was impressed with the continuous play of all the videos of our daughter.My only gripes are A) mine did NOT come with a remote with a keyboard like the larger screen sizes does and B) THE ANDROID REMOTE APP IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH SAMSUNG'S CURRENT FLAGSHIP PHONE THE GALAXY S3.  I hope they update this soon. The app on my tablet works pretty well.  Set up was easy and linked right away.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: HelpMeHelpU
Reviews.Content: This is the first HDTV we have purchased and it replaces a 20+ year-old 19" Toshiba, so perhaps the bar wasn't too high.  But so far we are very pleased with the purchase from Amazon.  We bought it a few weeks ago and it was delivered promptly.  We shopped around some and found Amazon to be the most competitive on pricing.  (For reasons that still baffle me, the price of this unit seemed to fluctuate rapidly between $399 and $499, even on Amazon and within the same day.  We were fortunate to pay $399, but of course it's lower still now.)The TV was relatively easy to set up and get operating, including connecting it to our in-home wireless network.  This is even more gratifying because I am anything but a "cable guy."The picture is very pleasing, especially when displaying real HD content.  It really makes a difference compared with a non-HD TV (I suppose this is probably self-evident, but it's still impressive).Some of the challenges we have encountered include selecting the proper screen size in the software/setting of the TV.  It appears correct for some things and incorrect for others and it's not clear why for either.The reason the TV did not receive five stars has to do with the incredibly kludgy navigation within the TV.  Boy-O-boy has Apple spoiled us with user-friendly, intuitive, fast navigation.  This TV requires navigating with a large selection of letters and selecting each with the remote.  It feels very 1980s-ish (or before!).Also, Samsung's idea of "apps" leaves much to be desired and it remains to be seen whether this SMART TV is really smart at all.  The apps load slowly and it's unclear whether they do very much.  Samsung claims to have nearly 900 or so apps, but I'm not sure any are very useful.We also connected an Apple TV to the set, which was pretty simple, and its navigation is far superior and faster than the SMART TV navigation.All in all, so far very happy with our first foray into HDTV land.

Reviews.Title: surprise
Reviews.Author: googola
Reviews.Content: Such a deal. I never thought that this would  both work and look like new.  Terrific in every which way.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Vivas
Reviews.Content: Very nice product handled with care very quick answer from vendor, recommended 100%, product left at final destination in the stimated time.

Reviews.Title: Consider it only if your place has good wi-fi...
Reviews.Author: JANARDHAN
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried to buy this online.. but it is great ..The picture quality and sound everything seems amazing..Good things about it are..good number of HDMI ports.. and picture quality is excellent.I did not like the smart apps as it just tests your patience..to open.. and when watching something on Youtube.. all of a sudden it hangs.. and doesn't buffer any more.. so you need to go and stream it again..If you have good bandwidth for internet..go for it.. otherwise normal LED TV with USB ports is good.. connect your laptop to it and watch it without any disturbance..You can stream videos from you Iphone to Youtube by Pairing devices.. the feature is good.. but does not work that great if you do not have good wi-fi support..Overall I like it.. and yes for the same amount I was getting a normal LED TV.. so preferred to get a smart TV.Worth to take it for the amount it has..The TV as such has good apps and features.. you need to blame the ISP.. for poor streaming.. :)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Colorado Lefty
Reviews.Content: Samsung's LED tvs have always scored big in my book with quality and reliability. This one impressed as well, especially with the online capability to stream Netflix or Amazon without a seperate dvd unit.  The picture and sound are vivid and didn't require any special adjusments after purchase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46EH5300 46-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Joseph Kinsman
Reviews.Content: This product is no less than awesome.  I have no complaints and am very impressed with the color and true black.  The only issue would be the screen reflecting room light; if you let the sun in it will reflect pretty badly.  You can only notice when the screen is dark so it isn't that bad for some, but me I prefer the non reflective screens.The wifi rocks and I can easily use the built in apps as well as load my personal ones.Awesome LED for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Robert M Bestani
Reviews.Content: The product itself is excellent and exactly as advertised. I remain very pleased and am now a convert to using the net for similar purchases. No wonder Best Buy is going under!

Reviews.Title: Best Smart TV in size class
Reviews.Author: RDR
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV a little over a month ago for the bedroom. One of the main reasons for selecting this one was on/off timer, there are not alot of TVs with this feature. Your able to have to TV turn on at a preset time tuned to a desired channel and volume. You can actually have multiple on/off settings. Picture and sound quality are good, maybe not the best out there. There are a good selection of apps, Netfilx works well. The only disappointing thing is when streaming videos from a media server you cannot fastforward. But all in all a very good Smart TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: ajj
Reviews.Content: The tv works very well so for, had it for about two months. It fits perfectly in our entertainment center. We only have about  37"  so this was as large as we could go. Not having to pay taxes on the tv was a big plus also.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV but sound could be better.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "rickenb900"
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for a couple of months now. We like the TV and it's features, but one area of improvement is the sound quality.  I purchased external speakers and connected them to the analog speaker output on the back of the TV.  This improved the sound quality greatly, but I discovered that the volume can't be controlled from the TV when using the external speaker jack.  I just confirmed this with Samsung support.

Reviews.Title: I use it as a Monitor but wi-fi...
Reviews.Author: Bianca
Reviews.Content: This TV is very nice, actually I use it only as a monitor since I dont watch TV, so I wanted a big monitor and the thing that it had wi-fi in it was a nice thing. I packed away my linksys router and I had all, a monitor and a wifi router in one place. After a month, the wi-fi simply stop working. My laptop is right next to the TV and the signal is being transmited intermitently, and even when the laptop finds the signal and tries to connect there is an error and the connection cannot be established.I tried with 5 other laptops, with two samsung galaxy phones and with 2 iphones and with all the same issue.Disabled the network, ereased all config, even reseted the TV and still the wi-fi is "KAPUT".About is being used as a monitor, is really nice.Just used an hdmi cable, chosen the correct source in the remote control and voila, you have a huge monitor that works like a charm with all games, windows etc.Samsung is always one step beyond in image tech since they are the creators of the lcd panels and it has all the necessary inputs you may need, also to attach external hard drives, thing you will not get if you buy a Philips, Lg,or any of those second class brands.My mother has an LG and I cannot see the subtitles of movies in SRT format for example and it can read only avi files, my sis has a philips 2012 and that tv wont even recognize the movies inside a pen drive.This one recognizes everything,the only problem is the wi-fi which is crap.

Reviews.Title: TV Delight
Reviews.Author: David B. Lovelace "Gabby"
Reviews.Content: Probably the easiest TV to set up that I've ever had. It connected to the internet and updated itself with little effort on my part. It quickly learned the channels available to me. The picture is crisp and beautiful. We love it!

Reviews.Title: WOW samsung 40" smart tv
Reviews.Author: Martin Faucher
Reviews.Content: I can barely believe how beautiful and truly amazing this product is!!Nobody that buys this will be disappointed after seeing its picture quality and discovering its capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture, Great Price, Came with Some Quirks Though....
Reviews.Author: Lightbringer
Reviews.Content: Great picture on this tv - using in a 3 season room equipped with natural gas wall furnace to turn into a year-round heated room.A little disappointed in the lack of RCA Audio output - I can use the optical out, but it limits the equipment I can hook up to it for better sound quality (As the sound quality out of the built in speakers is rather terrible at higher volumes - external speakers are a must if there is any loud ambient noise in your viewing area.)  Not a major gripe, just a minor annoyance (and something I could have avoided having carefully read the specs on the TV - I guess I just overlooked it upon purchase).  Another annoyance is that every now and then, the tv just randomly turns itself OFF.... yes... OFF.  It turns back on immediately with about a 2 second delay between picture displays, and only happens about every other use - maybe two instances each time when it chooses to occur.For a TV that gets used 4 days a week for only an hour or two each time, it's got its quirks, but the SmartTV Features are pretty nice, and VERY easy to use - well thought out for sure, the firmware updates are quick (though, I have fiber optic 25/25 Mbps net service here - so that probably helps too) and I haven't had any issue streaming netflix or pandora.  I can't speak to the quality of other applications on the TV at this time, as I do not use them.The picture is overall pretty good - I've noticed a few minor issues with image blur in fast scenes, but this might be a function of the tv being at a slightly different than ambient temperature, or the feed signal itself, I don't know - It's not usually an issue, and is never lasting.I've played PS3 on it, and that seems to work just fine.All in all, I picked this up as a black friday deal from Amazon - The TV arrived quickly courtesy of Amazon Prime (Great deal folks - I suggest checking out their trial/student memberships if you qualify) and in good condition.  I can't believe how light it is... so if weight is a concern - this TV is very lightweight, low profile, and easy to move around if needed.For the price I paid - I guess I can't complain too much - It serves its purpose, but has its drawbacks.  If you want a GREAT TV - this one's probably not the one for you.  If you want a GOOD TV with a lot of capabilities that's not going to be your daily viewer - this one fits the ticket.

Reviews.Title: Everything we expected.
Reviews.Author: kdb
Reviews.Content: Sharp clear picture and desired sufficient audio (we did not want a loud TV in open living room). Only wanted smart TV at good price and this one delivers. We also wanted easy wireless and combined it with Apple TV, which we also love.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: We have the 46 inch verson of this product and we ordered this for our daughter and she loves it. In fact that is all we have in our house is Samsung TV's. This has great picture quality, sound is good enough for a bedroom.The price was not bad either for a smart TV compared to some of them out there.Would recommend that you buy one if you are looking for a Smart TV, and would also recommed buy from Amazon because of the price and fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Morales
Reviews.Content: I'm not really into the pixel counts or how the LEDs are set up, but I am into using the connectivity features of the TV, and that is working awesome. I use the TV to stream movies from my NAS drive and from online services. I also have a Samsung phone and can easily connect the TV to the phone to stream from there. The TV can even turn itself into a wifi hotspot if you happen to have it hooked up via wire. Very cool TV, perfect for a small apartment or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Smokestack
Reviews.Content: I am a man of few words and the following expresses my opinion -TV met my expectations in every way.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is great!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Brazel
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, great picture and sound, easy connection to all of our peripherals. Look forward to hours of enjoyment!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 42 inch LED Smart tv
Reviews.Author: Isma
Reviews.Content: It's true that Samsung is on the right track with the right idea for the next generation of smart TV's however they still have a long to go to make this product better.They user interface for this TV isn't so friendly, Special with things like Netflix and Wireless keyboard compatability. Netflix application does not support wireless keyboard and it is very time consuming to type using the TV remote and the layout of the Netflix is very poorly designed. Actually the wireless keyboard only works on youtube and the browser.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV!
Reviews.Author: Eilan
Reviews.Content: I researched a lot about tvs before buying this one. Samsung of course is an amazing brand and their products are of quality, most of the time you won't be wrong buying a Samsong TV. It's my first smart tv and I am very happy about it, I wasn't sure at the beginning... I don't watch much TV, I don't even have an antenna. I don't like tv schedules and most of the tv shows...I know, I'm weird! I prefer to be able to select the movies and the shows I want to watch... But I want to watch them in very good quality. I have to say that this tv allows me to do that for a very competitive price!The video quality is very very good. Don't get scared about the 60Hz thing, your eye will never see the difference... I don't know maybe video games players should care about it, but for normal tv products this tv is really good. It is very simple to set too. It has some audio profiles you can choose from, as well as video profiles.The audio is ok, as all the flat TV the speakers are on the rear so the quality is not THE best. But all the TVs has this problems so this is not a downside of this model in particular. If you care about audio quality I suggest to buy speakers to connect to the tv. I have a small living room so I am happy with the built in speakers (and for now I don't have money for a new set of speakers).The smart hub installed in the tv has netflix, amazon instant video, hulu, pandora and many other applications already built in, you just need to log in with your account. It also has a web browser, it is a little slow and the writing and selecting link with the tv remote control is a bit of a pain... but it's not like you are going to use it all of the times... you can also set your smartphone or tablet as a remote control so that typing will be easier.From Samsung you can download the all share application to your windows computer and it will wirelessly share photo, audio and video from the shared folder of your computer to the tv! It is really convenient! If you are a mac user you should check for Serviio software, I use it and it works smoothly.It have 2 usb slots on the side, one of them is auto powered so you can easily plug and external drive with the conents you want to watch on tv. More slots on the back panels. It also has a normal audio-in jack connector if you want to connect your ipod or if your computer doesn't has an HDMI port with audio. Be careful that the audio-in connector works with only one specific HDMI port, you'll finde the scheme of the connections in the user manual.If you are not looking for a giant screen but you want a good quality tv for a competitive price I really suggest you to buy this one. It has everything you might need for a very good quality!

Reviews.Title: I Sell This TV - Good Picture, but Caveat Emptor
Reviews.Author: RNW7
Reviews.Content: First, I work for a reseller that carries these TV's as part of their product line.  I was in the market for a TV that I could use in our basement exercise area that could share the satellite signal with the DVR in our family room via a splitter.  The TV needed to be 1080P resolution to match that of the family room TV (splitter signals always default to the lowest connected TV resolution).  After reviewing alternatives, the Samsung UN32EH5300 looked to offer the most bang for the buck, especially since I was buying  at our actual cost.  Upon arrival, the Samsung was diverted to the master bedroom room, while the MBR 1080p unit went to my wife's office and the 1080p unit in her office wound up in the exercise room - musical TV's.  Bottom line evaluation of the UN32EH5300:Pros:- Great picture, with vivid colors and deep blacksSo-so:-Smart TV functions are okay, nothing to write home about.  Easy wifi connectivity and setup, but even with a Logitech wireless keypad, I much prefer surfing the web and checking email with my bedside tablet.  The SmartTv interface defaults to the Family Story app, which we don't use.  I do like the free video/movie access for Amazon Prime, but there's extremely limited volume range on movies like "National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation", requiring volume to be maxed out to hear the dialogue.  Adjusting any of the various sound functions (Movie, Clear Voice, Surround on/off, etc.) doesn't improve the situation.Cons:- VERY unstable base - gives new meaning to the words cheap and flimsy.
