Reviews.Content: TV qualities: 5 stars- Picture quality is fantastic for the price.- Unit is lightweight, can be handled easily by one person- Separate USB ports for keyboard/mouse and for hard drive.- Attached USB hard drive (Western Digital MyBook) shuts down when TV is in standby or powered off (when connected to the HDD USB port).- Only one button on the TV itself, one button press turns on, but once the unit is on the button brings up a menu and you have to move the button around to navigate this menu.  As a result, button is hard to use initially as its on the bottom and you can't see it.- Wifi quality is excellent, rarely is picture quality low even with crappy internet service.SmartTV qualities: 3 stars- All major streaming services are supported.- When powered on, TV will not start in Smart mode, you always have to push the button on the remote to start.- Software is unreliable, TV and apps will not update when unit is in standby mode despite TV setting that should control this.  So when you start it up and want to watch Netflix or other smart app, the unit spends several minutes updating. Both AppleTV and Roku perform better in this regard.- Interface is clunky and occasionally unresponsive.- App bar at top cannot be edited or sorted in any way.  Occasionally updates to one of these apps will confuse the shortcut, clicking on Netflix launches YouTube for instance.  Problem reset when unit was powered off.- Windows media files not supported.  Plex app also will not support Windows Media, even though mobile and Roku Plex apps do.- Search in app store doesn't bring back enough similar results, appears to only search for exact terms only.- Only one non-HDMI AV port (may not be a problem for you)

Reviews.Title: Great computer monitor for Macbook Pro once you calibrate it
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace an Asus 27" 1080p monitor for my Macbook Pro and also for use with a PC. I wanted a bigger screen, but didn't want to push my video card harder with higher resolution. I am very happy with this monitor. When you first get it, it is important to rename the PC/Mac input to PC or PC/DVI. It increases response time (decreases lag) and removed post-processing. Second, if you own a Mac, do yourself a big favor and buy the program SuperCal. It's only $19 but it will save you some stress of setting the levels. The first 2 times calibrating I wasn't that happy with the result and I thought maybe it wasn't going to work well as a monitor. But, I kept trying and especially focused on the "optional" white level adjustment in SuperCal. It made all the difference. Once you struggle with white levels for a while to get a true white, it works great as a monitor. One thing to note, however, is that since text is blown up, you WILL see kind of jagged text unless you turn sharpness down. But, this is pretty much the way big 1080p monitors are. My previous monitor, an Asus VE278 had the same issue. On Windows 8, I didn't notice as much of a problem. It does text smoothing differently. If it's of some value, here are some good levels to get you started, if using as monitor:TV:Backlight=15Contrast = 93Brightness = 26Sharpness = 48Rename HDMI input as "PC"SuperCal settings:Red X,Y, Z = 0.4361,0.2232,0.0139Green X, Y, Z = 0.3851,0.7177,0.0968Blue X, Y, Z = 0.1430,0.0595,0.7141White X, Y, Z = 0.9505,1.0000,1.0891** UPDATES **1. I've been learning to keep playing around with the white tint/level value in SuperCal for awhile until I get a really true white. It's worth it!2. Download Flux App for Mac (apparently free). It will adjust your levels depending on the time of day so once you have calibrated for a bright white, it will dim it at night. Works wonderfully.3. Hooked up second HDMI input to PC for gaming. I noticed some mouse lag so I turned on GAME MODE. Very smooth!4. Continuing to enjoy this as a monitor for word processing. Once calibrated carefully, the text looks better than my Asus 27" Monitor.

Reviews.Title: can;t do half of what it's said to do !!
Reviews.Author: GOMERpyle9
Reviews.Content: Beware if you are looking for a true Smart HDTV, Samsung 40EH5300 is not the one. You cant access your Google mail , you can't get picture in picture without purchase of other expensive componets. There tech help is so so, first time I called I was speaking to a tech and in the back ground you could hear his supervisor saying disconnect your on too long,and he did. One really poor feature is you will need a wireless mouse or key board to navigate or take for ever to sign in with the hand held controller that comes with the set. Yes I understand that just after Xmass you will be on hold for some time, but for 2 hours plus,started calling on Dec.18th when I got cut off ,& did not get a line thru till Jan.2. There E manuel is a waist of storage it wont stay still it jumps around, your looking at PIP set up, then scroll down it flyes  down to set up picture color and other setups. Its a great picture and color for an HD set but not for a smart set, I would not purchase this item if I had known what it could not do.

Reviews.Title: Taking it back
Reviews.Author: Bob Carver
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, but picture quality and color could not match what we have on a CRT Sony. We played same Netflix movie in parallel on both. The most irritating thing, though, is the so-called smart hub. As others have noted, you cannot delete or otherwise hide many "options" and those you may elect to download must compete for screen space with ones I would never in my lifetime use. Worst of all, Samsung sells advertising space in this layout! At first I could not believe but, yep, that was an ad for Ford in the upper right corner. That was the final straw for me.

Reviews.Title: TV worked, but a disappointment
Reviews.Author: betty bazemore
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tv that I could watch TV shows, stream movies, and surf the web on.  Previously I had a PC attached to my tv and it did all these things well.  By the reviews I thought the smart TV would do the same and I was willing to pay the additional cost for a TV to do all that. The smart TV does these things, but is very limited.  I had a netflix subscription and the smart tv limited my selection of movies on netflix.  With Hulu I could not easily access the free Hulu, but the smart TV was set up for the premium HULU which I did not want.  The advertising for the smart Tv praised all the apps that could be downloaded.  Most of the apps that were anything at all you have to pay for.  To switch from surfing channels to using the pc was slow and cumbersome.  To watch you tube was frustrating as I could not do what I usually do on you tube and that is watch movies.  I did not want a tv that was a cash cow in that I had to pay to access anything worthwhile.  I kept the smart TV for two weeks and continued to get more frustrated with ir.  It had a decent picture and the sound was good, but it just would not do what I wanted it to do. To me it was cumbersome and frustrating.  I finally packed it up and returned it. Amazon was great and promptly refunded my money.  I ordered a larger screen off brand TV for much less money that has all the ports to attach everything including a VGA port for a computer.  I think I expected too much of the smart TV.  The name smart TV is misleading as it is very limited in what it would do..  .

Reviews.Title: Randomly shuts off after only 3 months
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is great and the features and fine overall although not as good as previous TVs. The smart TV apps are very slow and could be much more user friendly. After 3 months it has started to randomly shut off. Sometimes it will work fine for 1-2 hours and other times it will shut off as soon as you turn it on.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected for my first Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Brian Etheridge "brianakabigb"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived just as expected and quicker than the estimated shipping time.  Out of the box it was really easy to setup and turn on and connect wirelessly.  It has more than enough ways to connect your favorite electronic devices to it.  3 HDMI slots, one of which is designed for a DVI->HDMI connection to connect a computer to your TV through.  Not sure how much that cable itself costs, but it's a nice to have at least.  Also, there are two usb connections on the TV (on the side too, which are easy to get to), one of those has more power sent to it so you can plug an unpowered USB device to the TV.  Follow what one of the commentors said about the picture settings, they look great although I thought it looked fine out of the box.  Updating the smart software wasn't that hard, it pretty much went through everything on it's own.  The smart part of the TV is pretty intuitive and has everything you could ever want in terms of "apps."  I liken this to a really big iPad which is easier to connect cable to.  Great product, got a good cyber monday deal on it, couldn't be happier with it!

Reviews.Title: A great buy for Black Friday price
Reviews.Author: Mitch85
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 40'' today from a local store that still had the Black Friday price of $399. This is my first flat screen and smart tv. Everything was easy to setup, didnt need the instruction booklet at all. The smart features have some lag to them as well as the remote keys..But other than that, it's a great tv. I signed into my wireless network and started watching 1080p  YouTube videos and they looked amazing..Cable tv without HD doesn't look great but I didn't expect them to. Using Samsung Link was easy, just setup an account on your pc and it will put all of your music, photos and videos on the website and then you can access it in the SmartHubOverall I would recommend this TV to anyone looking to upgrade to there first Flatscreen or just to upgrade to a smart tv. I followed another users preset guide to set the picture quality, but I changed the Picture Mode to Natural and Sound Mode to Amplify.. This is a great TV for under $400!

Reviews.Title: COOL FOR UNPLUGGERS!
Reviews.Author: Jon M. Fasthorse
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT TV. EASY TO SET IT UP AND CONNECTED TO MY WIRELESS ROUTER ON THE FIRST TRY. I HAVE BEEN WATCHING NETFLIX WITHOUT PROBLEM EVER SINCE.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Jospeh J. Viola
Reviews.Content: Great TVLooks absolutely amazing with my Consoles. With Game Mode there's no input lag or ghosting for $297 this is such a steal just buy it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT T.V.
Reviews.Author: kevin berry
Reviews.Content: GREAT T.V - I LOVE THE INTERNET FEATURE, YOU TUBE, PANDORA, NETFLIX,NICE PICTURE, GOOD SOUND, I HAVE MINE HOOKED UP TO SURROUND SOUND

Reviews.Title: Fills a gap in the home
Reviews.Author: Audiophilereviewing
Reviews.Content: This is a nice television. It's not awe-inspiring but, given its price tag, it definitely can fill a 'gap' in a home. For example let's say you have that killer 60" in the living room but you need something nice in the bedroom. This is it! I like the picture, light weight, dual-band wireless, speedy menu's and SMART features. I don't like that it lacks ARC audio ability... I assumed any modern television from a big manufacturer will have this but I was wrong.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Mendel
Reviews.Content: The TV is very good except for audio, but the setting up and continued smart use is difficult probably because of the smart program.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, not so Smart however. (Update, Smart Function = Improved)
Reviews.Author: George Williams
Reviews.Content: *Update: The Smart TV features have been improved since this last review & it is now performing like it is supposed to.Connection, speed of accessing applications & all else, has been improved.Lets get the bad out of the way....*Cons: (Have been addressed 12/20/13)Smart TV Function:Its clunky, it doesn't stay connected, slow & overall its just unreliable. You're better off getting a Google TV attachment or that Chrome air HDMI+USB thing. I won't say Roku or Apple TV as they are not comparable to what Samsung attempted here.Do not buy it looking forward for the smart function to shine. I had hope that the pending update was going to fix things but not by much, its barely bearable now.Set your TV's DNS to 8.8.8.8 to avoid graying your hairs connection wise. I'm willing to update my review if the software ever improves.Pros:The TV & Picture:If this TV does anything right, its the picture quality. Its excellent for a tv under $500 & it rivals TVs over $500.Black levels & the vividness of the colors are excellent & adjustable (both).The adjustment options are pretty thorough, its energy saving setting are pretty easy, it has a respectable amount of ports, 3 HDMI, 2 USB (They have different designations, one is (HDD 5v 1A) & the other (5V 0.5A).Sound wise, its ok. If you have a sound system or are in the midst of getting one, do so. Volume levels are respectable butto be fair, this TV is in my room. You may want a modestly priced system for a living room. I'm looking at Logitech myself.The remote is smooth and easy to use for regular functions, its pretty basic. This might be another thing that kept the price down,If it had a better or simply smoother smart TV function, I would've called this a con.Final say:Its a great TV & I doubt you will find better quality under $500 as of this date.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Michael D.
Reviews.Content: This is my 1st LED TV and without doubt it is second to none.  I enjoy the built in smart feature, there is less equipment to buy.  The set up was very easy it took a while to have the internet to download the updates but once completed all was good.I tried to use the web base feature to go online and watch public channel TV (full episodes of CBS, ABC, NBS shows) using the wireless  and every time it tried to load the video the TV would say out of memory and shut the program off.  I now use my laptop and with the HDMI cable to the TV I am able to watch the programs.I found the remote cumbersome to use while trying to add in character text and based on recommendation I purchased a Favi smart stick which  made it easier to navigate the screen.Overall, good priced product lots of nice features and thus far no issues.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and the sound is great which is great since I am not a fan of Surround Sound. The e-manual is on the TV and it can be downloaded from Samsung. The problem with the download PDF is it is in 28 point font so it is 625 pages long. I spent 3 days reformatting it to 12 point and 108 pages, so now I can easily read it in front of the TV. I had know idea what a Smart TV was until I read the entire Manual. Email, Web Browsing, Automatic connected to my Wireless Network, it has Samsung Antivirus (yet to be confirmed) along with automatic connections to Netflix, Huluplus or ABC website direct for the Free stuff. This is not even 20% of what this puppy does.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ms. Marlene
Reviews.Content: I'm a Samsung fan.  I got the TV for my guess bedroom.  It's lightweight and easy to handle.  It found my Wi-Fi right away and we were on Netflix in just a few minutes.  This is my second Samsung HDTV.  I also have a 61" LED DLP purchased in 2008 and it operates just great.  I would definitely recommend any Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Needed a smart TV that wasn't a "monster" - we are fulltime RV in a motorhome.This the smallest smart TV I could find.It works great!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: shipping and instructions
Reviews.Author: Randy Cameron
Reviews.Content: The shipping box looked worn and was not packed tight. The unit did not come with any warranty info of manual.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Sound but Mediocre Web TV
Reviews.Author: Robert M Hyman
Reviews.Content: The Good: great price, picture, and soundThe picture is clear and vivid with superb surround sound movie effectsThe Bad: Mediocre Web TV functionsApplication support is limited since there is no support for any security apps such as Norton Mobile Security and for Google Play Store. Unfortunately, although the built in Google TV is essentially Android with a Google TV wrapper, Google TV does not support security apps, so don't use the internet for anything that will reveal sensitive personal data -- e.g., don't do your banking from your smart TV.But even though the lack of good security seems to be a platform limitation in Google TV itself, there is no excuse for not supporting Google Store. The only way you can obtain Android apps for this TV is using Samsung's own app store which has a collection of fairly mediocre apps. Half the apps I've tried so far don't work very well. The rest are sort of boring.All in all, this TV is a great buy if you want an excellent economical LED TV. For this price, the Web TV features are a nice bonus. You'll certainly enjoy the built in Netflix application.

Reviews.Title: The BOMB!!
Reviews.Author: Phil Briggs
Reviews.Content: The picture is great. The setup is simple.  I am not the picture guru compared to most but I do work as as a service provider.  This picture quality is exceptional and Samsung is the brand to have.  The other TV's I looked  at just can't compare that are in this price range.  The wifi works flawless and I truly am satisfied with whole product.

Reviews.Title: Didnt expect the product to breakdown within 1 month of purchase
Reviews.Author: Pramod Badri
Reviews.Content: I never expected Samsung to sell such low quality products. The tv screen is already showing issues. I see a red line on it ! Just horrible !

Reviews.Title: nice picture, not enough ports
Reviews.Author: Anna Braun
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is very good, smart tv is pretty cool for streaming online content (if you don't already have a streaming blue ray/game device.  Simple setup.  I was surprised to see how few inputs there were...usually TV's have like 3 hdmi, plus regular a/v, component, etc.  This one only has hdmi and 1 a/v.  I have a wii and an old dvd player so I can only hook up one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good, Youtube app is crap
Reviews.Author: phonysaint
Reviews.Content: I bought this to upgrade from a 32" TV and to take advantage of its ability to play streaming video without a computer or box.Pros:-It looks good, is fairly inexpensive, and is energy efficient.-Good amount of ports - 3 HDMIs - in the back.-Does quite a few things with Smart TV, which I haven't fully explored yet. Amazon Prime works well for watching videos.Cons:-Smart TV is slow to start up, which sucks when that's all you want to do with the TV.-Youtube app won't buffer videos properly, so anything of length is unwatchable. Seems to be a problem among all Smart TVs. Other apps such as Amazon Prime don't seem to have this problem.-Can't adjust sound when using external speakers.-Single switch on TV doesn't automatically turn it off. You have to pull the lever/button towards you, then press it to turn off. It's more intuitive to have the power, channel, and volume switches as separate buttons.I'm keeping it, but not being able to watch Youtube hurts.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: GA
Reviews.Content: I just bought it 3 weeks ago, very easy to set up and connect to wifi, the image resolution and clarity are superb, and the size is just right for my living room. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Price and Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Beth Glasscock "iggiboo"
Reviews.Content: Our Sanyo TV got struck by a thunderstorm power surge and was going to cost a lot to be repaired. We priced other TV's and this Samsung was the best product for the price. We are very pleased the with high quality of this product. Very sharp, clear HD picture. Great for watching football games!

Reviews.Title: It has a pretty picture, but...
Reviews.Author: Vikki L Harris-Dooley
Reviews.Content: I am not wowed by it.  I like the regular cable, and the picture and sound quality is awesome, but the  so called "smart" part isn't so smart.  I tried several times to watch other aspects of the smart tv, but it continuously buffers and buffers endlessly.  I actually was trying to use it to watch my amazon prime videos and that was a joke, as was trying to use Hulu.  I will continuously try. Maybe the sattelites were off kilter or something. Or maybe I just get frustrated easily.  Who knows.  There's always tomorrow to try and try again.

Reviews.Title: Smart tv= load of viewing opportunity
Reviews.Author: Dell Hoffert
Reviews.Content: Great picture with many controls to allow customizing to your viewing habits. Have not looked at all the features on the Smart hub as that will have to wait for a rainy day. my only complaint is the sound quality as it sounds like the speakers are in a cardboard box. I have tried all the various sound settings to now avail. Was not wanting to purchase peripheral equipment for quality sound, but i feel i am forced.Thank you for asking.Dell Hoffert

Reviews.Title: cant ask for a better bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: greeknasty
Reviews.Content: Not much to say..its a great tv. smarttv can be slow at times but its manageable.  anyone who dislikes this tv is an idiot.

Reviews.Title: This TV was good... while it lasted...
Reviews.Author: welovecorgies
Reviews.Content: I received this TV a few days ago. I set it up, updated the software, tweaked the color configuration and all the video/display settings I could find and, let me tell you, the image is gorgeous. Pictures are crisp, sharp and very colorful. This TV provides awesome bang for the buck. I loved it... for the few hours it functioned, which were less than eight hours. I connected my PS3 to it via HDMI, started watching a documentary on Racoons on Netflix and then boom! The screen went off, only the sound kept playing and the screen just stopped displaying anything.I tried restarting the TV. Nothing.Checked the troubleshooting section on the manual. NothingCame back to Amazon and checked all those 1 star reviews and I realized I wasn't alone. In other words, I got a lemon of a TV. A defective unit meant to fail sooner or later. I requested a return via Amazon and they complied. By now the TV should be on its way back to their warehouse. After asking for a refund, I also ordered another TV here on Amazon as well, and oh boy, I am happy that this Samsung TV failed because the one I got afterwards, even if a bit more expensive, it's way better in any possible way.Thumbs up to Amazon for their awesome customer service. I just provided a bit of information regarding the TV and they sent a UPS guy to pick it up, no questions asked, to ship it back to their warehouse.My advice to anyone planning to buy this TV is: do your research. It seems like these TV's tend to fail often and you could find yourself without a TV sooner than you think. However, if your unit happens to work, you will own an awesome TV for half the price other TV makers ask for.Good luck, and again, thank you Amazon for your awesome customer service!PS:Just in case anyone cares, the new TV I ordered is this one, from Panasonic and I love it:Panasonic TC-L42E60 42-Inch 1080p (Right here on Amazon.com!).

Reviews.Title: Ridiculous support
Reviews.Author: greataunt
Reviews.Content: Each time I want to use an account such as Skype or Pandora they keep pushing down "updates" and wipe out my login info as well as the settings on my devices, such as my home theater and internet login info. They claim that the applications companies require them to reset the system after updates, but I checked with both Skype and Pandora to find that is not the case. It is just the inept practices of their IT people. I even wrote to their US president and got a dumb phone call claiming there is nothing wrong to have to recreate all the settings again. This is totally amateur and thus over rated as well as over priced! Further, I've been trying to get to speak with a management level person but get put into voicemail and/or the 800 tech support people who are clueless about the issue.

Reviews.Title: fantastic tv
Reviews.Author: Nathan Futch
Reviews.Content: I have been a fan of Samsung for about 7 years now. Ever since I bought my 52" DLP. Their products continue to excel and impress me.Picture quality is great.Sound is above expectation.Design is appropriate.Interfacing with the TV is no problem.Samsung knows the value of connecting with other media, I think that is the best feature for this product. The tv can be controlled from a SmartPhone, Anynet devices are recognized and work out of the box.... I didn't even know my Phillips surround sound system was anynet capable and all of a sudden I'm controlling the volume on that device with my TV remote! I interface with a home network server and no flaws over a wifi connection. I am very happy with this TV.  I Think the next gen will give us a more computerlike desktop gui and behave a little quicker, maybe have more apps. This TV will keep me busy for a while however, I expect I'l get a 4k after the initial price gouge has worn off.  I didn't want to get anything too large when i purchased this 32" as this will fit nicely in a particular corner of the bedroom when the 4k gets moved into the living room.

Reviews.Title: Love It - Got it for $150 Cheaper At the "Red Circles" place...
Reviews.Author: Brad "Brad"
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a TV at the "red circles" store, kid at the store was scanning TV's for me, and this 40" LED baby ( UN40EH5300FXZA ) was on clearance in store, he had two in stock.. after their "5%" discount for getting their "red circles" card, sucker rang up $353 before taxes.  Definitely worth it at that price.Plugged it in, it updated like crazy, and I am enjoying it very much.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Siddhartha Tomar
Reviews.Content: Absolutely phenomenal. Awesome features, great price. Smart TV feature is a breeze. You do not need anything else with this TV. Just switch on your wifi and you are good to go.

Reviews.Title: I thought I was very happy with this product,  not!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Tamez
Reviews.Content: It really sucks cause all the apps run very slow ,not recommended!!!!! When trying to watch anything on a app it runs super slow.  My internet connection is very good so it is not the connection it's the tv

Reviews.Title: Product failed after eight months.
Reviews.Author: SHERRY A. HEACOX
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product August, 2012.  The picture starting randomly going thru a light/dark phase.  Will go to snow white and then fade to black.  This has been going on for two days.  Today, a new wrinkle appeared.  A solid gray line appeared on the right side of the screen running from top to bottom and about four inches wide.  Should have gone with my first instinct and purchased a Panasonic which I will know do.  This is the second Samsung TV to fail within a year of purchase.  This was purchased for my mother to replace an ancient Sony that finally gave up the ghost after about ten years.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "laurabel"
Reviews.Content: Love this tv! So nice to have internet and be able to watch old tv shows---no commercials. This is a great product.

Reviews.Title: keyboard for tv
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I love my new 40 inch TV and this being my first HDTV I love it. I wanted to get this TV during the black Friday sale but was already sold out after I thought about buying it or not so got it for the same price of 447 from another website. Glad it worked that way because I got the 120hz. I know using the remote to surf the web is torture so I bought a wireless keyboard and it works. I have the Logitech k400 with built in mouse pad. Its perfect for your lap as its not a full size keyboard but I don't find it too be to small its the right size. Got it at wall mart for 32$. I wrote this post so people would know that this keyboard works.

Reviews.Title: Great acquisition for the price!!
Reviews.Author: joe "Joe"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this TV set as a gift for her mother. Main reason was Netflix and built in WiFi. We knew it was not cutting edge model but it had minimum requirements we were looking for.Very light device with amazing picture definition and very estable WiFi connection. Set up was a piece of cake and we could try Netflix after 10 minutes. Still have to go trough all features and learn on our on as manual regards solely to TV set.Only minor thing is the sound, as speakers are not so potent but one can solve that with a hometheater, which is not her mother's case.Bear in mind it is a full HD TV set with lots of features for less than U$450,00!!!!Excellent bargain!!Well, I am editing this review to add what I suspected but had to try before affirming: some Wireless keyboards and mice will fully function with this TV set. The one I purchased was a Microsoft. All I had to do was to plug the USB adapter on TV side port and "presto"!! Web browsing is now available to my wife's mother, who is 70 and can now browse the internet from the comfort of her bed!! You must get used to a few adjustments in how to opperate it. You use the mouse to click where you want; whenever you want to write use wireless keyboard but, when enetering any website which requires your login and password, "enter" (after inputting login and password) must be done with the mouse. If you are posting something on facebook, for instance, after writting everything you need, press the 'enter' key so that Samsung virtual keyboard will disappear and then use mouse to click on 'post'. This is important hint, because Samsung's virtual keyboard can be covering "post" icon and thus preventing you from posting. Also interesting is the zoom. She uses it in 150% when on facebook website.This is the way it works with Microsoft Wireless Desktop 800. I don't know how other wireless devices will interact with Samsung 32UNEH5300. However, I guarantee my experience when testing it for my mom's mom (I just don't like calling her mother-in-law) was great!! Some Youtube videos will not be as good as Netflix, but mostly due to the quality they were recorded, web traffic and your download speed. Should this tree be above average and you always choose HD youtube videos, you won't have problems. So, now she uses her Samsung for internet movies, facebook and orkut (farmer game) and she is as happy as can be. And so am I!!!

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Flor A. Fabela
Reviews.Content: It's been only a few hours and I think I'm in love with this TV. I bought it today at Walmart.com which was the lowest price I could find. Yesterday this television was advertised at $447 right here, I thought about it and decided to buy it. When I checked in the morning, the price went up to $550 or so and now is more than $600. Walmart had the same price $447 so I rushed and bought it at that price, and I'm not regretting it! The picture is outstanding and beautiful, I love the features, the fact that I can see movies directly through the USB port... everything about it! I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: works as it should so far. or used to
Reviews.Author: timberjet
Reviews.Content: No problems with this tv after having it near a month. waiting to get A home theater audio set up and a blueray disc player. Once I have all that hooked up we'll see if everything jives. Sure wish it had amazon video.Update 11/4/12; problems have started with the picture. seems there is a vertical zone malfunctioning or something. Happened right after an update. took an entire week and 6 phone conversations before I got the go ahead for repair, which I might say is going to be a major pain to do and no tv for who knows how long. I don't know if I should just see if I can get amazon to take it back or go through with the return and repair. for 500 bucks I could have bought A much bigger non smart tv now that I have a smart blueray player that has way way way more apps than this pos. I did like the picture a lot Well, until now.

Reviews.Title: cool smart tv
Reviews.Author: codywebb

Reviews.Title: Great Option!!!
Reviews.Author: We Are Lakers!
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for a month and so far it is working great! It is very light weight and has a semi thin bezel. The picture and sound quality are both great too! The initial setup was very easy including the wifi setup so I was done within 20 minutes. Samsung's app store for the smart tv is not nearly as huge as you would like but the smart tv is a new trend so I know devs will continue to support this technology. I have a samsung phone with gingerbread installed on it. Samsung offers a remote app in google play which allows you to use your samsung phone as a remote and it works great! But if you have android 4.0 your phone will not be compatible with the current app remote until Samsung updates the software. Using the supplied remote can be hard to use for navigating through the internet and typing in searches so if you have the remote app installed on your samsung phone I would recommend using it. Sound and picture quality are both clear and very responsive. Watching movies through apps such as vudu or through hdmi show great and have no lag or buffer time. I purchased a $7 hdmi cable from bestbuy and i can't see any difference between mine and a $30 cable. I purchased this tv a month ago directly from Amazon and it has already went down in price by $30 so this may be a great gift for Christmas. If you want to save money by not getting cable service I would recommend getting this tv. Some of the default apps include facebook, youtube, mlb and pandora. Netflix also comes as a default app which I think is a great alternative to cable. One great reason is becuase I'm new to netflix and I have found every cable show I used to watch with several seasons on netflix so $8 a month is worth it. Vudu is another great movie/show app that comes preinstalled. They don't offer a monthly subscription like netflix instead you have to pay per movie or show. With Vudu they give you $5.99 in free credit so that you can watch a movie or show for free! This is also offered on the ps3 so that means you can what 2 free movies if you have both! Other brands such as LG and Sony also offer smart tvs but I like the samsung smart tv price and interface better. Overall this is a great tv option for a midsize room.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Alok
Reviews.Content: I have been using my new Samsung TV for last one week and it has been a great experience so far.I have not encountered any problems with the led screen as cited in some reviews.I particularly like the netflix app which allows me to stream my movies and tv shows .

Reviews.Title: Kool
Reviews.Author: Oliver Clarke
Reviews.Content: Very nice Tv only problem is I need another one for my Bed Room. I've fallen in love, Smart TV's, Samsung, Net Flix, usb movies, apps, browser, ect.....

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product
Reviews.Author: VENKATA NARAHARISETTY
Reviews.Content: This model is week compared to LTD model. No swivel base.720p HD picture doesn't look good,  may be I missed some setup.

Reviews.Title: Love Samsung !
Reviews.Author: Teakwinters1
Reviews.Content: Best TV in this size I have ever owned. I like Samsung products anyway , so I have a certain bias in that direction. With this TV tho, what took it over the top for me was having all those "Smart" features. Without those features I still would have purchased the TV because, in simple terms, it has a great picture. Why else would you bye a TV for. Oh yeah, the price was good also.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Koleno "Robkol"
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping and nice TV for less than $700.  Thankfully it was easily compatible with my existing wall mount (for my 42" Sony).

Reviews.Title: Great telly
Reviews.Author: Trinigirl
Reviews.Content: Great tv quality is excellent easy to set up, the only thing is it would be nice if they included the hdmi cable but its cool

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Anubhav Jaitley
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful product. And I like the color and its features. Performs well and I like the display.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy- turns off & on
Reviews.Author: Gloria Francisco
Reviews.Content: After having this a few months it began to shut off and on. I read many other reviews with the same issue.

Reviews.Title: Summary review
Reviews.Author: Russell Procissi
Reviews.Content: This TV is everything I thought it would be. Samsung really produced an exceptional TV. On a scale of 1 to 100 it's a 300

Reviews.Title: Great screen, Smart TV functions are ok
Reviews.Author: Alex S. "ruprickthemonkeyboy"
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Samsung TV.  They are good value for the price and we like the screen quality.  I opted for the SmartTV feature as the TV is mounted on a wall and there is no room to mount the ROKU.  Unfortunately the SmartTV has several disadvantages.  First, the built-in wifi antenna is very weak (ROKU works fine in the room) so I had to purchase an ethernet powerline adapter to get it to work.  Second, the SmartTV is slow compared to ROKU and I've had numerous drops and freezes.  I've only used the streaming functions, but it's slow enough that I'm not going to bother with web browsing.  Finally, the remote jams every known button into a stick that is impossible to use without staring at the buttons.  Samsung really needs to look at the simple remotes from Amazon, ROKU and others.I will give Amazon big kudos for their tech support.  I called to ask questions about setting up the TV.  Tech support called back every 3 days to help work through minor issues (I could have read the manual).  What a pleasant experience!

Reviews.Title: Just the right size
Reviews.Author: Angel Crossroads
Reviews.Content: This TV I personally enjoy for my education because it is useful by being a projection screen, so it is like sitting front row in class. :)

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Ceejay
Reviews.Content: I love the Tv!!  I haven't figured out how to use the Smart TV yet, but the TV is great

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture and price
Reviews.Author: Andrew B. Newman
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely with every penny. Amazing picture, sound is good, setup is easy, plenty of hookup options, built-in wife, smart TV.. I can go on and on...

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money
Reviews.Author: Linda D Dunn
Reviews.Content: It's a nice tv. Love the Netflix option. Would have given it a five star but for the volume,, has to be turned up too much to be heard.

Reviews.Title: really good, not quite great
Reviews.Author: Garrett Dane Henderson
Reviews.Content: Really good though not great  Smart TV. As far as the normal specs it has a beautiful image that is crisp and color neutral, the auto brightness function is a nice perk. On the less than great side, off axis viewing is subpar and the screen has significant glare (though i find that true with the vast majority of flat screens these days). The "Smat TV" system works well fro the most part, though loading the apps can take a bit longer than one would expect. The other issue is nit-picky, but annoying. The volume on the Netflix app is REALLY muted compared I usually have my tv set to a level 17 or so... have to crank it up to 70 for the same level out of netflix. Then when i leave the app i get blasted out of my chair by the volume of the normal tv. Wish they'd fix that.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)
Reviews.Author: Ken  Blackmer
Reviews.Content: I have a Sony that is three years old and cost about twice as much as this one.  It does not do as much as the Samsung and is not as clear.  I bought this for my bedroom but, after seeing how well this Samsung performs, I am seriously thinking about putting the Sony in the bedroom and using the Samsung in the livingroom.

Reviews.Title: Another Samsung
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung TVs.  Their picture is the best in m y opinion.  Minimal frame and great "smart TV" functions.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46E5300
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Townsend
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV was just not up to par. Whites seemed to glow; colors just didn't seem true to life; the hd was just not crisp enough. I had no problem returning it to Amazon, and I got another Samsung (more expensive) smart TV from Amazon. Maybe the 5300 was just a lemon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: ALLEN HEBERT
Reviews.Content: Good Price and as expected quality.Easy set up and easy to use remote control.recommend for basic 2nd T.V.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Timothy Lusk
Reviews.Content: Slim display. Works well on the Cheetah Mount and has great color and saturation balance out of the box. Samsung is definitely a great brand for the price.

Reviews.Title: My Samsung
Reviews.Author: Sunny Cherian "beefman"
Reviews.Content: Came in on time.  Good packaging.  Was easy to set up. Requires more time to learn how to navigate with the remote control.Good quality picture

Reviews.Title: Samsung led TV
Reviews.Author: Zayra
Reviews.Content: A wonderful product purchase. Gave this as a gift to my son as a house warming gift! This tv is worth the money spent !

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV
Reviews.Author: John N.
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN46EH5300 does everything well.  The setup and installation is easy and this model received high scores from reviews including Comsumers Reports.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up
Reviews.Author: S. ELAM
Reviews.Content: This is a light TV so It was easy for me to get it out of the box.  I have 'air' TV and the instructions were very simple for me to hook it up.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Steven Gurish "Mack"
Reviews.Content: If I refer strictly to the TV part, this device is excellent. the color are quite vivid, the brightness is perfect and the contrast is in the normal limits. It also comes with a lot of features which deliver a lot of entertainment to the user.However, I am a bit disappointed by the SMART TV part. When trying to connect it to my laptop or smartphone through DLNA it keeps disconnecting from time to time. It's not because of my home network because I've tested other devices and they work just fine. The software pack from Samsung is not very helpful here, either.

Reviews.Title: FINE TV
Reviews.Author: JOAN E
Reviews.Content: It has great picture - very good sound - fits small area in fireplace stone.  Volume control is dreadful, taking ,MANY REPEATED CLICKS  instead of easy glide.

Reviews.Title: Samsung does it again!!
Reviews.Author: Ann Bennett
Reviews.Content: This TV has great sound, beautiful picture and perfect sized close caption font for those of us who need it!!  I am very pleased with this product and will focus on Samsung from now one.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: peepa
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and she just loves this over her last one. Very clear, sharp images  Color are bright  She was very pleased

Reviews.Title: Good quality television. The software isn't the greatest though.
Reviews.Author: K. Cunningham
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about the hardware functions of the television. It is what it makes out to be; quality wise. However the smart software is relatively slow, and the smart hub app almost constantly gets updates. So it seems about 3/5 times that I start up the smart app: it will update. And sometimes when you start the app it will either not start up or take very long.I don't know what the Samsung firmware updates will bring in the future but I'm still very happy with the quality/price combination of the screen and audio. It has sufficient inputs, is lightweight and slim.

Reviews.Title: Not Smart at All
Reviews.Author: LAS
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 6 months ago, and if I had it to do over, I definitely would not purchase this TV. The picture looks nice, and the price is good, bu SmartHub is NOT ready for prime time. Want to watch shows on the major networks' websites?  In theory, you should be able to do that; in reality, not so much. First of all, it takes me about 15 minutes (literally) to navigate to a website using the clunky interface.  Once there, it's nothing but errors.The volume wouldn't go loud enough for comfortable listening of a TV show, so we got external speakers.  This works fine when watching regular TV, but when using the smart hub for Pandora, Netflix, etc, the volume control on the remote will not control the volume....at all.  There is one volume level, and it's loud.  Apparently you have to have an amp with a remote to connect your speakers to.  Then you can use the amp's remote to control the volume.  Or, you can disconnect your external speakers when you want to listen to Pandora.  Yeah, that makes a lot of sense.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: Salomon
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv and it seems so good... it's good for gaming for movies and it's not so expensive at all... i feel good with it  i recommend it

Reviews.Title: Greatness
Reviews.Author: Michelle Cooper
Reviews.Content: Great picture! Great price! Great brand! Wonderful product! No complaints at all! I am fully satisfied with this TV completely

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV for the price.  Perfect as a 2nd TV or to be used with a PC using the TV's HDMI port connected to the DVI out on the PC.

Reviews.Title: New Samsung
Reviews.Author: Arlene Tunney
Reviews.Content: Our 6 year old Samsung started to have yellow & purple people.  So, we got a new one, 50" but it doesn't swivel - even tho it looked like it swiveled in the photos :-( However, so far, it works quite well.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: Corey
Reviews.Content: i like the fact it has 3 hdmi ports but it has no s-video and the av and the color stream uses the same ports so you can only use one at a time but other that its perfect for the xbox 360 and the ps3 and the nintendo 64 don't look bad either for the price and how fast it shipped its well worth the price i already recomemded to most of my friends and family but over all it's worth 299.99 dollars

Reviews.Title: one for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: jrjmd
Reviews.Content: Nice sharp picture and good color.  Mostly I read a while once getting into bed but every now and then there is a movie or a game that I'll switch rooms to watch.  Just the right size for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Amazon is the best online retailer
Reviews.Author: Sara "Sara"
Reviews.Content: I received my Samsung 50 inch 2 days ago and the screen was cracked. I went online and reported the problem and Amazon shipped a new TV SET  to me today. I just love my new toy. While I am very please with the TV (PICTURE QUALITY, APPEARANCE AND PRICE), most of all I am very please with the service I received from my #1 online store "AMAZON". IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A PLACE TO BUY TV ONLINE OR ANY PRODUCT AND YOU CARE ABOUT DEPENDABLE SERVICE, QUALITY, AND  CONSUMER'S TRUST- THERE IS ONLY ONE PLACE TO SHOP- AMAZON. SHOP WITH CONFIDENCE. I would recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY TV
Reviews.Author: Niobe Garcia "Tell us about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: Love my tv. It has everything I want on it and the price was amazing. I put the bottom part (the stand) together rather quickly and I have it sitting on a tv stand not hanging on the wall. The picture is great and love all the apps. Very very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I am truly satisfied with my purchase. If I could buy it again I would. For the best quality of picture read the comments the most helpful ones that tell you how to set it and you will be satisfied. 10/10

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: adam yenshaw
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this new Samsung's extras! I wish I had one in every room. Works like a charm. LOVE the options and apps

Reviews.Title: A great led TV
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: Amazing image quality, standard sound and the Smart Hub its very intuitive but a bit slow. The only thing I din't like so much its the Clear Motion Rate effect because sometimes seen, but I don't care because is a great tv for that price, I'm very happy with my new 40 inches led tv!

Reviews.Title: So Far so good
Reviews.Author: Leonard A. Reneau "goatman"
Reviews.Content: The set up was easy, assembly easy, Hardest part getting the Samsung on line site figured out.  Accomplished Same.  So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Smashed screen
Reviews.Author: Nagoya
Reviews.Content: I was extremely excited to get my tv after dropping the money for it. I got home the day it was supposed to have arrived and it was still half the country away. The following day I got off of work and found the tv at my house. I excitedly borrowed tools from the neighbor, pulled out the stand, screws, and other accessories, and put it all together. I then pulled the actual tv from the box and set it on the stand. I looked at it, and noticed that the screen had been shattered at the top and had spread across half the screen. I was very happy with how it was a used tv and I could hardly tell that it had been used. For $420 it was still a great deal for a used tv! Shiny stand, no scratches. But now I have to take the time to fit it in my car, take it to a shipping spot, and pay for insurance to mail back a broken tv! Extremely inconvenient and I don't even know if I will be compensated for the high shipping cost. Late shipping delivery for a broken tv that I must now ship back and the deal for the tv is now over. Wouldn't recommend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Tammy W.
Reviews.Content: Great picture and so many apps! I love having a smart TV. We already have a Samsung TV and like it so well.

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: Couch
Reviews.Content: has a lot of apps most require some sort of purchase , its slow connecting to the wifi . netflix will give error 95% of the time crackle and hulu loads but slow ( modem is 5 foot away with internet speed of 50 mps ) the picture is excellent with many modes even with a room detection sensor that will auto brighten or dim

Reviews.Title: Great for tje price.
Reviews.Author: Honeyb
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy!! I am enjoying the product and pleased with the picture. Will look for othe Samsung tvs in the future.

Reviews.Title: Brightness problems
Reviews.Author: Lynn Mielke
Reviews.Content: At times the picture is outstanding but then the brightness will suddenly fade and then be muted for several minutes and then return. It sometimes happens as often as several times an hour which is really annoying. I tried researching a fix but I can't find one for this model number. It should be noted that there are multiple reports of other samsung Tvs with this same issue. I cannot recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: The "Smart" part is lacking
Reviews.Author: Duggus
Reviews.Content: As a hi-def flatscreen, this TV is very good. I could not have asked for more. Some of the other reviews were helpful in setting the picture quality.The smart feature you pay extra for, if I had to do it over again, is not worth the expense. 1)Everything moves at a snail's pace. Any word or code entry you must do is done with a displayed keyboard that seems to take forever to work with. 2) The content you are offered is all very old, some of the more recent will cost you money. 3) Offered features such as YouTube work, but you'd better have some time and patience. If you're trying to show someone something interesting you saw on YouTube, use some other media. Again, snail's pace.

Reviews.Title: Known defect
Reviews.Author: James "jamie_congo"
Reviews.Content: BewareJust found out this tv has a power problem (cycles on and off) Samsung used faulty parts. Class action suit in progress. Don't buy.

Reviews.Title: Smart Buy
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Only one quote is worthy of describing the deal I got on this Samsung smart TV. "Shop smart. Shop S-mart"

Reviews.Title: What the fruit.
Reviews.Author: Christian Duran
Reviews.Content: I set up the tv perfectly. I sit down and turn it on and all I see is a white line on top. I was like the hell? I thought it was the tv protector so I left it up and I notice the screen Is just popped out from the Tv. The picture on the tv was choppy and had lines going down as if lights were broken or something. It was just a few lines going down. I was super excited after a week of waiting for this tv. What a disappointment. I don't know if they mistreated it or what the hell. The box was beat up and had a hole.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: sdwoodfin
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! Easy setup.  Brand name you can trust.  Arrived when expected. Clear picture. Sound is a little quiet so additional speakers would be nice.

Reviews.Title: worth the purchase!
Reviews.Author: Rossie
Reviews.Content: This tv is amazing and I cant wait to get another one! the only thing is if you do not have Prime shipping to receive in two days, UPS just leaves it on your front door and it is not in another box to hide its contents.  I signed up for UPS delivery text messages and they were never correct! I received a message saying it was delivered the day before it was actually delivered!  Then I come home after lunch to find it laying on my porch and it had been raining for it to potentially get stolen!  I was frustrated with Amazon for not putting it another box for shipment but ultimately it was UPS who left it.  They dont require signatures anymore for stuff like this obviously! i think if the merchandice is over a certain amount, a signature should be required even if its at a small cost. I would have paid a few extra dollars rather than risk my tv to be taken off my porch had I not come when I did!

Reviews.Title: LOVE ITTTTTTT!
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY TV. I consider myself really tech savvy, so I put a lot of research behind this purchase. The only thing I was unsure of was how the 60HZ would play out, as a lot of the newlywed TV's are 120, and even 240hz. Honestly once you turn the tv on and start watching you won't even know how many hz the tv has.  Samsung makes the best LED smart TV's btw. The App Store is great and it's being constantly updated which is huge. I didn't want to get a smart tv that has an abandoned App Store. Overall I'm really pleased with the purchase.The shipment arrived in a huge box which was fully protecting the tv box. So nothing was damaged during delivery, but if you live in an apartment like me make sure you have a dolly or someone to help you take it inside.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Jones
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a not so large or to small TV for my condo. My sister purchased a TV for my daughters room and it was a Samsung. Her TV is why I chose the Samsung due to the quality of the picture. I received my TV with a couple of days. I love this TV. The size is perfect, the picture is great and I love the smart TV apps. It was easy to learn how to operate and I have the choice to play music (Pandora) or netflix or my cable TV or popular movie app and more. I would recommend this TV to anyone. I do have an RCA flat screen in my bedroom. The picture is not as clear as the Samsung and of course not as smart. I am totally happy about this purchase and would do it again!

Reviews.Title: as described
Reviews.Author: Miguel Robles
Reviews.Content: awesome tv for the value, love everything about it. great deal for a smart tv read a bunch of reviews before purchasing, they were right. Great tv

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Anthony G Spartos
Reviews.Content: Very nice "used"TV.good color,picture,sound.would recommend highly.nothing else to say. I don't have other words and will not rare again . By by

Reviews.Title: Love love love!!!
Reviews.Author: Happymommy09
Reviews.Content: Our tv is amazing!! The colors are bright and vivid, and it is truly energy efficient. Has many functions, and it is really nice to not have extra wires and cords from the tv hanging around when mounted. I would recommend this tv to anyone for the price. Its def worth it :)

Reviews.Title: Finally got an LED flatscreen!!!
Reviews.Author: TOMAS "GEEEAR!!!!"
Reviews.Content: This thing is great.  For so long I would just turn my computer screen and watch whatever I wanted while wasting power by keeping my PC on.  I have a 16GB thumb drive and a 250GB HDD hooked up to this to play my movie collection.Streaming from this is nice too.  It's and HD certified device for Amazon Instant Video so that's a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: S. Hoang
Reviews.Content: If you're like me and just need a good TV without getting too technical, this is for you.  You can surf the internet, watch Netflix, surf YouTube, or get on Facebook with just the TV remote control--among other features.  It's really lightweight and is a breeze to set up.  Also, I can't mention enough how great Samsung quality is when it comes to LED TVs.

Reviews.Title: Replaced a damaged Toshiba 47 inch and am happy
Reviews.Author: Christopher Barrett "Evil Corgi"
Reviews.Content: Priced this model and others at Costco, Best Buy, Fry's and other retailers.  Amazon won.  Especially with free 2 day shipping with Prime.$577.99 directly from Amazon.It seems that since Amazon sold out, prices have been a bit higher from third party sellers.  Which is to be expected.I had previously had a 57" Samsung DLP which the movers dropped (youch), when I purchased a new TV, the Toshiba Regza was the best deal.  Now it seems the Samsung LED is the best deal for a decent size TV.Notes about TV: Very thin bezel compared to the previous Toshiba I had.  The TV model is a year old now, but it's still a Smart TV.  I actually use my PS3 since my speakers are wired through that device and not the TV.  If you don't have a smart Blu-Ray or PS3/4 or Xbox 360/1 then it's easy to wire the TV to speakers with a digital optical cable and set up the streaming services directly through the TV.  It works best hard wired with an ethernet, but has wi-fi as well.The menus are very nicely laid out.  Good color options.  You can adjust the color settings manually, but they have good presets.  Dynamic is great for movies, but can sometimes be a bit dark for video games.Overall a good value TV from a trusted brand.  With the LED, I expect this TV to last awhile.Only drawback: 60hz instead of 120hz.  But I wasn't willing to pay $200 - $300 more for a 120hz model.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Ronald Braggs
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 46 inch screen and am just loving it.  Best purchase I've made in a while.  The picture is clear, bright and has great sound.  I had a sound around system already, so putting these two together is a great experience.  I did need help setting it up though, as it is a bit complicated getting all the smart TV settings right.  I found the Geek Squad to be invaluable.  Although it costs me a few dollars, the setup was correct and hastle free.  Considering the money I saved by purchasing the TV from Amazon, spending a little with the Geek Squad was inline with purchasing the TV from a appliance store.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Richard M Ferko
Reviews.Content: I've had a Samsung 40 inch (UN40C6400) for a couple of years now and haven't had any problems with it. I saw the price on this and decided to get it for the bedroom. Perfect size and the apps mean I don't have to mess with extra connections/power to do streaming video (Roku, Chromecast, etc.). Wifi connection was no problem to setup. I use Amazon Instant Video, Netflix, Plex and Youtube just about daily and haven't had an issue. Picture is sharp, color is crisp, and the black is black. The previous TV I had in this fairly small room required external speakers to sound good. This TV, while not having great sound, is definitely better than most other units of this size I've looked at.This unit is fairly light weight as well, making it easy to put anywhere. We put it on top of the dresser, but I may get a mount for it eventually to get it further out of the way.I'd have no problem recommending this for anyone looking for a compact smart TV.

Reviews.Title: best TV I've ever had
Reviews.Author: Nick c
Reviews.Content: I got this TV last week when it was on sale and I gotta say, im very impressed. the picture quality out of the box isn't the best, but after 10 minutes of tweaking the picture settings, it now looks fantastic.PICTURE QUALITY-the picture quality is great. Again you're going to have to tweak some settings in order to make the picture the best.SOUND-I've seen mixed reviews about the sound for this TV and i can tell you that I got this TV for my bedroom and the sound works fine for me. I don't have any complaints about it.GAMING-For those of you that are gamers and want a TV that has little to no input lag, get this TV. With my old TV I could never play games without input lag unless i switched it to game mode. For this TV, you do NOT need to turn on game mode in order to enjoy your games. I've tried multiple fast action games via my PS4 and it looks and feels amazing.Overall this TV is great. Of course it's not the newest model and it's not the state of the art best picture ever TV, but unless you're willing to spend a couple thousand, then buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Overall good
Reviews.Author: Plasma52
Reviews.Content: I like the TV if using it with a cable box (bought it as a second TV without cable box, straight cable in)....otherwise, I find it frustrating to have to keep adjusting the picture size to have full screen otherwise it will continually have a border, defeating the 32 inches....when hooked to my cable box, it sizes correctly (HD is full screen, 4:3 is a full 4:3 in the screen)....sound isn't like you have a separate sound system, but is fine for a normal room...the backlight for the remote should be brighter....maybe because it is new, but I have had to wait quite a bit when I go to use the Smart TV functions for it to do "Updating"....kind of a slow process

Reviews.Title: i love this the picture and it was so easy to set up i have other stuff to say.....
Reviews.Author: Nisi A.
Reviews.Content: Hi i had a Panasonic lcd and it was not good keep braking down and the customer service was bad so thanks to the great people at Amazon i got this Samsung led and its the best t.v. ever the quality of the picture is so good and sound is good and most is was easy to set up but i did have a question so i called the number and got someone and they helped me wow thats great to know they are there to help!!! I would give this t.v. 6 stars my Panasonic was more expensive but  its the not cost it the quality and this t.v. wins!!

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Bugandbear
Reviews.Content: Really like this tv. Easy to set up, easy to get on wifi, lots of good features. The tv itself is so thin! The picture is good (not like our pioneer elite plasma in the family room) .

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade for bedroom
Reviews.Author: The good, the bad and the ugly
Reviews.Content: Not really much to say, normal Samsung quality, good picture, nice options and features. Samsung has become my go to manufacturer over the last 3 years, whether it be phones, appliances, electronics or anything else they make, simply better quality for your money.  Always register your Samsung products at their website to add 3 extra months of warranty to them, that is just a no brainer and a good thing for them to offer.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Judith P.
Reviews.Content: Great T V perfect for our room, stylish, great picture, easy set up , nice remote and various outlets on TV

Reviews.Title: Love it - just wish the ports were recessed more
Reviews.Author: Paul P NYC
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd Samsung smart tv that I've purchased in the past 2 years and have to say that I am loving it. Connection to the Internet is simple and the picture quality is great. My only issue is that the design should have accounted for those of us who want a flush wall mount which is not possible since the ports force the wiring to protrude from the back of the set. Also, the power chord is on the opposite side of the set causing more wiring hassles to reconfigure.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Picture.  Love the Apps
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The tv has a great picture, nice sound.  I do love the apps.  I haven't had any problem with them.  Netflix, Hulu, Crackle.  They all run great.People talk about who they don't like the Youtube app and using the browser.  Please remember, it is not a computer.  If you want to go on facebook, youtube, or browse the internet.  Buy a computer .  Don't expect a tv to do it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great price!
Reviews.Author: Raul A. Diaz
Reviews.Content: After researching different brands we decided on Samsung. The TV is wonderful and we can't be any happier with our purchase. One suggestion: use the movie option on the picture settings, everything looks more natural than the standard and other settings. And as always is a pleasure buying at Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: J. L. Chapman
Reviews.Content: I would  have appreciated more input capability. WII, home theater, CD required more inputs than offered. At first, I suspected operator error, but the issue was non-existent with my 2006 era flatscreen.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture and good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: skibik
Reviews.Content: It is nice to have a 32" that a person can move without getting a hernia. It has a nice picture. The reason for the 3 stars is that I am a simple man and getting older and it is hard to keep up with the technology and not sure if it is just this TV but to me they did not make it user friendly. I bought it for the bedroom for occasional use. TV doesn't have a sleep timer, but has a power off that can be set if controls are not used for a certain period of time, apparently it doesn't work as my TV ran all night and it was set for 2 hours.Channels, another downfall, unless the TV found the channel in the search you just can't type a channel that is hasn't found it won't accept it. I lost the signal to a couple channels and it wipes that channel out and you can't type it back in unless you let it do a full search, another 20 minutes gone every time you do that. I have a 7 to 8 year old Toshiba DLP TV in the living room and for some reason the channels on that TV are not the same channel number on this TV, For instance, ME TV is channel 64-3 in the Toshiba it is 64-5 on this TV, go figure!I understand that technology is evolving but things shouldn't be this complicated to use. Since I think this TV is not exactly user friendly I can't imagine what it will be like in a few years when I need to replace the TV in the living room. After this TV I am actually regretting just thinking about it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: D.R.Weaver
Reviews.Content: I could not believe when I saw this TV for the Amazon.com price..It arrived quickly and it is amazing..There is a little work to set up the stand, there is a little brains needed to plug all your stuff into it, but, once that is done. The TV does everything else for you..just sit back and watch the magic..:-)

Reviews.Title: Happy Happy
Reviews.Author: Olka Glasgow Tonge
Reviews.Content: I'm happy wiht the overall experience , will be odering other stuff from this site.so far no it's all good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Reynaldo Hurtado
Reviews.Content: I love the TV, great picture, smart TV features are OK, not excellent but that was not the main reason I purchased it so it doesn't affect my opinion. Set up my PS4 with it and it has been a great experiemce. Only complaint is that I noticed it has a stuck pixel, only really noticeable on really dark scenes.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Has the latest (2013) Samsung features.  WiFi works well for streaming, which actually surprised me.  Best when wired Ethernet.

Reviews.Title: Replaced the last tube we had
Reviews.Author: chrissys traveling circus
Reviews.Content: It said it was used.......must have been a return....their loss our gain. Found this offered by Amazon and Amazon shipping. WIN WIN....arrived next day.....easy set up....great picture quality. Researched new TV.s for this particular TV it would have been 100 plus dollars more. We are very happy with it and was purchased for the garage man cave......needless to say husband is a HAPPY camper!!!!

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend
Reviews.Author: Robert Jennings
Reviews.Content: If you are in the market for a new TV and don't mind an TV that is a whole year old buy this one!  It has all the latest features, I used a wall mount for mine and it makes it fully adjustable for the seating in the room or in the next room.  Smart TV features are GREAT!  Remote is nice and has braille on it as well.Really happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn
Reviews.Content: I gave 5  stars, in spite of not currantly having an internet connection. I am hoping that the "Smart" aspect will be as excellent as the performance of this tv, so far.The price, ( because it was last year's model),  was  great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Nakaisha Burch
Reviews.Content: I love my tv!!  I haven't had any problems with it!! It shows great the sound is perfect!! I feel like it's well worth the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: G Smith
Reviews.Content: Great picture, works right out of the box. Exceptionally cool if you already have Hulu, Amazon and/or Netflix memberships. Do away with cable!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Christean
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this smart TV although I probably should have ordered a larger one. What stood out first is the sound. It is good even when streaming movies. I had to buy a sound bar for my other brand smart TV because the sound was bad while streaming. The picture is great, and the menus are fairly intuitive and easy to navigate. Set-up went smoothly except for updating all the apps. I had to call tech support to accomplish that remotely. It was well worth it. The new Netflix app is great, so much better than the one I'm apparently stuck with on my other brand smart TV. Little did I know that when newer models come out, apps are often not updated for the older models. Anyway, this is a great TV, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy another Samsung when the time comes.

Reviews.Title: Pros and cons
Reviews.Author: Joseph L. Mahoney
Reviews.Content: Pros: It arrived quickly. It's light, easy to attach the base to the stand (just 8 small screws!), and the picture quality is good.Cons: The stand does not rotate or pivot. This might be a problem because it has a slightly upward slant that cannot be adjusted. The up slant is good if you have a lower TV stand, but problematic if your stand is typical height. I had to prop the back of my TV up about 1" to get a level picture.The base does not provide a lot of stability so the TV could be tipped over pretty easily. Might be a trade-off -- stability for weight. If you have have to prop your TV up like I did, it's even less stable.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dodey Larson
Reviews.Content: I bought this T.V about half a year ago and I love the thing to death. The price is incredible for such an amazing Smart T.V, Samsung did an incredible job.

Reviews.Title: tv for a freind
Reviews.Author: G. Barnes
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for someone else. They say that they were very satisfied with it. So I guess its good.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Ever!
Reviews.Author: E. Blake
Reviews.Content: This is great purchase for a great price! I just need how to fully utilize it! Great Buy! Love Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Love Samsung electronis
Reviews.Author: Janis James
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung Smart TV. Love them. Good color, picture, easy to set up, easy to use. Both Samsung and Amazon have excellent customer service. Samsung has a wonderful web site for their customers and manages all your  products.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Woody Muire
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for almost a year now and can't complain.  The size is perfect for my room, and the features are great for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: bsbeedg
Reviews.Content: I purchased this only because I wanted to have smart TV that can support dishworld and Yupp TV.  I was able to assemble the TV within minutes, plugged it in, updated the software, downloaded the two apps (dishworld and Yupp TV) all within few minuutes.  It is great value considering that a streaming device for dishworld and yupp tv would cost 100@ each and this TV cost me 250$.  It is a no-brainer if you are looking for a smart TV for streaming.

Reviews.Title: Great for Netflix
Reviews.Author: Mohammad
Reviews.Content: - Screen is amazing.- SmartTV software is really great for watching Netflix. Works like a charm.- Not so good for YouTube with unreliable rewind and forward functions.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Alyssa Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  Have had no problems, great picture, wonderful smart features, sound even works fine for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!!!!
Reviews.Author: Steve Langston
Reviews.Content: Ordered this through Woot! and really satisfied with this.  I do agree with doing a manual adjustment on picture/color settings, but aside from that, really satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: NITIN
Reviews.Content: I am loving my tv, I stream movies from netflix and its awesome, though you need a really fast internet in order to get good quality. Planning to install direcTv now, which will be icing on the cake :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch smart TV
Reviews.Author: john w
Reviews.Content: No problems with the TV or the smart function. Excellent picture, sound, digital reception was better than digital box. Enjoy this TV and worth every dollar.

Reviews.Title: Great model
Reviews.Author: MILO
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. I did some research on this model prior to purchasing it. Now I'm glad I did.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mr.gallant
Reviews.Content: Great tv love it the interface is simple to use and it does what I like and want it to do no complaints about it

Reviews.Title: samsung is oh so good
Reviews.Author: Reginald B. Woodson, Jr.
Reviews.Content: love the tv. first smart tv i've gotten. it is the perfect size and has such great features. its like a ps3 without the games lol, LOVE IT! my only complaint (dont know if it is the tv or my internet) but when browsing it moves incredible slow. none of my other internet devices is slow like that and as this is my first smart tv dont know if this is the norm or if there is a way to fix it but other than that no problems

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV set
Reviews.Author: Nicola Bello
Reviews.Content: Light weight, not to big, not too small. The perfect size for your room. Image, great! A whole new experience in watching tv.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: We've been happy so far. We encountered no problems connecting to WiFi or Netflix and Amazon streaming video. We are also pleased with the apps that came with it. The work-out app is getting plenty of use. All said, good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Don't purchase this TV.  It has RAM issues
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. "Facts Are Stubborn Things"
Reviews.Content: YouTube freezes every 10-15 minutes without fail.  Apparently there's no way to clear the cache manually or automatically.  I recommend buying a smart tv which doesn't have these issues or its just not worth it at all...

Reviews.Title: I'm a happy camper
Reviews.Author: Mark Madison
Reviews.Content: Once I figured out my budget and what I wanted with some help from a friend who is an expert in home entertainment systems, I went right to Amazon, plugged in my wishes and this is the unit that came to the top of the list. It has fulfilled my every expectation and is actually the first flat TV I have ever owned. The performance of this unit is superb and even the speakers aren't' all that bad. The specs were on point and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Ephesians 3:20
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a hood smart tv with a full web browser, amazon, vimeo and hulu plus apps all in 1 system. It did not need to be the largest in size just good picture and functionality. This TV more than met my needs and then some!! I can fully control it with my IPAD for the keyboard and everything and the browser works just like any other internet browser without any hiccups!! It may be the 2013 model but it has been an exceptional buy for me and my granddaughter. I am able to access all social media websites as well and post to all of them without any issues. I can even go to Hootsuite and via the web browser and post from there. I was on the fence with this one or Vizio and while the Vizio model is also a great TV this one was just more of what I wanted as the one that compared in price by Vizio did not include a web browser nor did it have Vimeo app. So for my needs the Samsung Smart TV was all I needed and then some. My setup is now complete as I have my apple tv to bring in all my itunes items, Amazon Prime Built in with HULU PLUS, and all controlled from either my IPAD, IPOD, NOTE 3 or MacBook..So for me this purchase has been a Win Win All The Way Around!!!! Definitely recommend it to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: R.A "Red"
Reviews.Content: A lot of the apps don't function well. They need constant upgrades. The color is off sometimes on netflix. Not super impressed

Reviews.Title: great picture sound not great
Reviews.Author: Joyce Janson Franklin
Reviews.Content: Arrived as scheduled, was easy to assemble.  Set up was easy.  Sound quality is not great.  Picture quality is excellent.  The smart tv part is great.  Can watch Netflix and Amazon streaming with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Excellen!
Reviews.Author: andamable
Reviews.Content: I bpugt this TV because my brother recommend it. Now I am happy for that  This is a great and wonderful product

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Eric A Orner
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV over six months and I still like it as much as the day I received it.  Lots of the Smart TVs switch between channels rather slowly but this one switches almost as fast as the old analog sets.  I like the automatic dimming feature because I have it wall mounted in a bedroom.  With all lights off in dims way down, but is still quite visible.  The only thing that is marginal is the sound quality.  With so little room for speakers in these new flat screens, I expect there isn't much that can be done to bet better sound without adding external audio to the TV.  The sleep timer is too deep in the button menus but the 4 hour auto shutoff usually works out for me anyway.  I don't use the built in Internet features as much as I thought I would but they are nice for occasional use.  The USB port works nice for watching movies stored on a USB hard drive and it even powers my drive nicely.  Overall, I'm still happy with this purchase.
