Reviews.Title: This is the most amazing TV I have ever owned.
Reviews.Author: HUNG PHAM
Reviews.Content: It can access to YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, and many many website.This TV also have karaoke features, help my friends and I have fun together.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: trinisuave
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a couple months. I think it's a great purchase, only thing I don't like is a couple times since I've had it the samsung servers were down, then it's just a regular tv, not SMART lol. Don't know how I feel about that.Overall I've been enjoying my tv and think it's a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: G. Orozco "Misty Mood"
Reviews.Content: I had a samsung 32 inch LCD.  Wanted another samsung, but a little larger screen and LED with smart feature. Got the TV in a timely manner, easy to setup and great picture.

Reviews.Title: good tv bad part
Reviews.Author: thomas dewitt
Reviews.Content: tv had a bad wifi chip when i opened the box and turned it on.  i am having a problem downloading a app for youtube the main reason for buying this tv.  i can only watch youtube through the internet. it is not the same. great picture and tv works well

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: sweetbuddies
Reviews.Content: I loved the tv and its slick design. Also liked the fact that i can browse internet and play netfix, hulu and other apps directly. Overall a good product.

Reviews.Title: Product basically new
Reviews.Author: Chris Sandoval
Reviews.Content: As in, I would think this tv was bought brand new. Easy set up, no problems picking up my apartment's weak wifi, and plays very well with standard cable/antennae (coax) and HDMI.

Reviews.Title: The smart TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Stublaski
Reviews.Content: My order was shipped very fast and was packed with in a bigger box. I received text messages to let me know when it was coming so I could be home. Samsung has designed this TV so well that even a person who it not technical, all I did was plug everything in and turn it on. All I than did was read and answer all the questions. Before I new it I was done and I'm learning more and more ever time I have it on. Watching movies is so enjoyable!  My son said to buy a Samsung and I now see why!

Reviews.Title: SOOOOOOO HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Younger
Reviews.Content: All I can say is I LOVE MY SMART TV!!!!!! No complaints what so ever.....it's very convenient especially when it comes to going online.

Reviews.Title: TV is fine. Samsung Apps absolutely embarrassing
Reviews.Author: DPC
Reviews.Content: The price point for the definition you receive on this tv is decent.  What makes the product so valuable is its smart tv capabilities.I also own a samsung blu ray player which does a fantastic job of playing blu Ray DVDs.  Both of these devices in less than six months became, in my eyes, obsolete because of Samsung's poor ability to update their apps properly. currently, Netflix and fios tv work on neither device due to updates which prevent the apps from opening properly. It's so bad that there are forums dedicated entirely to helping customers find loopholes to make the apps work again. Thes include but are not limited to, changing the programmed country from USA to uk to get netflix to work again.[...]I repeat, know you are getting screwed by buying this for its smart tv capabilities and just spend a little more for something better.

Reviews.Title: Love love love it
Reviews.Author: brad
Reviews.Content: Great size, great weight, wonderful color, sound is suitable even without a sound bar (I've seen a lot of Hd tvs that need to have the volume at 50,70,or even 100 just to get decent volume) we keep it at 20 for daily use, and at night when I watch movies or play games while everyone else sleeps, 10 is suitable for me to hear. The stand is sturdy and all the connections outlets are readily available. My issue is with 'smart hub' and is why this is 4 star as opposed to 5. It constantly updates base software (same version Everytime!), connection speed is mediocre even when wired, so loading Netflix, Facebook, news feeds, etc takes forever. Other then that this TV meets or exceeds the expectations I held for it, and it even arrived a day early.

Reviews.Title: Great quality and useful apps
Reviews.Author: BinkSays
Reviews.Content: Like others have said you have to fidget with the settings but once you do the TV has beautiful picture and pretty good sound if you don't have a sound system. Great TV for gaming, very little delay.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy a Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Eamon Daly
Reviews.Content: I'm perfectly happy with the TV itself, but the Smart Hub software is incredibly bad. It's clumsy to use, crashes frequently, updates /constantly/, and devotes 90% of the display to advertising and channels I don't want and can't remove. Do yourself a favor and by a "dumb" TV and a Roku: you'll be infinitely happier.

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest. Poor software.
Reviews.Author: Student of Life
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in September of 2013, it works great for over the air broadcasts with an antennae but when using the Smart Hub, it can take anywhere from 3 seconds to 6 minutes just to boot the Smart Hub. The pre-installed apps are really horrible, there are few apps that are decent. I am only using the Netflix app with this TV. If you are purchasing this product because it is a smart TV, I think you will be sorely let down.Samsung has quite a lot of work to do in order to provide quality media products, in my opinion. The Smart Hub could be simplified, the pre-installed apps could be removed, more memory could be added to it, and a faster CPU could be added.The quality of the picture is great and can be adjusted to several different presets or customized to your liking, I cannot comment on the audio since I am hard-of-hearing and I use the closed captioning with the audio low or off.The Wi-Fi connectivity is acceptable. I have had issues with it disconnecting but then other devices on my network have disconnected so that is most likely an issue on my end.Other accessories can be purchased for this (not necessarily from Samsung) that can help make text input or selections easier, for an example, wireless mouse and keyboards.After 7 months of ownership, and changing just a few settings, it has decided to start sporadically rebooting while either watching TV or while I'm using the Netflix app. I have reset to factory defaults several times which clears it up for a while and then it starts rebooting again. While doing a web search to try to find a resolution to this issue, I have found that other models from Samsung also sporadically reboot. So far i have not seen a good resolution to this issue posted on any site.To sum up: I like this TV for the quality of the picture but the other features of this TV are not worth the expense.

Reviews.Title: Great unit
Reviews.Author: Don Dell
Reviews.Content: Love it. Can't stream movies because my HUGHES NET SATELLITE INTERNET IS NOT FAST ENOUGH. I called them and the want to move me up to the next up-grade that cost a $100 per month more. Not the TV's falt

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: JUD
Reviews.Content: Oh my word I cannot say enough about this Tv. the picture on it is beautiful. the sound is excellent. Its just the most awesome Tv.  you really must upgrade to this tv..........Smart Hub is awesome. I haven't used everything that it has as of yet but what I have has been spot on perfect. Im so proud of it.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Justin Shorey
Reviews.Content: I needed a small TV for my room to play games on. This fit the bill perfectly. I watched netflix a lot on it as well when I couldn't use my xbox.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV.
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Vargas "Gustavo Vargas"
Reviews.Content: I chose this grade because from the first moment I put it into operation responded excellently to all applications that brings. A refined design, a crisp image with excellent color and digital sound, and WI-FI INTERNET, is ideal for stay at home enjoying the entertainment that this technology allows us to team. I recommend it to anyone who likes quality home entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV at thsi price
Reviews.Author: Mahip Bhalla
Reviews.Content: I received this TV well within time of delivery. When I opened the TV, it was in very good condition. I liked the TV very much, it is slow while connecting to SmartHub since it is Series 5 (old version). But this is just to start, once it starts then everything is good. Overall worth spending on this TV at such low price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: David Goldstein
Reviews.Content: Great TV, actually more than a TV-full entertainment center, with tons if movies, music and web surfing- and very easy to set-up and install,

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: rick4948
Reviews.Content: As I had a 25 year old TV and  anything would look better than what I had  . I didn't want to spend thousand of dollars on a new TV and I found this one which really had more than what I needed. with all the good reviews on the picture I went to Best Buy to see it in person was pretty happy with it and the side viewing angle is pretty good . I bought it from amazon and it came in two days in perfect condition, I set it up and used Gordon's review settings witch made a big difference I could not adjust the hdmi black  to low not sure why but the picture is pretty good for the price you cant go wrong . Don't know if I will use the smart TV features but I have it just in case. The sound isn't great but not as bad as I thought but will be buying a sound bar in the future. If this works out well in a couple months I will buy a second one for my man cave very happy with this TV

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV with Tons of Apps
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Really like this TV.  I bought a Visio first and had to send 3 of them back due to dead pixels before just saying, lets get a Samsung.  Arrived, no dead pixels, easy setup, nice picture for the bedroom, tons of app features!

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it in our RV!
Reviews.Author: John Lewandowski
Reviews.Content: I bought it because it was the best one with the features that I needed (built in wi-fi) for the RV parks that have not got cable.  It is a perfect fit for her and simple enough that she set it up without help!  Would definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: MIAMI305
Reviews.Content: GREAT TV CANT GO WRONG SAMSUNG ARE GREAT TVS.  GREAT QUALITY FAST SERVICE. EASY TO BUILD SET UP WAS SUPER EASY

Reviews.Title: GOOD DEAL FOR THE BUCK!!
Reviews.Author: Stephen R. Walker
Reviews.Content: This was what I needed for me to get. It was the best price that I could find for this item, & I found it on Amazon.com.  SW

Reviews.Title: Audio problems
Reviews.Author: David A. Barak
Reviews.Content: This is our first HD television, and the image is great compared to our old SD set. However, we're having some weird problems with the audio. I have no idea exactly what triggers it, but once in awhile we hear what almost sounds like a single random muffled knock. (Strangely enough, it's not happening during the commercial that's on right now.)It's not bad enough to make the TV unusable, but it can be pretty distracting at times. It sort of comes and goes. Anyway, because of this problem alone, I wouldn't buy another one.

Reviews.Title: I would recommend it to others
Reviews.Author: liline
Reviews.Content: I like it does is good but I had pick up the wrong  inch too small I wanted a little bigger

Reviews.Title: just got this and I'm very pleased
Reviews.Author: Rick K
Reviews.Content: I exchanged a smaller, different brand smart tv for this one because the other one didn't have the full Amazon Prime channel and it never had a full screen on half the channels or DVDs and Blu-Ray, but this Samsung 40" was plug ready and full screen. I couldn't read things on the 32" unless I put my reading glasses on and stood in front of the TV, but this Samsung is clear, crisp, and I'm able to easily read the credits and subtitles no problem.The one problem I haven't yet found a solution to is that there is no way to delete the over the air channels once the TV has scanned them Where I live there must be 100+ channels and sub-channels, and more than half of them are in Spanish, Korean, Armenian, Vietnamese, Chinese, Japanese, etc., and I can't delete them so must click through them or key in the channel I want to see. It's a real pain. If anyone knows how to delete channels from this model please post how. Thanks

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: fuwei
Reviews.Content: always love it, and samsung company is the best ever.my family like it and look great to me.i will invite my friend to buy it!!

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: D. Christian
Reviews.Content: has a good picture is clear vivid sharp ,is very easy to program all the apps are easy to find  .Works for my needs

Reviews.Title: Samsung an excellent choice, I agree with consumer  reports  consumer report
Reviews.Author: Jim & Mary
Reviews.Content: Easy installation, great picture and sound. Recommend Samsung tv, purchased a second larger samsung for the bedroom , can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: good experiance
Reviews.Author: Lucretia Bryan
Reviews.Content: I like the tv, great picture quality and delivered within a good timeframe, was missing a couple of screws but for the most part a positive transaction.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: This is our second Samsung and we love them! It was very easy to program the DirecTv remote. The color and picture is great right out of the box. The sound isn't the best but it's in our bedroom and we won't be adding home theater speakers to it. The sound is good enough for where it is.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV is exactly what it claimed to be.
Reviews.Author: EllenStPete
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time.  Easy to set up and install (especially if you have a handy neighbor).  Takes 2 people to physically set up.  Easily interfaced with Bright House DVR.  Amazon Prime simple and easy to use on Samsung TV.  Very pleased with picture and reception.  Did not require upgrading Bright House connection for streaming.  Overall very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: roberto
Reviews.Content: Satisfied in its aspects , but its memory is not that much good...browsing with pointer is diffcalt and slow,that is not ok

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Really nice tv, the colors are good and with a little antenna you will get some decent channels.  The set up of the tv was really easy.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV - Good Picture - Nice Features - SLOW Apps.
Reviews.Author: D. Veracity "Mac Guy"
Reviews.Content: Pros:Nice shiny black case.Inexpensive and good quality.Built in wifi receiver.Built in Apps for Movies, TV, and Music.Autosetup.Good remote.Good sound - plenty loud enough - even over the shower running.Lightweight.Cons:No external controls (requires remote).TV itself boots VERY slowly...may be quicker if it's connected to cable or antenna, but I only use it for iNet apps.iNet Apps are even slower - about 1.5 to 2 minutes before you can actually watch TV.Apps SHOULD boot automatically, that is if you were watching an APP, it should be the first thing that comes up...just like the last channel you were watching would on a regular TV.Other than that, Ilike the TV as a second TV...we use it in our Master Bath to watch the news/listen to music while getting up or going to bed.  Nice.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv
Reviews.Author: sheryl willis
Reviews.Content: Samsung tv is a very good product.  have really enjoyed itlove it.  just what I thought it would be

Reviews.Title: Very basic Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Archana
Reviews.Content: We basically use it for Netflix. And that too for my son. Its a decent TV. Although there were problems with the smart hub a couple of times, that was because the samsung server was getting updated and issue all over. It was rectified promptly. Its a good tv in a fair price range.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: E92stealth
Reviews.Content: Does everything I could ask from a tv.Only gripe is the sound isn't so hot, unless you add a separate system.For the price, it was definitely worth it and I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the first flat screen TV I've bought. It has more than met my expectations. I have enjoyed the features it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Janice Martin
Reviews.Content: What a nice TV, it does it all! And then some! Easy set up, took a little to get movies going thru Amazon, but it works great!

Reviews.Title: Good thing
Reviews.Author: raymond legorreta
Reviews.Content: The only thing that it needs to be better is the remote control to have the slides up to open the keyboard. Other than that its ok.

Reviews.Title: Very dumb or ultra smart
Reviews.Author: Phillip I. Good
Reviews.Content: Alas, I have little or no control over this model; many of the features are disabled when I attempt to access them. Sometimes, I can route the sound to an outside speaker (via my receiver) and sometimes it decides that no all sound must go through the TV,. Problem is that I never know in advance which it will be. I've called support many times. Most support personnel are clueless. Only those who can do remote reset appear knowledgeable.,  I just got tired of telephoning once a day, particularly if the response (which happened only once) is there will be a 3hr wait. Picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Just set up, exactly what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Dan in SD
Reviews.Content: I pretty much got this TV just to stream HBO GO and Netflix, and to watch Blu Ray discs. I set the picture settings to the ones suggested by another customer on here and they look great.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Ever !
Reviews.Author: Arthur Bailey
Reviews.Content: Love my new Samsung TV!  Best tv by far. I have a 4 year old 54" in our living room and we both love it .  I've owned Vizio & GE TVA, their nothing but JUNK!Vizio lasted 13 months'- on a 1 Yr warranty- repair would have been $410, only paid $379 @ Walmart !  GO WALCHINAMART!!!

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: John Fenzel
Reviews.Content: Searched the internet a lot and for the money and size this was the best deal for me.  There are a lot of features to learn how to use but not real bad to set up.  Watched Netflix movies and did some internet surfing but haven't used everything yet.  i would recommend using an HDMI cable  from the cable box to the TV or the aspect ration will be off when you go high def.  The picture will run off the screen . It shipped quickly and is very light and easy to move around.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Huy Pham
Reviews.Content: I am definitely happy with this tv purchase. I have yet to really adjust the picture settings to my liking but so far, the picture quality and even the sound is great. I use this TV as a bedroom TV and it fills the room adequately. The only thing I knock the tv for is the base makes the TV tilt slightly up, but that was more of a half star deal than a full star.

Reviews.Title: My son loves it
Reviews.Author: Regular Joe
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for my adult son and he loves it. He's a gamer and movie buff and put the TV through the wringer before giving it two thumbs up. Playstation games, action movies and sporting events all play perfectly on this TV after applying some of the tweaks suggested by another reviewer.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Jean Morton
Reviews.Content: After doing much research, we decided to go with the Samsung Start TV. It is so easy to use, the picture is great and have had no issues with the sound. I am planning to buy another in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: MAS AttacK
Reviews.Content: Love it. Have had no problems. The resolution is great, it's constantly being updated so that's nice to see. Plenty of apps if you're into that(I use my xbox for everything). Here's hoping it continues to be good!

Reviews.Title: intelligent tv
Reviews.Author: Norman Swope
Reviews.Content: This is  our first smart tv, and it will not be our last.  It is amazing that the TV is smarter than some people I know. I chose it for the price, but am pleasantly surprised to find all the features and still learning more.

Reviews.Title: Good quality - no problems
Reviews.Author: Jason M.
Reviews.Content: I've had no problems in the few months since receiving this television.  Good picture and decent sound.  The TV connected to the wireless network and did updates automatically.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-Inch Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Cosmos
Reviews.Content: This Smart TV works very well so far.  I have not yet attempted to link all the various social and other media like Facebook and Skype.  Hope to do so soon to take full advantage of these facilities. I am excited about the possibilities and will let you know what happens when I set it up. Up to now I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Couldnt be happier
Reviews.Author: Robert McCarty
Reviews.Content: Awesome Smart TV, love netflix, picture is crystal clear. Great value, would definately buy again. The app capabilities are impressive as well

Reviews.Title: Seriously?
Reviews.Author: Pam A. Erbe "airsoft addict"
Reviews.Content: How can you possibly get a TV  for this price?  I was skeptical.  Compared to my old TV this is amazing in picture quality and depth.  I love being able to get on the internet and take advantage of all of the free Amazon prime TV and Netflix.  Fabulous deal!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Roger Nelson
Reviews.Content: The TV has excellent picture quality.  Allows me to connect thru from mysmartphone of tablet to play videos for my grandson.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Sean Shepherd
Reviews.Content: only complaint is the bass sounds horrid, so if you have a surround sound system its perfect. but works great other then that.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely LOVE it
Reviews.Author: John merryman
Reviews.Content: I shopped around quite a bit and was reluctant to purchase a TV through the mail, but it came packaged safely.  Great price, awesome features, easy set up and an amazing picture.  Pretty much my dream TV as of late.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture. Unfortunately, it's dumb, not smart.
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: I wanted to like this TV, as we've had great success with Samsung in the past. Unfortunately, the reviews about the shortcomings of the Smart functionality are indeed true and as a result, this TV is being returned.Connecting to my wireless network was easy, as it found it right away and indicated it was connected to the internet. Unfortunately, none of the apps would work properly, as the Smart Hub would connect. Numerous calls to Samsung and making sure my firmware was the latest did no good. Eventually, Remote Management (a higher level Samsung service call where they remotely access hidden menus on the TV) proved successful and things were up and running.For a day.The next morning my network was nowhere to be found. So, I manually entered the configuration. Things were back up and running.For a day.The next morning, Smart Hub was not working. I was done fighting. Submitted my return thru Amazon, pulled the thing off the wall and boxed it back up. On to another model. Hopefully, the Vizio will be smarter ... a LOT smarter!

Reviews.Title: Good but not great.
Reviews.Author: G. Harrell
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with a "smart" TV so I am probably not qualified to judge against other brands "smart" features.  I do like the features however and have watched a number of movies and TV episodes off the internet using the built-in wifi.  My only significant complaint is with the excessive reflection on the screen when a light source such as a window is behind you.  I had a 40 inch Sony in the same location and could watch with almost no reflection or glare.  The Samsung screen is just "glossier".  The Sony screen seemed to absorb light instead of reflecting it.  At least 4 HDMI jacks on the back would also be nice.  Overall, it's a good TV and will probably last a long time, but if I had it to do over, I would probably pay the extra money and spring for another Sony.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic tv
Reviews.Author: Steve in Memphis "Steve in Memphis"
Reviews.Content: The picture looks fantastic.  I also have a Samsung 720p set and I can tell the difference, even though the 720p set looks great.  It can stream from Amazon, Netflix and Youtube natively.  It can even stream music from DLNA-compatable media players.  As soon as I connected it to our network, it listed my media players (Mediamonkey and Songbird) as sources and I could stream my music.  It even shows the cover art. iTunes is not DLNA-aware, but Mediamonkey will import your iTunes music.  It does have an analog audio output, which some tvs don't have these days.  A nice thing to have.  There are 3 HDMI inputs.  Two on the back, and one on the side.  My only regret is not getting the 40" size.  If you can scrape up the extra dollars, that is something worth considering.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Orlando Ferrer
Reviews.Content: It is great! but remember, this is one of the "low price" samsung smart tv's, so don't expect too much!It has a great image, i didn't even tried to change image settings because it looks great by me. View angle is awesome! I thought it was going to be annoying watching TV at high view angles after I read some reviews but not! It is actually really good and I don't even notice any diference wheter a watch it just in front or being in one side.Sound quality is normal, it won't never be like having a 2.1 subwoofer (which is basic I think), it is just normal for a TV. If you want to have a good sound while watching movies, I recommend you to use a separated audio system.I don't know if it has some bugs, but I don't like using those "smart" functions, some I haven't noticed one. I use it to watch TV and some movies, and that's it! And i feel it is great for what I do.I have tried to use some of its apps in Smart Hub screen, but it is a little bit slow sometimes. The new model has a dual core processor, while this one is just one cored, it barely can with those function!Anyway, this is a great TV for who wants "smart functions" at low prices!

Reviews.Title: The item was listed as NEW but it is not. I will say it is MANUFACTURE REFURBISHED
Reviews.Author: Dawt Lian
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV like 10 weeks ago.TV is fine but when I use Smart Hub, it becomes slow.I mean SLOW.And I thought TV was smart but it can't remember my wifi.Whenever I want to use Smart Hub, I have to enter my wifi and password again and again.If you want a smart TV (I mean SMART), don't buy this one.I feel like it is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Good product for good price
Reviews.Author: vinni
Reviews.Content: I am very  impress with the product and the price I paid. Picture quality is awesome. I will recommend to everyone..

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV.
Reviews.Author: Grawells
Reviews.Content: The size is just right for our den, the picture is great (with a bit of tweaking) and the "smart" features are easier to use and more convenient (if more limited) than Roku or Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Don't like
Reviews.Author: fabian wright
Reviews.Content: Don't like it Screen doesn't seems to fit right And it seems real small compare to a regular 32 inch TV

Reviews.Title: Hardwired or wireless reception is wonky
Reviews.Author: Jack Marchant
Reviews.Content: Prior to purchasing I read many reviews on this tv that said the wireless reception was often times wonky with smart tv functions unavailable.  So, I hardwired the tv.  The same issues apply.  Every comment regarding slow functions, program upgrades, and sudden disconnects occur on my hardwired set as well.  Disappointed with Samsung and it will color my future Samsung purchases.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup / easy connection to home network / clean ...
Reviews.Author: SEAN BROWN
Reviews.Content: Easy setup / easy connection to home network / clean clear bright picture /Cons - Samsung Hub Center constantly updates (good) but the notification in the center of the screen in today's day an age is annoying. A better notification center, banner is needed giving user options where and how to be notified and for how long.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Stephen Wentling
Reviews.Content: Great tv, easy to use, tons of features and great picture. Would definitely purchase again. Also surprisingly light and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying our Smart TV every day.  It was very easy to set up.  Had little problem with the color; but, used the settings suggested by other reviewer.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV.
Reviews.Author: Apple
Reviews.Content: For the price it was a good buy since it was in promotion at that time. Pictures are clear we just followed what was suggested by another post.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Joan Duclow
Reviews.Content: Love the smart TV. Combines with Amazon prime it makes laying in bed watching TV that much better....GO SMART, it's worth it

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: APpup
Reviews.Content: took some fine tuning to get it to reflect colors correctly, but now that its setup it looks great just like all other samsung tvs we own.  The smart aspect of the tv works good and streams just as good as a roku.  The menu for the smart option is easy to navigate and I was able to add hulu, amazon, and netflix without any problems.

Reviews.Title: I'm in love!
Reviews.Author: Aimee
Reviews.Content: Love this television! I'll never go back to a regular TV again. I will be purchasing more Smart TV's for every room in my home. My others flats...well...I'll find a place for them!

Reviews.Title: Perfect tv
Reviews.Author: bhumika
Reviews.Content: Everything is perfect in this tv, must buy tv!!! it is like a theatre,  that is all I would say!!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TV
Reviews.Author: brittany
Reviews.Content: received the tv really quick even the delivery girl said she bought one of these TVs and never regret it ! :) so far so good for me

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous TV
Reviews.Author: Gerald Hayes
Reviews.Content: This TV replaces an old analog set and is the perfect size for the bedroom.  The high def picture quality is absolutely amazing.  We love the built-in wifi and the set is now part of our home network.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Shane Francoeur
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect, its a smart tv with a crystal clear picture and fits wonderfully mounted on the wall in my office.

Reviews.Title: Winner of the worst remote control design ever!
Reviews.Author: dg
Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV and picture. Internet connected right away. But Samsung skimped on the remote so it's getting 3 stars.  It is difficult to tell which end of the remote is up, not ergonomic and should probably have been paired with a less expensive TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Had a few shipping issues at first, but the TV that we did get is great, does everything it says, great oicture no matter the angle...absolutely NO complaints.  Thankyou.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price, but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Matthew R. Burns "Avid reader and film buff"
Reviews.Content: You're not likely to find another 32-inch smart TV of this quality at this price.  I certainly couldn't.  For this reason alone, I'm tempted to give it a 5-star review.  But that wouldn't necessarily be honest or helpful, because this TV does have some flaws.The main problem isn't the picture quality (which is very good, especially with some of the custom settings others suggest), or the sound quality (which is as good as can be expected from built-in stereo speakers), or the features (which it isn't lacking).  The problem is the UI.  The software is just really, really clunky.  The menus are poorly organized, and the "Smart Hub" screen is poorly designed and lacks customization (which is particularly annoying since such a large amount of the screen is taken up by the at-least-for-me completely useless "signature services").  This clunkiness of the interface extends to the remote, which looks and feels more like a slightly outdated universal remote than a modern remote for a major brand.This is my second smart TV.  I have a larger Vizio in my living room, and purchased this for the bedroom.  I'm really happy with the purchase of this TV, but even happier it wasn't the other way around since the Vizio's interface is much, much nicer.  I would definitely recommend this TV to anyone on a budget looking for a smaller smart TV, but it definitely has room for improvement.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for that Price
Reviews.Author: TAFAZZUL HUSSAIN MOHAMMED
Reviews.Content: Happy to buy it. Enjoying every day watching different online videos. Nice product for that price. Cannot expect more for that price.

Reviews.Title: Please fix the apps!
Reviews.Author: MissJess
Reviews.Content: I love having a smart TV, were able to have some of our favorite apps right on the tv but I feel they should have more apps available.I would love to see show time not just the preview of it but the full app. The apps they do have sometimes cause more grief than they should.Foxnow deactivates all the time so you have to reactivate it once a week or more via the computer.Hbogo freezes a lot more than if I were to just watch it on my laptop or PC.Netflix keeps glitching out and won't allow us to uninstall it so we're forced to reset the entire tv then download the rest of the apps again.Other than issues with the apps the quality of picture is nice. The sound quality is good too.I would have saved money by not purchasing a smart tv had I known the apps were going to be wonky.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart best
Reviews.Author: deepak
Reviews.Content: Product forth for the moneySmart feature is amazing. Watching movies in Netflix and other Samsung apps superabYou will enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV....
Reviews.Author: Karen Choquet
Reviews.Content: Great picture and not just smart....brilliant!  Replaced an older lcd t.v. I had for years and had been happy with.The SMART features are amazing.  So glad I went for those features...

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: Lboogy from LBC
Reviews.Content: I think it was worth what I paid... Can't complain, it's a smart tv.... I like it! Picture is super clear and sharp... Doesn't rotate, bummer!

Reviews.Title: an "ok" smart tv
Reviews.Author: munna
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting anything spectacular when I bought this. I'm also not someone who looks into getting a dozen tv's to fill up every inch of my house. I was just looking for something simple so I can watch tv and play games with. So far I've only used this to watch netflix, hulu, and play games and so far it's doing just fine. I haven't experienced any of the major issues that the other reviewers have been getting, just the clunky, and usually slow interface (which is kinda ugly, btw) and the buggy apps. This tv isn't that bad, but it's not that good either, just "ok".I've had this thing for almost a year, and I'm pretty satisfied with it so far. If you're not looking for anything grand, then this is a pretty good smart tv, especially for the prices it's offered for.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Caitlin
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase for the price. The picture is awesome, the smart TV feature is way too advanced for me.However, I am running into the issue that my new wifi password (provided by my landlord to the four apartments in my building) contains a $ and I cannot locate that when trying to enter the new password. Any tips??

Reviews.Title: Great TV (samsung of course)
Reviews.Author: Rafael Palomares Quiroz
Reviews.Content: I used to work at Samsung manufacturing (we made this TVs) so I knew what I was buying, worth every dollar spent on it (and even more). Loving this TV's features (playing movies through HDD, smart apps, HD display and low power consumption)

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Minh Nhat Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Pros: Decent amount of apps like Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon, etc. Good picture quality. Decent soundCons: Apps could be a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Eileen Trejo
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV, great picture quality and daughter loves the apps and features such as lighting adaption to the room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: T. Corson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend as a gift.  She reports that the picture quality is outstanding.  The features are excellent too.  A lot of 32" TVs don't come with the internet features and that is why I chose this one.  It was only purchased as a bedroom TV but having the internet features, along with Samsung's outstanding picture clarity, make it a clear winner for this size TV.

Reviews.Title: customer service at amazon.com
Reviews.Author: hassan saberi
Reviews.Content: in general i ' m very happy with samsung product ,because i have very good exprience about,this 46" smart t v has a state of art technology . it is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Commercialphoto32
Reviews.Content: Solid product.  Beautiful image.  Easy Setup.  There is zero I would change with this TV.  If you have very specific needs (I don't... I just want to turn it on and watch Nova or something), dig deeper.  But, if you are like me and just want to watch a TV show every now and then, you can't go wrong with this......

Reviews.Title: Endless issues
Reviews.Author: Tracey Conley
Reviews.Content: This smart tv uses the Samsung Smart Hub, since getting the tv almost 6 months ago, the smart hub has been down or in need of an update constantly. I have to wait for the update to load almost every time I want to use the hub (Netflix). We bought this so we could cancel our cable and watch Netflix, now Netflix won't work, it's NOT a Netflix issue, it works fine on all of our other devices, even after uninstalling and reinstalling Netflix it still won't work. I already had to call customer service (took forever) for a new remote because the first just stopped working, now I'm forced to call them again for this issue, who has time for that?? This tv has been nothing but a pain in the butt.

Reviews.Title: this tv is so nice I bought it twice.
Reviews.Author: David Rogers
Reviews.Content: s my first t.v. that is not an old c.r.t. type screen. I have only good things to say about the picture,sound and almost everything else about it. My only real Complantes are that when Web Browsing if I'mnot careful and move to fast even when the page is done populating it will kick out of the page you were on and go to a page that says it can't continue due to not enough memory or a reason I can not think of now sorry then you have the option to return to the page you were on or to exit the web browser. If I had a Nickel for each time it happened I could buy one of theese t.vs. for every room in my house inless than 6 months. And I would because it's that good of a t.v. the other problem is Amazon has now shipped me the wrong stand twice. The first time I bought this model was  December of 2013 and another in March of 2014. It was to have a 4 leged chrome stand but both of mine came with a Black oval plastic stand. when I called about the first one I was told it was out of stock  waiting for 2nd reason now.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this t.v. It seems to do everything it is suppose to. The only thing I could complain about is that it is a little slow connecting to the internet but once it connects it seems to run smoothly. I have only had it for two days now and so far everything is going great. If anything changes I will update this review. As for now I would recommend this t.v. to anybody looking for a nice, easy to set up smart t.v.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've Owned
Reviews.Author: Grant Ames
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. Delivered by Amazon Prime in less than 24 hours. Set up was quick and easy. Menus are simple to follow. Built in Wi-Fi found my router with ease. Picture still amazes me. Sound is fine for a TV this size. Remote speakers are an option if you desire. All the necessary connections for DVD, Blu Ray, USB, HDMI, Component, etc. I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: The Tv is excellent addition is technologically and economically, I highly recommend it, friends this is a dream TV also brings Netflix and Wi-Fi

Reviews.Title: It's pretty cool!
Reviews.Author: Penny Gray
Reviews.Content: I've had my TV for about a month now and it's been great!  I did use the color settings that someone blogged about and the picture looks great.  I haven't even delved into all the apps and such that the TV has to try!

Reviews.Title: good deal so far
Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: It worked from the time it was plugged in and with the hdmi cord. Great picture but I wish the sound would not fluctuate.I thought the government was going to require the commercials not be so loud, more than the regular programming.

Reviews.Title: TV looks great, nice features with Netflix and Youtube built in
Reviews.Author: Dylan S.
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this tv. 40" version. Looks great, nice colors, deep blacks, small frame (the plastic housing of the screen is pretty low profile, giving a huge feeling to the screen). The thing weighs less than my old 27" from 2006. I did end up getting external speakers, but before I set those up I didn't notice anything missing (AFTER I set them up, however, I couldn't ever go back).I did mess with the color settings based on some of the previous recommendations and have been really happy. Looks great with games and movies. My first 1080 tv and wow. This is last year's model, so if you can get it for a good price I'd say go for it! One thing missing: Bluetooth output would be really cool as both my soundbar and my headphones are Bluetooth. Sounds like they did add it to the next model.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Nicole K. Shaffer "Nikki"
Reviews.Content: Everything about this TV is as expect and is great! Works good, haven't had a problem with it. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Moni Oloyede
Reviews.Content: This tv is great. I'm not a tekkie, I don't know the ends and outs on the technical aspects of what makes a great tv but this tv is pretty damn good.Picture quality is great, The smart tv features we easy to access and set up. Basically just plugged it in and started enjoying itIf your just looking for a good, quality tv with some nice features, look no further. I have no complaints

Reviews.Title: Looks great!
Reviews.Author: Brad Simmons "Homes and Land for sale in Lexi...
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV in our real estate office now for about a month - and love it.  Even the sound is good - which I did not expect.  I hooked an Apple TV to it and we stream content from our laptops and ipads to show clients.  Great price --- and it's a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: TV off and on!
Reviews.Author: Samuel S Sigurdson
Reviews.Content: After having this TV for about six months it began turning itself off and on losing both picture and sound.  Some timesthe interval will be several minutes and other times it will be just a few seconds...

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Estefania Andrade
Reviews.Content: Excelent image, all kind of entrance available.Heavy but slim.Great for movies with the family and excelent for series.Internet options available

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Sharon T
Reviews.Content: great picturewe are still finding our way around with the apps but so far so good!thanks for good turnaround time too

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46EH5300 46-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Grizz "GRIZZ ADAMS"
Reviews.Content: As other reviews I was freakin out because of crummy picture, but the picture has to be fine tuned and that was no problem. We are very satisfied with this TV! a good buy! I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Ferrante
Reviews.Content: This TV has a good picture and good sound quality. It's a good TV for the money.  Sets up easily so installation was easy, especially with TV box, DVD player, and VCR.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46 EH 5300
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: I received this quick....it was very easy to operate and install apps...picture is great and so is the audio.  Great buy!!

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: manasesch
Reviews.Content: is the best tv i like a lot. have very good resolution and audio. I want to buy another one but 42"

Reviews.Title: Got the right one now!
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: This TV was the perfect gift for the child whom it was purchased for, especially love that smart TV stuff!

Reviews.Title: Great picture (for the price)
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: I have spent hours calibrating this tv using several calibration sites and THX reference patterns, here's what I think:Pros:Bright scenes and colors pop on this screenIt is a good-great looking screen overallPicture quality is very evenDark scenes are much better than other LCDs I've ownedNot a fan of post-processing, but I think the "dynamic" setting on this TV is actually good! it's not as accurate as the TV calibrated but my girlfriend and our friends think it looks better (it really really pops in this setting without being overly vivid, or crushing the blacks too much that I cant deal with it)There is little to no lag for videogames (very important to me)Great priceCons:Dark scenes look good, do not look as good as bright scenesHave never been able to get a perfect grey scale balanceSmart TV features on here are hot garbage! I have this connected to my PlayStation 4 so it's not an issue but do not buy this TV if you need it for it's apps! its slow and buggy and terribly designed and blegh! Worse UI than an old cellphone

Reviews.Title: Absolutely a great purchase from Amazon
Reviews.Author: George N Jacob Jr
Reviews.Content: I ordered my set a late Sunday afternoon and received it by Tuesday noon. The Television is fantastic and very easy to set up. Netflix and Amazon Prime loaded up easily. You can find the full manual at the Samsung site which is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Mjr
Reviews.Content: This smart tv is a great value, easy to use and program.  Quality picture and color. Not experiencing any of the issues others complained about.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with Samsung
Reviews.Author: James Ringold
Reviews.Content: I have always had excellent results from Samsung Televisions.  This one is no exception.  It is remarkable how light it is allowing it to be shipped by UPS.  An amazing thing about this LED Television is that on five hours of use every day the annual Energy Guide cost of annual operation is a whipping six dollars!  Talk about a green TV!Read the specifications, it works on WiFi to download.  This TV will also function as a large computer monitor.Get it you will love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV very satisfied.
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: The television arrived ahead of schedule very well packed and in tip top condition.The hardest part , which was still really easy ,was assembling and attaching the base.Very satisfied with the TV which has a great picture.Overall very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: I loved the TV!
Reviews.Author: Andy S.
Reviews.Content: Shipping was no problem, it came when expected.The item its self is of good quality and worked just as expected.The real thing that was great about the TV was the Smart HUB with all the apps and stream connections. This made it  avery appreciated item in the house, as everyone likes to watch Netflix on it.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: Another great Samsung product.
Reviews.Author: seagirl
Reviews.Content: I have two other Samsung TVs and a Surround Sound system.  This tv is really easy to use and I love the apps.  It was easy to set up and connect to the internet.  It has lots of fun apps to use and lots more to download.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Milhse
Reviews.Content: This product was great for the boys bedroom. Using his tab can stream his youtube all day to it. Picture quality is great too.

Reviews.Title: The best deal - i got so forrrrr
Reviews.Author: Srinivasa Rao
Reviews.Content: All features are the best...What ever in the description - we get the same...no problems in terms of shipping or the product too...

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Emilio Puentes
Reviews.Content: Love this tv, good image quality, easy to use and set up. Button on the control can be a bit unresponsive when it comes to bringing up the smart tv section. Seems to take it a bit. But other then that, great tv all around.

Reviews.Title: getting the smart hub to work
Reviews.Author: Macie baker
Reviews.Content: The tv works great but it took me forever to get it to work. I followed all the instructions that came with it and it still wouldn't work. Finally figured out that since I bought it through amazon there was no country code set on the TV. Once I got that set it worked perfectly. Was a little worried at first b it now I love it

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Ricfera
Reviews.Content: The image is not what I expected from it in the beginning, but with a few changes to the settings (color, contrast, etc.) you can make it look good.The first time I tried to run the Smart Hub, I had to do go trough "support", then it would be automatically updated, and only after that the Smart Hub did open. Easy to download and run apps, especially Netflix and Youtube, both of which can be run from your smartphone. Good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but not so 'Smart'.
Reviews.Author: David A. Burrows
Reviews.Content: The 'Smart' functions are slow and clunky.  Network connectivity is sometimes spotty (but works fine when paired with AppleTV appliance).  The search function is a real pain.  It never finds anything and will just go on searching forever. The only way to kill the never-ending search is to turn the TV off and back on.  I like my regular Samsung and Apple TV that's in the living room much better.  Samsung TV's are great, but they have a way to go before giving any real competition in the 'Smart' TV market.

Reviews.Title: A perfect TV for me!
Reviews.Author: Edward Kelstrup
Reviews.Content: It works! The SMART Hub can be a bit annoying and it does have issues with Netflix playback on specific titles (Like Archer) where the audio cuts out but picture is fine (not a Netflix/Internet issue, something with the TV's playback). I still like it. Clear picture (one stuck pixel in it's month of use that comes and goes) and the sound is perfectly great! All in all, I like to keep it short and brief, I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: No YouTube app and Smart is glitchy, but still not a bad TV.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: For an older model, this TV has an excellent picture quality. It's not top of the line of course, but it's a solid TV for the price. Walmart has it, but Amazon is a much better deal. So if you get it, don't get it at Walmart - get it on Amazon and just plan to be home for its delivery. Warning: The packaging is not at all discreet. It comes in just its store box and it's quite obviously a TV, even from afar. That's why I say plan to be home, or have it delivered to your work if your boss will allow. My husband and I both had to work on the day it was scheduled to be delivered and our UPS guy refused to even leave it when he realized nobody was home - we were still at work when we saw the failed delivery status.Anyway, as I was saying, this is a good TV within most people's budget. We probably would not pay much more for a TV than we did for this one - especially since we don't have cable and probably never will. We are avid Hulu and Netflix users. The TV we had before was only 19 inches, so this is certainly an upgrade. A friend of ours tried to say that 32 inches is too small - that we could easily have gotten something bigger for only about a hundred dollars more. That friend is crazy. He may be right, but we live in a small apartment and believe me, anything bigger would not have fit in our living room. No, this TV is just the right size. Not everyone has a big enough living room to hold a 46-inch TV. Well, certainly not us lower middle class folks!What we really like about this Samsung TV is that we can connect it to our Samsung phones (with an MHL to HDMI cable). This is how we have to watch YouTube. That's one thing that disappointed us - this TV (or at least this older model) doesn't have YouTube. We would say that YouTube is right up there with Netflix in popularity, hence why we find its absence from this TV so ridiculous. It has a "LinkToYouTube" app, but it's totally not the same - it just opens YouTube in the browser. The browser, I have to say, only serves to be a nuisance if you don't have a wireless keyboard and mouse. One reviewer said the "Smart" aspect can be very glitchy at times and I agree - an app can, at times, take forever to load, and there have even been times we've had to turn off the TV and turn it back on for it to do anything.Okay, I realize I've contradicted myself in this review. What can I say, I suck at writing reviews. I started out saying it's a good TV, then instead of going into full detail about its pros, I went into full detail about its cons. It is a good TV, just maybe not a good Smart TV. Oh well... It isn't bad for the price! We have had good experiences overall with Samsung products, and aside from the lack of a YouTube app and Smart glitchiness, we would put this TV on our list of good Samsung experiences. Like I said, the picture quality is excellent and the screen mirroring capability with our phones is also pretty sweet. It has us thinking twice about upgrading to iPhones!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what she wanted.....
Reviews.Author: odell gordon
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves the Netflix movie app. With this new smart TV she can watch all of the mermaid movies she wants.

Reviews.Title: value for the money
Reviews.Author: Dennis Black "tool guy"
Reviews.Content: Price is good. There are better TV's but much more expensive. HD and Smart...everything we need. You should buy it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful HD TV
Reviews.Author: KatGrrlCT "K"
Reviews.Content: My first HD TV and I really love it.  It was fairly easy to set up although I needed to call my cable provider to upgrade my service to HD.  The picture quality is really great. Perfect for the price. Excellent value for money.

Reviews.Title: "Glitchy"
Reviews.Author: Steve Miller
Reviews.Content: TV works fine but the smart aspect of it very "glitchy", not enough testing time put into this product to correct the problems. I hope they have a firmware update soon to correct the problems.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV !
Reviews.Author: IAN DOUGLAS
Reviews.Content: The Picture on this TV is awesome! Probably the best I have ever seen. A downloaded HD Netfix version of House of Card just blew me away. The picture alone makes thisTV worthwhile. just from the fact that you have a browser within the Smart TV app makes spending a couple extra bucks all worthwhile. I cant give it 5 stars because my Netflix does not always work the first time with this TV, I actually have to try a couple times sometimes before i can get in. That's pretty annoying because sometimes I have had to give up all together. At least there are many Plan B options. Secondly, you can buy a wireless keyboard to speed up the web browser but the keyboard does not  work properly with the other apps. But did i mention how good the picture is...... You will not be dissapointed with this TV. I have had had it for 2 months already and I have barely scratched the surface on what it can do5/23/144 months into this TV and I can give an update. Picture Quality is still the biggest asset and it has to be mentioned every time especially when downloading stuff off the internet. But I finally found something I have to be critical of and its not because of the TV itself. I think its Samsung. During peak periods when you really want to watch TV using apps such as HBO GO and Netflix do not always load. I used to think this was a problem with bandwidth of my internet supplier but I am almost certain that this is happening because of Samsung. I think that Samsung just cant keep up the demand from all these smart TVs that they are selling. Maybe I am wrong but I hope someone can comment on this. Its getting very annoying

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Megan Corneliusen
Reviews.Content: I love this tv! It has an amazing clear picture. I can watch my prime and Netflix. It picks up your wireless and I have had no connection problems. It is so simply to set up. No regrets with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bing's TV Reviews
Reviews.Author: Bing
Reviews.Content: Wonderful tv for the price.  I bought one two years ago for a christmas present and bought another one to donate to the VA home where I live.  The veterans love it.  Enough said!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: Siobhan Glover
Reviews.Content: I should have bought the wireless keyboard... Love this tv.  User friendly, kid friendly.  I'm really glad we made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Happy Camper
Reviews.Author: Tim Tapio
Reviews.Content: Purchased mine from another source (due to financing). Easy setup. Picture was not bad out of box but I did tweak it some. Sitting on a wire shelf so have a piece of cardboard to support stand, bottom/rear shooting speakers are not bad but weak bass. Going to hook up my logitech surround system (500 watt RMS). Disappointed 1/8" audio out does not vary with volume. Have a set with 220 RMS watts...good bass but I have to get up and adjust. Not good. SRS does have a remote control.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've owned
Reviews.Author: Gulpreet J.
Reviews.Content: Like to start off with the Great picture and impressed by Smart TV features. I used to have to use my PS3 for online features and streaming, but this TV has made it so much easier with all that built right in. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Good buy with some minor caveats..
Reviews.Author: Joe Porto
Reviews.Content: *Amazon was helpful getting me up and running. The apps (netflix, amazon, etc) worked after running some fixes.*The picture quality is good, definitely not great though. Sound is pretty good for a flat.*Hooked up a wireless mouse to the usb to make typing passwords, searches, websites easier.*You can DL pretty much any app that you could from a smart phone, however I have been getting a pop-up notification that paid apps will no longer be available come a certain date, which may have passed already. The free apps are not affected by this.*In my experience the roku box was easier to navigate. The icons in hbogo for example are all aranged vertically, like one long list. Pain in the a$$.*My biggest concern is that Samsung will come out with a new generation smarttv that's better/more user friendly. Hopefully not for a few years.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: William Riera
Reviews.Content: Lots of TV for the money. Sent this to my mom who still had a 25 year old analog tv.  She was amazed at how far technology has gone

Reviews.Title: mini key board is needed
Reviews.Author: soumya ganguly
Reviews.Content: with the changing time Samsung should upgrade is app specially there is a lack of compatible mini keyboard practically none.overall its an OK job decent picture & sound though you need separate sound system if you are serious about building a home theater.specially with this 60 Hz  the price package which vary between 390 to 450 is a good choice  over all its a good TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv but...
Reviews.Author: carla
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV the only thing that I didnt like was the fact that my login and password for the wifi werent saving so each time I want to watch something on netflix i keep having to put in my password.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: P3t3r P
Reviews.Content: Great picture, nice remote, good sound.  We use this in our bedroom.  My only grip was with the "SmartHub".  It did not work and took lots of time to make it work.  Below average support for this.  Once I did firmware upgrades it finally started working with WiFi, but still can't get Netflix to work.  I gave up and bought a Chromecast, which is awesome.  I would not advise paying extra for SmartTv.  I have never used the 3D.All my Samsungs have had awesome pictures.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Bob Beck
Reviews.Content: The Smart Samsung was easy to mount on the wall, features are great and the live support I used was excellent!  Satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: Reasonable priced smart TV set fitting in a tight location. Excellent picture quality.The "smart" feature enabled us to use our internet-connected Blue Ray DVD player with a "dumb" TV elsewhere in the house.

Reviews.Title: Very happy customer!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Carr
Reviews.Content: I love it! The picture is crystal clear, and I love all the features it has. The volume option is great so the volume stays the same no matter what channel or when I play video games. Highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Has been working fine with a couple of complaints
Reviews.Author: Thomas Almy
Reviews.Content: I bought this locally and a good thing since the first one I got started acting up the second day. Replacement has been fine. I needed to simplify operation -- I had an older Samsung LCD HDTV with a computer for "Smart" media access and an AV receiver for source switching and sound bar, but it was just too complicated to use. The computer is still there (the browser in the TV is dreadful) but I no longer use it for Amazon Prime, Netflix, or Plex -- the TV handles these well.What I don't like are the prime, top row placement of services I will never use, for which I expect Samsung gets kickbacks. I found that the AV receiver could still be used but the optical out sound quality was poor with some HDMI sources. It turns out that the TV only forwards 2.0 sound.Operation with the computer connected has been fine. Unlike some other reviews I didn't have to change the input name to "PC" to get a good image. In fact it made no difference what I called it. Computer is a Mac mini so maybe that makes a difference.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Antoinette Williams
Reviews.Content: I must admit we have not used the "smart features" yet because they took quite a bit of set-up. However, love the TV and the picture quality. Gave 4 stars for the lengthy set up but still a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Eric Keiffer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a secondary tv for the basement, primarily to use for Amazon prime and to use for my infant son to watch primes kids programs and he loves it, was really easy to setup and accessing online programs with the samsung smart tv technology is quick and easy, and the interface is much more responsive than my 42" LG smart tv.

Reviews.Title: not very smart
Reviews.Author: Chandan Gaddamanugu "knowledge seeker"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is good - full-hd looks good (atleast to naked eye)Netflix/amazon prime/youtube apps work fine as expected.Works fine with my PS3.Works fine with many video formats through USB as well.Cons-Browser keeps crashingOccasional network connection dropsThe smart is not reliable - I frequently end up connecting my laptop/rasp-pi/ps3 to supplement smart features.You cannot completely replace the smart devices(roku/raspi/ps3 etc) with this TV.

Reviews.Title: amazing purchase
Reviews.Author: stacy gomez
Reviews.Content: The best purchase I could have made..very easy to set up an the picture is amazing highly recommend this purchase to everyone

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, it has a good performance, software & app are amazing.!!!I really  recommend this product for everybody.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: wayne tadlock
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Easy to set up (with instructions from a past user). I can't think of anything I would change, for my use. Therefore five stars are appropriate.

Reviews.Title: It has good functions
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL PLAZA
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother, it is a very nice tv, i just had a trouble with the package because it came whit a small Green point in the screen, on the other hand, it has very nice functions, i can connect it to my wifi and cellphone, just be carefull whit the seller

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: candice caldwell
Reviews.Content: The picture is really great and the sound is good. It's a good value for the smart TV with WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tv!!
Reviews.Author: adriana
Reviews.Content: I bought the samsung smart tv 40' as a birthday present for my husband.. Its an amazing tv.. Of course there are newer and better those days but this one fits perfectly our needs.. And is a good price for a tv. Love that we can download apps and the images are really awesome... Shipping was great, the tv came without scratches or anything...highly recommended

Reviews.Title: I love my Smart TV
Reviews.Author: gooseygirl
Reviews.Content: I received my Samsung Smart TV quickly after ordering it and it works wonderfully. Should have bought one a long time ago.Very glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: E. Karlieva "JK"
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV's performance. It is in use for cable, Apple TV and ChromeCast. The picture and sound are great and it works reliably.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Oswaldo Gomez
Reviews.Content: I chose this rate because I'm happy with the productProduct I like everythingI would recommend this product to all my friends to buy from amazon

Reviews.Title: My new Samsung 32 inch TV.
Reviews.Author: Marilyn K. Ireton "Confused in Raleigh"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV.  It's even better than expected.  Great picture and sound, I don't even need my sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Deanne Schwarting
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Has everything that we ever wanted in one package! It is truly great to be able to pull up Netflix and Amazon Prime without using one of the gaming systems! Picture quality is superb. The sound is ok but when hooked to the surround sound you get the great picture with the great sound!

Reviews.Title: Sound quality
Reviews.Author: Michael Luttbeg
Reviews.Content: sound quality is poor and needs to be turned up higher than my two other samsungs which are smaller and you would think should be poorer

Reviews.Title: Extremely happy with the price and the product!
Reviews.Author: Stumpy
Reviews.Content: I'm not a technophile, I don't know what all the specs mean, I'm slightly colorblind...BUT...I know this tv looks gorgeous to me, runs my ps4 awesomely, and has left me totally satisfied!

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Ruth Morgan "Intelligent Buyer"
Reviews.Content: so far it's been working great, i bought it in october and now it's march.  it's a nice size, gets good resolution and i'm thinking of dropping cable entirely because there's so much available - without commercials - on the web.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Magaly
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and a great addition to our movie world.  VERY light, I was able to carry it up the stairs without struggles.

Reviews.Title: new TV
Reviews.Author: Ji Lin "N2JL"
Reviews.Content: Move down state, new place, new life, NEW TV! I needed a new tv for my place and this one has good review and its cheap so y not. Connect it to my computer and life is good.

Reviews.Title: Didn't love it so much when I installed it - -
Reviews.Author: AnKhe1967 "An Khe"
Reviews.Content: The box was a mess when the UPS driver dropped it off - - the inside packing seemed intact, so I decided to try it.Installed easily - I am using this as a computer monitor (replacing a 27").  Used the HDMI connections.  Fired up on the first try.  As I used it,,, I noticed the screen becoming bright,, then dark - about every minute it just kept cycling.  Drove me nuts.I was going to return it,,, but noticed the Amazon customer service link - NERVOUSLY, I clicked on that.  God help me, the service guy,, knew exactly what to do.  HONEST,, he did.  And spoke the American sub set of English - - fluently.Here's the deal - - - -Yes, it is a "Smart" TV, but not THAT smart.  The light sensing do-hickey - DOESN'T.  Tech guy said "turn it off".  He went through all the "menu poking" parts with me.... problem went away.  I had to wrestle the colors down later, because that "Smart" part is also a bit stupid - - but now it's GREAT.  Might work better as a television - - maybe Samsung could set up a MONITOR default in their menu with all the others.It gets 5 stars - AFTER about 5 minutes work.  Beautiful colors,,, quick refresh,,,, and my 7360 x 4912 pictures are spectacular on this BIG screen.  I finally get to SEE what my Nikon D800 really does does.  This ain't your grandma's picture album....... FINALLYCUSTOMER SERVICE - REALLY!!  it was after 10PM on a Saturday night - I filled in my phone number for a call back, and decided to go to sleep for a while.  WRONG !!  I got a call back in less than a minute.  Almost didn't answer the phone - too late for people to be calling..... who would have thunk it was my return call?

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up, good picture
Reviews.Author: Laina Farmer
Reviews.Content: bought this so we could get rid of our old tv and roku.  Love the app options.  Easy to use.  Also like that you can still watch tv while you're looking through the apps.

Reviews.Title: LOve IT!
Reviews.Author: Mayoh W.
Reviews.Content: The picture quality gets 5/5 based on price($500) and expectation. I had a pioneer kuro 500M If anyone knows what that is. Smart hub is great except could improve navigation. No other issue. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Nothing special
Reviews.Author: Don D. "Don DiNunzio."
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit to replace an old (2009) Samsung LN46B650 46" LCD HDTV that went bad.  I loved the old Samsung but this unit has a 'cheap' look and feel to it.  It has a flimsy metal back and far less AV input & output jacks and the base doesn't swivel.  I also preferred the color and contrast on the older unit.  I'm now sorry that I didn't have the old unit repaired....

Reviews.Title: Great TV and cheaply priced
Reviews.Author: ryan426 "Ryan B."
Reviews.Content: Got this for the bedroom and WOW, it's awesome. Got my tablet, my wife's tablet , & both are laptops sync to it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lag1126
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this TV. Picture quality is great and the smart TV features are awesome too! I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Prairie Person
Reviews.Content: We purchased this Samsung to replace a Sony equivalent that quit working after only 1 year.  We have had the Samsung for several months and love it!  It has great definition and ease of use.  The "Smart TV" app is wonderful for streaming movies, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: Love it and it is the perfect size. Picture is beautiful and very easy to set up. I recommend it to anyone looking for a tv

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 smart tv
Reviews.Author: Wendy B Walker
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is better than I expected and even though it is only a 32inch, the picture seems so much bigger. I have not used all the features like streaming, but am looking forward to doing so.

Reviews.Title: amazing TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: Amazing I love it best TV I've every owned picture is amazing, the smart features rule I just love it.

Reviews.Title: Another Great HDTV from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Randolph Eck
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a good budget 46 inch TV for my sister when I came across this Samsung TV. This appears to be, at the time of purchase, the least expensive of Samsung’s Smart TV series. My main concern was a good picture, but having “smart” features added to the package was icing on the cake. After seeing many good reviews for this TV, I decided to recommend it to my sibling.I can say that I wasn't disappointed by the picture quality. When setting up a new television, I like to find the recommended settings for picture quality. I noticed the recommendations some have provided on Amazon’s reviews. Having a Sound & Vision Home Theater Tune-Up DVD in my possession (a bit dated, but satisfactory for picture setup), I decided to use it to adjust the picture settings. This DVD has test patterns for contrast, brightness, sharpness, color, and tint. Below I list the values I got using this disk:Contrast: 90Brightness: 47Sharpness: 36Color: 40Tint: G46/R54I left the backlight at the default Standard setting of 12. I did not change the default advanced settings either. After the adjustments, the picture looked quite good to me – not that it didn’t look good before. This is the second Samsung TV I have used, and in both cases, the picture looked pretty good right out of the box.When you turn on the TV for the first time, it will walk you through the necessary initial set up including setting your Wi-Fi settings if you are not using Ethernet. If using Wi-Fi, have your passphrase ready to enter.For the Smart TV, there is a plethora of apps just waiting for you to explore. At the top of the screen is Netflix, Amazon Video, Shop TV, M-Go (movies and TV), and HBO GO. Below this are some main apps, such as Samsung Apps, Movies & TV Shows, Fitness, Kids, Media Hub, and Social TV. Below this are even more apps! We have Channel Favorites (program your favorites), Web Browser, Schedule Manager, FIOS TV, VUDU HD, Pandora, Source, Samsung Link, Link to YouTube, Hulu Plus, Explore 3D, Tune-In, and TWC TV. Wow! One note about the Web browser: you will have to navigate using your remote control – not fun. Some people have managed to interface a Logitech keyboard to the TV, but I don’t think this is officially supported by Samsung. It certainly should have been an optional item, I think.Hey, bottom line is: I don’t think you will be disappointed with this affordable TV.

Reviews.Title: Good values
Reviews.Author: M. Welch "Fat Matt"
Reviews.Content: This was a pleasant surprise, The 60 Hz spec was suspect, but didn't affect viewing quality. Other than phones and tablets, I like Samsung products, and their quality.

Reviews.Title: really like this tv!
Reviews.Author: GreenLamper
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up.  I am so happy with the tv and I wonder why I waited so long.  Like it so much I purchased another for my son.

Reviews.Title: Great and Affordable
Reviews.Author: Karen4Kindle "Kindle Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: Hard to beat for the money. Great picture quality, all the streaming apps I use built-in. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST SMART TV FOR THE VALUE.
Reviews.Author: Tyrone Nelson
Reviews.Content: I WAS VERY EXPRESSED WITH THIS LED 40" SMART TELEVISION.THE FEATURES IT GIVES YOU ARE SO UNIQUE & THE VISUAL EFFECTS ARE ASTOUNDING.I COULD'NT ASK FOR MORE.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my tv it has a lot of features that I enjoy I'm glad I chose this tv

Reviews.Title: Smart TV the way to go
Reviews.Author: K. Whitmore
Reviews.Content: I love it, it was actually cheaper than the television I bought last year that did not have wifi. The only problem I have is that it looses connection and my remote needs batteries often

Reviews.Title: A very satisfied customer.
Reviews.Author: Shane B. Glinton Jr
Reviews.Content: I am pretty pleased about the T.V. And it capabilities. Just have to take some time playing with it to get to be familiar with its capabilities. Only thing I regret is that I didn't get a bigger screen... Lol

Reviews.Title: just like the way that i like
Reviews.Author: Hassan Neamah
Reviews.Content: i was really excited to have this tv and when i got it it was amazing and with good price toothanks amazon

Reviews.Title: love the tv!
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: first one came in with the lcd cracked on the inside, called customer service they overnight the new one and it was there the next day, brand spanking new. the border kind of looks cheap but for the functionality and price with amazing picture quality i can't complain a bit!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Nickolas S. Sine
Reviews.Content: its in great condition when it came in and its what I wanted. I love the product,  and nobody recommended it

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: lisa jalet
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv. excellent quality once again and fantastic price. browse the internet so easily. Go on and watch your favorite movies, etc. Easy to use if you are familiar with a computer. Very clear pic. just need to pick up a keyboard instead of using the remote to browse with.  Def. buy!

Reviews.Title: Works fine, requires an Ethernet or wireless Internet connection for all active features
Reviews.Author: Alex King
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my bedroom, after trying a same size off-brand TV that was so poor that I sent it back to Amazon for a refund.  Spending near $200.00 more for the Samsung Smart TV, I am quite happy that I made this choice.  There are many active features and options that use the Internet for updates and such, so it needs a continuous Ethernet or wireless Internet link, preferably high speed of 25 Mbps, at least.  Note that the two USB ports sport different available voltage currents, conveniently printed right next to the USB ports.  To take full advantage of options and the like, you will soon realize that you need at least a wireless mouse, better yet a wireless combo keyboard/mouse.  A full search of eBay using the Samsung model info got me just one source for a wireless keyboard and mouse fully compatible with this particular Samsung model.  Located in the UK, the eBay Seller will work with you, should you find problems, such as my dead keyboard.  Even though the Seller says it is now past the 90 day warranty, he is promptly sending me a tested replacement. Possibly, a wireless keyboard/mouse from Staples will also work.  I went with the one from the UK mostly because it was advertised specifically for this model Samsung Smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Love love love it.....
Reviews.Author: jerry Hurley
Reviews.Content: We got this tv today and so far so good. I got 30 days teck support with amazon. One thing I would like to say is when you first get it there is a button under the right bottom of the tv it's a little wobbly feeling hold that down for a 30 second and then unplug the tv. this gets out the electric when it is shipped.
