That's what the teck told me to do and it worked great. I was able to load amazon prime streaming and netflex pretty easy with the teck's help. I would tell anyone to get this tv and if you have any problems call samsung or amazon. I hope you all love it as much as I do. I will up date as I explore this tv threw the weeks and months.....

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV 32 inch 1080p smart LED
Reviews.Author: Irene Nowak
Reviews.Content: Samsung is a great TV, great color and the picture is really awesome.  I highly recommend this TV especially if you do not spend a fortune in cable TV - you can just get the programs to watch and watch whenever you want to. I rate this a FIVE STAR

Reviews.Title: Great purchase....excellent picture quality. Good wifi connection...but slow server.
Reviews.Author: Steve A. Varela "SAV"
Reviews.Content: The only drawback is the slow Samsung server between most smart tv functions and your viewing eyes.  Our children's programs play for 20 seconds and then stop to collect more data for 20 seconds.The quality as a monitor is good,  live tv is great, and the cost was good.  Just fix the Samsung server, please.

Reviews.Title: Superb n go for it obviously
Reviews.Author: Chirag
Reviews.Content: Amazing quality and truly meeting expectations. All latest applications and did not require to buy additional box as apps are included in the samsung apps only.

Reviews.Title: Next time I'll buy this in a store
Reviews.Author: P. K. Davis "Nana Songbug"
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my husband and I was excited about the possibility of having it delivered to our homerather than having to go out to the stores at Christmastime.  Well, it has never worked right.  It shuts itself off for no reason,the HD does not work, etc.  It's been problematic.  My husband has had to spend hours and hours on the phone trying toget the issues resolved.  He finally had to pay to send it somewhere so they can fix it.  They did e-mail him recently sayingit was fixed and they were sending it back.  Hmmm..  We'll see…..

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Efrain V.
Reviews.Content: its a good tv only issue is the smart hub. if you try to start it too early it won't work. but when it does this tv is really good.

Reviews.Title: exactly what i wanted
Reviews.Author: Trevor Fowler
Reviews.Content: this TV is awesome....I love it. It is a great buy and it is so much more than I expected for the price. I shopped around and had a bad experience with Wal-Mart.com. the TV was right on time like amazon promised and it was packaged well to the point that I don't think that it could have gotten damaged unless the ups truck had a head on collision. Very satisfied with this TV and amazon. I order from amazon at least 3 times a week and I have never had a problem with anything that I have ever purchased from them.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Apiz-Sacks
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV/PC monitor. This Smart TV totally fits the bill for my entertainment and school needs.  Highly recommended. Very pleased with product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I bought this one after buying the 32" model as a test model 8 months ago.  Before I bought this, I read every review on here.  I had concerns about shipping such a large TV. Shipping was wonderful and everything arrived in mint condition.  This TV is simply fantastic in all respects!  Gorgeous picture and I'm addicted to the benefits of having a Smart TV.Go to a box store and they'll caution you about having only a 60Hz refresh on such a large screen. Well, I've watched all kinds of fast moving action on it and it is awesome.  People complain about the Smart Hub updating too often. It does happen a bit more than I would like, but it's not unreasonable.Do your research, as I did mine.  I couldn't be happier with the 50" Smart TV and will encourage everyone I know to buy a Samsung Smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality at amazing price
Reviews.Author: aquido
Reviews.Content: Lighter than expected.Picture quality can't get much better and build quality is very high standard.This is highly recommended to anybody.Great bedroom companion.

Reviews.Title: Love this thing
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: This  has changed my previously tarnished view of watching TV.  My favorite TV shows are so filled with commercials, that I gave up on them.  And, hence, my TV viewing overall.  Then came Samsung Smart!  I subscribe to Amazon Prime, and am watching commercial-free television.  I was debating weaning myself off from TV, before this, but have been so glad that I went with Samsung and Amazon Prime -- this winter has been the pits, and Samsung saved my sanity.  The internet feature works like a charm, and support help is great (I actually had to use it one time, and it turned out to have been an Amazon problem and not a Samsung problem).  Updates are performed regularly and expediently, searching for movie/TV titles is simple, the feature keeps track of what programs I have watched (including those that I wasn't able to finish in one sitting -- allowing me to continue from where I left off), keeps a file of those programs I want to see in the future, and much more.  I haven't taken advantage of other features, yet, but might use the fitness feature in future.  I recommend this, definitely.

Reviews.Title: pretty smart.
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: wish I could get rid of that stupid Android o.s. and download windows. But, it works and the picture in clear.

Reviews.Title: All the modern apps for your video binge!
Reviews.Author: Flint
Reviews.Content: Plug it in, connect to cable and WiFi. Now you can binge on Netflix, Hulu and Amazon prime movies when you've already seen the Law and Order episode on cable.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, nice and light
Reviews.Author: David P. Smith
Reviews.Content: Great picture and performs great. Built in apps are good. The operating system is fast and the interface is easy to use.With HDMI input the picture is incredible.

Reviews.Title: samsung 32" smart TV
Reviews.Author: Lynn Timgren
Reviews.Content: The image on the TV is super clear. Do not like typing letters or words with the keyboard on the tv screen.  Is there a better alternative? Easy set-up.

Reviews.Title: UN40EH5300 LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Packer Fan
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture.  Easy set up.  Smart features work well. Connected Bose Solo sound bar and it is an amazing system. Easy to understand documentation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Patricia L. Hossenlopp
Reviews.Content: We really like the TV.  The setup was relatively easy.  Good picture and sound quality.  We highly recommend this model.

Reviews.Title: Perfect HDHomeRun Prime Solution
Reviews.Author: hilong08
Reviews.Content: This TV is PERFECT for watching premium cable channels from your HDHomeRun Prime box. It also is perfect for DLNA applications as well. Samsung has implemented the DLNA standard very well in my opinion. Controlling the rendering device (TV) and the source (HDHomeRun Prime and media server from Windows PC) from my phone (Android with BubbleUpnp) is great! :DMy Setup:- ASUS RT-N66U Router- HDHomeRun Prime w/ Comcast Servixe- TP-Link Nano Powerline Adapter Kit (AV500)- The SmartTV mentioned aboveThe tv is connected to the powerline adapter which has a connection to the router and the rest of devices. The initial TV setup was simple. Plug in the tv to the network, let it update itself, download HDHomeRun application, and profit. :DOnce the app in the tv was running, it behaved as a real TV where you can enter channel numbers. With other DLNA solutions, you would have to scroll through a list to get to the channel you wanted.  With this, it's like a real tv.In simpler words, this tv is perfect if you just want a tv set to watch TV with your HDHomeRun Prime box.The ONLY con is the fact that the app in the tv WILL NOT run on Wifi for obvious reasons (limited bandwidth over Wifi). You can solve this issue easily with a powerline adapter unless a ethernet connection is available.Also on another note, this tv DOES support 5.0GHz networks out of the box. I could never find the specifications online about the Wifi so I figure this review could answer that question.If you just want a network TV without any other longering boxes connected to it, get this. It'll literally play anything you throw at it, including HDHomeRun Prime channels.

Reviews.Title: Excellent SMART TV option
Reviews.Author: rob horton
Reviews.Content: Great picture, very easy to program, like fit/finish.  Replaced an older TV, really impressed with the quality of this one

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: mindy hayes
Reviews.Content: I love this TV it's perfect. I wish I would of gotten A bigger size but overall amazing.Keep up the amazing work

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Metalman
Reviews.Content: For the price its a great TV. Picture is clear and works great. The remove is a letter hard to nav. Buttons are stiff but I think that will change over time and use. Over all a great TV. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Joni
Reviews.Content: Love this TV! The color of this TV is so amazing. Remote is so easy to use with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: BBB123
Reviews.Content: This is more than expected for the price!  Picture is sharp and the colors are perfect.  No complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Delivered on promised performance
Reviews.Author: RCN
Reviews.Content: Have been using it for 2 months, works well.  Would have been nice to have the same software that is on the 32 inch model but still can do all the things I need it to with a few more clicks.

Reviews.Title: AmAzon Great customer Service..
Reviews.Author: R.W. Lujan
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my Samsung Smart TV! It's my first digital tv.I really like having the access to the apps..

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Jamar Graham
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this TV.  So far it's been a great purchase and we have had no issues.  Time will tell if we get another of larger size.

Reviews.Title: yep
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a 46 inch Samsung smart tv and blue ray player about two years ago and it sold me on there products. this tv is no different, very cool

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Marcus Polk
Reviews.Content: Looks great. Sound could be a little louder but that's what sound systems are for, right? I'm not gonna bore you with any technical stuff but it's been going strong since I bought it in August. Search up a good setup manual to get the picture to your taste and voila. You'll love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Cle216land
Reviews.Content: This tv is a great value. It's my first smart tv and I love that I can listen to Pandora in two clicks. The screen brightness adjust to the lighting in the room and the picture is great. The only downside is that the remote isn't very conducive to surfing the web. I'm probably going to get a wireless mouse or keyboard at some point. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Hunt "Desert Rat"
Reviews.Content: This TV is the bomb!Easy to set up and a pleasure to watch.One thing I did not care for is the built inlight changing feature. It hurt my eyes and seemedto change every few minutes. I adjusted the backlightsetting and that cured the problem. It connected to myInternet Router in a few seconds and I have been enjoyingNetflix and other apps.As far as I am concerned it is a great TV.

Reviews.Title: 4 stars
Reviews.Author: Linda girtley
Reviews.Content: This television is very satisfying.  It was easy to put to as well as easy to program.  Clear picture and great sound.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32 in
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: It's been great. Easy installation ... no make some adjustments to get perfect image as televisorer .. all speakers and are fully sufficient, but I think anyone who likes good sound for movies must have a speaker system or bar sound. Intelligent applications are good and can be found in his shop .. excellent tv

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Anita Bethel
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to order this TV because the reviews I read said that you would have to adjust the settings before the picture was watchable.  NOT SO!  My picture quality was spot on out of the box and the I love this TV.  Don't be afraid to make this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Trip Shannon
Reviews.Content: Very good picture and easy to set up. Nice remote control. Good tv for a bedroom or small den type room.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great greatchoice
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality, good sound. Very light. My first first smart TV, easy easy teaspoons manage and install. Love it

Reviews.Title: Simple and perfect!
Reviews.Author: raja
Reviews.Content: Priced right and i love the natural colors! Have had it for more than a year! Connects well on Wifi and gives a good HD experience.

Reviews.Title: Best Tv I have EVER OWNED!!
Reviews.Author: Tori Powell
Reviews.Content: Small enough to fit on our TV stand and it has the clearest picture I have ever seen. I am really loving this.

Reviews.Title: I Bought It based on Samsun's Qaulity Reputation
Reviews.Author: Paul 1946 "Paul46"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Samsung Smart TV at Costco for about $70 more than this price.  I was interested in the concierge service if I had any issues also 3 yrs warranty that went with the Costco deal.  It replaced my 30 yr. old Motorola that was flawless but we were getting tire of the picture quality and the goofy decoder box issues.The picture quality is excellent with a over the air antenna. Sound quality from the internal speakers is satisfactory for the kitchen area where we have this TV.  If I have any complaints, it is with trying to get all the features and functions I have with my SONY blueray player. I have yet to figure out how to access Crackle with this TV.  The best I can do is access Crackle videos on the YOU TUBE feature.It was very easy to get up and running and connected to my DSL router by following the instructions on the TV screen and the prompts.  I did read the instruction manual and in the manual they referenced a part to keep the TV from falling over with a TV HOLDER set.  It has to be bought as an accessory and does not come with the TV.  I spent the better part of 2 hours in the Samsung "customer service" runaround.  I could not get the part from Samsung online nor could I get it from two different "800" numbers  I was referred to along with all the waiting to get someone to actually take my call. I finally put in a customer service email and it has been two days and no answer to my email query for this part.Bottom line... I like the TV and the build quality on what I received is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Good so far
Reviews.Author: Dave Pace
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, picture is good.  Good TV for the money.  Haven't tried web apps yet, but the web browser is difficult to navigate

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ghandi95
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV.  The quality and picture are fantastic.  I was impressed.  The only real issues I have are the "Smart TV" which I honestly don't used much.  I am not sure how they have the Wifi, build in, but it is not very good.  My connection never holds, thought I have 3 other devices on my WIFI in the exact same location with no issues.  When I do connect, it is very slow.  However, that is not a real issue.  I am not in love with the stand.  But, I plan to hang the TV soon anyway.  Overall, very good product for the cost.

Reviews.Title: Love It.......
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv. I was debating hard on purchasing a tv online. But im very pleased with my purchase. Picture clear, sound great. Linked up quick with my wifi.. I Recommend Purchasing this..

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Laura Lynn Hornick
Reviews.Content: Could not be happier with this product.  It was purchased as a birthday gift for a not-so tech savy person who was able to set it up by himself.

Reviews.Title: Solid Purchase.
Reviews.Author: sxh168
Reviews.Content: Not bad for the price. I only use this TV for netflix/amazon prime so I have no idea how it works with cable; with that said, I have been enjoying the quality of the pictures. Sometimes it gets slow but I'm blaming that on the home internet. The price is pretty cheap for a 40inch as well - and it's extremely light weight which means moving will be a lot easier.The only thing I would want for the TV is better sound; I wonder if I should blame netflix for it, but a lot of times when I have the volume to 100% it's still not quite as loud as I'd like.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Richardson
Reviews.Content: Great quality. Very easy set up. I like the internal wireless router set up for smart TV. Just what we needed for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!!!!!
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: This TV is everything I thought it would be! Samsung is the best! I know nothing about electronic gadgets, so I'm glad there is someoneout there I can depend on for quality products and Samsung has it hands down!!!

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV Purchase
Reviews.Author: B. Hall
Reviews.Content: My wife and I decided to take the 20" Samsung HDTV in our bedroom and move it to the basement to use in our workout area. We bought this TV as a replacement for the bedroom wall.We didn't want to have to string a bunch of cables or worry about connecting other streaming devices externally, so a Smart TV seemed like the best option. The UN32EH5300 seemed like the perfect size and price, and had all of the features we wanted.This is an excellent TV. The picture quality is as good as our larger Sony HDTV in the living room, the TV is very light so I feel good about it being secure to the wall mount, and the Smart Hub is incredible. With all of the built in apps (like Netflix, YouTube, Amazon Prime, etc), we almost don't need much else for this TV. However, the Samsung Link option, which I didn't know much about when we bought the TV, has turned out to be an amazing feature. I can send any video, music or image content from my laptop or Surface directly to the TV wirelessly. On the laptop, I just had to install the Samsung Link software, and on my Surface, I just have to use the built-in "Play-To" feature, which didn't even require any setup for sending content through the Surface desktop screen (although there was a registry change I had to make to get it to work flawlessly with the Metro Apps, but that was on the Surface side of things, not the TV). The YouTube app is great because you can pair the TV with your YouTube account and send videos directly from any device as long as YouTube is open on both the device and the TV.Even though the Sony TV in our living room has a Smart Blu-Ray player and a PS3 hooked up to it with all of the same apps, the ability to use the Play-To feature and direct sending of content from devices and YouTube on the Samsung TV make me wish our Sony TV had the same ability.Overall, this was a great purchase that we've been very happy with.

Reviews.Title: More consistent quality
Reviews.Author: Norman K. Weiner "NormCIO"
Reviews.Content: Fifth Samsung HDTV.  Price is right.  Size is perfect for the room.  Smart functions are outstanding, and will be the basis for severing the content link to the monolith in Philadelphia.

Reviews.Title: good smart tv at this price
Reviews.Author: zj
Reviews.Content: TV is easy to setup and use, no problem in my first month usage, I trust samsung's quality and the features are good to me.

Reviews.Title: This is an amazing (!!!) TV
Reviews.Author: Cindy Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a great television!  I am so happy with it.  Great picture, color, sound plus all the benefits of a smart TV.  I am thrilled with my choice!

Reviews.Title: High quality worth the price
Reviews.Author: snowhuskyboy
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear HD picture and sound.  Easily compatible with local cable hookup.  I mounted this TV on a wall without difficulty--very light and no problems with an after-market mounting bracket.  The Olympics coverage never looked so good!

Reviews.Title: First One Shipped Was Broke. Second Shipment Perfect
Reviews.Author: Destin Darren Jones
Reviews.Content: I ordered this 40" Smart TV for my bed room and mounted it up, however, I had to wait for the second TV, because  the first one was shattered from my shipping service UPS, but still I got the second one free so I am okay with that. It is nice to be able to watch Netflix on my new smart TV without having to use an HDMI plug in with my PC. The apps that come with the TV are great. I love the YouTube application. I am a college student living with my parents, and this TV kills out that school stress if that makes this product look any better. The price is nice and so is the display. My rating that I will give this TV is a 10/10

Reviews.Title: Samsung TVs has come a long way
Reviews.Author: Pavel Mekler
Reviews.Content: After seeing  the Samsung 52" that my Dad had purchased I had to get it for my self. And let me tell you that it was not what I had hoped for, it was better. And the only this I might add to Samsung people is that if you going to support Skype as an app on your TV please do people a favor and have a built in video camera that would be great. OK!!!!! TX

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Tom McGrath
Reviews.Content: Overall a great tv. Only downside is the base. Just a tad flimsy. But it you mount it on the wall this tv is 5 stars..

Reviews.Title: Samsung Once Again Delivers the Goods!
Reviews.Author: Shjon Gilbertson
Reviews.Content: Samsung TV's have always performed well for me.  In fact I am waiting for my 55" DLP to die so that I can upgrade to a newer model!  But alas it keeps on kicking!This 40" LED for under $500 bucks is a steal at the price.  Very impressed with the 'smartness' of this smart TV.  It's synced to my router easily and shows it as an input for media streaming, automatically!!As noted on other reviews, you must update the software to the smart hub to get all the latest apps, etc, but once done logging into netflix and amazon prime was flawless!I ran into one small glitch when I did the initial wifi scan, it seems to hang and may have self recovered but I being the typical male unplugged it after about 30 seconds.  Second attempt was very smooth.Great picutre.. decent sound (wasn't expecting to be blown away by the speakers anyway)  Mounted to the [Cheetah Mounts ALAMLB Articulating Arm (20" Extension) TV Wall Mount Bracket for 23-55 inch LCD, LED and Plasma Flat Screen TVs up to VESA 400x400 and 66lbs, with full Ballhead Tilt, Swivel, and Rotation Motion, Including a Twisted Veins 10' Braided High Speed with Ethernet HDMI Cable and a 6" 3-Axis Magnetic Bubble Level] perfectly without the extension arms.Cannot recommend this TV higher.  Great item at this price!  Looks awesome on my wall!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING TELEVISION!!!
Reviews.Author: Brit  Engbrecht
Reviews.Content: I COULD NOT BE HAPPIER!  THIS TV IS WHAT I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR & AT THE RIGHT PRICE TOO.  THE PICTURE IS BRILLIANT AND THE HUB MENU MAKES TV WATCHING SO ENJOYABLE!

Reviews.Title: I would Buy it again
Reviews.Author: kjanai
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent TV/Monitor I use it as a computer monitor and it is great at an awesome price.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: RUTH SMITH
Reviews.Content: Bought for a friend as a birthday gift and he loved it and it was everything that Samsung states it is and will do.  Cannot go wrong with this purchase!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Latoya Reid
Reviews.Content: After returning one of these because of malfunction, I am very satisfied with this replacement. The picture quality is very great! The apps, especially Youtube and Netflix, are very convenient.The only drawback is that the internal memory is limited and I am not aware of how to increase the memory.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: S. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: its a great TV for the price i paid for it and it shipped really fast  this is the first TV i ever order from amazon

Reviews.Title: Smart is not smart, blotch at the bottom
Reviews.Author: veletsky
Reviews.Content: It is OK as a bedroom TV. The SMART feature is not that smart with YouTube getting suspended after about 15 minutes of watching.Better buy an HDMI transmitter/receiver pair (Actiontec, for example) and use your PC for streaming.  Transmitter connects to PC,receiver connects to TV. Also the screen has a 3 inch blotch at the bottom that is visible when viewing dark scenes. Unfortunately, I did not watch it often during the return time window. Don't make the same mistake!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for a few months now, and I'd have to say it's definitely worth your money! Although I mainly use mine for gaming. The only thing I found a little disappointing is the sound quality for movies... You can barely hear the people talking, while the background audio is over powering. It gets rather frustrating with movies. Luckily I purchased a surround sound system that went nicely with this tv. All in all this tv is great! The picture is great, the size is great. The smart features are a little last gen, but they're a nice addition to have. As I said I'm a gamer, and use this tv for video games. So it has provided me with everything I was looking for. It is not a perfect television but works great for my use! If you want a tv for movies and television I'd recommend looking for a different tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV Horrible Shipping From Amazon
Reviews.Author: Tina Phan
Reviews.Content: When I first received the TV, I unboxed it and set it up and turned it on only to realize there was a small-ish scratch on the screen (about an inch or two long). I hadn't noticed earlier but there was a hole in the front of the box as if someone jabbed it from an angle with a pole or metal rod or something. I had tried to call Samsung and they were super terrific but since this was not a defect in the product but a problem that occurred due to Amazon's handling, I had to try to return it with them first. I returned it at the nearest FedEx and waited for a replacement from amazon.When the replacement came i did a quick scan of the packaging but it was dark on my porch. It wasn't until the delivery man drove off that i noticed in the exact same spot as the previous box there was a similar hole jabbed. I really didn't want to deal with returning and waiting for what will probably be another jabbed box so I decided I will be getting a refund if this TV was also broken. Anyways, I unboxed it and thankfully the hole was much more shallow than the first and did not reach the TV.I'm no expert on tv or electronics but it works. Surfing the web is a pain in the ass with the remote. And I only use this connected to a PS3 or computer with an hdmi cable and it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Crystal Clear
Reviews.Author: Rene Duran "MD"
Reviews.Content: You Have to witness it yourself the Tv looks amazing, everything looks sharp and clear and very vibrant. I Recommend it.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: CRD
Reviews.Content: Our first flat screen. I am not that technology savvy, and I was easily able to set this up! we love it!!! Great picture, great sound, and I love having pandora, netflix, amazon movies all on my TV!!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor digital tv reception with internal tuner
Reviews.Author: Chris K. Jacobsen
Reviews.Content: I like the picture quality and the remote features, but after setting it up and connecting it to our antenna the reception has been poor, especially on local channels. The picture breaks up sometimes, and is very annoying. I have a Vizio TV on the same antenna and I have not had the same problem with it, it works fine. It must be the internal receiver in the Samsung itself that is weaker or something. Not sure. If you have a rooftop antenna for digital reception, think twice about purchasing this TV.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv 32
Reviews.Author: Luis Vivas
Reviews.Content: all well recommend 100% in good condition came to Venezuela was nice buying this new product without further ado thanks.Excellent

Reviews.Title: Good tv, decent price.
Reviews.Author: Larry D. Davis II "ldavis"
Reviews.Content: Great tv, with good picture. Easy to set up. Would give 5 stars except the internet browser is not the greatest. Remote should have a mini keyboard. Bought an aftermarket keyboard but it didn't work with this tv. All, in all, you can't go wrong with this one!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Kristen L Michaud
Reviews.Content: Our old Samsung TV had some issue with the Power On function, so it was time to get a new one. The 40-inch is perfect size for our living room, not too big, but definitely big enough that you can read the guide very well. The picture clarity on the TV is great, and I think overall Samsung does a really nice job with TVs. Haven't really explored the SmartTV aspect of it, except for using our Netflix subscription through it. But maybe as time goes on we'll explore more functions on it, especially when we decide to move away from cable.

Reviews.Title: Bought today and happy so far...
Reviews.Author: Loves2Read
Reviews.Content: Bought this today and installed it--fairly easy--needed the builtin WiFi cause we have no wired connection available upstairs--thought to get a 40" same model from Costco vs Amazon cause Costco has sale on but when we got there and saw how large the screen was compared to the older model "tube" tv we were taking out, it was no brainer to go with 32 and save some more money...not as cheap as Amazon's price but we get extra year's warranty from Costco for free...Anyway--easy to install--put stand together and got batteries in remote...diconnected the older tv and moved this onto shelf in armoire...nicely balanced in the 37 inch shelf--40" would have fit but probably looked too big for the space...Easy to connect the WiFi eventhough our hub is downstairs...Once I connected the cable box I was able to change the viewing options over to the HD 1080p and got a great picture...I may try to calibrate using some suggestions on other reviews -- I did change some levels but even just out of the box the picture was so much better than what was there that making adjustments is the least of the worry...Took a while to download the Samsung apps for Netflix and Amazon Prime (and some others that apprear to be mandatory like Hulu and UTube which I don't use)--there is a memory ceiling with this so if you wanted to get all crazy and download all available I don't know you could but the only other one I might want is Skype and need camera for that first...The sound seemed very clear using TV speakers--and there are some options o the meny to change setting so you can fiddle with dynamic quality there too...The only thing that is a little offputting is going back and forth between watching U-Verse cable and using the SmartHub for Netflix and Amazon Prime...Once I touch the SmartHub button and get those options showing--IF I want to go back to cable viewing my option is to either go BACK< BACK<BACK<BACK< however many times it takesor to use the SOURCE button and go back to the HDMI1 for cable...I didn't spend much time reading instructions so maybe there is easier way--I was able to easily tie the Samsung remote for ON/OFF and volumn to my U-Verse (silver) remote but I will still need the Samsung for going to/from the SmartHub choices...didn't want a DVD player for this room--have blu-ray and Xbox and Wii in gameroom upstairs and one (Sony smart blu-ray) for main tvgetting better quality flatscreen w/built in wi-fi just seemed smarter way to go for this particular room--and it is light enough that we can take it outside in summer if we want and watch on the patio...have cable run there already...

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Mossy
Reviews.Content: TV has everything I could need: 3 hdmi ports (for various devices) and 2 usb ports with the ability to play video files through the usb ports. Didn't need the 'smart' aspect of this tv and will probably never use it since I own a Chromecast. The only reason I bought this model over the 5000 series was for the extra hdmi and usb ports. Since the difference was only $13, why not? The only gripe I have with this tv is the plastic used to attach to tv monitor to the bezel. While screwing the stand into the monitor one of the screws popped up essentially destroying the track the original screws were made for. Had to find a slightly larger screw and make a new track, works fine. Just be careful when screwing the pieces together.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup and features are unlimited
Reviews.Author: Vishnu Vijayakumar "dealdemon"
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy setup for internet using wifi or LAN. The features and apps are unlimited.Great buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: I highly recommend this item
Reviews.Author: Nora C.
Reviews.Content: This item has a picture perfect view..very clear and wi-fi works awesome. I most certainly recommend it for family entertainment. I use Netflix and never have had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: AZDAD
Reviews.Content: This TV has an awesome picture. The HD quality makes the images on screen jump out at you. Very nice TV

Reviews.Title: Great Deal....
Reviews.Author: Ajay
Reviews.Content: I have brought this TV on Thanksgiving that time price was very less as, its quality is great,works great...the only issue with its browser browser will not work for online streaming movies....

Reviews.Title: Great TV but smart hub is terrible
Reviews.Author: Kojo P.
Reviews.Content: I should have bought the non smart hub version of this television and used the money saved to buy a roku. I have yet to get online with this thing. The smart hub just refuses to connect to the internet.UPDATE: Looks like the issue was with the country. Thanks to the reviewer who mentioned trying that, once the country was updated to USA smart hub finally worked!

Reviews.Title: It's funny
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Jackson
Reviews.Content: Today marks one year that I have owned this tv. It is also the first day that my tv started cycling on and off by itself. I am about to order a repair kit for the powersupply. Avoid purchasing this tv unless you can fix it, want to deal with technicians, or feel the need to buy a new one next year.

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: ca tuttle
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it.  It came quickly and was relatively easy to set up.  What a difference from my 20 year+ 13" TV.  If I can set it up anyone can.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present for my son.  He love having the smart tv in his room.
Reviews.Author: rose follett
Reviews.Content: This Christmas present was the best for my son.  He can now play his games in his room and I got back my living room.

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Allen Crawford
Reviews.Content: Only had it a month.  Looks and sounds great.1080psounds good stand aloneDirectv capableeasy to usebuy one now!

Reviews.Title: Very buggy software
Reviews.Author: J. Gettys
Reviews.Content: Quality of picture is what you would expect from a Samsung HD TV but this models software driving the SmartTV functionality is very bad.  As of 2/19/2014 I have received three updates since I received it a couple weeks ago.  You must wait a minute or two after turning it on before pressing the SmartTV button or it will freeze with a spinning "connecting" icon.  Several times during the short period I have had it the NetFlix, TED and HBOGo apps would either stall "Connecting" requiring a restart of TV or the TV would simply power itself off after a minute of two of starting the application.This TV has NO PHYSICAL BUTTONS!  Lose the remote and you must order a new one or hopefully have an app on your phone.UPDATE: Seems to be getting SmartTV Hub updates once every couple of weeks.  Today (2014-03-09), in NetFlix, the unit froze with an occasional burst of audio while playing a NetFlix show.  Only way out was a power off.

Reviews.Title: Decent after all the updating
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "student"
Reviews.Content: Samsung's SmartHub is slow to install updates, but it is fine afterwards. I think the stand could be more solid or heavier. The auto-dimming was annoying, so I turned that off. Otherwise, the TV is decent.

Reviews.Title: Excellant Product
Reviews.Author: Skippy
Reviews.Content: I gave this TV 5 stars because for me this was a excellent buy.  I can look at my On Demand Amazon digital videos without a Roku box (and I love Roku).  The picture quality is beautiful.  I love being able to log into the internet without booting up my laptop.  The price was so affordable.  I connected the Bose Solo to the TV and the whole setup is awesome.  I would recommend this TV for anyone who loves good quality merchandise.

Reviews.Title: samsung 46 smart tv
Reviews.Author: jerry van leeuwen
Reviews.Content: THIS TV IS OUTSTANDING AND I AM GLAD WE PURCHASED THIS.THE APPS ARE EASY TO USE AND I CAN CHECK MY EMAIL FROM MY COUCH.

Reviews.Title: We like it
Reviews.Author: Longo
Reviews.Content: Provides an excellent picture and sound. Better then the 31" Sony plus it is a "smart tv" which I have not learned to use. Also it was priced better then Sam's or Samsung websites.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Vince Rock
Reviews.Content: This unit is a gem.  I hung it on the wall, plugged it in, and it has worked perfectly with a sharp picture from the get go.  I really like Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Jeanne718
Reviews.Content: I just love my new TV.  The set up was easy as I followed the advice I read from other customer reviews .  It's very intuiative and I have had few problems navigating through it.  I did have a problem with connectivity, and the Amazon support line helped me solve it.

Reviews.Title: Holy Cow!  Excellent
Reviews.Author: Another Opinion "AO"
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture.  Sound isn't too bad, but I don't use the speakers in the TV.  Remote is easy to use.  I'm not a TV snob about all the bells and whistles these things offer, so do your research.  I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joanne K.
Reviews.Content: This tv has been a joy. Great picture and sound. Just like I am at the movies.Good job Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Just a great TV.
Reviews.Author: DrakeStonecastle
Reviews.Content: Well priced, and just a phenomenal product. While I tend to use it as a companion to my Macbook Pro for entertainment and video editing, I've been very impressed! My own critique is that the shipment came without screws, so I had to request them -- but Samsung support was quick to send the missing parts. Awesome TV!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: selective
Reviews.Content: This is truly a great buy. I'm not computer savvy, but a short tutorial from my daughter set me on my way.The picture is amazing,  and it was worth every penny I spent!

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Annie "brasilmom"
Reviews.Content: SO far so good, easy hook up picture is fine, I have it attached to an regular antenna and it looks real nice

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Shonae Gillespie
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv. Great picture and sound. It was very easy to set up. Cool apps too.  Great price.

Reviews.Title: FAST DELIVERY
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My TV came very fast and in great condition and the price was amazing! I would definately reccomend this to people who are looking for afforable tvs

Reviews.Title: Yes
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: My cable has been out for two weeks now. My satellite receiver/dish has been covered with snow and ice  on  the roof of my home....Wait for its...Wait for it...I've  been using my smart tv and I have  internet, YouTube, netflix and more..hahaha..I am ahead of my time :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent value.
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: This product is easy to use and a great picture quality.  We use our apple tv with it and also use Hulu and Netflix in addtion to regular tv and DVD use.  Would definitely recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: A Christmas Gift To Myself
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader
Reviews.Content: My old t.v. was on it's last leg and I knew it was only a matter of time before I would be forced to purchase a new t.v. When I cam across this t.v. I was excited due to it's price, and yet apprehensive purchasing a t.v. where I couldn't actually see it's capabilities prior to purchasing. However, knowing the ease with which I've had in returning a couple of items to Amazon in the past, I was willing to take the chance.I'm not a techie, so there may be features that are not as great as some would like, or could use a bit more oomph, but for my general needs in t.v. watching this is a great t.v. The sound is excellent - I rarely have it over 5 on the volume scale and often times it's a 4. It's great to access my amazon prime via the t.v. and watch movies, shows, etc., on the t.v. itself rather than always on my kindle. The picture is fabulous. I've only had the t.v. for approx 2.5 months, and to date I have no complaints what so ever.

Reviews.Title: Keep Getting Better!
Reviews.Author: Tex
Reviews.Content: These smart Samsung TVs just keep getting better, in my opinion.  A year or two ago I bought one, and I was very pleased with the then status of the "apps" and watching Amazon or Netflix or Hulu directly on my TV.  They're way better now.  I'm loving the new "YouTube TV" function where I can watch a saved playlist on my TV.  So cool!My only complain, having bought a Visio Smart TV Xmas of 2012, is the controller.  Love that it has a light feature on the remote that I can turn on and off.  BUT, the awesome thing about Visio's controller was that on the back, it had a full keyboard.  Makes it so much easier for logging in to my applications without having to get a separate keyboard for the TV.Fabulous quality picture.  Suprisingly good sound.  No complaints here!  It's just more and more impressive in quality.  :o)It was also very well packaged and had excellent instructions to install the base/stand.  Very clever.

Reviews.Title: Recent Hub Software Updates break Amazon Instant Video and Netflix
Reviews.Author: Anne Milanese-scanga
Reviews.Content: I have owned this TV for several months, however, for the last month or so, both Netflix and Amazon have not been working.  I tried reporting it to Samsung, but the customer service reps simply state that a fix is in the works, with no additional details and no work-around options (uninstalls/re-installs).  If you are considering this TV, I would not accept any of the SW updates, but the Netflix application should work right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV is a smart buy
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome. The picture and sound are exceptional. I have always bought the Sony, but was persuaded by a friend to try Samsung. Good decision!The "smart" features were very easy to set up; the on-screen help is very good.No regrets!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Mohan Menon "Tech Buyer"
Reviews.Content: Samsung has always had great quality.  Bought this during 2013 Thanksgiving (Black Friday) sale.  So far no problems.  I like the fact that it is a "smart" TV.  Will be buying a 65" or 70" Samsung for the media room soon.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: G. Page
Reviews.Content: great color , apps work flawless i paid under $400 to my doorstep around black friday , but do get a soundbar the speakers are real poor !

Reviews.Title: My new but dated Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Hilda T. Brower "H Terri Brower"
Reviews.Content: I got this new TV b/c it was larger than the one I had.  I rarely use the Smart features & it took me awhile to sign into the apps.  It is not interactive & you cannot browse on this dated model, but it is fine for me.  It is a Samsung like the one I replaced & I do not notice any difference in the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: recommend this product
Reviews.Author: luis Hernández
Reviews.Content: This product is working perfectly love and love all the functions, all the apps working perfect, colors are nice,  thinking on buying a bigger one!!

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: d.ross
Reviews.Content: I have had Samsung products before and they have always been good. this one does not disappoint in it's look or performance.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Ryan Barnes
Reviews.Content: This tv is everything i wanted. Good size for the room its in; smart functions work great; picture and sound are solid.

Reviews.Title: fancy
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from an old JVC tube type so to say the least I was blown away by the sound quality and picture quality

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase for Personal Use
Reviews.Author: Joe Kim
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my own use in the bedroom. Hooked it up to my router, a PC, my PS3 system (soon PS4), and a cablebox. Handles everything smoothly. There is however a bit of a set-up process you need to go through. The top comment in the reviews definitely helped me out a lot. The picture is a thousand times clearer. Also when you're naming your sources, name it accordingly so the TV system knows how to translate it. My PC didn't come up too clear until I changed the source name to PC. Just a heads up! Otherwise great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Teresa A. Keller "SD GOATS"
Reviews.Content: This tv is wonderful.  Quality picture and I like the Smart part of it.  Trouble is all these "smart" products are smarter than me.

Reviews.Title: Best for the price
Reviews.Author: Angad Pal Singh
Reviews.Content: I mainly bought this for its Wifi support. I couldn't find another TV that was priced under $500 (40-inch) and had wifi support. Been using it for 6 months and works great till date. The specs say it is CMR 120 as opposed to CMR 240 on newer sets but that didn't matter to me too much.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch
Reviews.Author: Deborah Acuff
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a first rate TV.  Easy to set up.  Our Haier abruptly died after two years of use.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40-Inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Friar Tuck
Reviews.Content: Nice unit for a reasonable price! Had to monkey with settings a bit for better picture but well worth it!

Reviews.Title: Great picture.
Reviews.Author: Hilary B. Wagner "Hilary"
Reviews.Content: With a few clicks you are on Netflix or the internet.  The price was great.  Samsung makes great products.  You can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: nice set
Reviews.Author: William T. Gilbert III
Reviews.Content: this TV works, good.  one thing, when I ordered it, it had said in the spec.s that it had 3 HDMI inputs.  well I got the exact same model that was in the spec.s I looked at, it only had 2 HDMI inputs.  I can handle that, I just need to get a good HDMI Switch.  on HDMI Switch, don't buy too cheap, or it might not work on some inputs or any inputs, or who knows what problems can come with buying too cheap.  FYI: on the TV, I am talking brand new, so, nobody had better have modified it, and I don't think it was modified, it just came from the factory with only 2 HDMI inputs.  It is a real nice set, however.  one thing with Samsung, in my experience it can be very hard to register the product on line.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound
Reviews.Author: J Berman
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box the picture quality was amazing, hard to believe the quality at this price.  Easy to set up the optional features.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Value
Reviews.Author: Reasonable Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I have had this for about 2-3 months and it is a great TV.  The Smart feature works really well and I can view my Amazon Prime Videos on it without needing a Roku or anything else.  Samsung makes great TV's.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TV
Reviews.Author: Survivor "formerly confused"
Reviews.Content: Happy with it.  40" is a big screen for us.  it is very clear, easy to use.  I like the smart tv/internet availability.  Very happy with it, fits our needs fine.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Arlin E Peeples
Reviews.Content: My smart tv has exceeded my expectations as have been able to link to hulu and also amazon prime. Was very easy to do and has many useful apps.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Valeria
Reviews.Content: Get rid of your cable bills this Smart TV Smart Hub is the best I would recommend  and the price was great. When it arrived we placed on stand and on tv stand and the sound and picture is excellent what I expected in this tv

Reviews.Title: Generic headline summary
Reviews.Author: Adam Donze
Reviews.Content: This is a copy and paste to meet the requirements to rate the product. Anything outstanding or awful is hand written.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Penny Grass
Reviews.Content: Great TV in the den, picture is pure and sound is better than expected . The price is a true value

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: cheryl morrison
Reviews.Content: Absolutely a great purchase. Was a gift for my mom and she loves it. Very clear pictures and a great smart TV

Reviews.Title: Great Price for a quality television
Reviews.Author: Lewis Jones
Reviews.Content: I purchased thi television for my guest room and it was very easy to setup it has an amazing picture the color is great and connecting to the internet was as easy as one, two ,three. there is alot of things that can done on this television and I would I say it just amazing for the price that I paid

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Earthy
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice TV for under $300.  Very nice picture and loads of features.  You can't go wrong at this price.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Picture, Small Price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Grogan
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for a smart tv. We bought it using the cyber monday deals and saved some money doing that, however the price is right almost any time. We have the big brother to this tv in our living room, a 55" and liked the picture on that tv, so we figured we would give this a try as well.The picture is outstanding. We had to upgrade our settop box with Verizon FIOS for HD, but the picture quality is amazing.We also like the smart hub and use it all the time to watch Amazon Prime on demand videos.We mounted this tv on the wall using a VideoSecu LED LCD TV Wall Mount Full Motion Swivel Articulating Arm mount and havent had any issues yet. The two items together make a great pair.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: bigben
Reviews.Content: Does everything I want it to do and more. It can handle a usb keyboard and mouse combo and a usb Webcam.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SMART TV
Reviews.Author: Bob S. "Classical Music Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: This is a super TV and I can't think of anything but positives to describe it.  The picture's great, the menus/controls intuitive, and even the sound pretty good (although we use an external surround-sound system).  We got it for a super price on Black Monday at Amazon and have been very pleased since.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good Tv
Reviews.Author: Stafford Gaitor
Reviews.Content: This t.v. was bought as a gift for someone.  They like the t.v., apps and wi-fi but the browser could have been better.  Other than that she loves her gift and would recommend it to other people.

Reviews.Title: NOT SO SMART AFTER ALL; I ENDED UP BUYING A ROKU BOX
Reviews.Author: alltatup
Reviews.Content: I could have saved myself $100 (which would have paid for the Roku) if I had done more research before I made this purchase. After hassling with this tv just about every time I would turn it on (I'd have to log in again, it would need to update itself, which took forever, it would lose wireless  connection etc.), I bought a Roku which I use exclusively now and everything is smooth as can be.So I give this smart tv a C-/D+.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Camilo Acosta
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I wanted to make sure to get a smart TV for our new home.. We came up on this one, at a good price from Amazon and we are pretty satisfied. It comes with a web browser and some Samsung Smart Apps. You can add more if you want but it's basically all you need in a TV nowadays.Only thing that could def be better is the control (for typing and stuff it would be better to get a wireless keyboard).

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great sound
Reviews.Author: David Schulman "DS"
Reviews.Content: The built in web browser is fairly clunky, so if we want to watch something off the web (like recent tv shows that are on NBC's or PBS's web site, we'll plug a tablet or laptop in with an HDMI cable. I keep a 15' cable plugged in, and coiled behind the tv so it's easy to grab and plug in. However, the built-in Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and other apps are excellent.

Reviews.Title: The Wave of the Future Smart App TV.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I received the LED HDTV and it was not that hard to set up. The only thing lacking were connectors for the sound into the cabloe box. Luckily I had an old set and plugged it in. The sound came out perfectly I then tried the Netflex app, and surfed the web. They're going to have to work on an efficient pointer for surfacting. Although the remote does it, it's a little slow. Otherwise, clear picture, wonderful shopping and movie experience. The assembly of the base took a few minutes. I highly recommend this product and give it a thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Chrismas Gift.
Reviews.Author: Chino
Reviews.Content: IT was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves it .also my grandson loves it made their Christmas.

Reviews.Title: High Quality Viewing at an Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Persen
Reviews.Content: Samsung Smart LED HDTVs provide high quality 1080i screen resolution at the best price on the market. The set is easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Need more functions
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: This TV its very cool, it has some apps like youtube and u can see videos and get into facebook, but need more smarts functions like operating by voice, recognizing movement, a wifi keyboard (its dificult to write on the tv) 4/5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Semmelweis
Reviews.Content: Had this TV for over 2 months and have no real complaints.  Use it as my secondary TV and for my son's Xbox when he is home.  He has no complaints other than he wanted the 60 inch.The Smart TV feature is great for Netflix, HBO, Amazon Prime and other web based services.  I don't use it for cable so I can not comment on that.  But for my needs it works without a problem.As always never enough HDMI inputs but not a real problem.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Orlando Eusebio Ozoria "Orlando Eusebio Ozoria"
Reviews.Content: This product is completely new and original fulfilling all the expectations described by the salesperson recommends it thoroughly and I am according with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Wish I Had Gotten a regular TV and a "smart" blu ray player
Reviews.Author: Amanda Koch
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is just what I expected in regards to the picture quality. If I could do it again, I wouldn't buy the "smart TV" since that doesn't really function all that well. My $60 blu-ray player I have in another room works far better than the TV does. My netflix crashes frequently, the apps that come with it don't have great content, opening up the smart hub is slow...all in all its just not a great solution.If you are looking at the TV just for the TV itself, then I would recommend it but don't pay more to get the "smart" capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Well done, all.
Reviews.Author: Rob Young
Reviews.Content: Good price for what has turned out to be a great product.  I had a Samsung for 12 years that needed to be replaced (it was working but was beginning to have a few very minor "issues").  The 40" size was perfect for my existing space.  The picture quality was what made me decide to buy this TV.  That fact that it was a "Smart TV" was just a curious extra.  A reviewer on Amazon suggested some changes to the default picture settings so that I knew ahead of its arrival what to change; and those recommendations were perfect. Look them up.  There have been some reported issues with the Smart Hub feature, and I did experience some delay over a day or two waiting for Samsung to fix that problem.  The web seemed to be full of very irritated owners, but I found Samsung to be genuinely interested in fixing and improving the software.  The TV arrived earlier than promised (good thing), was well packaged, and was very easy to set up (by myself).  The Samsung web site has good documentation for the user community.  I have been taking advantage of the Amazon Prime trial offer, and it has been working seamlessly with the Samsung TV.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: Thomas R.
Reviews.Content: got this for my kids for Christmas. the picture and sound are nice, with a lot of cool features. They love it

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth16
Reviews.Content: We got this TV today and put it up with the Cheetah wall mount. The picture is really nice and all the smart features on it are really neat!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS TV
Reviews.Author: ROGER G
Reviews.Content: I read some of the reviews  and don't know why they had their experience.  I have several TV's andfind this one perfect for my use.  It may not be perfection, but you will spend more money for perfection.This is a good value for the money and I am buying another one when I end this.

Reviews.Title: TV is fine - instructions poor
Reviews.Author: UXO Aware
Reviews.Content: We love the HD picture this TV provides. Semi-gloss screen still has a problem with bright (daylight) light in room. HUGE difference in image quality between old coax cable (poor, noisy) and new HDMI connections (crisp, bright, lucid).Setup was pretty easy, even for older not-early-technology-adopters, though the instructions hardly helped wander through the morass of settings to get things fine-tuned. Instructions for taking advantage of much-vaunted Prime video are woefully inadequate, and we still haven't been able to figure out how to take advantage of that paid-for "benefit".We were not able to activate Close Captioning for hearing-impaired guests - dunno why.Prompt shipment, through truly horrid/dangerous winter weather, was appreciated!

Reviews.Title: Major issue not discussed often
Reviews.Author: Richard Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model television and I have to admit I think it is fantastic. I like toys and I like having all the apps etc. on the television. I will need to move it around in the house to find a good location because it doesn't handle light very well - even with the Eco Sense shut off.What this review is about is a major flaw in my opinion. I have ADSL internet service and have never experienced an issue with my internet service since it was installed. The same day I purchased the television, my internet service became intermittent and unreliable. I work from home most days and losing service is a major earth-shattering issue for me. I contacted my provider and they insisted the problem was that I customized my modem and created my own private IP scheme instead of using the default. Any fellow IT jockey out there knows this is definitely not the problem. Although tech support insisted nothing was wrong, I am extremely upset Centurylink would employ tech support idiots that suggest having a valid private class C addressing scheme is preventing the problem.Two days later, I'm calling the local cable company for quotes to bring in internet. I then noticed a miraculous event - my internet is working fine but as soon as I watch the news, it goes out. I isolated devices on my network and lo and behold, this television is messing with my ADSL signal. I moved the modem to a different room than the television and all issues resolved. The Xbox cannot connect to the internet on this television because of the signal being thrown out.The television deserves a rating of 1 simply for this reason. There is no disclosure from Samsung and Samsung's response to me was that perhaps I should accommodate the idiosyncrasies of the television rather than them providing a solution. Those ferrite items in the box that supposedly correct this issue have no effect.So just take this as a warning. If you have internet service from the phone company, do not place your television in the same room or connect any devices to the television that use internet.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch Samsung smart TV was bought as a Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Roger Hartsoe
Reviews.Content: received the television on time and in good condition.  I would recommend this Samsung 32 inch smart TV to anyone that is interested in buying a 32 inch high definition television.  I had searched around and found the price to be the best price I can find before Christmas and even after Christmas.  This was shipped my prime and came in on time.

Reviews.Title: TV  has a great picture
Reviews.Author: Valinda Threadcraft
Reviews.Content: It is the perfect size for my room,  The remote is not to compilcated to learn. I did not set and account with samsung yet, and Amazon deliver it on time.

Reviews.Title: Good TV.  Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Derrick Kane "DK"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Clear picture.  Quality sound.  For those who can't put a 52+ in your home this TV is a solid deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV at a Great Price!!!
Reviews.Author: MarkFitz
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a week now & I absolutely love it!!  I don't have cable, but I wanted a smart TV so that I could watch Netflix & Amazon prime movies on a beautiful 40" screen.  These apps both work wonderfully on this TV!  Also, the picture on this TV was great right out of the box!  I'd highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a great quality LED smart TV at a great price!!  Amazon's price even beats Costco's on this model!

Reviews.Title: awesome TV
Reviews.Author: AM
Reviews.Content: We haven't even begun to explore the possibilities with this TV yet.  The picture quality is excellent.  This is our first flat panel TV and I'm happy we chose this one.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Shelly "Yarn shop owner, audiobook addict bec...
Reviews.Content: Everything we expected, nothing we didn't. It works great; easy to navigate the menus, easy to figure out how to use it.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv so much Im going to marry it!
Reviews.Author: A. Murphy
Reviews.Content: First off, when they sent the tv - the first one was damaged but no problem Amazon sent a new one right away just had to send the first one back.  Yes that is a pain but I got such a great deal ($600) it was really worth ordering through Amazon.  Other than that I LOVE this TV.  I thought the picture settings seem perfect right out of the box so I haven't messed with them.  I was able to download the amazon instant video app and I can watch tons of free prime (Im a member) movies.  I was also able to download the HBO Go app and can watch a bunch more content that isn't available on demand (you have to pay for hbo with your cable company in order to be able to access that content).  I think this TV is just the perfect combo of price and size.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46in smart tv
Reviews.Author: Linda Vitale
Reviews.Content: This TV was so easy to set up. It has so many features for the price. the picture is fantastic and it is even facing a window where the sun streams in. the box was totally beat up to the point i was so nervous that the tv would be destroyed. i am keeping the box just in case the tv dies or has issues any time soon but that is my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Deborah K Sicks
Reviews.Content: Really like this TV. It has a good clear picture with nice colors. I haven't hooked it to cable yet, but it looks great with antenna too.

Reviews.Title: Good picture!!!
Reviews.Author: Meme
Reviews.Content: Seems OK to me, have not figured out how to work the smart part, manual could have been better to understand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and way smarter than new other brand.. V
Reviews.Author: Beachpups
Reviews.Content: Extremely easy to set up with internet, dvd , vcr.  Quick start up time and many built in connects to web media services - most of which I probably will not use up.  Picture is clear and menu is easy to navigate to optimize audio and video output.The total set up time probably only took 30 minutes -which I am still amazed by.

Reviews.Title: love this
Reviews.Author: LuckyJhawk
Reviews.Content: great tv and it was actually easy to set up. I'm not super tech savvy, but I managed to get it set up and even figured out some of the settings I didn't think that I'd use like getting the twitter feed during a show.

Reviews.Title: Largely as advertised.
Reviews.Author: IceSyckel
Reviews.Content: It does what it says it will do - just much slower than I would like.  Especially with respect to running Netflix, Samsung "smart" products (I've had more than this one) don't really keep up with other brands in terms of speed.  If you have an xbox, then it will run Netflix and Hulu much, much faster than this TV alone.  Also, loading the "SmartHub" takes longer than it should.On the whole, however, it gets a good picture.  Unlike my "smart" Samsung  Blu-Ray player, this TV actually does run Netflix and other apps consistently, just slowly.  The blu-ray player's Netflix app works only about 50% of the time, so it is nice that this TV does actually do what it says it will do every time, even if it is slow.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Christmas Gift for Parents
Reviews.Author: Knobb490
Reviews.Content: My wife's parents are more elderly and have been using an old style standard definition TV for many years and they spend a lot of time watching it.  All their children and children in-law decided to give them a new TV for Christmas and found this one with outstanding reviews.  We gave it to them the first week in December so they could enjoy Christmas programs on it through the month.  They have just loved it.  They said that they didn't realize there could be so much detail in the picture.  It has really increased their joy of watching and they thank the children every chance they get.  A home run!

Reviews.Title: Such great TV! Excellent price! So smart! Much wow!
Reviews.Author: Abhijit Kiran
Reviews.Content: Hehe, so this is indeed an awesome find of a TV! The price is in the $330 range, and for that money you get a Full HD (1080p) smart TV with Samsung's old (2012) Smart TV software. It has 3 HDMI ports, 2 USB ports and one HDMI port also acts as a DVI port so that you can hook up a DVI input if needed with a separate DVI audio input available for audio. It also has a component/composite input.A lot of wonderful features and options to tweak the picture quality, audio quality etc. I tried out some of the apps on the smart TV platform and while they are decent the interface is too much of a hassle to navigate with an IR remote so I will stick with either my PC or my PS4/PS3 to access the good stuff like Netflix, youtube etc. Still it is a plus and good to know that I can access some basic stuff without turning on my PC or PlayStations.And as an added bonus I have a Samsung tablet so I have some TV related apps to help me easily browse available programs and quickly navigate to that channel as the tablet has an IR emitter! Great bonus!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Annie Girl
Reviews.Content: I love love my Samsung 40 inch TV...this.....this review is not going to be long sine I am NOT a technical person..but it was extremely easy hooking up to my cable..picture. .sound..color has been perfect..very pleased with my purchase...

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Russell Kreindel
Reviews.Content: Looks fantastic with only minimal tweaking.  Smart TV features are great, I'm using netflix and amazon prime on mine.  Initial setup took about 1 min!  Had no idea it'd be up and running so quickly.  I'm only using the wifi right now, do not have a cable box hooked up to it at the moment, so can't comment on the quality or ease of cable setup.I have this samsung in my bedroom and a much older and bigger samsung in my living room.  For the price, samsung makes great products that will last.  There are nicer looking 40 inch TV's but you'll have to pay a LOT more.  For the price (I bought it at 50% off) you simply cannot go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Love at first sight.... and still in love 3 months later!!!
Reviews.Author: poo_bear
Reviews.Content: Oh my how I love this TV. Granted I didn't have much of a TV previously to compare it to (a Sanyo CRT) but, the picture is just so AMAZING! I feel like I'm right there. Even the one thing I thought would be bad, the SOUND is so good!! Yeah the browser is a little difficult to use but, it does the job. I could not be happier. LOVE.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, but not the best
Reviews.Author: NY Brown 12
Reviews.Content: Nice tv, very attractive and it was a great upgrade from my last one and at this price I really don't have any complaints. The picture is a little grainy at times but the colors seem accurate

Reviews.Title: Samsung is #1 fo a reason
Reviews.Author: PaBeagler
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung smart LED TV for no other reason than they are awesome. Samsung is #1 for many reasons, as I am sure you have heard about or you would not be looking at this review. My Advise is Do your home work and find the TV with the right options for you. Know they are not a cheep China made set that last a short time before it's dead and then your back out looking at TV's again. Good Luck hope I helped.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture, but not very smart.
Reviews.Author: Anon
Reviews.Content: I have a Roku box and a ps3/ps4 so I don't really care about the smart features on the tv. The picture quality on the tv is amazing after you mess with the settings a bit. If you're a gamer then this is a great buy because the Video games look amazing on this television. The ps3 games look great, but the ps4 games look epic when playing in 1080p.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Quinn
Reviews.Content: I bought this over 6 months ago and works great. It works really good streaming video from my  Samsung Galaxy S4 and Note 3 also.

Reviews.Title: It seems to forget.
Reviews.Author: Wayne Uhde
Reviews.Content: It seems to forget that I'm registered for netfelx  and I need to be registered again. On top of that the keyboard to do it rarely works and it needs to be done with the remote. TS says that this model doesn't work with some model keyboards, I've tried several. Probably they don't all have the problem.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Fanboy
Reviews.Author: 7ftchkn "7ftchkn"
Reviews.Content: I guess I'm a Samsung fanboy, but I haven't had a bad experience with them yet. I bought this as a gift for my youngest son and he loves it. This replaced a 22" and a Roku that we had mounted in his room. The wireless works great for streaming Prime/Netflix videos and I have a spare Roku now.

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: readyk
Reviews.Content: We decided to replace our old tv this has a supper pictureWhich you canset to things like wide screen thrater ...It has a real web browser(theres) you can not change it or down loadAnything outher than there apps

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very happy with Samsung TVs. Bought this second TV to replace old smaller one. One, two, three, four, five and six.

Reviews.Title: Sloooooow
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Image quality and sound is fine, but UI and bundled software is TERRIBLE. I use it primarily for Netflix and we thought we could get rid of our Roku. That was not the case. Starting the app center takes forever and after that, many times the Netflix app will hang or not load. Every week or couple of weeks the TV wants to update the bundled software. The process takes forever and instead of improvements it feels like regressions :-/  On the plus side, the TV takes whatever video format you throw at it on the USB port and is very intelligent about picking subtitles, etc.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel Bowman
Reviews.Content: The Picture quality is great for the price. Easy to operate the remote just enjoying watching the playoffs and tile games on it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy on Samsung 40 inch Very happy.
Reviews.Author: Richard L Strothers
Reviews.Content: Everything was very good , it was a good buy. I would recommend it to all my friends. wasEasy to unpack and setup.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my parents. It is exactly what they wanted. When it is hooked up to HD the clarity is great. I am a huge fan of the Smart TVs as you can use it as a computer, especially the Netflix App. My parents do not have gaming systems, so having the Netflix App on the TV is really the only way they could get it. Great product, shipped fast and has been working great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV so far
Reviews.Author: NBJohn
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to replace a Vizio M-series TV I was having all kinds of trouble with (thank you Amazon for your awesome return process).Out of the box, this thing is a little thicker than the vizio I had, but the picture is just as good. There wasn't much to set up when you pull it out of the box, but I recommend you do mess with the video settings ASAP. The picture out of the box was terrible, but quickly remedied and it's now looking awesome.I've only had the TV for 24 hours, but compared to my experience with the vizio this thing has been terrific.

Reviews.Title: Its a tv and works for that purpose
Reviews.Author: Clint Emmons
Reviews.Content: Not impressed at all with my first smart tv purchase. It seems every time I turn it on it is updating. The Apps such as netflix and Amazon prime continually have to buffer. It is not an issue with my internet because my Roku box sits in the same room and works with no issues. I am also unable to easily turn on/off the wireless.

Reviews.Title: I think it will be good
Reviews.Author: bobo
Reviews.Content: The tv is very clear, it just doesn't come with directions. I still have not had time to see what it will do, i guess I'll have to find some online source to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: I like it but netflix sucks on it
Reviews.Author: scubagirl65
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I live in Mx and don't have cable. I bought it specifically for the netflix. When I open it up the TV does not have the options that it does like on a computer or tablet or even phone for that matter. There is no search function on the left for genre, new releases, etci called Amazon for support and they tried a few things and then we tried to call Samsung - the line was super busy so i let Amazon go and tried myself - the support was horrible - the agent i worked with didn't know a thing. She told me that the TV is that way and thats that! I chatted with someone from Samsung and they told me its because I am in Mx that everything gets updated from the country you are in. So I need to figure out how to trick my tv into thinking I am not in Mx to get the proper screen -sounds like crap to me - if any one has any suggestions I would appreciate it

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Gray
Reviews.Content: Product brand name a definite plus!  Very satisfied with price, online purchase, ability to purchase protection plan online, kept informed on shipping date, and ease of setting up and installing.  Great product, inside and outside!

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: rickshaw
Reviews.Content: Easy setup once we realized what to do (our first smart tv).  Picture is very good and love the picture setting choices already programmed in tools. My husband liked his so much, he surprised me with one.  A great choice.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: jerryB
Reviews.Content: I fricking love this TV. I literally dropped my jaw when I first turned it on. I must have had a real cruddy TV before haha. The Smart TV makes everything super convenient and it's quality in unsurpassed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung offers a great television
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung televisions. I have two of them and have not had any problems with them. In fact, they both had more features than I really know what to do with. The only problem I have with both of them is there are not enough sockets so that I can hook my gaming device in at the same time as I have my video equipment plugged in. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: TV Performs Well, Samsung Support Horrible
Reviews.Author: Johnnie
Reviews.Content: TV arrived undamaged and well packaged.  The setup was easy but the TV could not connect to internet with a direct or a WiFi connection.  It took a week and many frustrating hours on the phone with Samsung to get through to a technician that could correct the problem.  Once this technician connected directly to the TV she was able to install the new/updated software and afterwards the TV connected to the internet as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory picture. Same issues as I just noted in review of Samsung UN5500 F
Reviews.Author: stephen volante
Reviews.Content: I have purchased both televisions and find the picture to have inconsistent color and brightness.  I have been unable to  find settings that will give a satisfactory picture on number of channels or programs.  Trying a couple of recommended settings has not resolved this issue.

Reviews.Title: Works great and nice picture
Reviews.Author: Robert Morris "Bob Morris"
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, no problems with it. The "Smart" part of it is very cumbersome to set up and use. Typing on it takes forever so I won't use most of the features on it other than the Netflix app. Overall very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Paula Testa
Reviews.Content: Great TV , regardless of the great price. Just as clear as my Way more expensive 60 inch Samsung TV

Reviews.Title: It took a while to install, but I LOVE this thing!
Reviews.Author: Nate River
Reviews.Content: I really underestimated HD. Before, I had a 12" by 16" oldstyle tv, and I wanted to get a new tv so I could play videos, games (from my PC via an HDMI), and watch tv in HD. I was not disappointed! The display is superb! the audio is great as well. I only played around with this thing for 6 hours, but I am just in love with this tv, especially with the $449 price.

Reviews.Title: Pretty awesome but sometimes slow
Reviews.Author: VCU Ram
Reviews.Content: Great quality and features but has a tendency to update the smart hub everyday which becomes annoying real quick and also has trouble loading up frequently, sometimes taking as long as 5 minutes after hitting the power button.

Reviews.Title: just the right size
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth DeBoer
