Reviews.Content: This fit into the entertainment cabinet and increased the viewing size of the screen. The border around the screen is so minimal, perfect. It also is easy to operate and access the wireless network.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: lex
Reviews.Content: was looking to upgrade from a 15 inch in my room.  Great sound and picture quality.  Haven't run into any problems yet.

Reviews.Title: my smart tv
Reviews.Author: karen bahadoorsingh
Reviews.Content: i choose to like this because it's really a good product but not exactly what i expected in terms of speed, other than that no complains at all. my kids are having fun with their new smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Teri L. Kaesler
Reviews.Content: My third Samsung TV. Picture is amazing. I love the Smart TV feature. It is very easy to use. I will definitely purchase again someday.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and easy setup
Reviews.Author: Jerry Johnson "JerryJoh"
Reviews.Content: This tv worked exactly as expected and in some ways even better. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a decent tv for a small room or a bedroom. It's a little small to be the main tv for a household.

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I love it, I never use the Smart TV feature but, I love the display quality for movies and game systems! I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice 40" Samsung Smart LED TV
Reviews.Author: R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Bought this 40" Samsung TV on a Black Friday deal and have been enjoying it ever since. The energy saving default picture setting is not that great, but after adjusting the picture as recommended in the reviews, the picture looks great! The sound is very good. The remote is easy to use, but it would be nice if it included a keyboard like some of the higher end Samsung smart TVs. It is not easy to navigate the web browser with the supplied remote.The Samsung apps are what make this TV a joy to use. We use the Netflix, You Tube, Pandora, Spotify, and other apps very often. I am using an ethernet connection and there are no lag issues with the apps. The only real downside is the speed of the Smart Hub. The processor seems slow and updates can be irritating, sometimes I power off the TV thinking it is stuck only to find out after turning on again that an update is in progress. But at this price point, I didn't expect a high end processor. If you plan on using the web browser a lot, I would recommend a higher priced smart TV with a faster processor. Otherwise, I recommend this TV as it is a very nice smart TV!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Pat B.
Reviews.Content: THE TV WAS EVERYTHING WE HAD HOPED FOR AND MORE. GREAT PRICE I WILL COME BACK TO THIS SITE TO PURCHASE AGAIN

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Heard
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this TV!  Samsung is the best brand ever. I will never buy from anyone else. It hooked up to my wifi very easy and am able to stream from several different sources. Amazing picture

Reviews.Title: I love the TV
Reviews.Author: Scott Uysal
Reviews.Content: In my opinion it is the best 32 inch smart TV, user firiendly and easy to scrool  araound also have many great futures

Reviews.Title: Really love this t.v.!
Reviews.Author: jennrs "jennrs"
Reviews.Content: I bought this t.v. on Cyber Monday for my bedroom.  I was replacing a 32 inch Vizio and my Roku.  I have enjoyed it very much.  The apps are easy to use.  I got rid of my satelite now that I can watch all of my favorite shows on Amazon Prime and other services.  Saves me a lot of money!  I was given a Samsung Tab 3 10.1 Tablet for Christmas and I was able to easily connect them.  I can watch videos on my tablet and have them mirrored right to the t.v.  I love this t.v. so much that when I move into my new house I am buying the 55 inch version for my living room.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Shell
Reviews.Content: I love this smart tv and am spoiled with the setup. I personally think a better remote for typing would be great.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: robbio
Reviews.Content: bought a Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (Black) through Amazon. It arrived  on time and in good shape. Am using it wirelessly. Works OK. Will hard wire it to my DVR and modem soon and hope it will be awesome.

Reviews.Title: An absolutely  great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Peter H. Kosel "Pete in Sacramento"
Reviews.Content: Compared to our previous, older Vizio TV of the same size this is totally superior.  Better picture, MUCH better sound, and of course it's "smart" where our old Vizio is "dumb".Setup and connection to our wireless internet was child's play.To watch TV it needs a cable connection or an antenna which we have not connected yet.  My comparison to our old set is based on watching YouTube videos from our wireless network and Comcast internet service.  Part of the reason our old Vizio  compares poorly may be that our Comcast box puts out an analog signal on channel 4 rather than a direct HDMI feed to the old Vizio.We have an antenna on order.  Perhaps we will cancel our Comcast TV service it it works well enough and just watch local broadcasts and stuff off the internet.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: I remember when Samsung was considered a discount brand electronics maker.  Boy have they come a long way!  This is my 3 Samsung LED and the first Smart TV purchase.  The TV was bought for my son's room.  Even at 60Hz it more than meets his needs which is primary cartoons, Disney and Football.Network Set up was easy.  We use Amazon Prime primarily for streaming on it which works much better than other network devices that we own. We own a smart blueray and networked gaming system that are closer to my hub but have to occasionally buffer while streaming HD video.  This unit has not had that problem thus far.Picture quality is very good.  I own an older model Samsung 50 in that is brighter and sharper but I also spend 4 times the price of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: The Smart TV HUB is really slow at times.If you would like to use the Web on this... I recommend you buy a pc.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Smart TV isn't that great
Reviews.Author: Andrew D. Degolyer "D-train"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, and have had great luck with Samsung TVs in the past. This time around I decided to go with the Smart TV so I could have access to Netflix without the use of an external device. Unfortunately the Smart TV feature is not very good. It runs VERY slowly, and seems to update way to frequently.Specifically, with Netflix I constantly had issues with poor quality video and reloading videos. I thought it was an issue with my internet provider, but when I upgraded with a new Sony Blueray player, the picture was clear and there were no loading issues. I think Samsung's WIFI receptor is slow, and couldn't keep up with the demands of high quality video.I love the TV, but will probably never use the SMART features again.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from my 32"
Reviews.Author: Leo T.
Reviews.Content: Had a Dynex 720p 32" HDTV, it lasted me a good amount of years but it was time for an upgrade and thank you Cyber Monday! The box was worn but the TV was in perfect condition. Took me days to get the quality just to my liking, that's how many options you have. Was going to get the same model but without the smart tv option but it was just $30 less so might as well get it since I'm spending that much anyway. If you having thoughts don't just buy it! Samsung is very good and I recommend it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: TV fine- Samsung website terrible!
Reviews.Author: PATRICIA A ANDREOTTI
Reviews.Content: For days, I've been trying to buy apps. for the TV. I finally called a support telephone number and was told that I cannot add a credit card on my account via my computer.  I need to  have a Samsung Gallaxy device.So, the "Hub" is useless if you want paid apps.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful screen
Reviews.Author: Norman L. Hente
Reviews.Content: Extremely bright and sharp 32"  HD TV, and a smart TV at that. Means that I can access Netflix, Amazon Prime and many other streaming sources. A quality TV at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Shashi
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. You can stream from your iPhone, iPad and laptop. You can download app like YouTube Netflix dish tv etc

Reviews.Title: Great quality & value!
Reviews.Author: Dicko6
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV. It's easy to set up has great picture quality and was very affordable. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but Smart Features Disappoint
Reviews.Author: B. Guenterberg
Reviews.Content: We purchased a brand new 40 inch Samsung Smart LED TV UN40EH5300F on Black Friday 2013 for a great price. This was our first digital or smart TV. Setup out of the box was easy, the stand is stable and looks good. It is connected to an overhead antenna for broadcast TV reception and it does very well with that. The picture is great. Initial setup was fast and easy. Connection to our Wi-Fi network was the same and it is very reliable with that. The “Smart” TV functions are a disappointment. Perhaps more realistic expectations would have been better. Samsung customer service on the phone and online chat is exemplary, it could not be better. I have needed to use that service both on the phone and chat 4-5 times for issues not covered in manuals or of a technical nature. The Smart Hub on our TV is evidently the early 2012 version, it must have been sitting around in the box for a while; hence, the good price. It cannot be upgraded to the latest Smart Hub version. The central search function in the Smart Hub has never worked, evidently a known problem that Samsung is working on. The “All Share Play” app has been replaced by “Samsung Link” which has no PVR setup so there is no way to record programs regardless of adding extra memory such as a hard drive. Evidently the PVR structure in All Share Play was buggy and maybe that is why it is no longer available. There are several apps that are designed to play about any TV show or movie you can think of but all of them require either a per-show fee or an ongoing fee to the app company, e.g. Netflix. The middleman fees mean you cannot watch TV programs for free that you could on an internet browser. We had hoped to be able to watch streaming video programs from broadcasters web sites on the Samsung internet browser in the Smart Hub but it cannot do that that, think NCIS or Good Wife. The proprietary browser does not have nearly the capabilities and functions of full purpose browsers like MS Explorer or Safari. It is fine for light web surfing. We did connect a Logitech K400 wireless keyboard with built in touchpad and it connected fast and easily and works well. It is much easier to use that then the remote control for text fields. As we have no other PVR or DVR we have no recording capability with this TV. We’ll connect our laptop to it with an HDMI cable run, an inexpensive option for screen replication and we’ll watch the TV shows from broadcasters’ internet sites that way. Having to do that along with the other limitations of the Smart Hub system sort of negates the need for the smart functions. For us the convenience of having the Netflix app is nice and the wife uses one of the exercise apps which has no fee. A standard HD TV with computer connected would probably be more functional than the Smart TV. Nonetheless, the Samsung Customer Service Representatives are great. Brian G., Dayton, OH

Reviews.Title: Great TV but Smart Features Disappoint
Reviews.Author: B. Guenterberg
Reviews.Content: We purchased a brand new 40 inch Samsung Smart LED TV UN40EH5300F on Black Friday 2013 for a great price. This was our first digital or smart TV. Setup out of the box was easy, the stand is stable and looks good. It is connected to an overhead antenna for broadcast TV reception and it does very well with that. The picture is great. Evidently the PVR structure in All Share Play was buggy and maybe that is why it is no longer available. There are several apps that are designed to play about any TV show or movie you can think of but all of them require either a per-show fee or an ongoing fee to the app company, e.g. Netflix. The middleman fees mean you cannot watch TV programs for free that you could on an internet browser. We had hoped to be able to watch streaming video programs from broadcasters web sites on the Samsung internet browser in the Smart Hub but it cannot do that that, think NCIS or Good Wife. The proprietary browser does not have nearly the capabilities and functions of full purpose browsers like MS Explorer or Safari. It is fine for light web surfing. We did connect a Logitech K400 wireless keyboard with built in touchpad and it connected fast and easily and works well. It is much easier to use that then the remote control for text fields. As we have no other PVR or DVR we have no recording capability with this TV. We’ll connect our laptop to it with an HDMI cable run, an inexpensive option for screen replication and we’ll watch the TV shows from broadcasters’ internet sites that way. Having to do that along with the other limitations of the Smart Hub system sort of negates the need for the smart functions. For us the convenience of having the Netflix app is nice and the wife uses one of the exercise apps which has no fee. A standard HD TV with computer connected would probably be more functional than the Smart TV. Nonetheless, the Samsung Customer Service Representatives are great. Brian G., Dayton, OH

Reviews.Title: It's okay I guess
Reviews.Author: Mike Jones
Reviews.Content: Pros: It looks good and it didn't need any calibration. Worked straight away.Cons: The app selection is very limited which is kind of disappointing. Wi-fi signal sometimes gets lost or is very week even though I live in a small house and the TV is not far away from the source. The browser is slow and you can't download different browsers (it wont let me at least) which is just... stupid. Overall, all apps seem to be slower than they should which is kind of weird.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: S. Buck
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter.  She loves it and it was very easy to set up and connect to the internet.  The price was excellent and we have had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung - 46
Reviews.Author: RentonWA
Reviews.Content: I do like the TV. Past I did purchase the 4-other Samsung TVs I'm satisfy the all Samsung products. This time I bought the smart TVs and have to figure out how to use with internet, other than that best.

Reviews.Title: The second one in the house
Reviews.Author: Thoth
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these over a year ago for our master bed room.  A year later I purchased another one for my daughters room.  These are well made and nice looking tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Susan K.
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and setup. The display is also very clean and bright. I would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Love my Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Although I called Amazon about how they would be sending this it was the exact opposite. I wanted this packed in a brown Amazon box not the actual packaging. The lady assured me it would come in a brown box but that was far from the truth.Keep in mind you will also need a screwdriver if your plan is to not mount this on a wall. Minus that the setup was pretty easy and I really enjoy the tv.What I dislike are the constant updates, seems like everyday and the sound. You will need to connect this tv to speakers, Im using Logitech speakers which can be found for less than $40 at Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Ever
Reviews.Author: A. A. McDonald
Reviews.Content: Purchased for daughter for Christmas.  After a week or so of getting used to it, she said if she had a bath receptacle and vending machine in her room, she would never leave! Does anything you could want, has tons of features Recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: TV Fine, But it's SMART part is crap
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: I chose to pay extra for the model with apps, thinking it would be worth it, but I don't recommend it. If my experience is true of other samsung computing devices, I will never buy another. First, Netflix constantly forgets my account information. That might have been fixed with a recent update, except now it claims that the wireless isn't connected even though the samsung wireless stuff says that it is...and, we've had to rejoin the wireless network repeatedly.If you want a SMART TV, don't by this one. Buy another brand. I've ordered a chromecast and will look into shutting the "SMART" part off for good once it arrives, and regret having wasted the extra money on a lousy hack of a "computing" component.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but problems with connecting to the "Smart Hub"
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: I've owned many TVs and this is the first one I've truly been disappointed in. Since it came out of the box I have had nothing but trouble getting it to connect to Netflix, Hulu, Amazon, etc. I chose this particular model so I would not have to connect it to a cable box right away (just moved in, want to plan where to have cable hook up placed) and could watch shows via the internet. It's been very frustrating with the inconsistent connection. I called Samsung and they have an auto response for those inquiring about problems with the "Smart Hub". They are saying it is down and they have no idea when it will be back up. NOT COOL SAMSUNG.We have 2 Panasonics and a Vizio in other parts of the house - no problems with those at all.

Reviews.Title: Great unit at a great price
Reviews.Author: Guillane
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for a bedroom.  I looked at the reviews here and made sure to update the software.  This took a while as I am on a mifi spot but it worked and I have been able to access my Amazon Prime watchlist.  Great definition and color.I saw the exact same unit at another merchant for $50 more.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: TJR - Cleveland, OH
Reviews.Content: Love the TV and sets up easily.  I thought the flatscreen would be able to swivel on it's base... but it doesn't.  .  I read almost all the 5 star ratings online and went to a store to see it before I bought it.... There are a lot of knowledgable people with great suggestions for TV picture settings, keyboards/options, and tips. Since this is my first internet smart TV, I am getting used to using it with the ethernet cable and web apps.

Reviews.Title: Best christmas present this year!
Reviews.Author: Xtine
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this tv! I'm completely challenged in the  ways of technology and I found this easy to set up and use. Its SUPER light and fits nicely on a 12 inch shelf. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Xylella
Reviews.Content: Picture  Is nice.  This is our first modern tv.  We use a Sony box to WiFi tv from Amazon prime.  The built in tv navigator is too slow. We have opted to just use the Sony box for WiFi.  Others may opt to save money and get a tv without the WiFi option if they are going to use it for this purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great TV
Reviews.Author: Timothy B Fellin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love this TV.  Great price, great quality, and has all of the smart functionality we were looking for in a TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: EC3 Corp
Reviews.Content: Well done Amazon and Samsung !On could be faster and off could be without pfitt noise and snow.What is with this word count?

Reviews.Title: Recommend
Reviews.Author: Italo
Reviews.Content: TV is really functional and it hasn't given me any problems until now. Had it for almost two months now and everything works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy
Reviews.Author: Magdalena "Magdalena"
Reviews.Content: We bought one from the warehouse and saved $50.We got it within a week and just love it.  The picture isexcellent and we had no trouble setting it up.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: GSpress
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my 26 year old son as a Christmas gift.  Nice TV and definitely was a great price! It appears to be working fine.  Just a bit nervous about how it gets delivered in Original box and it was obvious what was left on our porch.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 - very pleased - well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Adam Doehrmann
Reviews.Content: I've been shopping for a medium sized TV for our family room, and became slightly obsessed with researching before deciding on this Samsung. So far to this point I've been very satisfied with the purchase of my first smart TV:* As a Roku owner, I was extremely impressed with the response of the Smart TV apps.. especially after hearing some of the so-so reviews of this capability.  I've encountered a few buggy situations of the web apps not loading, but the occurrences aren't frequent enough to get worked up about.  Initially I wanted to save a few bucks and not buy a Smart TV, but not I'm glad that I did.* Like many have mentioned, I had to adjust the picture settings to my preferences, taking heed to the advice of some of the setting adjustments mentioned here.* The sound is so-so, about what you should expect though for a TV at this price level imo.. I can say that I haven't had any need to raise the volume on this set to a higher level than it is capable ofAt this point I would recommend this TV and the Samsung brand..

Reviews.Title: My 1st flat screen!!!
Reviews.Author: BrendaD
Reviews.Content: Still trying to figure out how everything works. No instruction book to go by very disappointing. Other then that I love it, great picture and sound. The price was amazing.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV Samsung
Reviews.Author: L. Kitchen
Reviews.Content: We love the features of our new Smart TV.  One drawback is that the Smart TV lacks a built in webcam/microphone.  The cost of the suggested compatible webcam is about two thirds the cost of the television.  The other drawback is there is only one USB port.  We'd like to use a keyboard with the TV but the reviews on the wireless keyboards is only fair at present.  Perhaps a new keyboard would be in production soon.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic...when it works.
Reviews.Author: Nickolette R Miller
Reviews.Content: It is a very beautiful tv. The picture is clear and bright.The applications all work wonderful for us (except for Netflix which gets buggy and had to be reinstalled a couple times a week. It's a few seconds to download so it's not that big of a deal). The interface is sleek and pleasing and easy to use.The downside? This is our second one of these in 2 months. The first one wouldn't even load up, it just kept rebooting itself over and over and I couldn't even get into the main part of the interface. We sent it back and got another one hoping it was just a fluke.Well, we have had this new one for exactally 1 month to the day and now.. It won't load. When I power it on, it just reboots itself over and over and over. On the offchance I can get it to the On screen, when I press the Smart Hub button it shuts off and reboots itself all over again. It's been happening for a couple days now but today has been the worst... It's been hours and I can't get it to load. Hilarious that it comes with a free month support and BAM after one month exactally it doesn't work.I'm trying to get ahold of Amazon or Samsung to see if there is a reason and a fix for this and I will edit and update my review.((( I do see this is a common problem, maybe someone who has had this issue can let me know how they fixed it? )))

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: SNOWQUEEN
Reviews.Content: This television deserves all the great reviews it has gotten.  I have purchased two from Amazon and have no regrets.  The picture quality is great and it's very easy to navigate the internet features on it.  I would recommend to anyone looking for a reasonably priced television with some nice features.

Reviews.Title: Great Set!
Reviews.Author: vato2262003
Reviews.Content: Great set, performance, picture quality. I would recommend it's purchase to my friends and family. Takes up so little space.

Reviews.Title: smart features simply dont work
Reviews.Author: celt67
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for several months now, and finally gave up and decided to edit my initial review.  The smart features on this TV are a disaster.  Netflix, Amazon Prime, Amazon videos, simply do not work.  This was the entire reason I bought this TV.  I have worked through the issues with Amazon and Netflix....both determined the issue is with Samsung.  I called Samsung and worked with them for 1.5 hours only to have them state that there are known issues with these apps.  They "elevated the status" of my issue and guaranteed I would receive a call back from an engineer.  Still waiting.......I have wasted days jacking with this set, now it is giving me fits with wired/wifi connection.  I have reinstalled everything repeatedly, updated software, firmware...on and on and on.This set is a mess.  I would now never buy a samsung TV.This is my initial review:this is a great reasonably priced tv.  slight learning curve, but nothing difficult.  i love having music on my tv.  I used the settings recommended by other reviewers and it works perfectly

Reviews.Title: Great Tv and purchace experience
Reviews.Author: John l. Rosato
Reviews.Content: Setup was a cinch...picture clean and crisp...great tv...the smart technology wireless setup worked flawlessly ...Delivery was smooth ... Overall excellent purchase experience..

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: walter bertrand
Reviews.Content: excellent tv color is awesome and the smart tv works really good bought so I could Netflix without having to run any wires and have had no problems

Reviews.Title: Love our tv
Reviews.Author: Michael Morneault
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm, love the internet on it, beautiful picture and perfect size for our home. Amazon is tops.  Great price

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: legolas
Reviews.Content: We watch programs on this TV connecting our Ipad using an HDMI cable. Great picture and clear sound. I was curious to know what the price was when I was at Costco. It was 20 dollars less at Amazon. I'm glad I bought the TV online.

Reviews.Title: omg awesome
Reviews.Author: giles gutowski
Reviews.Content: the absolute best thing i have ever purchased on here. the price was what caught my eye i thouhgt there has to be something wrong with it, but nope it was the bees knees nothing wrong with it and the picture is the clearest ive ever seen it connects to the internet and runs all the apps just like it should and has all the bells and whistles

Reviews.Title: was great
Reviews.Content: the tv was better then I expected,, came with everything and on time, not one problem with it will use them again

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: Honestly I am really happy I bought this tv!! Plus it arrived super quick....When I have more room, I will buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: ProsGreat picture 1080p LEDPriceWifiSmart tv apps (though a bit sluggish, Netflix, youtube, HBOGo, Pandora, all have worked fine. Note you have to download HBOGo, but its very easy.)The menu buttons sound like old school Frogger! Yes the old arcade game, LOL. I love that.ConsApp navigation with the remote is a bit clunkyLimited connections: there are several hdmi (forget how many) but:Only 1 composite video/audio inOnly 1 audio out and its optical (no composite) – take note those with home theatre systemsNo DVI in (pc video) – ie cant connect it to a computer like a monitor, unless your pc has hdmi out (not really required since it has wifi and the apps, but as many flat screens have DVI connector, thought I would mention)Base does not swivelOther thoughtsThe cons are mainly connectivity related. So basically, Samsung has skimped (reasonably so IMO) in this area to keep cost down. I am ok with this, as it beats skimping on more important things like picture quality. It looks great. I would highly recommend this tv, if this is your price point and you either don’t have home theatre or you can make use of the optical out. I bought an optical cable for six bucks. No big deal.Get the free app to turn your tablet or phone into a remove (I recommend the third party app, not the official Samsung app which has bad reviews). This helps with text input which is aweful via a remote.The speakers are… hard to judge. It seems to depend on the show. Some shows sound weak and I can’t hear on 40. Others are fine at 15. I think this accounts for the mixed reviews on the speakers. Frankly I have never had a tv with “good” speakers. That’s why I bought a home theatre system. So I never have to care.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Luis Gomez
Reviews.Content: The Smart TV goes beyond the limits. It's an amazing TV. You will never want change it. The best image and the best sound for a TV. Good choice.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture; OK sound.
Reviews.Author: Lovin' life in Florida
Reviews.Content: After searching thru the ratings for a 40 inch, +/- LED TV I settled on this Samsung model.  I have been very happy with the picture but if you raise the sound anything beyond a 10-15%, the mid and lower frequency sounds get muddled.  The description implies it has some sort of a secondary speaker for the lower frequency sounds, and, while it is somewhat better than none, it doesn't do very much in adding to the overall sound.  If you attempt to boost the mid and/or low frequencies, it get muddy/boomy very quickly.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Wilkes "Liebe sifrei"
Reviews.Content: I don't have cable TV attached, but have Netflix and Amazon Prime; it sometimes takes an incredibly long amount of time to recognize the network & connect; it loses the Netflix log-on, and sometimes for hours is unavailable because it is doing "updates"  When it works it's great, great picture, a sound system as good as my stereo system.  But can be frustrating waiting for it ....

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: Joshua T. "-Josh"
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV.  I bought it so my wife and I could watch movies in the evening without sitting on our too-small couch.But I primarily bought it so I could hook my Xbox One up to it for some BF4 and COD: Ghosts while the kids are watching D-D-Dora!The picture is great.  Read through these reviews for some suggested settings.  I set it up through the Xbox One HD TV set up tool, but the settings I ended up with are very similar to the ones I read in the reviews here.I almost gave this TV 4 stars because the Netflix app on the TV is constantly giving me errors and telling me to reinstall it.  I'm not sure what the issue is, but it is pretty annoying.  I have reinstalled it, but I still get the error from time to time.I will say there are PLENTY of inputs for this TV.  3 HDMIs on a TV you'll likely just be using a single input on is fine.  The Optical OUT was a nice touch as well though I haven't been able to tell if it will pass through 5.1 surround sound from an HDMI IN to the Optical OUT.The 32-inch is a decent bedroom sized TV, but I think if you're on the fence between this size or the next one up... go with the next one up.

Reviews.Title: son loves this
Reviews.Author: Sharon Wright
Reviews.Content: It gets 5stars from me to actually please my son as much as this for Xmas gift. He is thrilled with it, so I give it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Hard to locate all specifications online.
Reviews.Author: Billy Cummings
Reviews.Content: Everything is all good. I know with a smart TV a VGA input is not absolutely neccessary but it would have been nice. I wasn't sure if it had one based on the detailed specifications.Probably my own stupidity but I am extremely pleased.

Reviews.Title: Love this Tv
Reviews.Author: Angs
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung smart TV I own. It is so easy to hook up and use. My 14  hooked it up in her bedroom and it is so light she takes it to a different room if she wants.

Reviews.Title: Great investment.
Reviews.Author: PWPUSA
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes great products. It was easy to hook up, although instructions are never great in any of these items.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch smart tv
Reviews.Author: Michael Tuennermann
Reviews.Content: Today you can get tvs at great pricess. With that said, the durability is a huge question. I wanted a tv for a mancave/garage atmosphere. Therefore, the quality and durabilty had to fit. After loads of research I made this purchase. Boy is it everything and more. This tv is clear as day and the thickness = durabilty. I am pleased and would buy again tomorrow if it were to fall off the wall

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: jane garmanian
Reviews.Content: Love my new TV. Making the proper adjustments to get the perfect picture was  easy for me ( a non technical person). This is my first HD TV and I love it!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Charles M.
Reviews.Content: I have had my TV about a month and haven't had any trouble don't mean I won't but so far so good

Reviews.Title: Nice picture; a few (typical) Samsung bugs
Reviews.Author: Wesley Everett
Reviews.Content: I have the 32-inch model, in an exercise room, connected into a home theater system with a new Yamaha AV receiver. TV setup was a cinch, connected quickly to wifi. One bug kept me busy for a full day: At first it looked like the TV apparently has no Audio Return Channel (ARC) capability, allowing it output audio to my receiver through HDMI, without running a separate digital optical cable up my wall to the unit. (This is somewhere between desirable and critical for anyone who wants to stream digital audio from the Internet apps on this TV -- such as Amazon's Prime video service, or Cloud Player for music -- back through an audio system, rather than listen to them on the TV's transistor-radio-quality speakers.)Fortunately, one helpful reviewer here informed me that the TV actually DOES have ARC capability, hidden in the "HDMI 2" port, although this is completely undocumented in the manual. By using that HDMI port -- unmarked as an ARC port -- to connect to my receiver, I was finally able to enable ARC and eliminate one cable going up the wall. (I'm sort of shocked that a manufacturer like Samsung doesn't make ARC standard equipment; one of the big advantages of HDMI -- the lack of a big wad of cables -- is negated if they don't support the standard in their equipment.)Note: Even after switching to the No. 2 HDMI port I STILL had to run the Samsung's "AnyNet" setup (by doing a "refresh") to get it to recognize the AV receiver. This scans the TV's HDMI ports for compatible devices, allowing you to, for example, use the Samsung remote to change the volume on your receiver, synchronize shut-offs, etc. The Samsung still doesn't list it as a linked device, but it does see it, and the ARC is working.Other stuff: The 32 inch feels about the right size for a smallish exercise room where I'm usually 8 feet away or less. Farther, and I'd probably want the 40. Wall mounting is easy. The TV is light, and it has a standard 200mm VESA setup. I coupled the TV with the VideoSecu swivel mount here: 0972683275 It's very solid, and the TV fits the square plate without using those long attachable arms.I agree with the assessment of others that the "Smart TV" functions are nice in concept, but buggy. The home screen that hosts them is not customizable and the entire operation is buggy at times and prone to hanging up. I have a fast wifi router close by, and when it's working it streams fast, with no noticeable freezes in music or HD video playback. But it has hung up in the process of loading the "Smart TV" page a number of times already. I suspect hard-wiring it into the network would improve that performance, but then you get another cable running up the wall! All in all, it's a nice flat-panel with a lot of features for the price, but it's far more difficult to integrate into a home theater setup than it should be.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto!!!
Reviews.Author: ruben antonio mendez castillo
Reviews.Content: guao best excellent product actually arrived as expected products are the best high definition details of the best tv they remain grateful that they know are going to do very bein happy afternoon and greetings from Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Fantastic picture; great price.
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I recommend you follow the setting recommendations of 1 or 2 of the other reviewers.  Once you get the basic settings in place, you can tweek them to your taste.  I really appreciated the 30-day free tech support that came with the TV.  The techs explained things to an old lady in terms I could understand.  They didn't make me feel stupid for asking, either. I needed help with the Wi-Fi set up, connecting my DVD player & my VCR to the TV; they also helped me access the internet.  I haven't used that to any great extent yet.Buy an HDMI cable when you order the TV.  It doesn't come with one & you will need it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mike Wilson
Reviews.Content: Easy to do any function you want. Great picture and sound. Easy to set up. Only problem is the remote isn't comparable with my cable wi fi.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Wayne S. Laird "deer hunter"
Reviews.Content: sharp and clear color a true two life color  Samsung always stands behind their product and is one of the three top televisions

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: thomas g mckenzie
Reviews.Content: What a great TV for our bedroom! Recommend this TV to all. The smart feature is a plus--still learning all the bells and whistles!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: We love this tv. It is so easy to access our netflix, hulu and amazon prime accounts. It is a nice clear picture. Easy to use and just a great great purchase. We are probably going to get a bigger one for our living room eventually because we like it so much.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great quality, great price.
Reviews.Author: Dennis VW
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is outstanding.  The "clear motion 120", although not a true 120hz refresh rate, it does a noticeably better job with fast motion scenes than my standard 60hz Vizio TV.The Smart TV function is feature packed and intuitive.  This was my first smart TV, and I love it!All in all, a great choice.  You just can't go wrong with this Samsung TV.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny, best smart tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why some people don't like this tv, hands down the best tv I've had in awhile. Don't let the size fool you, it's true that great things come in small packages. 1080p, bright beautiful picture, great easy to use fun apps, perfect for gaming or movie watching, slim and light weight. I can keep going all day but the bottom line is, a known brand smart tv with full 1080p is hard to find at this price and it's a 500 tv that if you buy it at this low price. It will leave you thinking you got away with something. If it's your first smart tv then bravo. :)

Reviews.Title: I like this TV!
Reviews.Author: John S. Yarbrough
Reviews.Content: I've used this TV for more than six months now.  I bought it to replace a similar five year Samsung so that I could have the Smart TV feature.  I gave up cable and now rely on over the air broadcast, Netflix and Hulu and other digital media for entertainment.  I have zero complaints about this TV.  It does everything I expected it to do, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a new or replacement TV.  I like being able to watch my old movies and a few new ones I have on digital media.  This TV allows you to use a flash drive for video and audio files.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: GlitterLove
Reviews.Content: I gave this a four star rating not because it's bad or anything wrong with it. I didn't realized that it was 60hz so picture quality is not that good. But someone posted their settings and I adjust mine to those, and it looks much better now. I do have one question though if anyone who purchased this could help me out. How do I get those motion blurs/waves out? Every time I see a high definition show or movie those motion blurs shows up. I just ordered a Samsung blu ray and I love it, but again high definition worse motion blurs while watching a blu ray movie. Doesn't do this on a regular dvd movie. So can someone please help me with this setting. Thanks in advance.

Reviews.Title: It's a great tv with high quality picture. The ability to ge to the internet is especially nice, since we don't have cable.
Reviews.Author: J. Holt "Cowboyguy08"
Reviews.Content: The packaging was very good so there wasn't a mark on the tv when it arrived. It's easy to set up with other components with the HDMI ports. The picture was disappointing until I researched You Tube for the correct settings. It now has a very good picture, comparable to the LG it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: ms
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 6 months, and I'm very happy with it. It was easy to set up and has a good picture. I wanted a smart TV because of the ability to stream without all the extra equipment. Has all the apps that I wanted (Amazon, Hulu, Netflix and Pandora). I'm not sure if this is a problem with the TV, but I've had some issues with the Netflix app having to be reactivated after my account being used on another device. This could be a problem with Netflix itself and nothing with the app support on the TV. Would order again, just in a larger size.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, REALLY BAD GLARE
Reviews.Author: Marijana Peric
Reviews.Content: Sleek look, very bright with cool features, but the glare that reflects on it is AWFUL.  We've had to change the lighting in our room when viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for where we needed.  Good reviews on Samsung. Have a small one in my office.Would recommend Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: stingy
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tv is fantastic. Many apps to select from. This tv supports HBOgo which is a big plus.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Job Amazon!
Reviews.Author: jim douglas
Reviews.Content: Great service & a great product! The TV was for an elderly lady confined to her home. The first order shipped on time but the TV had been damaged in shipping. Amazon amazed me with their return response...they sent out a new one even before I could send the defective TV back! All I had to do was box it back up & have it ready for UPS. THE SWAP OUT TOOK ONLY 3 DAYS!!! And that was during Christmas! The new TV worked perfectly, was easy to set up and easy for our friend to use. Plus, this new 40" HDTV produces clean, sharp images and was a breeze to color balance to her liking...(she doesn't see very well in certain color ranges) The larger screen was great for her bedroom, fitting nicely in the space available. Even having to send the first one back made this a great transaction because of how the people at Amazon do business...that's how you earn customers for life! Awesome job!!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 In. Tv
Reviews.Author: ladyrider
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love this tv! We found on one of the reviews how to set the color and all the other adjustments, looks wonderful, color is great, picture quality is awesome. I even like getting on the web with the web browser built in! We would recommend this tv to others! Have had it for a few months and have had no problems with it. It is a good size for the bedroom!

Reviews.Title: In the Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This one is in the bedroom. I know, it's not supposed to be there, but whatever. It's really nice the way it just sits there, waiting. Perfect Size!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture, dumb TV
Reviews.Author: Troy
Reviews.Content: The TV is great apart from the Smart TV function.  It spends more time updating than we do using it.  Does it really need a daily 15 min update?

Reviews.Title: This is masterful!
Reviews.Author: oldseagull
Reviews.Content: I would not buy a new TV until my old - old - TV quit.  It finally did, and this is the greatest improvement to our den!  Moved from 32" old TV to 40" thin line new Samsung TV and we are HAPPY!  "Maybe" a larger screen would have been fun, but where would we put it?SAMSUNG has produced a nice TV and we are enjoying it very much.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: John H. Weiss
Reviews.Content: Very good quality: fit and finish is attractive. The picture is as good as one would wish. The WiFi works perfectly with a minimum of set-up effort.However, Samsung charges dearly for the WiFi. When a second TV entered my life, I chose a 'dumb' set coupled with a WiFi BluRay, a move that saved me money with a BluRay player thrown in.

Reviews.Title: Good bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: charing
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly without any problems or damage. TV is okay, good picture after calibration. I had a hard time with Smart hub initially. Thank goodnes I was able to read  one of the reviews here with the same problem. I called samsung and nobody can figure out why my smart hub is not connecting to the internet. All I had to do  was set my country code and it has been okay. Smart features are a little slow to load, but plays youtube, netflix and hbo go flawlessly. It is not perfect, but it suits my needs!

Reviews.Title: Great value for a smart t b
Reviews.Author: J. Hockenberger "Jimbo"
Reviews.Content: Nice tv. Great picture. Excellent Smart features. Very easy setup right out of the box. I can't believe how light this tv is. The sound is also good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, perfect for bedroom viewing
Reviews.Author: leon
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the tv. It is the perfect size for my room and all of the add-ons work well. I didn't notice any sound discrepancies that other mentioned. I'm not really an audiophile, it still sounds nice and crisp to me without a soundbar.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: ANA ARDILA
Reviews.Content: I love this TV is just what I paid for my money. if you could buy another more large perfect otherwise this is great

Reviews.Title: very good team
Reviews.Author: MARTIN INOJOSA
Reviews.Content: the team has good resolution and sharpness, I recommend to use. also communicates very easily with table and cell samsung

Reviews.Title: This TV was a great gift.
Reviews.Author: Debbie Johnson
Reviews.Content: It was for my sister and she loves it. I too have a Samsung, and I have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung made it good & Amazon delivered it as good!
Reviews.Author: Ana MF
Reviews.Content: Simply awesome loving it with its great features and quality pic but thats the Samsung electronics quality overall .. they are one of the Best and Amazon was great in its time of delivery and it come in perfect condition..Waw this was my 1st time ever ordering from Amazon.com and from all other companies i ordered in the past this also is the first time in my life i got something without defects or damages.Alelluia!THANK YOU AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: worth it, but smart tv is slow
Reviews.Author: Danesh
Reviews.Content: packaging was really good. doubled boxed. screen quality is good, smart tv part is really slow,needs updated everytime, compared to newer versions. I am using an xbox one with it. So i don't need it.

Reviews.Title: tv review
Reviews.Author: Rakleyah Yisrael
Reviews.Content: Great tv.. only wish the remote could change channels on my cable. Love the fact that i can sync to my phone

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Tech1
Reviews.Content: The smart TV aspect is not so desired. Takes too long to go through the internet and apps. Nonetheless, its a great little TV

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 Inch 1080p Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: J. Dutcher
Reviews.Content: Not a big fan of the controls for this TV.  it is way slower than the Apple TV i have in another room and it wants me to reinstall Netflix weekly.  TV itself is good but for the price, i should have picked one without the SMART features.  If it would stay installed and not have issues, it would be great technology.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, love the smart tv
Reviews.Author: beggar
Reviews.Content: Finally, I can watch Netflix in bed without a console. Seems to update a lot though, which takes some time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Easy Installation, and the Smart TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Gregory Gilkey
Reviews.Content: Love this TV...my only comment might be that the sound quality could be better but I've heard that's an issue with all flat panels.....No Biggie....added a Samsung sound bar and now it's smoking...  I would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: A TREAT !!!
Reviews.Author: B. WILLIAMS "B WILLIAMS LOOKING FOR LIGHT"
Reviews.Content: When I clicked the purchase button for this, I almost went back and cancelled it; who needs another TV when you have 9.  Glad I didn't.  This is in the office portion of my house and is now the most watched TV of all.  I haven't begun to use all its features, but those that I have, I really enjoy.  For us, this is a great size and was super easy to set up.  A very nice price on Amazon and with Prime, I had it in 2 days.  S U P E R !!!

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: This tv works great. The smart tv feature is why I brought the tv and i love it. Only wish i would habe brought a bigger tv.

Reviews.Title: Father loved it!  Now to buy a sound bar.
Reviews.Author: Candy
Reviews.Content: Purchased as present for Father.  He loved it!  Presently learning how to operate all the different functions this Smart TV has.  He just needs a sound bar to boost the level of sound.  Thank you for the quick delivery!

Reviews.Title: No Complaints
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Crossley
Reviews.Content: The TV is just what I needed and there is nothiong about it that I do not feel is at least acceptable.  In fact it if anything it better than advertised!

Reviews.Title: Love the Samsung!
Reviews.Author: John Myers
Reviews.Content: Great unit, super picture. Will hook up to surround sound and rock!  May end up doing a wall mount. Major improvement over my old unit.

Reviews.Title: Super Quality!
Reviews.Author: Marcel Vandenbosch "Marcello"
Reviews.Content: We love this TV!It took only a couple of minutes to set it up. I was completely guides through it by the setup program. I have never seen such an easy setup of an electronic equipment before.Menu is very easy to understand. The remote is made well and the buttons are well organized!I hope that we will have this TV for many years to come!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: Niner Gold
Reviews.Content: Amazon delivered the tv as promised, no issues with Amazon. However, even with sale price, I was disappointed with many facets of this product including the 'Smart' function not operating properly and no matter how I adjusted the picture (using the specs in above review)...the picture just wasn't very good. Comcast?...maybe. If the picture were clear I would have kept it, even w/ a non-functioning Smart feature...but back it went.

Reviews.Title: My first Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Chreiger "JamieSC"
Reviews.Content: OK, I'm not so smart when it comes to "smart" electronics, but this television was easily hooked up, easy to unpack, and was appropriately packed into a larger generic cardboard mailing box to prevent theft.

Reviews.Title: Speakers died after less than 4 months
Reviews.Author: Vincent
Reviews.Content: The speakers no longer work after less than 4 months of ownership. The image quality is still fine though :-) and I can get audio through external speakers. Since I have an HTPC connected to the TV the "Smart" features turned out to be not useful for me. If I had to do it over again I probably should have just gotten a "dumb" TV. I will update this after going through the warranty repair process.

Reviews.Title: This TV is wonderful
Reviews.Author: no name
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV and am very pleased.  The picture is clear, it was easy to set up, and has great sound.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV app get stalled sometimes
Reviews.Author: Aliasgar Lanewala
Reviews.Content: Display, sound quality is good.Smart TV is a little slow. Apps get stalled sometimes.It's good for someone who doesn't have a very big living room, and doesn't want a hole in the pocket.

Reviews.Title: beautiful tv
Reviews.Author: joann karklus
Reviews.Content: This is the first tv I've ever had that needed no adjustments. Just turn it on and watch. Love it.

Reviews.Title: good bargain
Reviews.Author: happycamper
Reviews.Content: Everything works as promised.  Wi-fi was easy to set up and the picture quality is excellent.  Cable hookup was a breeze.  I am very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Proud Black Friday Deal
Reviews.Author: Jude
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!! It is absolutely all I want and more. Picture and sound are great regardless of all reviews say. It is easy to use, and the controls are pretty much simple. I am not very good with electronics and I found this TV was easy to configure easy to install and the picture is clear everything absolutely perfect with this TV. One thing though, when I bought this TV I read in the description that I would be getting a warrantee for a year which has made the decision of this purchase, when I contacted the seller they said that it doesn't necessarily come with the TV but it has it. I find this honestly strange but I haven't faced problems with the TV yet so I have been needed the warranty but will see what happens. Finally, when using the other features that come with the TV like the Smart TV features such as the fitness, it takes a while for it to load and when I first turn on the TV took some time for it to update and it depends on the speed of the connection you have, plus for some reason I am not able to use the search bar when using the built in Internet browser.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jeanine Brudenell
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV!  The picture quality is amazing, and the sound quality is adequate for our bedroom.  Also, I have an Amazon Prime membership, and it is awesome to be able to stream from Prime right on my TV!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: bought this to replace my 42" vizio that took a dump on us (power supply)  this tv been great.  no issues at all.  i love the PLEX app. i can stream any movies/tv shows from my home desktop.  the netflix, VOD and Hulu are also avail.  the only issue i ran it to is the power cord not being very long.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Noonan
Reviews.Content: I did lots of research before purchasing this HDTV. We have an existing entertainment center so we had to stay within a certain size.  This TV is perfect for all our needs and it fits.  The picture is amazing. It's everything you could want in a smart television.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: H. Kang
Reviews.Content: Works beautifully, and easily. i just wanted a good simple TV for my room and this was perfect. Updating does take a bit of time, but plays great

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ellen Cunliffe
Reviews.Content: This has lots of options I didn't even know where on it. Remote is easy to use. Happy I got it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SmartTV
Reviews.Author: Ben Nguyen
Reviews.Content: The only thing was that the tv box arrived was damaged with holes on the side.  I was worried since it was raining in our area and there was no protection from the rain.  The TV was sprinkled wet when it was opened, but it works fine.  Just need to have better protection.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: S. Leavelle
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV during Samsung's Black Friday Week promotion for $498. It was to replace an old 32" tube TV in our 2nd (small) living area. This is our first "smart" TV and we've been enjoying that aspect of it immensely. We are Amazon Prime members and we've been watching so much programming on Prime that our TV in the main living area has been kind of neglected for the last few weeks.I adjusted the picture settings as posted by one of the reviewers here and the video quality is outstanding whether we are watching HD programming on Prime, DirecTV or BluRay movies. The only negative issue we have with this TV is that the speaker location makes for fairly crappy sound. But that's an issue with flat screen TVs in general, not this model/series alone. So the next purchase for this setup is a decent sound bar to install on the wall below the TV.Update 4/23/14:  We have been watching a number of series on Prime Instant Video. We had some intermittent issues where the program would continually pause for seconds or minutes before continuing. Earlier this week it got to the point where we could not Resume a program where we had left off and were getting some network error messages. Other streaming content like Pandora was trouble free. Last night I downloaded and installed the latest firmware update (March 2014) for the UN46EH5300 (46-inch set) and that seems to have corrected the problem.The other thing I have done to enhance our enjoyment of this TV is to install a 38" Vizio sound bar with wireless subwoofer. That has made a huge difference as dialogue is much more clear, music is so much richer and sound effects are really good. If your flat screen TV is not connected to a surround sound system, a sound bar is highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V.
Reviews.Author: Kristina Kucker
Reviews.Content: I can not believe what this T.V. can do. I've had it for already a month and I am still learning about all the things it does. Excellent, would definitely recommend, especially seeing as how when I ordered it,(and it had to come all the way from Texas to New York) the box was some what battered but the T.V. was still comfy in its insulation. Good for tech junkies. I love all its features.

Reviews.Title: Good, meeting our expectations.
Reviews.Author: Missy Christopherson
Reviews.Content: Good quality screen and sound. Can be a little slow loading smart function at times. The stand is not the most stable.

Reviews.Title: Not disappointed
Reviews.Author: N. Southerland
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Bought it to replace an old box-style that I had for years.  Picture quality is great, and the features are textbook Samsung.Really like the WI-FI and it works great.  Recommend this item to anyone looking for a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Darker picture
Reviews.Author: Joshua M Swanberg
Reviews.Content: Great TV, picture is a bit darker than I would anticipate coming from a LED TV (tried with all settings).  Good price and very clear picture.

Reviews.Title: I see why this tv gets such positive reviews
Reviews.Author: avid buyer
Reviews.Content: I love the picture, the remote, and the smart aspects.  There's so much to explore I haven't even begun.  I definitely feel that I bought the right tv.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Anita A. Smith
Reviews.Content: Have not gotten to play around with it alot.  Love what it offers.  Beautiful picture, and lots of apps.  bought two and both are great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Upinarmsingf
Reviews.Content: I so far love this TV the picture is awesome. Before had a 32-inch old TV, but never had the hi-def that this has. Football games are picturesque. And being a Smart TV allows me to activate netflix and hulu which I have been paying for and now can watch on my 32-inch TV. There was a TV that came but it had damage to the screen, The return was easy and the replacement came with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Neither picture or sound quality are outstanding.
Reviews.Author: Eugene Benson
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound quality are reasonable but not great. The Smart TV controls are clunky and set up instructions were not clear.I don't use the Smart TV features often because they are more trouble any benefit I receive.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Xdbugr
Reviews.Content: My 1st Smart TV. Was  time consuming to get connected to wifi because of the screen keyboard.  Otherwise I am very pleased with it.  Sound is great foe a TV that size.  The streaming works well and I went a month before connecting it to my Satelite and then only so I could get live sports.  Would be great if could connect a mouse and keyboard to it but with patience the remote works well to navigate. I would recommend it to my friends for smaller areas.

Reviews.Title: Didn't know how smart this TV was!
Reviews.Author: Lucinda J. Michaelis
Reviews.Content: We just wanted a bigger TV for our living room and we got so much more.  The picture is very good, people can sit to the side and still see everything just fine.  I didn't realize it was a Smart TV and that we could access the internet, watch Netflix and Roku through the TV without any other equipment, and my favorite thing is we can watch You Tube videos on this thing....it's 3 weeks old so I am still exploring all it can do.  The remote is easy to use. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: It's a Great Tv!
Reviews.Author: James E.
Reviews.Content: It has ample connectivity. I bought it for the bedroom because I love the 3D 55" for the living room.(Wow, that was a quick 20 words.) I really like it, tho!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: JEFFREY LEE
Reviews.Content: An excellent TV for the price.  The TV was installed in minutes and has great features.  Only thing it doesn't equipped with is 3D which I don't mind.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Rudy Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Tv looks great.Love the smart tv feature it provides.This tv is perfect for what i needed and it is 1080p no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: The picture looks great to me. The Smart TV features are great. I use it in my bedroom so I haven't taken advantage of all the different apps. There are lots of them and from reading reviews you can tell new ones are always being added. As with most Smart TV's, the web browsing is not that great. Facebook and other apps are not going to be better or even on par with accessing them on your home PC or tablet. I don't have a keyboard or mouse hooked up. It would be nice to, but like I said, it's a bedroom TV not my main one. The WiFi works great. I got it at the price of $450. I wouldn't pay more than that. I know it says at that price I'm getting a deal of 44% off the price, but if you go to Best Buy or Samsung they have it listed for about $500. The new models are coming out so these are just taking up space now. You might find a better deal when they are trying to clear them out, but you also might miss the chance to buy one at all if they are suddenly out of stock.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Grerat TV
Reviews.Author: Texas customer
Reviews.Content: Love the quality and connectivity. Fixed my Cheetah Mounts on the wall in 30 minutes, plugged in the new TV and all settled.Love the TV.

Reviews.Title: L. Williams, Jamaica
Reviews.Author: leroy williams
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to any and everyone.IT WAS THE RIGHT DECISION TO PURCHASE THIS TV.The cost was okay.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch Smart Tv Review
Reviews.Author: GTA GAMER
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv, the picture is far better than my outdated standard definition television. The smart hub works alright but could be better, is rather just use my xbox for apps. The sound was the only big disappointment, dispite it's small flaws, I would recamend this for any bedroom.

Reviews.Title: GReat TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Michele
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this TV great picture and easy to use Great apps too!  Would recommend this TV to anyone

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this for a friend of mine as a gift, helped her mount it up, awesome, should have more apps though, not everyone likes sports

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Carl Gaenslen
Reviews.Content: This Samsung Smart TV was easy to set up and start using.  Great color, clarity and sound.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Brian Grzeszkowiak
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a flat screen TV for a long time. I found this one on Cyber Monday and got a great deal on it. It arrived fairly quickly(3 days I believe). Set up was actually very easy. I had read a lot of reviews about this smart TV being hard to set up but I think if you can connect a laptop wirelessly to your router, this set up won't be a problem. A keyboard for this TV would be nice but not necessary. The picture is great even with non-HD material. I'm somewhat of a gamer and the 1080p resolution is a very nice element that this TV has. You can't go wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV
Reviews.Author: C. Burr "Photoman"
Reviews.Content: Great quality picture, sound is OK. The only thing we didn't like was the lack of a half-mute that we had with our other TV. Other than that, a great set for the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent smart TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "fred_sambo"
Reviews.Content: This television is everything it was advertised to be. This was a sweet Cyber Monday deal, and now I have a groovy smart TV, which was easy to set up and works great with my wireless! Bye bye cable!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Igor Kitagorsky "kita"
Reviews.Content: This TV is exactly, as it was advertised: good picture, striimming and sound. I have already reccomended it  to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Brian T. Lawrenz
Reviews.Content: It's a good TV, but the picture quality is not a good as my other Samsung product.  I really like the Smart TV features.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: shorty
Reviews.Content: it arrive on time and it was on  good conditions. we like the technology on this tv. we are really happy with our new TV. definitely we recommended to any body. I order one for my mother in law and she love it too.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup
Reviews.Author: Denise A. Jones
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup.  Love apps in Smart Hub. Samsung was great offering assistance when it was required. I Love TV.

Reviews.Title: Just right for me.......
Reviews.Author: Stephen E. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This was the right TV for me. It is smart can get on Internet, watch Netflicks and analog/digital TV and much much more! The screen produces wonderful colors is very appealing to the eye!  I added a Sony sound bar to project sound into room and it now looks and sounds great!

Reviews.Title: I can see the football game better.
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Concannon
Reviews.Content: I haven't tried all the smart applications yet just using it as a tv. It's very clear and easy to use. Am waiting for my techie kids to visit and show me how it really works.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Fritz
Reviews.Content: Samsung always has great products. And the price was certainly right! Couldn't find a better deal! There are a few picture setting adjustments required, but I found them right here in the reviews.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Matt Stewart
Reviews.Content: Great out of the box. Apps are useful and easy to use.Stunning picture. Highly recommended to all. Samsung all the way!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Smart TV!! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: G. Clint Bowen
Reviews.Content: Awesome Smart TV!! Great Price! Would definitely purchase again. Picture is very sharp, TV easy to mount. Very pleased customer!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung smart tv done right.
Reviews.Author: Jillian Kitts
Reviews.Content: A little confusing to navigate at first, but overall, excellent tv. Picture quality is excellent! Samsung did a nice job with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 "smart TV"
Reviews.Author: Dennis J. Benard
Reviews.Content: The Samsung "smart TV" turned out to be an excellent purchase and gift for our daughter.My wife, daughter and I spent a good amount of time viewing movies and TV programs in their entirety while enjoying the Holidays in NYC.My wife and I will be purchasing one as we found this model provides exceptional visual quality while being easy enough for people of any age to use.  I think Samsung hit a "home run" with this model TV.

Reviews.Title: Great addition
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Taylor
Reviews.Content: I really like all of the features of this TV. I can now network my computer (movies, music and pictures) without having to go through TIVO or XBOX. I cancelled my TIVO subscription after getting this TV because of the redundancy and saved $14.99 per month. The only problem that I've had so far (I've had it for about three months now as of Jan. 2014) is the smart hub update. Often, when I want to use smarthub, I can't get to it because the TV is evidently in the middle of updating. Inconveinient but not a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: tanks
Reviews.Author: manuel borbon
Reviews.Content: good and gkd conditions..i do not have time to taste but looking good..so tks..and like make bussines later ttanks tanks

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: sailndoug
Reviews.Content: Great picture and cool features; I like the ability to sinc with my tablet to watch my YouTube channels. My kids love the Netflix link. Shipped quick and arrived without damage.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Johann Warner
Reviews.Content: The picture is great. The apps are great. It is everything I expected and more. It was the perfect upgrade from the regular flat screen I had before. I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: jalyn jerez
Reviews.Content: good tv for that kind of money, just waht i wanted for my xbox one, its cool for apple tv as well

Reviews.Title: All-in-one!
Reviews.Author: Jenny RightSide
Reviews.Content: We don't have cable/satellite, but use Netflix, Amazon Prime Streaming, Pandora and XFinity.Bought this TV for our home gym and love, love, love the fact it works like a computer/tablet with WiFi.  Download your apps onto the TV, plug it in and go!I can play my favourite Pandora or IHeartRadio workout mixes or run TV shows while working out.The TV is very light, energy efficient and easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Brian Jarrett
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my mom for Christmas to replace an old 25" television.  She loves the flat screen and the picture quality.  She probably won't use the Smart features, but they are there if she wants them.  My dad liked it so much he went out and got his own!  He didn't get our deal, though, because we got this tv for a great price during Black Friday week!

Reviews.Title: Enjoyed
Reviews.Author: Linda Harris
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this tv we gave it as a gift and he is enjoying it very much. Thanks for the speedy shipping

Reviews.Title: The Best TV Ever (according to my son)!
Reviews.Author: Rosenrosen74
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for my son and he loves it! He is able to access Amazon Prime easily and he's able to watch videos in HD. Very compatible with the WiiU.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Nancy Bryant
Reviews.Content: It was easy to set up right out of the box.  the picture quality and sound are very good.  The aps function is very easy to use and I was pleasantly surprised by the number and types of aps that were preloaded on the TV.  I would recommend this product to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: ehab
Reviews.Content: Good tv would like better apps.... overall exactly what I wanted... Image is good after some adjustments. Thanks for all the other reviews they help...

Reviews.Title: Very good quality picture so far.
Reviews.Author: lawrence albert
Reviews.Content: My son connected his blue ray and wii to this unit. He tells me the picture has been very good so far.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: maico desir
Reviews.Content: It was fast just like new love it think you for your serves I will be back for more think you

Reviews.Title: Web browser is working  for playing videos online. It is crashing.
Reviews.Author: Karthick
Reviews.Content: Web browser is working  for playing videos online. It is crashing.  Other than that all application working fine. YouTube app needs more user friendly featured

Reviews.Title: Exceeds Expectations
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Lockey
Reviews.Content: This tv is as excellent as Consumer Reports promised.  Set up was practically auto.  Love it and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A real winner!
Reviews.Author: dreampod9
Reviews.Content: Great TV with all the bells and whistles what a great price you cant beat the Samsung...for quality sound and picture....it's simply chock full of features that actually work...

Reviews.Title: Actually arrived in time for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Beverly Stevens "Bev's reader"
Reviews.Content: This was to be the family's group Christmas present. The response to the order said it was out of stock and would arrive between Christmas and new years. We were pleasantly surprised when it arrived in short order long before we expected it to. Well done. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: A great tv
Reviews.Author: Todd Dressel
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture easy to set up love the smart tv features a great tv you can't go wrong with this one

Reviews.Title: worth every penny
Reviews.Author: val
Reviews.Content: it was definitely smarter than us at first, no manual included. we have now learned how to use it and are getting much enjoyment from it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Moore
Reviews.Content: Really enjoying the TV and happy I listened to the others who provided comments.  Looking forward to my wireless mouse/keyboard to arrive so I can start to really enjoy the web end of it.  Only complaint is trying to use the remote to type as it is a bit of pain but the keyboard will solve those problems.  Highly recommend this tv to others.

Reviews.Title: ONLY A MONTH AND HAVING PROBLEMS
Reviews.Author: leon Bowes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on December 1, 2013. Everything is great except when I turn off the TV, the screen blinks with a dim light continuously. The nightmare is trying to get the issue resolved through the technical department. I have to upgrade a program to my computer, then to the TV, which means I have to go buy a flash drive. TV was manufactured July, 2013 and has an outdated program??

Reviews.Title: the TV works well, except for viewing live streaming of English League football it keeps saying insufficient memory.
Reviews.Author: Avalon Hospedales Julien
Reviews.Content: I enjoy watching You Tube on the big screen and I totally love the Apps such as fitness and karaoke .

Reviews.Title: great tv!
Reviews.Author: michael a. atkins
Reviews.Content: easy set up and registration. great picture and color picture is very sharp. shipping was very fast. this purchase was a pleasure.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: rebecca hardin
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV! Picture is beautiful, smart TV features are perfect. We got a keyboard to connect and it is so easy and fun. 100 times better than our last tv

Reviews.Title: Excelent TV
Reviews.Author: Coleen Amoroso
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with all that it does and the picture is perfect with the HDMI wire,it was worth the extra 24.00 dolars,I recommended !!

Reviews.Title: what a great TV
Reviews.Author: Rosemary
Reviews.Content: WOW, I love this smart TV, it's so much fun and I can watch all my Amazon prime free movies on it.  Simple to use too.  I ordered another for my husbands office and he especially loves the clear sharp pictures when watching his golf. Amazing price, thanks Amazon you are the best!!

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: Diana Scott
Reviews.Content: We bought a Samsung smart TV 3 years ago for the living room. This one is even better and easier to use.

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: Sonia frazer
Reviews.Content: It is user friendly, great picture quality and great performance overall. Easy set up, light weight and it is really great.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: GayT
Reviews.Content: Was so excited to give this gift for Christmas.  The recipient LOVES the Netflix, Facebook capabilities.  Samsung is always a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Prasanna Swaminathan
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. The only thing that needs improvement is the web browser that crashes frequently. All other features are excellent

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch clear picture
Reviews.Author: Susan J Meyerott
Reviews.Content: Although we have not yet explored all of the features of this HDTV we are pleased with how clear the picture is and how easy it is to use.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Value
Reviews.Author: Rafael Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV that I've purchased online.  I was hesitant not having seen the picture quality and what would happen if I didn't like it.  The reviews and the price moved me to purchase it.  I wanted a "Smart TV" for our bedroom so we could watch Netflix and Amazon Prime shows.  The picture quality and the setup exceeded my expectations considering the price.  We haven't subscribed to Netflix yet but we are watching several Amazon prime shows and we couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Nikki Graham
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Beautiful picture! The smart feature makes it super easy to use and navigate. Lots of options. So nice to have!

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Jimmy McGlamery
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it....especially the WIFI feature ......makes hooking up for Netflix extremely easy

Reviews.Title: A very impressive small TV for a small room.
Reviews.Author: Anicia Limmany
Reviews.Content: I like this product a lot because it meets the expectation I was looking for a TV, the picture is crisp, clear and easy to set up. So far, there was no problem with it.  I have been using it for a month now and I can recommend it to friends who would like a small TV.

Reviews.Title: this is a good tv
Reviews.Author: kary lofton
Reviews.Content: Im satisfied with this tv. I also purchased the wall mount for it. Good call. Very easy step by step set up As well.

Reviews.Title: Bedroom Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Bruce K. Bleikamp
Reviews.Content: Great TV that allows us to watch TV including Amazon Prime and Netflix without hooking up the IPad.  Great picture.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: K. Cashman "xboxer"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son for his college dorm.  He is a big fan of Samsung and even more with this because its a smart tv

Reviews.Title: Very good not great
Reviews.Author: Gary  Lipp
Reviews.Content: Very good product. I would have given it a 4.5 but couldn't be more precise on your scale.  I think the volume control is too varied when switching modes and it is not reactive quick enough. In other words it takes too many clicks to affect the volume.  Picture is great ...
