Remote controls are great.  The smart aspect has not been used to its potential yet and the ease of typing on the remote is not easy at all. So overall I would say an 8.5 to a 9 out of ten.

Reviews.Title: Product review
Reviews.Author: Thuc X. Nguyen "thucxnguyen"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Smart TV is great. The picture is clear and brighter compare to a regular TV those it costs quite more but I think it is worth to spend. It is so light as well.Thanks,Thuc Nguyen

Reviews.Title: Nice set
Reviews.Author: Lydia Larsen
Reviews.Content: Easy set up. Colors are accurate and were easy to fine tune. Nice not having to buy Roku or other such device to stream content from Netflix and other services. Still exploring apps. Perfect size for an average size bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Love our new TV!
Reviews.Author: Linda M Stratton
Reviews.Content: This TV is spectacular in our family room. It was easy to set it up and we have no problems operating it. We love the way we can stream movies directly to it. It was the best buy of the season!

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality and a bargain for the features.
Reviews.Author: Richard McPherson
Reviews.Content: This new set replaced a previous Samsung set and I am amazed at the improvement of the picture quality. Both my regular DVD's and BlueRay's have great clarity and along with my surround sound it is better than going to the movies.  I haven't gotten into too many of the other options but I do already have my Amazon Instant Video set up installed and enjoying every minute.  The narrow bezel around the screen blends in with the picture and the video image appears to float in mid-air....COOL...and lovin' it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price I paid
Reviews.Author: Michael Cruz
Reviews.Content: The TV looks good, but it's not as clear as i thought. I grabbed it on black Friday for $630 so i think it was a good buy. Other than that, i like the smart portion of the TV. You can listen to Pandora, watch Youtube(control it from your phone) and watch movies.If you are on a budget and still want some what of good quality, this TV is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Steven Ellis
Reviews.Content: It was all i was hoping for...got what I wanted, when I wanted and how a wanted. Recommended in all aspects

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Brenda J. Herrington
Reviews.Content: love it, easy to read instructions, packaging was terrific kept the product safe from scratches, and how to warning label upfront. That prevents accidental damage to the TV while unpackaging/unboxing.  yep I am looking for same product much bigger for the living room later on. Keeping my eye on some really good competitive deals. I love the Samsung smart TV, the Amazon prime, fast service and the Team that got it safe to my front door. Thank-you. sincerely, Brenda..

Reviews.Title: Great bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Allison J Tinney
Reviews.Content: Took a while to get set up but now works like a charm. If you have trouble getting the internet connection to work, make sure the location settings are set to "United States" if you're in the US. For some reason without this it wouldn't connect for me and took 3 samsung support calls to figure it out. I don't have much experience with smart tvs but I'm pretty happy with the price and performance.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Ian Howley
Reviews.Content: Boyfriend loved it. He can't stop using the smart hub. It was great value for money and I'd highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Ivy Lim
Reviews.Content: This Great tv and pretty easy to use. The remote could be better though. The picture quality is good too.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Chinita Stalzer
Reviews.Content: Great picture. It was easy to set up . It was easy to connect to internet. Perfect for my room.

Reviews.Title: Best for the dollar
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: Love this smart TV.  Just the right size too!  Used for a second TV (Bedroom).  it was a gift for daughter.

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Pat Nacker
Reviews.Content: I loved the new smaller frame so much that I was able to place a larger TV in the same spot that I had previously had another 32" TV (A Plazma TV with only 720h).  There was n o problem with the TV, I just wanted a larger one, which I ordered.  Thanks for the speedy responses.Patr

Reviews.Title: A TV thats lives for its name.
Reviews.Author: Tarun
Reviews.Content: Great tv for everyone. No image flicker or distortion. It's been perfect. Handles all graphics of my ps4. Plays hd without hassle. the only issue is the sound which is not that great. Good on ya Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Good tv not great "smart" tv
Reviews.Author: Sofia
Reviews.Content: The size and look of this tv was exactly what I was looking for. The "smart" aspect of this tv is not as reliable or as efficient as I would have hoped. It is difficult to navigate that system and it is pretty slow. Overall I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: excellent quality for the price.
Reviews.Author: ltimbo
Reviews.Content: I'm a plasma man myself but I purchased this tv as a Black Friday week deal for my girlfriend as the price was great and I couldn't find a plasma that was 40 inches (no room for > 40 inches).  After calibrating the tv based on specs listed by another Amazon customer, the image looks great.  Being a plasma man, I was impressed with the black levels on this set (not quite Viera quality but respectable for an LED set).  My only complaint is that I cannot get the Samsung Apps to work and am waiting for a tech to call me to solve the problem.  I'm not too concerned though because I a familiar with Samsung's customer service which is excellent and I know they will take care of me.  I have set up other tv's with apps in the past so I know what I am doing and I know that the problem is not me.

Reviews.Title: great TV, bad remote
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: Love as a whole,one thing i didn't like was the remote for using the Web based services and apps. Makes doing searches difficult if you want to use Netflix for instance. Picture is great though. Consider using A peripheral keyboard if you do much internet or app using.

Reviews.Title: Review of this TV
Reviews.Author: micheal carson
Reviews.Content: Purchased during holiday season so was less expensive than most times of the year.  First go around with smart tv at the home.Issues: devices will not allow for Comcast channel changing.  This means another remote.  Nor, does this device have the hardware to allow Comcast channel changing.SwipeIT App is not working/found on App MarketPlace. Even though featured on Samsun website.Seems like lower tiered hardware for Internet requests but I get what I pay for.  Still, don't put it out if I would not reply to a post like this.

Reviews.Title: A great TV
Reviews.Author: margaret e ensley
Reviews.Content: A great TV with way more features than expected. It is very user friendly! We are very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: So far I am loving it!
Reviews.Author: D. White
Reviews.Content: I have never ordered a TV on line.  I was pleasantly surprised.  My son set my smart TV up.  This Samsung is a beautiful TV.  My HD picture is beautiful and the Samsung apps are pretty easy to use.  I really couldn't have best my price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Gibson
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great.  I did have to make adjustments until I found a setting that I liked.  It linked to my wireless router with no problem.  I have watched several Amazon movies, played music from Pandora, did some U-Tube and did the Web browser.  The web browser is somewhat limited without a keyboard.  I may add a wireless keyboard through one of the USB ports but I already have 2 computers so I may not need it.  I also hooked it into my stereo receiver which is great for music and movies.Amazon also did a good job on the delivery.  Initially it was out of stock but they sourced it somewhere in several days.Overall, I am very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung continues to please
Reviews.Author: daukamp "daukamp"
Reviews.Content: This is our second Samsung, a 32" Smart LED model for the office that just barely fits the available space. We are very pleased with it's performance but miss the on-off timer capability of our larger Samsung in the family room. The Smart feature is great. We recommend this TV to all.

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Terhaar
Reviews.Content: This is our first "smart TV" and at least so far it does everything we had hoped. The cable hook up was as expected and the wi-fi connection was very easy with no problems. We were able to log in to our Netflix account and watch movies immediately.

Reviews.Title: Its A Tv
Reviews.Author: Daniel Heath
Reviews.Content: I like the tv it is what I needed. If you are looking at this tv for the application aspect, The interface is hard to navigate but I didn't buy it for that so its a great TV.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: RICH
Reviews.Content: Works great. I've never had a SMART TV before and I am glad that this great product was my first. my only dislikes are the bulky remote control and that the apps could be better. The apps always need to be updated before use which is why i do not use the apps much.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: S. Banks
Reviews.Content: I love the smart central with apps. I love the ability to check emails online, access my prime movies and watch for free. The picture quality is outstanding and the size is perfect for my bedroom without being a sore thumb. Now adding sound bar to maximize the theatre effect.

Reviews.Title: Great pic, nice features
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm not a techie type but this tv is perfect for me.  It's very light and portable if need be, it has an excellent picture and I'm enjoying the Smart features.

Reviews.Title: Dave's review
Reviews.Author: David W Venable
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent HDTV, the colors are brilliant and the picture is great.  I have only owned this tv for a month, upgrading from the Samsung DLP projection tv which I bought 6 years ago.  This tv is lighter(not that it matters once you have mounted/placed it on a stand) As this is a "smart" tv, I can tell you it is smarter than me.  As recommended by another owner of this brand, I made adjustments to the color, contrast, brightness, etc to get the most out of this picture.  I highly recommend this model for all sports fans.

Reviews.Title: Superb TV
Reviews.Author: Fran Cespedes
Reviews.Content: A lot has been said about this smart tv, and i just want to add that works perfectly fine in Costa Rica.Some features do not work here for obvious reasons (amazon video for example) but do not pay attention, it has a lot of different options that will keep u entertain for a while

Reviews.Title: Met and exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Antonio I.
Reviews.Content: Pros:Price was rightDelivery was well before posted dateSmart TV functionality is much more than expected......can use FIOS app to avoid having extra set top boxCons:Stand is not the most stable....can tip over if not carefulWould have love to have the capability to expand memory via sd card

Reviews.Title: Foolproof quality.
Reviews.Author: libby
Reviews.Content: I had to consider what I needed this TV for- I watch Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu (for the shows on cable I like) and YouTube.  This was perfect, as it find my airport, I entered my password, and I could download my apps for these elements in a few minutes, right out of the box.  I cancelled my cable, and I'm saving so much money.  I was literally downloading these apps within ten minutes of the delivery.  The box was 16lbs, so I can move it from room to room, whenever I need (the apps usually need to be reactivated, but that is merely logging back in.) It is very nice to move a large TV the weight of an 80's VHS player with an Oxford dictionary on top, and just plug it in to the wall, no additional wires.As for settings, I really didn't change anything!  I had read reviews about spotty sound, and picture, and jelly belly-like recipes for the right sound and picture settings, but for me, it was nearly perfect.  And I went to film school and have spent a lot of time calibrating monitors.  I brought the backlight up a bit, which was right in the menu.Phenomenal value for the product.I kind of hate the remote, but whatever.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: F. Andrew
Reviews.Content: ONLY THING IS I DID NOT REALIZE THAT THE WEBCAM FOR SKYPE IS SO EXPENSIVE, EVERYTHING ELSE IS JUST GREAT.. I LOVE MY CHRISTMAS PRESENT

Reviews.Title: Skype App Can't Use Standard Camera
Reviews.Author: Investor
Reviews.Content: Samsung elected to force us to purchase their expensive Samsung Camera instead of including a driver for the ubiquitous Logitech cameras that most everyone already has.The phone controllers are much easier to use than the remote, especially if you need to type anything on the keyboard. No doubt those apps will also improve quickly.In general, I would like to see all the phone apps pipe their display to the big screen like the YouTube app does.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for all purposes
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and I use it for my new xbox and lovethe picture on the games. You defiantly have to buy this tv!

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: this is our first smart tv.  we like it. we appreciate getting over the air signals plus internet movies and other items

Reviews.Title: Amazing Smart TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Matt R. Galletta
Reviews.Content: I must say that I did a lot of research when purchasing a new Smart TV, and the price of this TV caught my eye. I was hesitant at first, because of the low price, but I must say that this is probably one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. Not only does the TV work phenomenally, the SmartHub is a really great feature that revolutionizes the way one watches TV. If you are interested in getting a new TV, DEFINITELY buy this one for the amazing price and the amazing quality.

Reviews.Title: wonderful. my kids love it for the play room.
Reviews.Author: Ragen Latham
Reviews.Content: Be bought this TV for black friday for our kids play room/game room. It is easy to use and has wonderful picture quality and sound.

Reviews.Title: Good Smart HDTV made by Samsung
Reviews.Author: ehweng
Reviews.Content: I really like this Smart HDTV which has a lot new features that the other HDTV won't have. The only improvement Samsung needs to make is the Search option on the Smart TV function which would hang the screen without Search window appearing. It didn't work even after resetting the Smart function. Overall, this is a very good HDTV for a small to medium size family living room.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Ahymerd
Reviews.Content: the shipping was fast and without any inconvenienceThe TV is very good, the imagen is acceptable And the browser is fast, but it's a bit thick, I thought it would be thinner , but is okey, i recommended.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Winnie
Reviews.Content: I was delighted with receiving this TV.  I enjoy the fact that I do need to have all the conversion boxes for Net Flix, Hulu, etc since it is all included in the TV.  It was a good value and I was fortunate to be able to take advantage of the "Black Friday" special that was advertised.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Ming Zhang
Reviews.Content: The price is cheap and quality is acceptable. It is too heavy to mount onto wall. On the other hand, it is perfect to put onto a table.

Reviews.Title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
Reviews.Author: C. Okonta "cokonta"
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to purchase a smart TV because I knew that there were so many new devices that could essentially transform any TV into a smart TV. However, when the Black Friday deal on this computer came up, I simply could not pass it up. This was simultaneously the best and worst TV related purchase I've ever made. And the only reason it was the worst is because I'm addicted to it. You really can't beat the convenience of the apps. I listen to pandora with TV sound and all the functionality of my computer-based version. I have both hulu plus and Netflix on lock with it as well. Plus, it was incredibly easy to set up and use. So do not pass this one up!

Reviews.Title: Aspect ratio
Reviews.Author: Vicki P.
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is good, but the aspect ratio is not.  The people are either short and squat or long and tall.  The only time they look sort of normal is if you choose 4:3, which defeats the purpose of a large screen TV.

Reviews.Title: Review for Samsung UN32EH5300 smart TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Vaughan
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed. the remote makes it difficult to manoeuvre the cursor. I spend almost one hour just trying to get on a site. The pop ups are hard to control when the remote is not moving as one would want it to. The TV has a forward slant appearance even though i double check to make sure the stand is correctly attached. Picture quality is good though. The movies I cannot access as I would have to purchase them

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Don Reyna
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed in this TV because the picture quality is not what is being promoted, the brightness is weak, the colors are less than true, and the overall picture quality is poor, however, the price was great but you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Andrew Flynn
Reviews.Content: The more that I use this television, the more I like it.  The only drawback that I would mention is that it is not entirely compatible with Apple products.  That said, it's a great product on it's own.  Wifi is amazing.

Reviews.Title: looks very nice in HD
Reviews.Author: felipesalas
Reviews.Content: the Samsung Smart TV is my first Smart TV and I'm loving it  so far it looks good  sounds good in looks great on Netflix and hulu I recommend this TV to anybody who wants to buy one

Reviews.Title: great buy!
Reviews.Author: Ashton
Reviews.Content: Excellent tv, love the news apps since I don't have cable but missed listening to the news in the morning.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Bob Galli
Reviews.Content: Nice TV easy setup-good for bedroom or spare rooms . Clear motioon Ok not as clear as 240 HZ that I own but excellent value for price

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ana91
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom and she absolutely loves it. The smart hub takes a little long to load sometimes, but I think that's a kink that will be worked out as the technology develops. Also there's been a few sound issues when the apps (hulu, netflix, amazon instant video) are used. The sound changes in quality in volume, but I think that's an app thing. Overall though, great picture clarity and a good product! Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: toddl
Reviews.Content: Excellent value, gorgeous picture, great sound.Bought this for my son's room for his XBOX gaming and it's perfect- he loves it!

Reviews.Title: Worth the investment! :)
Reviews.Author: Brownie
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on Black Friday for a super duper deal. The picture quality is great. Sound is good. Very energy efficient. I wish it came with a universal remote though :/. Very annoying to use smart-hub apps.The logitech K400 keyboard works great with the tv for browsing. The browser is not really good though. Wish i could installl chrome :)Overall very satisfied. Samsung never fails to impress. If anybody is looking for an affordable Smart TV with excellent picture quality, I would definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: My second TV running solely on my WiFi network = awesome
Reviews.Author: Anne CLS "redorr"
Reviews.Content: The Smart TV comes loaded with Amazone Prime, Netflix, Hulu and TimeWarnerTV so I can watch anything, including TW On Demand and live TV in my office without a cable or antenna.  Note that all these services require paid subscriptions, but I had them all already.  The picture is great, it has a web browser also so I can get my yoga videos streaming off the web.  I have high-speed internet and the buffering is rare.  Great price here, nearly $100 less than the same (although slightly different model number) item on big box store websites.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Green
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and the cheapest price around. Received the TV earlier than expected. On screen remote can use some updates though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Nage
Reviews.Content: I liked this Samsung product, the world is moving towards Internet based entertainment. It is excellent value for money if you have around 5 Mbps bandwidth connection to your home. I saw couple of movies like "Polar Express" and "The Adventure of Tintin", I would say excellent quality.One thing they should have added to the product was that there should be literature mentioning how you can remove an application you have downloaded. I am well versed with "how to use Internet", but, I would say that would lesser tech savvy people. All in all, I would recommend this product for the money I paid for..

Reviews.Title: Excellent  product
Reviews.Author: torries
Reviews.Content: As expected very good product. Product wort it. Would recommend this product to any and everyone. I will give it a thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv!
Reviews.Author: Jesse Flores
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice TV. Its capabilities are more than what I expected. It does some cool things. I recommended it

Reviews.Title: My first Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: Iziah mike
Reviews.Content: I Brought this Flat Screen for my wife for Christmas and she really enjoys it!!!!!! will consider changing all my Fat Backs !!!!! LOL

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Kathryn L Blue
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to use and exactly what I expected. It was easy to set up as well for someone that is knind of a novice at electronics!!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Anzoategui V
Reviews.Content: Best price best tv out there I love it. It's big and beautiful I just have to learn how to connect it and I will be done!

Reviews.Title: Samsung all the way..
Reviews.Author: Ruskin Baksh
Reviews.Content: Great tv and picture quality and I love how it links up with my samsung galaxy s3 through samsung all share so my pictures and videos from my phone can instantly show on the tv with the click of a button.

Reviews.Title: Trust this brand
Reviews.Author: Tom D
Reviews.Content: Replaced an old 32 inch CRT. It's quite thin and light yet not flimsy or cheaply made at all. Brand matters, and don't think otherwise. Every TV in the house, except one, is now a smart TV. There's no going back to a regular TV once you get one of these.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald R.
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality but the Samsung App market is weak. I don't like how in the Netflix app you can't toggle between user profiles. It might be because they created the app before Netflix introduced multiple users but I hope they fix it soon.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Ginger Steele
Reviews.Content: EZ set up, nice pic. perfect for our living room. anything larger seems like overkill. great for netflix lovers too. we love it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV, Black
Reviews.Author: Lisa silva de Leo
Reviews.Content: I am most than happy with this purchase. It is an excellent product just like other products I own of this brand, and Black Friday's offers let me buy it intead of a regular TV set. 100% satisfied

Reviews.Title: So far so good....
Reviews.Author: Colleen Smith
Reviews.Content: Christmas gift for my adult son. He loves it. Hooked up a keyboard to it and now has free HBO from my cable and has netflicks from an family account.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: DawnP
Reviews.Content: I was leaning towards buying a Plasma TV after hearing that the picture was better than LED, but I am not disappointed in this TV at all. The picture is great, even from an angle, The sound is quite decent. The setup was extremely easy - I got it hooked up to our wireless internet service within a minute. Some reviewers have suggested changing the settings for a better picture. I have not tried changing anything yet, we have been watching it with the factory settings and it's just fine. Love it!

Reviews.Title: love it, love it, love it
Reviews.Author: joy h
Reviews.Content: easy to hook up, beautiful clear picture,  love the netflix and amazon ease of use... should have done this years ago.  arrived early.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: KATHY KELLEY
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent choice for my Grandson for Christmas.  It has so many apps and things he enjoys.  I was very pleased with this product!  I also have a Samsung it's quality is the best!

Reviews.Title: bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: Cristina E. Lima
Reviews.Content: I researched capabilities and smart hub was very appealing to me. It is everything I expected it to be. Very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture and feature filled LED tv.
Reviews.Author: Pj
Reviews.Content: This Led smart TV is phenomenal.  Picture, sound and feature packed.Have a Playstaion 3 hooked up to it and it is the perfect size for a bedroom TVAll the "smart" features allow him to use the set to watch Netflix, social media and of course Youtube

Reviews.Title: Good one
Reviews.Author: prema
Reviews.Content: Got this for Thanksgiving. is good, has browser capability , USB..etc lot features.. many apps are there to download and play

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300--Love It!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lucille D. Merchant "Avid Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I did my homework by reading all the reviews on Amazon. I had a friend set it up for me and the picture is great. I love this TV and caught a real price break before the holidays. I do not have it set for web browsing, and I may call in a professional. I am thoroughly enjoying this Samsung and only wish I had gotten a screen larger than 40 in. I may just do this and use the 40 in. in the bedroom. I'm one happy camper!There are very helpful reviews which detail settings and we used them in set-up with great results!

Reviews.Title: Meets expectations
Reviews.Author: JC-Doc
Reviews.Content: Once I got it set up it worked perfectly.  It has a great picture.  No problems.  Met all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Works fine.
Reviews.Author: Terry Lund
Reviews.Content: TV works fine. Good picture crappy sound like most flat screens. The Smart part works pretty good but I think problems I am having has to do with lousy Router the telephone company rents you.

Reviews.Title: I really like my new tv.
Reviews.Author: donna smith
Reviews.Content: Since I am visually impaired I enjoy a tv I can see without sitting 2 feet in front of it.

Reviews.Title: great smart tv.
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: The resolution is great,  the tv isn't heavier and is easy to use. Firmware update was easy, fast and without errors. I think this tv has a perfect relationship between quality and price. I really recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Ron in Florida
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the TV and the features that it brings such as  the WI-FI  connection for UTube and other sites but it has one annoying feature.  The picture is like it is zoomed in so do not see what is one the bottom like the score of the game that is on.  No help on a call to Samsung but I can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Greast tv for price
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: seems like the WIFI is slow sometimes, few other minor things, but over all a great tv with great picture for the bucks

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Dwight Ott
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase I do not regret. I am very pleased with everything about it and think Samsung products are superb. Good price and quality.I definitely recommend this TV to anyone shopping for a 40" smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Vikash Gill
Reviews.Content: A perfect sizeGood quality , Great Apps,Good Pic Quality, Easy to assemble,Good Sound and Great Picture .

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: john reynolds jr
Reviews.Content: Great for a bedroom TV, unless you have a very large bedroom, not too big not too small, the picture is clear and the smart TV function is great, hooked up easily to the internet and has a lot of other applications than just netflix and hulu.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: DJB
Reviews.Content: This smart TV is awesome. It is very user friendly and easy to set up. It was also very easy to connect to my wireless network. It has great picture quality and I would buy this again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: So far it's doing evrything I needed
Reviews.Author: EFRAIN O ORTUNO
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace my old tv that went out. I see that it has a lot of different things I can do with the apps and so forth. Maybe when I get some time I'll tinker with all that. Have had it over a month now and everything is going great.

Reviews.Title: We wanted the best
Reviews.Author: Jerry C
Reviews.Content: Our Condo is fairly small and we wanted to get a bigger TV.  The time and price was very right.  We are so pleased with larger screen and wonderful quality.

Reviews.Title: A steal deal
Reviews.Author: Ehsan M. Felemban "Ehsan M Felemban"
Reviews.Content: It was the best deal ever.  I never realized that I could purchase a 46" Smart TV for a low cost.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Lindsay Mena
Reviews.Content: I did lots of research before purchasing this TV.  It has met all of my expectations for being a high quality SMART TV.  It has awesome screen resolution and great sound.  I live in an apartment, so the size is a good fit.  Big enough for a 12 x 14 room, but not over powering.  My only complaint is when in Smart mode there is a "blink/blip" sound when moving between apps or choosing anything that gets a little annoying.  Overall I would actually give this TV closer to a 5 star, but there are no options for selecting additional half stars.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for a great price
Reviews.Author: Spencer
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, wireless works just fine.  Awesome television for the price.  This is a 1080p smart tv for under $300.  Samsung televisions always have the best picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LED 1080P HDTV
Reviews.Author: George Hatcher
Reviews.Content: I liked the ease of installation to my dish service and the clarity of the picture it rendered. I would recommend this TV to anyone It is a good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: Maddawg2961
Reviews.Content: Got this tv for a cheap price compared to stores on their Black Friday sale, I expected it to feel look at work cheeper, but it is a real solid tv, with great wifi strength. A lot lf reviews as I was reading complained about the smart tv part and how it was slow with netflix and YouTube, but I have not had any problems, always loads faster than I can watch, so it must be those peoples internet! 5 star tv!

Reviews.Title: 1st Smart TV
Reviews.Author: T  Leary
Reviews.Content: All I Can Say is WOW! This little TV packs a punch and is loaded with features. The color is crisp and clear, the funtions are easy enough, plenty of hook-ups. If this TV has a small downside it is probably the sound quality is a little weak for my taste. The smart functions work OK (Remember, this is a SMART TV for under $300.00) - streamed some episodes of "Lost and Walking Dead" from Netflicks without an issue. Overall - I LIKE IT !

Reviews.Title: this tv is truly a smart purchase
Reviews.Author: John Del Conte
Reviews.Content: This TV replaces an older tube type and is very light weight and easy to handle and very efficient. The functions are excellent and easy to access and the price was great. Netflix function is a good value and has allowed me to remove some cable functions lowering my cost.

Reviews.Title: Great quality TV
Reviews.Author: Caroline A Young
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great price. I was a bit concerned about ordering a tv online but it turned out to be high quality for a great price for my bedroom. Love that it is a smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Sulaiman Saka
Reviews.Content: Because it's simply Awesome and all the features are amazing. It's simply Magical, all my friends are just envious of my new smart hub TV

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Brian Offenberger
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. She absolutely loves it. Picture clarity is great and set up was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv to go with ps4!
Reviews.Author: Shoperson
Reviews.Content: I got this tv to go along with my ps4 and it is amazing! The clarity and colors are vivid and the picture is crisp for my games. The apps on it are very nice as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality and value
Reviews.Author: Colorado Smart Shopper
Reviews.Content: After reading many of the conflicting review regarding this particular model, other models, and Samsung in general, I decided to give it a try.  We have owned the TV for over six months now and it has worked very well.  The only minor issue I have had that other reviewers have commented on is the app for Netflix often does not retain user name and password information, and it is a bit time-consuming to re-enter it.  However, this problem is far from a daily occurrence, and the other apps we have used, including Amazon Prime and Pandora, have worked without issue.  The TV is very light and is easily mountable to the wall.  I would recommend this Smart TV without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Samsung smart TV
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Stephens
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent Smart TV.  Easy to set up and even easier with an external mouse and keyboard.  Wireless works great.

Reviews.Title: excellent bargain, so far so good
Reviews.Author: oss
Reviews.Content: Very Good quality image and audio for the price, would advise to get a keyboard for the smart hub, remote control will take you too much time

Reviews.Title: Liked it so much I bought a second one!
Reviews.Author: KatrinaRadia "KatrinaRadia"
Reviews.Content: I first ordered this TV Dec 2012. I have used it everyday as the set I watch in the bedroom. LOVE it. In fact so much that I just ordered another for my activity room to watch Smart TV via the apps available, or movies, during workouts on the treadmill on Dec 27th 2013. That and the helpful hints from others in reviews should be enough to insure you that this is a great TV for the money!

Reviews.Title: Easy as pie
Reviews.Author: Shalonda Garcia
Reviews.Content: Love the ease of watching Amazon Prime and Netflix on the Smart TV.Simple to use for the technologically challenged person(s).

Reviews.Title: Mostly great
Reviews.Author: Greg Tamblyn "Greg Tamblyn, Musical Lafologis...
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the picture, and after a month, no technical difficulties or other major problems. Also, it was easy to set up the TV and the stand. Light enough that I didn't need another person.Only disappointed with 2 things:The remote doesn't have a "Light" button, which would be helpful. It does light up when you press a key, but sometimes you press the wrong key in the dark. Also, the remote layout of the keys could be better, which you can say for just about any remote designed in South Korea.Secondly, the Smart TV feature is nice, but the apps for the Smart TV update automatically, which can cause a delay of a few minutes when you turn on smart TV. Also, it would be nice to be able to delete some of the apps I never use. It may be possible to do that, but if so I haven't discovered how.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a GREAT price.
Reviews.Author: dr. mike
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture if you read reviews and follow set up there. Love the Smart TV! Easy to set up and start watching.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: SoFi
Reviews.Content: I was ready for a new TV and samsung was high on my list. I ordered around black friday week and got a really great deal. The set up is easy and so is the navigation to the apps. I really love this TV!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Evelyn McDonald
Reviews.Content: I'd heard about how good Samsung TVs were and this one lives up to the hype.  Beautiful picture, easy to use.  I had someone install it for me and will now take time to read the instructions.  Yes, I am female and do read instructions.

Reviews.Title: UNBELIEVABLE FEATURES AT AN INCREDIBLE VALUE!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Pruessen
Reviews.Content: I can't recall ever being more pleased with a purchase. If you don't have the money for this item, get it and you won't regret it. It has built in wi-fi, picture in picture, the remote control has a built in light for the keys so you can see in the dark, there are so many features I can't even describe. Research this product and find out what I'm saying. You'll wish you invested in this sooner!

Reviews.Title: Samsung is tits!
Reviews.Author: Paul Hanna
Reviews.Content: This works great for my needs. I am enjoying the great color and picture clarity. I just bought a larger model.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, not so good Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Myra
Reviews.Content: The quality of the TV is great but we continuously experience problems with the Smarthub.  It has to update daily, it often will not load at all, and trying to type with the remote provided is a painful experience.  We bought a keyboard to go with it but it only works with the browser so it's only useful at times.  It's nice not to have to use a different device to stream Netflix or videos from Amazon, but the smarthub needs more work.  I would recommend waiting until the bugs are worked out before purchasing this TV.  Samsung has not perfected this technology yet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Katy Cahill
Reviews.Content: Fabulous!! Perfect for my apartment. Love the smartness tool of it. Recommend to everyone! Clear picture and slim design. Love!

Reviews.Title: Very nice... better quality than I had expected.
Reviews.Author: donald mortensen
Reviews.Content: The Samsung HDTV has excellent picture quality.  In addition it is easy to set up...it does most of the work for you.  Its built-in wireless worked as advertised and sets up quickly.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Rice2000j
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture and being a smart TV will auto dim or brighten with the room lighting.  I did have a misconception about the TV when I bought it as you can see on the screen I thought it being a smart TV and the picture showing facebook and Netflix it might connect to Wi-Fi and run the programs but it doesn't.  The TV has to have an external source.  It did connect to Wi-Fi to download updates for the TV but that was it.  Need and external source to do any internet.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful color
Reviews.Author: Golfnut
Reviews.Content: I had purchased the Vizio T.V. first and was so disappointed with the set that I returned it and ordered this one and couldn't be happier, color, apps and everything is just perfect.  I am so happy now with this set - you just won't go wrong with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Baylor Mom "DJ"
Reviews.Content: It works beautifully and in my opinion is an excellent product at a fair price.  It did come later than expected, however, so I had to make arrangements for someone to stay at the house an extra day; I didn't want to leave a package so obviously a TV out on the porch.

Reviews.Title: Good large screen LED TV
Reviews.Author: Sandip Das
Reviews.Content: Fulfills all my requirements for large screen TV in drawing room. Apps are good, but HDD space seems to be a bit limited (around 800 MB). Sound level needs to be upped to 80% for decent hearing from Netflix movies.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture
Reviews.Author: JVP
Reviews.Content: Wi-Fi and the apps are a snap to setup and navigate. Easily hooks to amazon prime for videos for the kids replacing the need other players and DVDs...oh, did I mention the picture quality? awesome one of the best. Can't go wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung junkie
Reviews.Author: Yvonne McKenzie
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV for a little more than a month, so far so good. I'm Samsung bias being that all my electronics are Samsung. Sometimes when going into smart TV mode the loading stalls,  but updates help cure that. The picture and sound is crisp. I haven't set my galaxy note2 to operate the TV yet, but the option is there to control the TV from my phone/phalet. In all a great TV thus far.

Reviews.Title: First flat screen
Reviews.Author: Sandra Stark
Reviews.Content: We couldn't be happier. The sound was less than good,but with a small tweak and hook up to the sound system it's all good now.

Reviews.Title: Love this tv!
Reviews.Author: Sandy River "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: I hesitated about purchasing a Smart TV because I was unsure of how complicated it would be.  It was easy to set up, and easy to use.  Picture is crisp and clear.  Nothing to it!  I give it a high rating because it is easy to use and great picture quality!

Reviews.Title: Warning, poor packaging but great TV, so it can be a hassle
Reviews.Author: Polly
Reviews.Content: To summarize the TV was great but first two I ordered had screen smashed in.  Yes I ordered one TV.  Found it had a broken screen, like some one had punched the front of the box and put a round hole about 6 inches across in the middle of the screen.I returned this TV and ordered a replacement.  The second TV had a broken screen in nearly the same spot. I was home when the second TV was gently delivered by the UPS driver. Neither box had visible damage, just a crease in the middle of the box.The package is obviously not suitable to protect the screen. Just one box, (not double boxed) and no foam in front of the screen.So on the third try I got an undamaged TV.  I would give the TV 5 stars but the shipping and returns caused a hassle. Most items I get from Amazon are overprotected, so I don't understand why so expensive an item is shipped in a flimsy package.

Reviews.Title: realllygood
Reviews.Author: juan avalos
Reviews.Content: Itsdefenetely a good tv but my first one i had, had a dead pixel but worked great and the new replacement I got is a little slow while surfing online and freezes a little. Hopefullly it justneeds a update but besides that really afortible and worth it

Reviews.Title: GOod
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Really like this TV. Te price was great and the picture is really clear. Easy to set up and just really like it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amy Tran
Reviews.Content: It's an awesome smart tv for the price. I've had it for two weeks now and am thoroughly enjoying it. I'm used to Vizio flat screens but thought I'd make an exception for this Samsung and I'm glad I did!

Reviews.Title: Great price, great pictue
Reviews.Author: Allen S. Keitz
Reviews.Content: Great picture, Sound good. Easy to connect to internet. Perfect for my family room. Would buy another just like it.

Reviews.Title: Just what we hoped for
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Bersani
Reviews.Content: Had been checking options for over a year before deciding on this model. Very big compared to the 32 inch dinosaur that it replaced. Very light. Excellent picture quality. Very good price. Still learning the internet apps features and what might work for us.Very glad that we finally went HD.

Reviews.Title: Finally !
Reviews.Author: J. R. Bastide "rumba9940"
Reviews.Content: I had been thinking of replacing my old TV in the bedroom for years. This is a great replacement !I can access Netflix and Amazon Video, Hulu etc. with it's Smart TV feature. I'm glad I waited and Igot a great price and did I forget to mention the great picture ?

Reviews.Title: 4 STARS
Reviews.Author: Nunz
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews before buying this tv and they were pretty much spot on, the positive ones. I gave 4 stars.Picture after set up is great. Navagation around the menus are easy. The only thing I find lacking is the sound, what can you expect from most smaller flat screens.Waiting on a ZVOZ to fix that.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tv it is
Reviews.Author: Harish Agarwal
Reviews.Content: Samsung has kept to his reputation, you don't need any of those additional devices.. Bye bye Roku.. buy wireless keyboard to access TV faster

Reviews.Title: good...better...amazon
Reviews.Author: Ifeanyi
Reviews.Content: It is just because I got exactly what I bargained for and conditions were perfect and thus I can't complain

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: matthew johnson
Reviews.Content: Love the tv. Work great. Only problem was Amazon didn't put in a box. So a box box that said Samsung smart tv was on my front door. Glad I don't live in the city. It would of been stolen

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jim W
Reviews.Content: Delivery was great as always with Amazon and the TV was packaged safely.  The picture is great our cable guy even commented on the quality and he sees lots of them.  We are happy with the whole transaction including the price.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tv that does  just what I wanted. Just pulled it out of the box, plugged it in and it does what it is suppose to do. But it's a Samsubg-that's what they do.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jordan Symanietz
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the TV. It has good picture and looks nice hanging in my bedroom. The applications load a little slow and can make the TV laggy and occasionally crash but all in all I would buy it again and have no real problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Features
Reviews.Author: Ronald Sampson
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV for 2 weeks.  The picture is great and so far it has been easy to connect with my in home Wifi.  I have not tried most of the internet features yet.  I most frequently use Pandora and that has been great and easy to use and connect to.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: David C.
Reviews.Content: Great picture, decent sound, and more features than I had needed. It works great, and took no time at all to setup and put it up. The base even has screw holes to attach to the stand.

Reviews.Title: Good TV to own..
Reviews.Author: Raj Karru
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for almost a month and i am very much satisfied with my purchase. Picture quality is amazing and WIFI works with no issues.  I would definitely recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Meets expectations... exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Salman Chowdhury
Reviews.Content: As a not-very-tech-savvy guy, I was quite anxious about buying my first LED television. I settled on this based on price and reviews. So far, no regrets. Great picture quality out of the box, audio output surpassed expectations, very easy to connect to wi-fi, and quite easy to navigate features. It's perfect size for my bedroom, but if you're buying for a bigger room, you may consider a 40" or larger model.The Smart TV features may not be the most up-to-date compared to latest models, but not a bother for me. Found the web-browser experience very klutzy, may have to buy wireless mouse/keyboard to avoid spending hours typing with the remote.All in all, definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Brent W. Knapp
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money.  Picture is amazing.  Love the SmartTV features.  Easy to use and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Gerald Weis
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my new house and have had it for going on 7 months.  I had a roku and Google Revue before but seriously this is the best option out there.  I loved it so much that I bought my sister and her boys one for Christmas this year only 40" instead of 32.  I had to do the 32" so it would fit into my entertainment center.  You will NOT be sorry if you buy one of these.  It has every app on there that you will need and all of them stream seamlessly.  I have my wifi set up in the basement and this is on the main floor and I have no problem streaming most apps.  I do have a bit of trouble with vudu streaming the XHD movies but HD and SD stream just fine.  Those issues are primarily due to the placement of my wifi and the materials of my home.  If you are on the fence on this item I highly recommend you buying it.  You must have wifi to enjoy it in it's fullest though.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: G. Kieliszek "Healthcare CIO"
Reviews.Content: This TV is not quite as smart as I hoped. Screen image is OK... not great. Same with sound quality. Really poor support on the Samsung website. Eventually got some help from my friends to get the functionality I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch smart tv
Reviews.Author: Harold J.
Reviews.Content: Had been looking for a new tv for some time. My current on (purchased in 2001) was occasionally giving me trouble and was a bear to move.  This is soooo light and east to move.  works perfectly.  Had some trouble getting connected to internet but once Ifigured how to get all the numbers that they required (WOW) it works perfectly.  Still learning about its potential.

Reviews.Title: Well Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: MikeP
Reviews.Content: It is what I was expecting and I am happy with it.I would certainly recommend this to my friends if they were looking for this size. It is just right for me. The sound is better than what I expected. The only draw back is that all the different things to use on it are not set up where you can easily go from one to another. Or at least I have not found a way yet. The directions what little there are of them do not offer much help in the area. It was easy to set up the internet connection, however. It was connected quick and not hard to do at all. As I said, I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful 46" smart TV
Reviews.Author: RS
Reviews.Content: After having bought a 40" Samsung Smart TV last Christmas (2012) for our living room, this year we needed another one to make our new home's bonus room complete. Waited until Cyber Monday & pulled the trigger on this fabulous 46", which is in all respects identical to our 40" except for the larger screen. We watch it about six feet from the screen & so far have totally enjoyed several DVD movies (Steve McQueen's "LeMans" & "Bullitt" especially) along with free local HD channels, Netflix and other apps easily accessible from icons on the main screen. Great resolution, color & sharpness, without any noticeable eye strain or fatigue. Based on my experience, Samsung's Smart TVs are hard to beat for value, performance & ease of use - highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: My gift for myself this Thanksgiving !!
Reviews.Author: TAMAL
Reviews.Content: I think i made a good choice. The setup is simple and provided you have good internet spped to back up your TV ,The Smart Hub works fine.Picture quality is crisp and clear. Sound is ok ,nothing out of the box.Definitely recomended.Thanks to Amazon for getting it delivered on time .. Loving it  :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv!
Reviews.Author: L. Frazier
Reviews.Content: This arrived timely and everything there.  We were shocked that the set up was so easy, since we are not skilled in that area at all!  We used the settings that a prior viewer had mentioned, which probably helped also.  We were also so pleasantly surprised to see that we could view streaming videos immediately without even using our Roku!  We are very low tech people, and the ease of use is just for us!  Samsung has outdone themselves!  The remote and tv options are self-explanatory without having to read instructions!  It's all very common sense.

Reviews.Title: I am addicted to this tv.
Reviews.Author: Michael Zdrakas
Reviews.Content: I got rid of my other bigger I cant believe in my room  that 32 inch perfect. For now I am now very happy!

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Joe Halaby
Reviews.Content: Very � with this product great deal and quality , I would highly recommend to all friends and family. Shipping was quick and in excellent shape

Reviews.Title: video/HDMI slots
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: Great TV and picture after you get the settings right. Horrible HDMI ports location. There all the located on the far right side with none one the back. Yes led TVs supposed to be thin but this TV is 4inches thick. So all you see after you hook it up are the HDMI cables looping trying to get behind the TV. Yes you can buy a 90 degree angle for it or like me just a better TV with more then 2 HDMI slots

Reviews.Title: Brings new innovation!
Reviews.Author: Danny "Danny"
Reviews.Content: This tv is great! Baically have my favorite youtube app and I can use it on a TV how great is that watching videos from a tv. There are many apps as well.

Reviews.Title: Very GOOD
Reviews.Author: Paul N. Gennuso
Reviews.Content: Great TV, wish I could get another one, the picture is GREAT., easy to use, easy to set up & use

Reviews.Title: awesome customer service.
Reviews.Author: Pedro C Palomino
Reviews.Content: Nice television for the price....a good deal !! When I ordered this, they wrote me a note telling me that they didn't have it ,letting me too to know that they will send the television to my home when it's available. Anyway, I didn't need to wait to much time because the same week I got the TV. At the beginning I wondered that maybe it was a bad idea to buy it, but seems that they solved the problem immediately. Awesome product, excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great smart tv
Reviews.Author: Mr. Rider
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this tv, I did some research on tvs. This one came with strong reviews. The price is definitely great. You get a really good smart tv for the price tag. Image quality is an issue for the tv out of the box. Follow the settings recommended by others and you'll great a crispy clean image.Believe it or not this is my first smart tv and I am really happy with it. I couldn't have made a better choice.

Reviews.Title: Smart feature
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Scott
Reviews.Content: It was a present to my room mate and she just raves about it all the features of a TV and a computer in one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Mobley
Reviews.Content: We love this TV!  It has a great picture and it was not that expensive.We will not purchase anything but a Samsung TV and this was one of the lower priced models, but it is still a very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Love this!!
Reviews.Author: Gina M. Caracci
Reviews.Content: After reading some reviews I thought I was going to have all these issues. I set it up in less than 15 minutes and am now watching Sons of Anarchy without cable Tv!!! The only thing is I realized I didnt get any kind of receipt from Amazon.UPDATE on receipt!! It was attached to the box!! So alls good there! lolAlso since there isnt a harddrive, I cant download adobe flash so cant watch shows from their websites..Thats ok though..still excited to have other options for free (amazon prime is CHEAP!) compared to basic antenna tv and dont have to pay for cable! Samsung support was very friendly as well. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Beatiful, vibrant colors, clear picture!
Reviews.Author: vibhuti  patel
Reviews.Content: I love this tv for its bright, vivid colors and its good sound. It's light in weight, and i love its smart tv features. I've used it for a month now and am very happy with it. The Samsung service which I have called a couple of times for help with features that are new for me, has been terrific. They have been able to help me out promptly and patiently. I have a larger Sony tv in another room that I had some problems with when I first got it--this has been a much better experience.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: oneshedevl "Catherine"
Reviews.Content: Really great picture, love Samsung products, perfect size for the spare bedroom.  Great apps and can't wait to try then all.

Reviews.Title: samsung BEST quality TELEVISON
Reviews.Author: michael schillinger
Reviews.Content: Just received my new Samsung T V  could not be happier with it super picture,easy set up,great quality,. It arrived in perfect condition Amazon did the best packaging you could ask for.....

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Lovestoshop "Shopaholic"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a great price and I love it.  The menu is easy to navigate and the quality is good.  The only negative comment is a very minor one.  It's supposed to adjust automatically for light, but I find that I have to manually adjust contrast and brightness sometimes.  It takes 2 seconds and it's not anything that would keep me from buying this again.  It's not very loud but I turn the volume up with no distortion.  A good deal.

Reviews.Title: This smart tv is beautiful
Reviews.Author: Ame
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with my purchase, the quality wasnt the best when I plugged it in but after I read some other reviews I changed the mode and the picture, brightness etc and its beautiful I love it soo much Im happy I bought this tv. The tv has wifi built in so you can watch netflix or browse youtube or facebook and browse the internet without a hdmi connection....I encourage anyone to invest in this tv

Reviews.Title: A very good tv but should with only 60Hz
Reviews.Author: Tim Bosch
Reviews.Content: This TV is pretty good but only has 60Hz which is a little bit below that standard these days. Other than that is a good buy for a "32 TV.

Reviews.Title: Speechless
Reviews.Author: Mat S.
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this tv. Im rocking out the factory setting and my Saturday and Sunday night football and it is awesome. the graphics are unreal.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: 12/13 Apps as provided by Samsung currently insufficient for me. Example Time Warner has good selection if using a Roku Box. Weak on the Samsung when using WiFi only, no streaming, just  On Demand. Also, no Acorn App on Samsung now. Acorn says may have App early 2014. Purchased Samsung with WiFi feature to avoid a need for additional set top box or Ruku. Not as advertised!

Reviews.Title: New purchase - great initial user experience
Reviews.Author: J. Hobbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV over the weekend - I was up and running, connected to WIFI, cable, and other components and streaming data from the internet in a matter of minutes.Obviously I cannot speak to quality since I've only been running for a few days, but initial user experience has been great!

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: K. Brakenhoff
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality.  Works pretty well with Amazon Instant Video.  Haven't tried it for web browsing or other apps yet.

Reviews.Title: This is a very smart tv
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Heuring Jr "Jimmy"
Reviews.Content: Was very easy to hook up. I pluged it in and it connected to my wyfi. Bout 20mins later I was streaming netflix, pandor, and amazon.

Reviews.Title: Perfectly attractive and functional
Reviews.Author: Tanya VK
Reviews.Content: I'm not a super-size-me TV person, so this 32-inch is perfect for my use. It's attractive, it has tons of smart features and is ridiculously easy to install and use.

Reviews.Title: never have to leave home!
Reviews.Author: Dunk
Reviews.Content: amazing! So nice. It sets up so easily to the internet. It's fool proof and the is so clear. Great buy and it came to my door!

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Willow
Reviews.Content: We have a smart system for our living room and this tv is super cool!! It has everything you need! Picture quality is great.  We love watching our netflix movies without needing a receiver!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Emily Pech
Reviews.Content: This TV is exactly what we were looking for. We got it on sale for Black Friday and it beat all of the local ads especially since we didn't have to pay tax.

Reviews.Title: Great and wonderful product
Reviews.Author: BOB
Reviews.Content: Excellent service merchandise arrived on time I really love it thanks a lot and very easy to assemble I will recommend it to any one

Reviews.Title: Great TV with excellent picture and cool features!
Reviews.Author: M. W.
Reviews.Content: This television is very bright and very clear.  The "smart" tv functionality is very cool, easy to use, and has a lot of services and features.  I use this TV in our basement with several inputs, an A/V receiver and a "smart" remote.  The TV integrated into my system perfectly and is very easy to use.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Value for money, youtube has issues
Reviews.Author: venkat
Reviews.Content: Worth the money. on the positive side it has got good picture quality and sound is also good. Looks good too.On the negative side it has issues with youtube streaming, but I think thats the problem with youtube app than the TV

Reviews.Title: Stunning Samsung
Reviews.Author: "Ali"
Reviews.Content: This is such a nice tv, and the picture is great.  It's a smart tv, so when my husband gets things up and running with wireless, we should be able to do many things we weren't able to do with our old tv.  This  tv looks sleek and modern, and we love it.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Anthony Rosato
Reviews.Content: NICE PICTURE..... PERFECT SIZE FOR OUR ROOM.....JUST LOVE IT GREAT SOUND.....THANKS AMAZONE FOR GIVING US THE CHANCE TO BUY THIS .

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: bsblurr
Reviews.Content: Great tv!!! I bought this for my wife and we all love it.  It is so easy to stream everything and the wifi is so easy to set up it's ridiculous.  The only thing bad about it is once in a while the home page locks up and you have to turn off the tv and back on again.  All in all this is a really good tv for the price, I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for good price
Reviews.Author: Christie Whalen
Reviews.Content: Had some issues with the smart hub software upgrade when I first got it but now that the problem is resolved I am very pleased with the TV!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 5300 46 in TV
Reviews.Author: Ernest J Mattern
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. The picture quality is excellent. The sound is so-so but I paired it with the Bose Solo Tv system and the pair are wonderful. The WiFi works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Samsung I'm singing!!!
Reviews.Author: B. Wise
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use all the features, but, I love it.  I find it amazing.  This replaced my 25+ years old TV.  Great price!

Reviews.Title: nice picture and sound looks great in the room
Reviews.Author: Ronald R. Campli "RRC"
Reviews.Content: I was a long term LG fan until my 42 inch developed small lines in the screen that grew worse over time. I'm told it needed a new mother board. I am pleased with the Samsung,  at 40 inches it works well in place of the LG. Goodbye LG hello Samsung. Ron

Reviews.Title: Awsome product
Reviews.Author: Brittany Rieke
Reviews.Content: TV is great! Good quality and the color is nice and vivid. It was exactly what I wanted. I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a great affordable smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Good quality electronic
Reviews.Author: Nyla McCarthy
Reviews.Content: ARGHHHH.  This is a great little television and neither my husband or I can figure the sucker out. We don't have cable and thought this would be a way to link our network and watch our favorites. I am sure it is, but it would have been nice if they had included some instructions.  Now we are looking for an adolescent techie to suppor

Reviews.Title: This is a Good quality and colors for the money.
Reviews.Author: A. J. Rupani
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS TV.  JUST FOLLOW THE COLOR SET-UP MENTIONED BY PREVIOUS USERS AND YOU'RE ALL SET. Though the menu could be better....it's a bit lousy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Samsung Television!!!
Reviews.Author: Wilber D Marin Jr
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat and smart television. So far no complaints with the television and its features. Everything works as advertised.  Thou I wish they would recommend you a wireless keyboard and mouse. I've been searching for one that will work so that I can enjoy the "smart" button even more.

Reviews.Title: great led hdtv
Reviews.Author: RICK L.
Reviews.Content: Had this tv for a couple of weeks, After first setting it up(stand went together easy, (stand DOESN'T tilt or swerve) had nice picture from many angles, smart hub had to update(did this about 3 times in as many days, but tv can still be used so no problem there) set up internet quickly works nicely(netflix, youtube) only annoying thing about searching online is using the arrows on remote, but what else can you do. About the remote, got every button you need but could have been designed a little better, can be a bit annoying because buttons you will probably use more are spread out on the remote, not a nightmare, but not the best either. The picture looked to be dim on every channel until I realized that the eco saver function which dims automatically was on, shut it off and great picture set to normal(which is great for someone like me who has had old fashioned fat back tvs forever, there are reviews with advice on how to set the picture to be better but as I said before I'm just a simple tv person and this is  an improvement from non hd tv so I like it as is looks nice outside to all black slim frame, sound is fine clear bass and all no problems there. Will update if any problems

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32", Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Danna
Reviews.Content: I went from an old fashioned (30# + large back) 19" TV to this...I feel like I`m at the movies. I couldn't believe I got this, Smart TV, with the ability to go on the internet (email, facebook, twitter, skype, etc.) and watch TV (PIP), and, you can get apps (limited) for less than a regular TV. Downside, surfing the internet with the on screen keyboard is very sloooow as well as the pointer. You can get a wireless mouse and keyboard for the, Smart TV, but, they are NOT low cost. The TV is pretty much easy to get around in but there are some things I am going to have to read up on. Good picture quality and good sound.

Reviews.Title: Four stars
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: Only had it a few weeks now but so far a good TV. Easy to set up, good picture. The speakers are poor. I'll be hooking it up to my surround sound as soon as I get a proper connecting cable but until then I frequently get a vibrating buzz with certain tones even at moderate sound levels. Also, its too bad the base does not rotate - you have to turn the base along with the TV to change the angle. The price was the biggest plus for this TV - very resonable considering the features it has.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Jarcquiste Rogers
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying this tv is awesome. I was amazed as I was fooling around with it. Great tv for a great price

Reviews.Title: Clear pictures
Reviews.Author: Oteng Selasie
Reviews.Content: Using this television in Ghana currently and i must say its a great tv. With all the digital television stations showing so clear. Connects to my home wifi so easily.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price
Reviews.Author: Balajee Nagarajan
Reviews.Content: Second samsung in my house. Perfect viewing and awesome inbuilt apps. No need for other devices like Roku. Easy to setup

Reviews.Title: Perfect bedroom gaming TV!
Reviews.Author: Kait
Reviews.Content: The TV is great, I find the sound is fine for just in my bedroom (though it would definitely be lacking in a larger area), but I will get a sound bar for better volume anyway.  The user interface is simple and it's perfect for gaming and movies/tv.  The TV stand is super sturdy which I appreciate and the narrow bezel is very nice!  I LOVE this TV so far.I was disappointed only with the shipping; The box came pretty badly damaged with a very large puncture in it about 1' long and 3" wide (luckily it was at the back of the TV and it caused no damage, though not for lack of trying it would seem) and the corners were pretty battered.  The TV is totally fine, but for such an expensive item I think it should have been handled with a lot more care (though I don't know if it was the carrier or the seller who damaged it).

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV's are the best
Reviews.Author: Lorac C "Lorac C"
Reviews.Content: It has a great HD picture, great sound, good extras.  Don't have any negative feedback.  This is my second samsung HD and they are both great.

Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: Lenny
Reviews.Content: I like the excellent picture, but don't know how to get the "smart" features such as Netflix, etc.I am also unhappy that my purchase price was reduced considerably only days after receivingthe TV.

Reviews.Title: It's pretty smart.
Reviews.Author: Clutch
Reviews.Content: Not too bad of a television. I had just gotten an LG 32" television for my birthday almost a year ago. Honestly the only reason I got this was due to the amazing price on Cyber Monday.

Reviews.Title: EH5300 Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome! Easy setup and ease of use with the Smart center.  We got it on our wireless network and hooked to our cable with no problem.  Sound is good and picture is great.. Great price for this TV!

Reviews.Title: One of Our Best Gifts to Ourselves!
Reviews.Author: J. Blue
Reviews.Content: This is on our bedroom wall and we love it!  Used a mount we got at Amazon... painless.  Great picture and we love having internet access.  Price was unbelievably low on a Daily Deal.

Reviews.Title: Our 1st Smart TV :)
Reviews.Author: Ivy & John Bednar
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our new TV.  We just hooked it up and so far so good!  We have lots more to explore on the Smart TV and looking forward to it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for bedroom/family areas...Get lost in the tv experience with Samsung's Smartv!
Reviews.Author: Silent Zygnomic
Reviews.Content: By the time you read this whole review you will be already setup and on the Internet, watching Netflix, or ordering a pizza via couch & remote(tablet app available too) which shows how easy Samsung has made the process. Buy, wait for delivery, inbox and watch...can't beat that. Now to function: Uses wifi or an Ethernet cable for a flawless Internet/stream app experience. Comes with a simple yet functional remote that the old man or the youngest could operate. Don't worry about any outdoor hacking of wifi due to password protection on computer, which conveniently acts as a wifi extender which can connect to other devices as well. Read the Samsung promo if you need to know more, but this is a sold Samsung device and will last you for years to come and will encapsulate you or your family in a magical experience known as: "Watchin' the tube!"

Reviews.Title: Go ahead, treat yourself to something amazing. :)
Reviews.Author: Victoria Morgan
Reviews.Content: PROS: I bought this on Black Friday for a pretty deep discount, and it came a lot sooner than I expected it to. It's a great set, and using the specs another user outlined in a previous comment, the picture quality really looks fantastic. I love the smart aspect of it, and since I currently don't have cable service, I've been watching lots of Netflix and streaming Pandora. Also, the audio on this set is SPECTACULAR. It really brings out the bass of songs and movies without being overwhelming, and I presume it'll do the same for video games. And it can get LOUD. I have yet to see what it sounds like at even 25% of its max volume since I haven't ever needed it to get much louder than that, but I bet it'll shake the stars senseless if it ever gets to its maximum (IMAX home theater, anyone?). It's a perfect size for me, and light, and I'm really happy with it. I bought the set primarily as a gaming television, so I'll update this after I bring my PS3 and get some games going on it. At that point, I'll comment on the picture quality and audio of the system and how it works with my gaming setup.CONS: Like it said in the description, it can connect to the internet, but I swear to whatever non-denominational god there is, if you want to use this function, do yourself a big, big favor and turn your smart phone into a remote or get a wireless keyboard and mouse -- if you try to use the included remote to navigate, the cursor will literally crawl across the screen. Also, since I don't have cable yet, the picture-in-picture shown on the Smart Hub is a tad annoying since right now it's showing the dizzying white blizzard typical of a TV with no channels. I have yet to find out how to disable this while in the Smart Hub, but I'm working on it. Since it's super glossy, it'll also show dust really easily, so you'll have to be after it with the included cleaning cloth pretty frequently to keep it looking sparkly.But I still rated it a 5 because it's a spectacular TV with some minor, nitpicky flaws that I got for a great price. I'd buy it again too if I had to and I'd definitely recommend it to my friends. And I recommend it to you as well. Go ahead, treat yourself to something amazing. :)

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Anne M.DiCostanzo
Reviews.Content: Great quality for price. Also easy to use and I am not computer savy. Easy to set up great picture quality

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV, but not slim
Reviews.Author: Alexander Goetze
Reviews.Content: Great TV, excellent picture, ok sound for a bed room or office. Need to add a sound bar if you like fuller sound. My main complain is the TV is not slim at all and sticks off the wall quite a bit, looking more like a flat tv from 10 years ago. I used a "picture frame" wire mounting, which helped a little.

Reviews.Title: Review plus needing help...
Reviews.Author: Brenda L. Carr
Reviews.Content: I like the TV extremely well, I'm not sure that I will be using all the gadgets that are on it, but to broaden my horizon it's worth a try. I'm having a problem adding channels 11 and 13 to the set. If you could help me with that right now I would be grateful. I am using an Indoor Digital TV Antenna and not ready to connect to cable yet. Can this be done? I am needing those like now.Thanks for your help and if there is a comment somewhere that tells me how to add it I would certainly appreciate very much. I have looked at a lot of them but nothing on channels.Thanks,BC

Reviews.Title: Smart is better than dumb
Reviews.Author: Richard L Eichman
Reviews.Content: Samsung is a great maker of TVs with great quality. The only thing I don't like is that now my TV is now smarter that I am.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Clay Eggleston
Reviews.Content: Got a great Black Friday deal on Amazon!  This smart TV has a great picture and was very easy to set up.  Although I typically have trouble getting a good Wi-Fi signal in the room where we placed the tv, the tv had no trouble picking up the signal.  Also, comes with a good choice of apps (better than apple tv, which doesn't allow for amazon prime).

Reviews.Title: Big Bang for your buck!!!
Reviews.Author: Art Olson
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this tv!! Has everything you could want at a VERY good price! You can't go wrong with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal
Reviews.Author: Mr. Fuad Alsultan
Reviews.Content: Excellent deal + fast shipment + great packaging. I am happy i bought this tv. I ve been using it for sometime and the quality is just awosone

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Truly a SMART One! Could be believe the WIFI capability. Very nice and what clarity of picture, awesome! A must have, especially when used as the monitor for your desk top computer, WOW!

Reviews.Title: A Really Good Bang For The Buck
Reviews.Author: JCW "MusicMan"
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for a very good HDTV. And it was the right size for a bedroom TV. It has built-in WiFi, and you get all the goodies that being connected to the internet brings.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and for using the Apps.
Reviews.Author: Marta28
Reviews.Content: The quality and resolution of the TV is great and we haven't had any problems with it. The Smart TV functions aren't ones we use that often because it's honestly quite a pain to type anything out in this interface. I love the hookup to Netflix, Amazon On Demand and Pandora since it was quite easy to login and I love being able to play pandora off of my TV while I'm elsewhere in the house. The sound quality is much better than if I tried to play off my laptop or computer since it's hooked up to my TV sound system. All in all I would recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, just the Smart is not so smart
Reviews.Author: Ryan Hamill
Reviews.Content: TV Picture is awesome. just the Smart TV part is kinda clunky and slow :/Samsung PLEASE send a update so it runs a little faster and better.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Travis Duncombe
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV, I've really liked it so far(3 months about). Nice picture, and I love that it has an app for hulu. It works great, no problems here!

Reviews.Title: Never new TV could be so awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I love the features of the Samsung smart TV!  Having all my apps. on my TV is so convenient.  Picture quality is excellent and its so easy to move through the screens.

Reviews.Title: Great but little storage
Reviews.Author: ahmed
Reviews.Content: Great TV but little storage for apps. Would be excellent if samsung increase the storage space to something like a 2gig.The browser is kinda slow though.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Duane Michael Scott
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this t.v.!  Picture is great, features are too.  Need a little better explanation of extra accessories, or better guides to where to find the information.

Reviews.Title: Best picture of any TV I have owned
Reviews.Author: ArizonaGardener
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews here on Amazon plus on Consumer Reports and this is a wonderful TV.  I followed the advice in eariler reviews on the adjustments to color, but tweaked it a bit for my tastes.  Have had it up for two days now and its great.  I had a small user error problem with setting up the channels, which I found out I don't have to do with the Direct TV box, but after a call to one of my kids, I got it worked out.  Easy set up, if you don't make the same error I did.  I watch the TV on the AV input mode and not the TV mode, so when I plugged it in, all I should have done is change the input and I would have been watching TV.  Thank goodness for smart kids.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV Smart Buy
Reviews.Author: Joshua Chaney
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture (might wanna bump up the brightness alittle in settings) apps and internet works great, fast easy use, wish my wireless mouse and keyboard worked for it though (keyboard does but just in web browsing) incredibly easy set up, I was supprised, small plastic boarder so it's ALL screen,ya idk what else to say fantastic purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Monsfrj
Reviews.Content: Nice tv... No problems yet :)I use it in a small space so it works. Definitely worth it recommended
