Reviews.Title: good model & good brand
Reviews.Author: tikmol
Reviews.Content: a friend got one &  works,  looks great.  it is good for small bedroom because of size and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: K. Mars
Reviews.Content: Works great, no complaints wat so ever. I love this tv and the service I got from amazon was 2nd to none. Wish I had more time to watch it tho :'(

Reviews.Title: Exceeded our expectations
Reviews.Author: AAK
Reviews.Content: This TV met and exceeded my expectations. Great image, really easy to set up, great apps come with it, and everyone felt it was a great addition to our house. Anyone with some minor experience using a tablet can easily work with the menu and set it up to get all sorts of extras.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I'm still getting used to the smaller footprint as I had a 52-Inch prior, but the picture is wonderful, and I don't notice the picture being smaller, just the overall size.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: kvp
Reviews.Content: I love this samsung smart tv.it was very easy to install and now i can watch tv and also use the internet for more entertainment sources...I love this product and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very highly recommended
Reviews.Author: APW
Reviews.Content: This TV does everything they say it does.  It is very easy to operate and set up, but I do advise you read the reviews as there is some useful set up info in them.  I would buy this again and again.

Reviews.Title: New to Smart TV. Never going back!
Reviews.Author: Daniel.P.
Reviews.Content: I've had this for 2 months now and I love it!!It saves so many wires PLUS it has a GLWiZ app which is great if you want to watch foreign TV programs (E.g. Iran/Turkey)

Reviews.Title: Samsung does not disappoint!
Reviews.Author: bayoubob
Reviews.Content: So far this has proved to be a terrific purchase and I am enjoying the convenience of getting NetFlix directly to the screen.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv so far
Reviews.Author: issy
Reviews.Content: I got this tv a few days ago and I am loving it so far it has the best picture (in my opinion anyway) it's awesome you can go online with it and download apps right on the tv which is a plus. Also blu-ray movies look great on it and of course my other favorite thing is that you can stream netflix on it (I like to watch netflix a lot).I will update this review in 6 months to let you know how it's working

Reviews.Title: Samsung Purchase
Reviews.Author: Ronna Martinez
Reviews.Content: We love the fit of the TV for where we needed to install it and it has a great picture.  Looking forward to many years of enjoyment of this produce.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Tadas Marcinkevicius
Reviews.Content: The Picture is not the best, but i didnt play with controls yet. Otherwise its great. Easy controls good sound.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Scott E. Kulpa
Reviews.Content: Crisp, clear picture.  Easy to setup.  Out of the box watching a movie in minutes. Very happy I chose it.

Reviews.Title: Video Review
Reviews.Author: TechSauce
Reviews.Content: This is a great television that I have now had for about 4 months. I describe the pros and cons of this television on my video review! I hope it helps those who are looking to purchase this TV around the holiday season :) Just follow the link below![...]

Reviews.Title: A Week After Receiving My Samsung UN40EH5300 ... Still Loving It!!
Reviews.Author: Jesselyn McCurdy
Reviews.Content: I've had my Samsung SMART TV for about a week and love it. I bought it because I want another SMART TV to watch Netflix. It took me more time to attach the stand to the TV than it did to actually set up the TV. I did not have any problems setting up the TV to my Wi-Fi router and have been enjoying streaming Netflix ever since.  Amazon delivered it on time and even alerted me that morning that it would be delivered that day.  My only complaint is that I'm having problems programing my Verizon remote to the TV, but I'll probably be able to figure that out. The best thing is I was able to buy the TV with my AMEX Reward Points . . . so it was a guilt free purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Best TV in it's price range
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV. I did a lot of research before buying a new TV and this was the one to get. I was originally going to get the 5000 model without the Smart TV features but for $30 buck more, it was worth it.Game mode looks pretty ugly when turned on but I have to problems gaming with game mode off.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful purchase.
Reviews.Author: Scotty Blades
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd TV I have purchased and the first Samsung. Let me say the ease of use was wonderful and the price from Amazon could not be beat. It took quite a while for all the apps to be downloaded, most of which are of no use to me, a single man. The intensity of color and visual effect makes looking at purchasing a 3D unit a waste of time and money. The picture quality just jumps right out at you and with the upcoming purchase of Blue ray player I could ask for nothing more.

Reviews.Title: Works great and was easy to set up.
Reviews.Author: Cherokee Flyer
Reviews.Content: What's to say?  It works great.  The resolution is very good.  Set up was very easy.  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: Chevysteve
Reviews.Content: great picture, great price, sound quality lacks but for the price its worth it. the smart tv is a little slow on the internet but the apps work great. the only apps that are a bit of a pain are the amazon apps which you have have to get online line and use a code to register each app. if you want the latest movies and tv shows vudu is for you. you can even buy a season pass for current tv shows and own the episodes as come out. pictutre can be adjusted to your prefrences.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Television
Reviews.Author: G. Townsend
Reviews.Content: Great TV at a wonderful price. Amazon came through again, with a terrific deal. The site never disappoints!!Go to it often.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: There are so many things the TV will be able to do, I haven't figured them all out yet.  As for set up and getting things running, it was pretty simple.

Reviews.Title: nice tv, not so smart
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Cisternas
Reviews.Content: It has nice image and good apps selection. Regretfully apps take a long time to load and the overall performance of the TV is very sluggish. If the processing was faster, I would give it four stars.

Reviews.Title: I Like it !
Reviews.Author: Bruce Simon
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase.  Useful smart tv features like Netflix,browsing, built in widgets and access to applications.  Easy to set up.  Great Samsung pic.  Easy to access pic and sound controls.However, navigation with remote is difficult.

Reviews.Title: A good value meeting my overall needs
Reviews.Author: M. Fischer "MikeF"
Reviews.Content: Overall a very solid TV though it could use some improvements.I chose this TV because it was the largest I could fit into a confined space that had the core features I was looking for with good image quality. It is my first Samsung TV. My other two flatscreens are Sony's.On the plus side, I like the colors and general sound quality from the built-in speakers. The built-in Smart Apps are very helpful enabling me to use this TV to play Pandora, stream movies from Amazon, Netflix and even my home movie library on my network NAS. Having an internet browser built-in is handy though not very practical without a better keyboard. I am also pleasantly surprised at the low power requirements.On the down side, using the internet browser can be frustrating using just the TV remote. The internet browser also lacks full featured functionality. For example, SmugMug photo galleries don't display properly. The app eco-system is weak and just like Apple, Samsung has a relatively closed app eco-system. I have not yet connected an external sound system to it but the fact that the external audio feed is fixed will be annoying.Overall this purchase was a good value and I would buy this unit again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV from Samsung except for wifi issues
Reviews.Author: Noel Doharris "Dissapointed"
Reviews.Content: The TV has a great picture and nice features. The remote control's shape is slightly confusing as it takes a second look to make sure you have it right side up.The only issue we have experienced is that after 11 weeks of use the WiFi no longer recognized the wireless router. It should be seeing a few wireless networks but does not see a single one now. Worked just fine all this time then stopped working in the middle of a Netflix movie. A Google search indicates that this is a fairly common problem - wireless adapter in TV failing.Good news is that Samsung fixed it under warranty. Repair tech said that this is a common problem with Samsung TVs.Pros:great picture, lots of great apps including redbox instant, compatible with different wall mounts.Cons:wifi issues after 11 weeks

Reviews.Title: Great picture, pretty light
Reviews.Author: Joshua D. Gearhart "Josh"
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount with the help of another person. Great picture. The sound is meh, but that's to be expected. It has a dynamic backlight that can change how bright the picture is depending on how bright the room is. That can get a bit bit annoying as it just looks like some gremlin is futzing with the brightness while you are watching, but that can be turned off.

Reviews.Title: TV which you can buy for your home
Reviews.Author: Dheeraj Kumar Prasad
Reviews.Content: TV is good but browser is not working as expected as you get some error while watching video. Four star for this tv

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Rodney1951 "Rodney1951"
Reviews.Content: It's nice having a TV that connects to our wireless network at home so we can use it to watch our Amazon Prime Videos.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Awna Stark
Reviews.Content: beautiful picture once we got it set up the way we liked it.love all of the apps, some awesome, Amazon Prime #1, Hulu Plus, Netflix, You Tube.Only downside, I wish there was 1 more HDMI port for our game system but maybe that means we need to downsize.

Reviews.Title: This was a good choice
Reviews.Author: J. Olson "jdo"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two TVs at the same time, this and a 50" Panasonic Viera. Recently something blew out the motherboard on the Panasonic and what ever it was did not effect the Samsung. I'd say that it is more rugged, but since I don't know what the cause was I really can't be positive. One think for sure, the Samsung is working perfectly and the Panasonic is dead. I really liked Panasonic and this is my second one, they both have died and this one lasted only 4 months. The Samsung has a great picture and all the bells and whistles work as advertised. No issues yet after 4 months of use. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Impressive sharpness
Reviews.Author: Bill B
Reviews.Content: The first one was defective; Amazon replaced it promptly. It's connected to a Comcast HD cable box. I adjusted the picture settings per an online review; the result was a truly impressive picture. I use it mainly to watch sports and classic films. I would have given it five stars, except for the defective first set and the less-than-optimal factory picture settings, which other reviewers have commented about. I've had it for about two months.

Reviews.Title: Great picture - No regrets.
Reviews.Author: Don Fowler
Reviews.Content: Extremely satisfied with this purchase.  Would have given 5 stars but sound is not as crisp as I would like.

Reviews.Title: best tv ever
Reviews.Author: rob
Reviews.Content: Im in love with this tv. Its the best TV I have ever had in my life! I love the smartcenter and all the apps, makes me life easy

Reviews.Title: happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: glenrog
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived when they said it would, and I am thoroughly satisfied with it. It is everything I exspected.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dhruv Kanwal
Reviews.Content: Met the description. Really happy with it. Web browser is a little hard to use but if you have a wireless keyboard and mouse it's pretty easy.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality for a good price
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Very good picture, attractive price, and smart features easy to work.  We especially like the small overall size for a 40 inch screen.

Reviews.Title: Great TV set for my kitchen
Reviews.Author: Skywalker
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my kitchen. Great TV, clean an dclear picture, 1080p HD looks awesome. Plenty of HDMI inputs, Wifi is great. As with most flatscreen LED/LCD TVs, the speakers leave more to be desired. Currently we're using a set of computer speakers plugged into the 3.5mm (headphone) Audio-Out jack. As a tip, the TV has an option to use both the built-in speakers and the external speakers. This seems to work pretty well, except the volume control on the remote does not control the volume on the external computer speakers.

Reviews.Title: Really cool TV.
Reviews.Author: Francis M.
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart TV, so I don't really have anything to compare it to, I do know Samsung makes a quality product, and I'm really impressed with the picture on this set, very easy to set up and a lot of apps included, I'm planning on buying a larger set in the future, and would recommend this set to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 in Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Martin Barretta
Reviews.Content: Got a great price, took out Amazon Prime and made it even better.  The TV is excellent, perfect size for my bedroom.  I was advised by my friends that the Samsung was a terrific TV, and they were correct.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for a 32inch TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a reasonable price, Samsung SmartHub needs some work
Reviews.Author: Matthew Slotten
Reviews.Content: Great TV, extremely clean, clear picture, 1080p HD looks incredible.  Plenty of HDMI inputs, Wifi is great.  The Samsung Apps are pretty good, however Samsung has been having issues with their SmartHub enterprise servers.  I'd say 10-20% of the time that we want to use an App (Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Prime, etc), the app fails to open and we receive a network error (see [...]  We have an HTPC hooked up to the TV, so we're able to access our subscription services that way when the Samsung Apps fail.As with most flatscreen LED/LCD TVs, the speakers leave more to be desired.  Currently we're using a set of computer speakers plugged into the 3.5mm (headphone) Audio-Out jack.  As a tip, the TV has an option to use both the built-in speakers and the external speakers.  This seems to work pretty well, except the volume control on the remote does not control the volume on the external computer speakers.  Note that this is behavior is unlike my previous Samsung TV.Overall I'd recommend this TV.Pros- Great Picture- Plentiful features- Built-in Wifi- Samsung Apps (when they work)- Great with HTPCCons- Built-in Speakers- Samsung Apps (when they don't work)- Stand doesn't swivel (minor, but a bit annoying)

Reviews.Title: Love my tv.
Reviews.Author: Brax
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tv. I can watch all of my streaming movies via Amazon, Netflix, Youtube, wherever. Amazon Prime viewing was the primary reason I bought this TV.That said, I do have one complaint/suggestion to Samsung for the future: Improve the streaming buffer!I have very fast internet, but my TV is on the opposite side of my apartment from my WIFI router. Occasionally I'll have a low signal or speed issues and the TV seems to not have ANY ability to buffer.I also suggest disabling the insane auto-brightness feature. In a dark bedroom it will wildly flail back and forth between light and dark, picking up it's own light as a reason to make the screen brighter.

Reviews.Title: Good TV - Issues with the Networking
Reviews.Author: Nick5405
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV for a temporary apt I was in at the time.The picture was very good along with all the amazon prime, netflix and all that standard stuffyou get with a smart TV.For a long time I have used an NAS server for Movie and TV playback and that is wherethis TV proved to be a problem.It would detect the drive, sometimes it would Map it then sometimes all of that would disappearand the Drive would be gone.Some files it would find and then the next day it would find others and lose the originals.All very frustrating.After following a whole bunch of threads on the Internet from others that had the same problem Icaved in and went back to stand alone media players connected with HDMIJust 1 more remote to be using

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: shanice
Reviews.Content: Very nice cool loving the versatility facebook Google and all .. you guys should carry it ib 70 inch for the living rooms

Reviews.Title: Great so far!
Reviews.Author: D Yordanov
Reviews.Content: Great, so far! Item is in perfect condition. Works without problem.I definitely will recommend it to my friends in the future.

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: bJ
Reviews.Content: Product performed better than expected. Good color and applications. I really like the smart hub feature.I would buy it again if I needed another. For another room.

Reviews.Title: Very lightweight
Reviews.Author: JeffM0606
Reviews.Content: Packed with features, super light-weight and easy to mount.  This tv was a great mid-size solution for our small office area.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Aniceprsn
Reviews.Content: This TV is fabulous!  It has a great picture.  We love the ability to get online with it.  We have access to many things that we have used boxes for in the page, such as Roku, etc.  We've not had one bit of problem with it, and would definitely recommend it to any of our friends/family.  A1 in our book!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great samsung Tv
Reviews.Author: Nolan Tuttle
Reviews.Content: The samsung smart tv was Awesome. And the quick delivery was great, got it in time for Sunday football the picture is bright and clear, and love being able to watch YouTube on it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: moviebuff52146 "Frank"
Reviews.Content: I have the 40in. model of this TV.  Coming off a 26in Toshiba and have to say this beats the Toshiba hands down in picture quality, but to be fair the Toshiba was 720p while this TV is 1080p.  The size of the screen made the difference in the pixel amount.Pretty easy to set up the stand and to mount the TV on it.  Power cord and whatever input you use connects very easily.I am pretty computer savvy and most features on this TV are easy to set.  I said most.  The only thing I could not do was connect my PC to this TV after downloading software and speaking to a Samsung service rep.It was very easy connecting to my router and do get connected to the internet without a problem. Netflix and other apps are readily available and easy to use.This size is just about perfect for our bedroom.  I guess I could of gone up to the 46in size, but I think it would of been overbearing for the size of our bedroom.  If a 42 or 43in were available that would be the perfect size.  We are watching this TV from about 15 feet away from the screen, give or take a foot or so.Also remember this is a 2012 model from Samsung.There are numerous controls that the user can set for personal preference.  You can fine tune every aspect for your viewing pleasure.SmartHub works great and many apps are available for free.  I only received this TV one day ago and still getting a little used to some features, but the main things are very easy to set.  You can fine tune things after getting used to the set.Just a point of reference.  In order for a Smart TV to operate properly, you must of a good internet connection from a good internet provider.I would definetly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv 50 wi fi
Reviews.Author: Emil U.
Reviews.Content: Perfect...... as was offered.... The quality of the display was ok, and the conection too, the design is good and It was shipped on time. Highly recommend this model

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Live like you in the movie.
Reviews.Author: Eric M Hughes "EMHughes"
Reviews.Content: I love this Samsung TV. It was a great deal and did my research on this tv before buying it. When watching older movies on netflix,  it makes you feel like they just made the movie.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Paul C. Jones
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to use in her sewing room. She loves it. We don't currently have it on HD but will in the future. But even without HD, the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: C. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Samsung un32eh5300 has Great picture!! The Smart hub feature works great. The tv is a very High quality product. Very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Jacob Glaser
Reviews.Content: very good. sharp picture, it works well with the wireless, the computer could use more RAM, but they have a more expensive model that does, so that's why.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great sound
Reviews.Author: goodshipsue "Sue"
Reviews.Content: We bought this because it was highly rated by Consumer Reports for sound quality even though we didn't need a tv this big for our bedroom.  Got a great deal through Amazon, received the tv quickly.  it was very well packed and protected for shipping and surprisingly easy to get set up.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!!
Reviews.Author: Saleem Nu'Man
Reviews.Content: Just needed something to that wasn't too big for the bedroom and this was just the right size. Don't regret ordering it at all and would recommend it to anyone looking for something entertaining with all the right accessories.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: mark gwin
Reviews.Content: This replaced a smaller set and the bigger screen is great in the Kitchen. The smart TV allows me to stream content without getting a second Roku

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Ron Gunter
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and it works great! The smart connection is wonderful on this model. I recommend this model and size TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung done it again.
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Evans
Reviews.Content: Samsung done it again. This TV is another good model from Samsung. Only thing I would add next purchase is 3D.

Reviews.Title: No Complaints
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: I received the tv on time and with no issues.  The tv was easy to setup and get started.  The tv has a clear, crisp picture with good quality sound.  I have had the tv for about 2 months and have no complaints.  It has been a nice addition to our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price!
Reviews.Author: Samsungnoob
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace a Sony that was struck by lightning. It was simple to hook up and paired easily with my router.  I used other Amazon reviews to configure picture and audio settings. This is a perfect tv for a small living room or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Two Five Stars !
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Porter "somdgramps"
Reviews.Content: The first set of five stars goes to Amazon itself.  The first TV arrived right on schedule late on a Thursday evening last month. Unfortunately it was damaged in transit. A click on Amazon's "Call me now button" connected me with a customer rep. who had a second set on its way in minutes and it arrived early Saturday afternoon. I've done business with a lot of companies in the last 70 years but these people take "customer service" seriously.The second set of five stars goes to this marvelous smart tv. It is an absolute joy to watch; the setup was quick and easy; the wireless connection took all of 10 seconds and we were, as they say, "up and running." Connecting with Amazon instant video posed no problem at all.One major point - the picture "out of the box" is terrible!  The settings given in the previous review are a very good starting point and you can make minor adjustments as you become more acquainted with the set.

Reviews.Title: Just right for the master
Reviews.Author: Earl F. Hale
Reviews.Content: This T.V. replaced a 20yo RCA set about the size of a VW.  Nice, big, bright picture and I love the built in Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: Updates suck.
Reviews.Author: Grant Dryden "GDD"
Reviews.Content: Sometimes the whole tv freezes in the middle of an update for one of the apps in the smart hub.  I really one use the Netflix and Hulu Plus apps to watch online tv on the hub.  Otherwise HD from the Cable box looks great on it. Other then it having a bunch of extra apps that I have no use for that make the tv freeze on occasion, it is a good TV!

Reviews.Title: product worked good
Reviews.Author: Ken Hartranft
Reviews.Content: This product worked a expected I enjoy being able to use pandora netflix and youtube. I also enjoy the a good picture.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: La Verdad
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen.  The picture is great.  You can get HD programming free with just a cheap set of rabbit ears. The Wi-Fi features work well to watch videos from your computer and you can plug in a flash drive with videos to watch too. It has a lot of very nice features and was a great deal for the price I paid. This is a high quality product.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Roger N. Knight
Reviews.Content: Picture is just amazing.  Set up was quite simple.  Was concerned about that prior to purchase.  Would definitely recommend.  Size is great.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: As prior reviews stated, It REALLY IS an easy setup & navigation.  I'm still finding new things to watch & do.  I followed someone's posted "screen settings" and the adjustments were a perfect combination!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Exceptional quality and a great bargain for a 32-inch 1080p smart TV. TV has a lot of unique and nice features.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For the Price
Reviews.Author: Jerry Pittman
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 5 months now and it has worked out great.  The picture quality is good and and the smart hub was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Size!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Stephenson
Reviews.Content: This TV is the perfect size for my bedroom (a bit visually impaired, so I needed a bigger one).  I love the ease of use, the clarity of the picture, and the smartness of it.  I am very pleased with this TV, and would highly recommend it!Cons:  can't think of any!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: poormike
Reviews.Content: I chose five stars because the quality of the merchandise is pretty good , I like the good quality and the low price and will recommend this product to every one. The delivery is fast too.

Reviews.Title: Best TV for price.
Reviews.Author: Kendel
Reviews.Content: Clear.crisp. games look amazing. Don't care for the apps , but the TV itself is great. Would reccomend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: 5300 smart tv
Reviews.Author: K. Lloyd
Reviews.Content: this is by far the best TV ive ever bought. the graphics and quality of this is the boss. The price isnt much and is worth every penny spent!! get it and you wont regret it at all

Reviews.Title: Good as new, excellent condition
Reviews.Author: david ramirez
Reviews.Content: TV looks  just like new. TV works just like new.  I am also very happy with the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Sharp, high-contrast, apps loading is slow
Reviews.Author: Hang Yin "bf109"
Reviews.Content: This is a good smart TV with reasonable price. I've tested this TV for 5 days and everything works well.Only one complain is it is slow when loading apps. Slower than most mobile phones.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Andy Bielema "Andy Bielema"
Reviews.Content: Wish I had ordered this product long ago. Great picture and sound quality. I am enjoying every Minuit of this TV & internet.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV for Technically challenged person. Perfect match.
Reviews.Author: Dana R.
Reviews.Content: Easy easy easy to set up and use. I am not a techy person, and connecting my dvd to the tv was as simple as connecting the plugs. That was it!

Reviews.Title: Picture perfect!
Reviews.Author: John Henderson
Reviews.Content: The only issue that I have had is the fonts can not be adjusted on the page for the internet. I am still in the leaning stage of the smart TV, but everything has been working very well and has exceeded my expectations.  Support from Amazon Tech has also been wonderful. I can recommend this product with full support, but it is still new and there is a learning curve.

Reviews.Title: Haven't got it done yet!
Reviews.Author: George fullwood
Reviews.Content: I'm sure it'll be good, building a rotating pedestal for it for viewing from kitchen and living room.  It'll be good.  Light weight, not hard on a stand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: thenerdal
Reviews.Content: Love it, thought it'd be bigger, but that's more of my fault and not Samsung's. The sound is pretty meh, so I removed a start for it. Love that it's a smart tv so I can use Plex since I don't have a Roku and Chromecast doesn't support it.Worth the buy. Would buy another one, but one that's larger.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: Good TV. So far so good.  I like it and would recommend it. Great price for what you get. !

Reviews.Title: Buy it if you're on the fence
Reviews.Author: Jesse_80
Reviews.Content: Great TV after the update.  Will be a five star after they get the youtube app working properly.  It does lock up sometimes when existing the smart system.  Overall though,  great TV,  and great picture.

Reviews.Title: Make the change.
Reviews.Author: mick shockley
Reviews.Content: Happy, Happy, Happy... Thrilled with this TV . Should of made the change from Sony to Samsung years ago. Not even close in quality.

Reviews.Title: Works great !!!
Reviews.Author: terry matteson
Reviews.Content: Love the apps. such as net-flex & amazon.I watch these a lot. The TV is clear and good sound adjustment.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Picture
Reviews.Author: Macinator
Reviews.Content: The only thing to improve on this TV is the offset for the ECO sensor. Changed it from 2 (default) to 5, and everything is Great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and easy to assemble!
Reviews.Author: Jamesthetruth
Reviews.Content: This product was easy to assemble and provides a crystal clear picture. The TV does require some initial adjustment to fit you color distribution preference but easy to perform. The instruction manual was simple to read and provided great summary of the various features. This is a great product and a real bargin!

Reviews.Title: the best Smart TV I've ever had
Reviews.Author: Sidney
Reviews.Content: The Smart TV works right out the box connected to my wifi I can also view music on my USB and the apps are great you connected to my samsung galaxy s3 with no problem just a great product

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: MBP
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV.  I like the clear picture and crisp sound. It is a wonderful value.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Claudia Rogers
Reviews.Content: This tv meets all my expectations.  I purchased a 55" Samsung SmartTV and knew it would meet the needs I had.It was shipped and delivered perfectly well so there were no problems there.Attaching the stand and setting it up was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Works beautifully
Reviews.Author: Brett LaPlante
Reviews.Content: Love the apps and the picture. I used the specs that others have posted for the best quality and have been very happy. The sounds isn't great, but in a small space it is more than enough.

Reviews.Title: i like this tv a lot
Reviews.Author: Luda26
Reviews.Content: I like a lot!! Works really well, has lots of memory for lots of apps!!  Good price also!!  Im happy!

Reviews.Title: Smart TV is good unless...
Reviews.Author: Mike Madej
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Smart TV is great unless you want to stream content from the web.  The proprietary browser installed by Samsung does not let you stream any content that uses Adobe Flash and doesn't have an app.  Netflix, YouTube and Hulu all work but I still have to connect my computer to my TV for an live streaming events such as watching ESPN.  But the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Marcelo
Reviews.Content: Very good TV. Very complete. And the best thing is the price. Lots of applications, good image and even Skype!

Reviews.Title: Lovely !
Reviews.Author: lesa albright
Reviews.Content: a beautiful clear picture easily adapts would highly recommend. Delivery was no hassle,very durable and easy setup.My daughter loved it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, the smart tv apps are great! The picture is very clear just needed to adjust the brightness when watching movies!

Reviews.Title: You don't always need more
Reviews.Author: Mike B in Virginia
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and awesome pictures, screen is the right size for a 60hz refresh also the smart hub makes it so I do not have to use my blue ray to get to netflixMikeMike

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, sound on Netflix sometimes slightly off.
Reviews.Author: John A. Read "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, it's a bit weird to have for-purchase apps on the TV.Also, got an external keyboard, works for most applications, but not Youtube, which is annoying because you want to seach for videos and you have to use the arrow keys like a mouse.Also, I thought I would like the Childrens programs built in, however, they are very poorly constructed, and I don't think a kid would enjoy having to read a book where each page has to load....

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: J. Patterson
Reviews.Content: TV is great.  Smart features are great.  Arrived in good condition.  Assembled & setup with ease.  Great picture & sound.  Highly recommend; especially at the price I was able to purchase this.

Reviews.Title: Bought for grandaughter
Reviews.Author: R. Collins
Reviews.Content: She really likes it a lot and that is the important thing.  She is a computer programmer with a small security firm and is going places now with a batchelor and masters degree in computer science from Louisiana Tech.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: gigi
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung 49" Smart TV. I like seeing pictures from my computer on the TV. It is fun to use the TV for Pandora, as well as many other apps.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with this tv.
Reviews.Author: Euanna Bernard
Reviews.Content: LOVE,LOVE,LOVE This smart tv purchased it about three months now and I am very happy with this love the apps this is just like a computer with bonus of being able to watch cable tv and netflix, My 3 year old uses it a lot for her learning games and it has a great selection of fitness apps as well,and lots more I can't write it all it will take too long.And to top it off this is the only brand of smart tv that can work in my country I am from the CARIBBEAN and the other brands like LG and SONY are a waste of time they don't even work hear in the Trinidad I really love Samsung smart tvs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: justme+3
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV at a decent price! The picture is impeccable. Easy to mount on the wall. Extremely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: I Love it.
Reviews.Author: Nyron Ramkissoon
Reviews.Content: This Samsung television speaks for it self it's sleek design and appearance attracts everyone.And it's features are 100% better than that it shows very good and the internet connection is fast. It has a lot of features that we did not try out as yet and the only thing it's missing is Bluetooth but that is not necessary seeing that is wireless.It arrived on time shipped from amazon. I'm looking forward to purchasing a bigger one in the future.

Reviews.Title: very nice tv. serves the need
Reviews.Author: sai
Reviews.Content: I bought smart tv for apps and stuff..Its really nice.. only problem is smart tv takes like 30seconds to start the interface..picture and sound are really good..if your room is big, consider getting speakers.. coz the sound is not too loud.. jus enough for a bed room

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV, unbelievable price
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Noriega "concerned citizen"
Reviews.Content: This TV is pretty awesome. My wife and I knew we wanted a 30+ inch smart TV that had wifi built in, not some additional part you had to buy. We wanted a smart TV so the need for a blue ray, roku, game system wasn't necessary. Google like best settings for this TV and you will find a person that gives a great starting point. Only bad thing I can say is the speakers aren't great, get something external to handle even the slightest base. Hulu, Netflix, Pandora, Amazon, bonus, free, and a web browser that only asks you be patient. Also Samsung has been consistently using the same interface or OS so it most likely will stay updated and current which was a big concern of mine.  Also it says on the specs it wont accept a blue tooth keyboard but it will. Great product, Samsung has my Smart TV business.

Reviews.Title: Bravo!
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Varga
Reviews.Content: Best TV I have ever purchased.  The picture is crystal clear and the sound is fantastic, clear as a bell.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED SMART HDTV
Reviews.Author: Visual Tracker
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED SMART HDTV looks good and the picture is great. The smart part takes some getting used to and I find using the internet to be less than suitable.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Sabti
Reviews.Content: It is a clear & nice TV, I recommend it especially for those who have Samsung smart phone as it is compatible with it

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: William Jason Sechrist "William J. Sechrist"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Samsung surround sound system and was so impressed with the quality of the product decided to go with a Samsung TV as well. This TV is as beautiful as it is functional. Very easy to connect and set up. There is no guessing, once the the TV is turned on it walks you step by step through the setup process. The apps work great and it is very nice being able to hook the TV directly up to the modem. I could not be happier with this product!

Reviews.Title: This is the best LED
Reviews.Author: Shivam Bansal
Reviews.Content: the product is awesome.Picture quality is too good.Internet is also working fast.I have also log in my facebook id. Youtube is also working fast.With HD it work excellent.

Reviews.Title: Too small
Reviews.Author: John Orban
Reviews.Content: I PLEADED with the boss to let me get a 50" for the display we were going to set up. But, no, he thought it would be too big. As soon as we hung the 32" he said, "You're right, it is too small." Thankfully we got a 50" for the front hallway. The picture on both of these models is just fantastic, right out of the box - absolutely no tweaking whatsoever. We have them hooked up to Apple TVs. We post Keynote slides as JPGs to our Flickr account and display them through the ATV. Simple and cheap!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Rishad Baraichi
Reviews.Content: so far,product works as described. price could have been better,but all and all a good overall buy. would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV, but Smart TV itself has some caveats
Reviews.Author: Lengau
Reviews.Content: The TV is great and has beautiful picture. It shows HD movies and shows perfectly, and it works really well for video games.Unfortunately, a couple of the Smart TV apps are less than stellar. I keep a Chromecast plugged into my TV so I can use it for YouTube, because the Smart TV just doesn't play YouTube videos well (I'm not sure why — it has no problem with Amazon Instant, Plex, etc.).

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Alfred Thompson
Reviews.Content: I have no problems when purchased and received and installation went okWill recommend for any one to make a purchase

Reviews.Title: Great TV for small apartment.
Reviews.Author: John Kingsley
Reviews.Content: I've had this for almost 2 months and am very satisfied.  Setup was easy, picture quality is fantastic and remote works well.

Reviews.Title: The Best Picture I've Seen
Reviews.Author: GPowner
Reviews.Content: Was forced into buying a new TV when our other one started showing black lines throughout the screen. After looking at a lot of TV's, reading numerous reviews, I chose the Samsung TV.We hit a home run!Excellent crisp clear picture (after make necessary adjustments for the resolution/quality we liked), outstanding sound, easy to operate and maneuver through the menus, and the wireless connectivity is flawless.I'll be purchasing another Samsung within the month to replace our other TV.Without a doubt, give this TV a chance!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the $$$
Reviews.Author: L. Kotur "L. Kotur"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use great picture and sound - wireless works great - love the apps - easy to use  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Zeep51
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for our bedroom and it is great. Great picture and a lot of features. Smart tv and a lot of apps. Easy setup.

Reviews.Title: I Now Like SmartTVs
Reviews.Author: NoID
Reviews.Content: I thought that this SmartTV was some marketing hype and that I would not find any use for the "Smart" features. I was wrong. Because this is a 2012 model, I was able to get it for a reasonable price. This is in comparison to the latest model of the non-SmartTV version of this line of televisions. I like the apps. Although I have not attempted to browse the web, I imagine that will come in handy as well. The television dynamically adjusts its settings according the lighting within the room. This was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!!
Reviews.Author: Shirley Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I got this tv and its the best tv i ever had. U should get this tv!!! And the price was realy good

Reviews.Title: I would purchase it again.  (my highest compliment)
Reviews.Author: S. Yavoroski "SPY"
Reviews.Content: Setup was a little counter-intuitive.  I was installing it into a rather complicated configuration and had trouble getting the “source” correct.  The printed manual is not great.  The online manual reflects the printed manual.  However, for the price – the TV is great.  Nice picture, good contrast, easy on the eyes.  I am not using the set’s speakers.  I would purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect
Reviews.Author: Josefina Garcia
Reviews.Content: Just perfect for the price. This is a nice, easy to use smart TV. the only bad thing about it is that the base does not have the possibility to change angles and it is a little high.

Reviews.Title: buyer's remorse
Reviews.Author: AL MCPHERSON
Reviews.Content: I am very very very disappointed with the picture.  I had a "regular" tv by Samsung.  It was and is great.  I have a Samsung washer and dryer.  They are super.  So I thought this Samsung Smart tv would be a great buy.  If I had it to do over again I would buy  LG.  I have a 36" LG and it delivers a perfect picture.  This tv is also the one that you have to be directly in front of and a certain distance away to get the best of its poor clarity.I will say all the features of the "smart" part of the tv are good - but if you have a bad picture - the smart part is of little value.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Baby!
Reviews.Author: Alex Tejada
Reviews.Content: This TV does exactly what I looked for in a smart TV (after researching). I just appreciate the Web Browser feature, it allows me to watch my NFL game when they are being blacked out locally. I have no need to connect video games, movies or anything to that effect, just plain and simple. I'm playing on getting the 46 in smart as well.

Reviews.Title: Not So Smart
Reviews.Author: S. Comer
Reviews.Content: Samsung sells this TV as "Smart," but the TV is anything but.  Onboard computing power is anemic--the buffer is overwhelmed by a short HD YouTube video resulting in regular (every 10 seconds or so) screen freezes.  The result is that the YouTube Samsung app is unusable.  Link your laptop through the HDMI port solves the problem.  Have found Samsung's apps to be generally poor--apps on other smart devices (phones, tablets, etc) are more varied and capable.  Samsung made a big announcement two months ago about signing a deal with Eurosport, yet I have yet to see the app appear.  Picture quality of the set is good, though--my recommendation would be to save your money and get a "dumb" set with faster refresh rate and use a laptop to give it brains.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Doll "Find a cure"
Reviews.Content: I don't think I fully realized how much I was getting with this TV! The SmartTV function is fabulous & I love that I can access my Netflix account through this TV without having to move my Apple TV from another room. on top of that...the picture is Fantastic & I still can't believe I got all this TV for such a great price!

Reviews.Title: very nice and price was excelent
Reviews.Author: Mariano Azcarraga
Reviews.Content: I was looking for one TV to replace my non digital one and this was far the best and cheapest for what it had to offer.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Umiker
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this TV. It has a great picture and great price for a Smart TV!  Would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Luv it!
Reviews.Author: tsn.mif
Reviews.Content: So far, No complaints....love having the internet on it!!!  Great picture!  Just took longer than expected to get it.We highly recommend this to anyone who wants more than "just "your average TV.

Reviews.Title: Excelent product
Reviews.Author: Antonio Figueredo
Reviews.Content: Excelent TV...the view is amazing and recommend to buy it.... The screen is very sharpness and the smart menu is the best option to the family.

Reviews.Title: Samsung has Never Let Me Down
Reviews.Author: Hotwaterplug
Reviews.Content: Since purchasing a Samsung flat panel monitor years ago, (it is still very much working)I have purchased a few Samsung smart phones, laptop, and this tv. Every item has operated trouble free and as advertized. The Smart tv has a great picture, and I can pick up many apps off the web, such as Netflix, Amazon Prime. etc. The price is right, and I couldn't be happier. I can't think of any negatives, as it does everything I expected.(you may want to have a high speed internet or wifi setup)

Reviews.Title: BEST thing that ever happened to TV, no need of a cable anymore
Reviews.Author: niko
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the TV and Amazon is outstanding.Love it, love it. Quality of the picture is great and very easy to set up

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: Stephen L. McDonald
Reviews.Content: This TV has met and surpassed my expectations.  I have really enjoyed it very much.  I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: meets expitations
Reviews.Author: Kirkland J Bader
Reviews.Content: arrived in a very timely manner. easy to install. easy to hook up my blue ray player. easy to connect to the internet. great picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kimble
Reviews.Content: Great price, great product, fast shipping.  I thoroughly enjoy this TV.  Excellent picture, easy to customize, easy to use apps.  Overall great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Mr Paul
Reviews.Content: This TV surpass my expectation I love the sound picture quality and the technology this Tv has, I wanted to purchase a Panasonic TV because Panasonic was my number one choice but price range for a smart TV lead me to this samsung TV. I was not deceived on the info provided on the TV compare to a  Pyle-Pro PMKS3 Tripod Microphone Stand W/ Extending Boom from china I bought.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Wireless TV
Reviews.Author: bgarland
Reviews.Content: Samsung wireless tv looks great & was a snap to get set-up even for me & despite other reviews for this item - love it

Reviews.Title: My new TV
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: My son came from Italy to get this TV for me and to install it.  It is the best just like his.  The picture along with HD is phenomenal.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Abhijit Sawant
Reviews.Content: I bought it 2 months back and so far so good. The picture quality is perfect. The sound quality is fine. The smart hub is very convenient. I am surprised by reliable web browser that I got with smart hub. You do not have to connect laptop very often because of that. I can even send you tube video from my android to TV screen.As usual the delivery was on time and it took only 20 to 25 min to assemble and get it going.

Reviews.Title: Aok
Reviews.Author: James D Danielson Jr
Reviews.Content: Everything works for now picture nice we will see how long it last last Samsung lasted just over a year

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Ken Klouzek
Reviews.Content: I purchased this LED TV for my RV motorhome to replace the flat screen analog TV in the entertainment center.  This is a great TV at a fantastic price and I received it in two days.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: tomjt714
Reviews.Content: Let me begin by letting all know that Amazon's damaged return people are excellent. First unit I received the screen was broken on the inside. Package arrived with no visible damage, but once the unit was powered up, the screen was toast. Called within an hour of receiving the damaged unit, had new one on truck next day. Excellent service!Replacement works perfectly so far......Great picture, mediocre sound, but that is no problem as I run sound thru home theater. Advise that if you purchase one of these units read some of the reviews by others. Some great initial set-up pointers in them. Overall satisfied with purchase. Only reason for a four star rating is Samsungs poor factory packaging.I will update if I run into any problems.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: kristin
Reviews.Content: We have waited to upgrade our tv and wow did we pick a good one to go with! we love the picture clarity and internet capability, it's great being able to connect to netflix and other apps without having to hook up cables or anything to other devices.

Reviews.Title: Great way to buy a TV
Reviews.Author: Lynn M Bullington
Reviews.Content: it was in great shape, mailed on time, easy to hook up,light weight, felt it had a little less color intensity compared to other Smart TV's, great high definition! Easy way to shop for a Television!

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: Margaret Cahill
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv I have ever owned.  Love the smart tv.  Easy to stream movies from Netflix or Amazon Prime.  Easy to program.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use..good investment so far.
Reviews.Author: Natalie Rivera
Reviews.Content: Has nice apps that kind of make paying for cable/satellite obsolete.  Easy to setup and use. Nice picture. Doesn't take up much room.  Sound could be better, but I anticipated needing to add a sound system of some kind when making my purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: It's a Great TV.  Love the picture and the ability to connect with Netflix when I am staying in Florida.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Esther Berry
Reviews.Content: TV is great and smart enjoy watching my shows and exercise programs on it, Like my choice so far no problems

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Cris5y "QueenC"
Reviews.Content: I LOOOOOVVVVEEEEE this tv! The only problem I've had with it is that I connected to my wifi but the tv wouldn't open any apps or do anything online so I had to call support. They did a remote connection and pretty much had to adjust all my settings. I didn't have the tv set to USA - wth?? - and a bunch of other little things like that weren't set correctly but once that was fixed the tv was able to log into all of that. The picture quality is great, the sound quality is great and the smart capabilities are very convenient.My only complaints are that it is just a little slow with loading apps. It's not super noticeable, but if you're used to having fast connections, this will bother you.

Reviews.Title: Good colors and image, a little bit slow.
Reviews.Author: Fanny
Reviews.Content: I like the image the TV produces, I haven't had any trouble with it although I do not use it for cable but just for Netflix and videogames.Using the apps included with the TV can be slow but they are good.

Reviews.Title: tv failure
Reviews.Author: Manuel J
Reviews.Content: buy the one UN40EH5300 and came with failures, is off occasionally. the tv I send to Venezuela, in the case did not come under warranty. as I can cover the warranty in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this TV!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Corbett
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my office/spare bedroom. It's the perfect size, the picture is beautiful and I love the SmartTV aspect of connecting to the internet.  SO cool to watch my favorite YouTube videos on my TV

Reviews.Title: My Son and Daughter-in-Law Love This
Reviews.Author: Kleiber1
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, but the word from my son is that the HDTV they got is "awesome."  That's high praise, indeed.  (I have a 40-inch Samsung myself and love it.)

Reviews.Title: My first flatscreen
Reviews.Author: Anthony T. "Anthony"
Reviews.Content: This is my first screen.  I like it very much.  The smart capabilities are wonderful and I am glad I bought Samsung...I only wish I could have gotten a bigger t.v.  I also purchased a Samsung soundbar to used with it and they sound amazing together.

Reviews.Title: Superb picture
Reviews.Author: glfrlady "glfrlady"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture with easy installation and set up installations.  Gets Amazon and Netflix streaming.  Had previously owned a Samsung and am more than pleased with this newer tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Kathleen O Gill
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, great picture, reasonable price, decent controls. We will probably purchase a second one for another room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV in all ways for price
Reviews.Author: WillowB
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up with full screen picture viewing.  Very good buy for under $500.  The first TV that was delivered was defective.  Amazon made it very easy to have this TV picked up the next day and a replacement arrived within a few days.

Reviews.Title: Spare Bedroom T .V....
Reviews.Author: Edward Stevens "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, HDMI ready, reasonable price. Not really a whole lot more to say, It's a television what more than nice picture and good price do you want???

Reviews.Title: Super Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have a number of smart devices, Blu-ray players and HDTVs - and I like this network menu the best.The picture is awesome as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300
Reviews.Author: maureen race
Reviews.Content: Great picture,nice colors, great clarity,easy to set up and easy to use. Works great for steaming movies, etc. Programing is simple. I can easily recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great for viewing wirelessly connected content
Reviews.Author: Nathan Gardner
Reviews.Content: I have 2 wires running to this TV, one for power and one to a stand alone speaker set.  Connected via Wi-Fi I can view everything from Amazon Instant Video and my local Plex server.  Incredibly convenient!

Reviews.Title: I was hoping this tv met my expectations, and it totally did!
Reviews.Author: Mistress Lady Friday
Reviews.Content: Great picture, love the apps, sound from some apps, like Netflix, amazon video and hulu is a little low but livable. Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, low price
Reviews.Author: Skylar Parish
Reviews.Content: What more can you ask for ....Great Brand .... Smart TV w/ all of the apps, Amazon put in on sale and I jumped at the opportunity to own it !!!

Reviews.Title: Value for Money
Reviews.Author: Kiran
Reviews.Content: Internet TV at affordable price. all features are good. Samsung has many apps free.Skype calling and youtube videos are best.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture  good color
Reviews.Author: Adele M. Klima
Reviews.Content: This is our first high definition TV, and our first "big" TV. I love the clarity of the picture. I also am amazed how the screen is easily seen from every seat in our large space. It's also wonderful that I spent very little and used accumulated points to buy the TV!

Reviews.Title: Samsung EH5300
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "DVD"
Reviews.Content: I really loved this tv, ita screen has many funtions and his control is very easy to used. I recomended amply this tv

Reviews.Title: Wireless networking was eaxy.
Reviews.Author: JayWS
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture.  Easy to use.  Wirelessly connected to my Netflix account without a problem.  Browsing the web was also pretty easy although obviously not as fast as using a computer with a keyboard since you have to navigate the "keyboard" with arrow keys.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Yoleinne
Reviews.Content: Delighted with my tv, worth, excelnte product, I can see netflix, connect to facebook to twitter, browsing and using wifi, best of all, because I avoid the cables, excellent buy

Reviews.Title: This TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael Luckey
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for a great price (from Amazon).  If you like to use the internet, youtube, netflix, pandora, this TV will fit your needs.  It helps to get the wireless keyboard that many people mention, as well as change the TV settings as others suggest - easy to find in the comments.  We live in GA and use an antenna to get digital air channels and it looks great.  No complaints.  Fits perfect in our armoire that is 37.5 inches wide.  The only drawback is the 60Hz but I haven't noticed it.  The 120Hz is way more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Simply amazing!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gerard
Reviews.Content: This product surpassed any expectations I had anticipated ... color quality is brilliant only glitch is the browsing the web with the control it can be a bit time consuming, purchased the logitech k400 and now it works like a charm...

Reviews.Title: excellent product.
Reviews.Author: angel avila
Reviews.Content: I recommend it 100 percent is really good quality and you can say that of the best I've had. thank

Reviews.Title: 32" SAMSUNG TV
Reviews.Author: PC Ron
Reviews.Content: I just purchased a Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black).  I just received it today and I just installed/configured it without any problems at all.  The screen is very clear and the Internet Feature is a very nice application to have.  So Far - So Good.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Janice Witter
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. It was easy to setup and lightweight so they i was able to lift it. The picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time. No damages. Works great. Want to buy the 40-Inch now. Blu-Ray movies show amazing. Wireless, USB Ports, HDMI and audio connectors. ITs amazing

Reviews.Title: I want this in the Living Room!
Reviews.Author: Big Bear Mom "BB Heaven"
Reviews.Content: If there is anything bad to say so far it is that the sound isn't real loud.  Eventually we'll use external speakers.  This TV found and connected to my house WiFi router in seconds.  It is fairly easy to learn and operate.  I cannot believe everything this will do.  Netflix without a Roku device like we have on the living room TV.  You can browse the internet and all kinds of things I haven't even begun to learn yet.  The picture is great, the weight of the TV is less than the one half its size that we used to have.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love this product
Reviews.Author: Curtis Lee
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my 32in Samsung TV. It really starts to blur the line between TV and computer. The smart capabilities are excellent on this device. It is like a 32in version of my Galaxy phone.

Reviews.Title: very very good,,,
Reviews.Author: A. Gaibrois
Reviews.Content: this is my first LED set,, very nice.  I had the set for about 8 weeks,, I recommend it as a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase So Far
Reviews.Author: Donald M. Oconnor
Reviews.Content: Every where I went Samsung was the brand I was told to buy for picture quality.  So I did.  So far I like it.  I bought the Smart TV to play with.  I gave it four stars because I miss real buttons and I'd like more inputs for my older players.  Other than that it's pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Down on Speakers, Up on everything else
Reviews.Author: Praveen Balanagendra
Reviews.Content: Got this one for $475. Firstly, this was an amazing deal. Secondly this product works great - HDMI, AirPlay, Streaming works perfectly. Only hitch is the speaker volume is very low.

Reviews.Title: great small HD TV
Reviews.Author: D. Kelly "LTD 58"
Reviews.Content: This 32 inch Smart HDTV is perfect for a small exercise room.  Lightweight.  Easy to install with the cables that came in the box.

Reviews.Title: A Winner
Reviews.Author: Lynn Wilson
Reviews.Content: "Consumer Reports" recommended this particular television.  The picture quality is excellent as well as the sound.  Amazon madethe transaction very simple.  I have had fun exploring all the aspects of a smart television.  Considering how complicated theproduct, it was extremely easy to set up. It took my grandson fifteen minutes to have it up and running.

Reviews.Title: fantastic picture!
Reviews.Author: Bill Welte "stickeen"
Reviews.Content: This truly is a "smart" TV! Hooked up to Polk Audio sound system easily and was watching blu ray movies in no time.

Reviews.Title: excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Ted in Delray Beach
Reviews.Content: This TV delivers superior picture quality and features. The only downside is the sound quality. Overall a really good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: C. Morrison
Reviews.Content: The picture is fantastic and the controls are relatively easy, considering that it's a "smart" TV... Love the fact that I can watch Amazon Prime videos and YouTube from my TV!

Reviews.Title: Best Buy
Reviews.Author: kathy ballard
Reviews.Content: This is amazing and simple to use. Love it. Clear picture and sound is great. Easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Great product from Samsung
Reviews.Author: rajesh kedar
Reviews.Content: Loved the TV. Even my entire family loved this TV once. Even my little one is loving to see cartoons on this TV. Apps are great and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Really Great
Reviews.Author: cloverdale
Reviews.Content: Working hard on NO wires.  Beautiful picture and easy to use.  Definitely a good buy.  Even the kids can use it.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: wilfredos
Reviews.Content: THE RESOLUTION IS VERY GOOD.  THE TV WORKS PERFECTLY AND I AM PLANNING TO BUY ANOTHER ONE IN THE NEXT DAYS

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tomas Mateo Cruz
Reviews.Content: So far no problems. Using it as a second monitor for my computer setup and also for football season coming up!

Reviews.Title: I like this TV
Reviews.Author: Sami Arnaout
Reviews.Content: Actually the only negative thing about this TV is that it has only one component AV in, the rest are more sophisticated (USB,HDMI...etc), so if you happen to have 2 devices that depend on such input component, you'll have to plug and unplug each time you want to use the other device.Otherwise, it is really a good TV with a reliable wireless connection, and a very light weight.

Reviews.Title: A Great Product at a Good Price
Reviews.Author: Clifton Pierce
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung flat screen I have purchased and have been thrilled with both.  One is 42-inch in the living room and the 32-inch is mounted on a pivit in the bedroom.  The product is great and delivery was even better other than the delivery man left the box on the front porch in plain view.  Luckily I live in a safe neighborhood.  Something this large needs to be signed for and not left when no one is home.

Reviews.Title: Item was shipped fast
Reviews.Author: leighton
Reviews.Content: Great picture, we love it and mounted it to the wall. The  feature set is great and unlike the previous TV we used in this location it has a very bright and vibrant quality that equals and in some cases best SONY

Reviews.Title: Best replacement
Reviews.Author: Lauren Readus
Reviews.Content: I love the picture.  And the setup was smooth and easy to follow for anyone to do on their own.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV We love it
Reviews.Author: Andres Romero
Reviews.Content: So far so good image, screen,  everything!!!!! Netflix works perfect on this ! connected a hard drive reads flv video and everything,

Reviews.Title: Just Loved it...
Reviews.Author: Shiladitya Roy
Reviews.Content: Go for Smart tv...dint realize it ll be so much of fun before ordering .and order a wireless keyboard with it.

Reviews.Title: best samsung tv out there for a low price
Reviews.Author: Giovani L.
Reviews.Content: this was a really good tv for this price and it also has smart features which is a plus even if you are not interested on this features.the picture was very good and the only the only reason to dislike this is because of lack of inputs. like many tv this tv is not so great with gaming but it works well enough.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Tank #1
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the purchase. It was as advertised and the cost was reasonable. Amazon prices save $$$$ and is ultra convenient. I love this TV. Easy set-up.

Reviews.Title: keypad please!
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: We had a problem first with the internet provider (as usual); it's nice to watch movie and all in the bed with this TV size and the color is amazing; the problem, it is hard to use the keypad on it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley B.
Reviews.Content: So much funEasy to useGreatNever going back to a regualr t.v. againYou should get it now :)

Reviews.Title: Great looking TV.
Reviews.Author: Keith L.
Reviews.Content: I love my new Samsung.  This is my first LED.  All of my TVs in my home are primarily Samsung and this new LED is everything I expected.  I was a little nervous having it shipped to Afghanistan through the USPS, but it arrived without a scratch.  Thanks Mr Professional, your name says it all!

Reviews.Title: Great TV; would highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: KDR
Reviews.Content: 40 in. 1080p Samsung TV picture quality is excellent whether in HD or standard digital. TV was easy to set-up out of the box. Would recommend this TV for any one needing a larger TV in master bedroom as we did or smaller living room.Amazon quickly resolved the shipping damage on first delivered TV with a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Great Value
Reviews.Author: R. Hodge "NC Wineman"
Reviews.Content: We got this on sale through Amazon, extremely fast delivery in perfect condition. Fairly easy to set up, although we had issues getting the Ethernet connection to work, and ended up using the built-in WiFi connection on our password protected router. Biggest dissatisfaction is there is no 'sleep timer' button on the remote, one must go through a menu to get to that option.Overall, we're happy enough with the picture and form factor that we obtained another 32" Samsung (without the Smart features) for a relative's home where no broadband connectivity exists, and they are happy with the picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: smart tv 32
Reviews.Author: Robert Levy
Reviews.Content: Smart tv did work well. Good function control. Picture screen very clean. Yes HD did show clear. Remote nice feature. Overall good.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly to me
Reviews.Author: alik1006
Reviews.Content: It took me 10 mins to install and setup including internet.Everything I've tried worked to me so far including watching TV, watching movies from flash drive, youtube, Amazon prime and even Pandora. :) The brightness and picture quality are good (true HD), the sound is decent (well you would not expect hi-fi from TV built in speakers).The only little drawback is that mobile application for remote control in several cases cannot work with text fields... that is why it is 4 starts, not 5. But this is definitely not a stopper for buying this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, Good value
Reviews.Author: Denton
Reviews.Content: We use this TV in a location where we do not have any signal via an antenna, and we do not subscribe to cable or satellite TV. We get all of the programs via Netflix, Amazon Prime and Pandora. The picture is great and the setup for those services is pretty easy. The only reason that I have given it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the internet browser is controlled via the arrow buttons on the remote control and it is very difficult to enter any URL using that interface. The TV does not have Bluetooth for connection of a keyborad or mouse. So, for internet browsing, we still use a computer. There is a more sophisticated Samsung Smart TV that can connect to a keyboard, and it also has a camera and mic built in for Skype use (I assume - I do not have one of those TVs). But, for the features offered and the quality of this unit, this is a very good value.One comment about Amazon Prime not working. This was the case when we took it out of the box, but we did a software update, which only took a few minutes, and that fixed the problem. Now Amazon Prime videos work as well as Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Love this television
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I researched smart tv's before choosing this model and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The picture is crisp and clear with great color, especially with hd movies and shows. There are more preset apps than I imagined and setup is relatively easy. I am minimally tech savy and set this tv up on my own. The only issue I encountered was getting the amazon prime app to work. After looking at the manual i realized that for certain apps to work, you have to create an account with samsung first. Once that was done the apps all worked wonderfully. My only regret is that i purchased this tv from best buy because it went on sale a day prior to amazon sale. I could have gotten a better warranty deal through amazon with sqare trade than through best buys geek squad. I highly recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 refurbished TV.
Reviews.Author: Lewis F.
Reviews.Content: TV arrived in excellent condition. Dubble boxed and padded for shipping with all its parts and user instructions.Very pleased with TV. I highly recommend the seller. They were prompted in shipping the TV , excellent service.One concern, the TV had the previous owners E-Mail and log in information in the Smart Hub. Samsung customer service cleaned out the previous owners information remotely. I would like to suggest that the saler screen refurbishedTVs for previous owner information and remove it before selling the TV.

Reviews.Title: Moving Up
Reviews.Author: W.R.Watkins
Reviews.Content: It was past time to junk the old TV's for modern, up to date ones. This has met all my expectations. The ability to plug in my computer and see a larger picture are a plus.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we were looking for
Reviews.Author: Roberta Mulligan
Reviews.Content: We purchased this @ 6 months after we bought the Samsung 60" for our den, this one went in our bedroom and is a fantastic upgrade.We've had no troubles with colors, sharpness or sound.

Reviews.Title: Great product and great service
Reviews.Author: Lamine
Reviews.Content: The TV fully met my expectations and I really like that the service/delivery was quickly done. And I like how light it is.I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I used the recommended settings that a previous reviewer wrote about, and i must say, i have only good things to say. The picture is super clear, easy to use, great value, and i download the remote control app for my phone that allows me to do anything the physical remote does. Connecting it to the internet was a breeze, and after the firmware update, everything seems better. In only regretting not getting a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: High Quality - Low Price
Reviews.Author: MusZicMan
Reviews.Content: I was a bit sceptical when I bought this but the price was right. After having it and using it, I can say the picture is great, the audio (for a flat screen) is excellent. Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Alisa Barber
Reviews.Content: Finally got rid of my old TV and purchased new flat screen, it fits well, looks great, works great. Was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup, connected to wifi (att u-verse) without a hitch, and display is beautiful and easy to see from a couch about 15 feet away. Great all around!

Reviews.Title: Samsung dependability, reasonable Amazon pricing!
Reviews.Author: 'Mantis'
Reviews.Content: Another Samsung in the household.  Smart TV features are great but quality of HD picture amazing.  We love this set.

Reviews.Title: Presently surprised and impressed,
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I must say, the set-up was very easy, the Smart TV features work well thru your wireless connections. I purchased this over a month ago and everything works great. Excellent picture quality, installed as a wall unit in my office. I found this TV to be a surprise in all features it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Very good HDTV
Reviews.Author: B. Fetterman "bearcat245"
Reviews.Content: We have been using this TV for a month now and just love it. Smart TV features work well and picture quality is super.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT HD TV
Reviews.Author: beerrun
Reviews.Content: My first smart TV, got it for the bedroom now I want one for the family room in 55-60inch size, so easy to use and the picture is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Smart Tv
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: This tv is really something else, love the picture quality and the sound, internet connectivity is simple and dependable, updates frequently, and the actual product looks stylish and sleek.My only side comment would be that there's room for plenty of better apps to be made for Smart Tv's, because the ones that are currently available aren't really groundbreaking, but they get the job done.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful LED TV
Reviews.Author: M. Goddette "GOLFPRO"
Reviews.Content: So far I have enjoyed this television.  No issues setting it up, Wi-Fi works great.  Amazon movies are a snap.  You will need to get a wireless keyboard of some type to surf the internet using the television.

Reviews.Title: great hdtv
Reviews.Author: chinshue
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv after reading alot of positive reviews about it. the picture quality on it is very good. i would recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Neeraj Beri
Reviews.Content: Picture Quality is amazing with pretty cool features. Would refer this TV to anyone who wants to buy a 40 inch led tv.The delivery was also quick.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT LED
Reviews.Author: roberto zambrano
Reviews.Content: happy with my TVgrand imagegreat soundgreat interfacegood priceI can watch my movies from usbthanks

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: A. Mosnov
Reviews.Content: I am using the TV only with an ethernet connection (no cable) for Netflix primarily. I've also used it as a monitor with a laptop, HDMI connection. The speakers are weak not good for immersive audio, I haven't added external speakers yet I use a headphone amp and a good set of headphones. The picture is excellent, features are great, I am very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture & it is smart
Reviews.Author: Rick Langtry
Reviews.Content: It was easy to setup.  It has a good, crisp picture.  So far the smart TV features we have used work great.  It automatically switches to the correct external device when we put in a move, and netflix has worked well.If you are using any internet stuff, typing is a pain though.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture, easy to set up, Internet works fine
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Witt
Reviews.Content: The only con about this set is that reflection of light shows up on screen more than on the older TV set I had.

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: P. Susi
Reviews.Content: I found this TV to be a surprise in all the features it has to offer. Easy to set up wireless access, install apps, etc. I also think that the speakers are an improvement over an earlier Samsung TV that I have, from 2010.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Quality
Reviews.Author: Gideon Ludwig
Reviews.Content: This is the first  HDTV I have ever owned, and it surpasses expectations. My video games have never looked better.

Reviews.Title: Delivering result as expected.
Reviews.Author: Monish Chandar
Reviews.Content: This TV is giving output as expected. Picture quality is good. Works fine on Network.UI is bit slow response.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the money.
Reviews.Author: D.
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived right on time. I had it out of the box and set up in twenty minutes. I followed the suggestions for the setting that I found in Amazon's reviews for this TV. They worked perfectly; the picture is very clear, the skin tones ect are very good. I am able to watch Netflex without any hassle. I have not tried any other feature. This TV is located in our bedroom; the size is perfect. Yes, I would give it a five star raring.

Reviews.Title: Not bad at all
Reviews.Author: David Di
Reviews.Content: Great little TV so far, good price for this product, my first Samsung, I like it.  I think I will try other Samsung products from now on.

Reviews.Title: awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Justin L. Williams
Reviews.Content: This tv exceeded my expectations! Crystal Clear Picture and cool features some of which i will never use but still nice to have!

Reviews.Title: 50" Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: cyainmaui
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it.Was delivered earlier then what was first told me.  Very good picture. Love being able to hook my computer thru the HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: More than a value for money
Reviews.Author: Rags
Reviews.Content: Everything is fine, fantastic viewing experience. Only thing which annoys is that, smart hub software gets updates every alternate day. Don't know why do they want to push so many updates. Once in a week makes sense.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: REYNALDO DEL ROSARIO
Reviews.Content: thanks the price is right and my son love it so much.He is using for internet.The price is right .

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Chris Placek
Reviews.Content: Price was great for the features this tv has, the picture quality is incredible, ease of use,smart tv is a lot of fun

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Nelson Standish
Reviews.Content: Just Perfect and I love it will watching everyday and show off to everyone that asks, plan on ordering more...
