Reviews.Title: Love my samsung tv!!
Reviews.Author: needlessone
Reviews.Content: This samsung tv delivers beautiful picture quality and sound. It has all the apps I need. And it doesn't take forever to load them. It's slim black screen and frame makes it a beauty on or off.

Reviews.Title: Awesome in the Price I paid
Reviews.Author: Parth Dave
Reviews.Content: Perfect picture and features in the price I Paid.One issue though:Using browser no video gets loaded or memory leak happens.No external keyboard support eventhough there is USB port.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a small apartment
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: Love the size and the convenience of this smart tv. I don't have a traditional cable set up and instead use the built in apps to stream all the content I want using netflix, hulu, amazon and vudu. The apps periodically get updated on their own, it looks clean and sleek and very slim bezel... nice !!Also I can stream content from my phone and tablet using the swipe-it app.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Ryan Roche
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my bedroom and am very impressed. Setup was a breeze. Picture quality is amazing for the price. I have none of the bugs that others mentioned in their reviews. Very very happy with it. My only complaint is that the video inputs don't face down allowing for a closer to the wall mout

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: M. Rosen
Reviews.Content: Met all of my expectations & more!!! This TV replaced another High Quality that lasted eight years. The picture quality is GREAT ant the Samsung Apps are a welcome addition.

Reviews.Title: Very happy and got a great deal
Reviews.Author: teaberries
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on various brands and their bells and whistles before deciding to purchase the 40" version of this Smart TV.  Thanks to my local store with the "big red circle with the dot inside" and their price matching policy I walked out of the store with the television after paying only $435.  Nice!  It was easy to set up.  I called Samsung customer service and the rep walked me through the whole process, taking less than 5 minutes, and I was up and running.  I also purchased a ZVOX 220 Sound Base from Amazon ZVOX 4002201 Audio Z-Base 220 Low-Profile Single Cabinet Sound System and the two together are a fantastic pairing!  As stated by other reviewers, I'm disappointed that I'm unable to stream movies through various internet sources (I am not a subscriber to Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, etc.).  But, I'm thinking of picking up a small box G-Box Midnight MX2 Android 4.2 Jelly Bean Dual Core XBMC Streaming Mini HTPC TV Box Player to run XBMC instead of having to watch XBMC-based videos on my laptop.  Navigating the on-screen keyboard via the remote is painful, so I'll likely pick up a wireless keyboard, too.  Logitech Wireless Touch Keyboard K400 with Built-In Multi-Touch Touchpad (920-003070)  After adjusting most of the picture settings to those suggested by "Gordon" in earlier reviews, and picking up an HDMI cable (free) from my cable company, I certainly can't complain about the picture quality.  Good TV, good price, decent apps, easy set-up.  Note: The "HDMI Black Level" can not be set to "Low" per the settings recommendation from Gordon as my cable company (RCN) only transmits in 1080i.  I haven't heard of a cable company transmitting in 1080p yet, even though this is the setting for most devices.  Apparently, it's "too expensive" (per the rep) for them to transmit in 1080p.  Some day maybe.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture and great color!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We really like the smart TV.  We subscribe to Net Flix so we can login with it and not have to move our Samsung Blue Ray player from room to room.  Now we keep it with our other TV.  Hook up is easy.  It doesn't have as many jacks/plugins as our other TV that we replaced, but with a little maneuvering, we are able to use all our components.

Reviews.Title: very nice tv
Reviews.Author: quickcheckgirl
Reviews.Content: i have always bought panasonic plasma tvs.....never again will i buy one. this one has an awesome picture quality and works well with my mac mirroring to watch movies.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TVs are the Best
Reviews.Author: Christopher Anderson
Reviews.Content: Samsung TVs are the  best all around value for the price.  Worked exactly as advertised.  Total watts used is 37w.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, my pros and cons
Reviews.Author: Peter W.
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. All the bells and whistles of internet connections, netflix, apps, DLNA, etc... that I was wanting2. Wireless capabiltiy INCLUDED with the TV :), haven't checked any ranges; however, I get a strong connection.3. Pciture is nice4. Easier setup to wireless5. When surfing on the web page PIP comes up with the TV signal in the PIP (not sure if that was done for earlier revisions of the TVs)Meh:1. Web pages have slightly better usability than the D series with a standard remote, not good, but qwerty keyboard comes up vs. using a phone style text entering. This makes the process faster but still brutal.Cons:1. The Web brower doesn't support Flash; however, I thought Samsung was supporting flash on these TVs. (bummer)2. My TV, maybe not other 5300s, "randomly" turns off and on roughly every 30 - 45 minutes of use (still tracking and trying to determine potential causes), time other...I ordered it here at Amazon, price is just amazing: http://amzn.to/1504gPv

Reviews.Title: Smart TV is nice!
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother-in-law and love it.  It can be hung on the wall and we can watch movies (Smart) when we go to visit.  We have one at our son's place, at home -- a bit larger -- and now at the nursing home.  Yes, I would recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: samsung smart tv love it
Reviews.Author: Pat viscuso
Reviews.Content: the samsung smart tv has a great picture & sound great price&  nice options wifi internet hulu plus a lot more

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome tv!
Reviews.Author: M. West
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart tv and was at a great price with all the features I wanted and more. I can search the web, watch Netflix, Amazon Instant Videos and more. Like in other reviews you will need to adjust color to your preference. I have a Samsung phone so I can connect it to my tv through All Share Cast. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Samsung is great !!
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, it is clear as a bell and the wifi works great.  It was a breeze to set up.  I liked it so much in my office that I bought a 60" Samsung for the living room.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Gift
Reviews.Author: PK Mast
Reviews.Content: I really loved this product it...I used it for a long time...now...and the way it works is really awesome...love it....

Reviews.Title: Did everything it said it would
Reviews.Author: Justin Kenyon
Reviews.Content: Picture looks great after some fine tuning with the settings.  As others have stated doesn't have the best sound but what LED does, just go with the separate sound system to boost the quality.  I'm still working through the smart apps, kind of strange that it downloads them to the main page but then some disappear from the page a few days later.  There are kinks for sure on this unit but for the price and size the picture can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for second bedroom
Reviews.Author: Gardenwander
Reviews.Content: Good size screen for viewing and easy to use and scroll through channels.  Clarity is great and picture quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: Very good product at a great price.
Reviews.Author: MCole
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Interface took a little bit to get used to but after that it's cool.  I bought this TV to be a utility TV; I use it outside to watch MLB and Netflix outside and as a second TV in our sunroom.  Also serves as a computer monitor at times.  Easy to move around and it holds it's settings for 30 mins making it simple to plug/unplug when it travels. Why only four stars then?  The viewing angle isn't as wide as others and outdoor glare is more than I expected from an LCD.  Bottom line:  I like it.

Reviews.Title: I love It!
Reviews.Author: R. Young
Reviews.Content: This TV replaced one of our last tube TV's and I just love it.All the apps and features meant that we don't have to use the blue-ray just for internet apps anymore.

Reviews.Title: works great as a monitor for my laptop
Reviews.Author: GenoSpinosa
Reviews.Content: my eyesight isn't what it used to be so I purchased this as a main monitor for my laptop, it works fine, once I had the screen geometry figured out from the Windows 7 driver,

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Corry Allen Grimm
Reviews.Content: I wanted a new tv for the bedroom and amazon had the best deal I could find for this Samsung TV. The TV is easy to setup, has the smart tv option, with wireless Internet connection. The only drawback was that the TV wasn't boxed in a plain box so make sure someone is home to watch out for it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Deborah L. Campbell
Reviews.Content: This television is of the highest quality.  We are totally satisfied with this television.  The service we received was excellent, making this a pleasant experience.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Charles Watford
Reviews.Content: Reliable tv for the price.  Samsung is quickly elevating itself into the electronis marketplace replacing Sony & Panasonic as a quality brand name.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for good price
Reviews.Author: I like it
Reviews.Content: I have Panasonic LCD 32" and I upgrade to Samsung 40" UN40EH5300fxza , I bought it a week ago from Costco for $529.99, I did a lot of search before I buy it , either to buy smart tv or not , is it slow or not , I know its 2012 model but I look at the display model at costo it was manufactured in Apr 2013 , I asked Costco guy about the TV and he said they get them last month, I did some research about the TV version since mine was HH02 and many people said don't buy HH02 since it's not Samsung panel and through the search I found that the version number on each TV used by Samsung company to track their product  to which store it goes ( I found that answer under Wal-Mart website customer asking and Samsung representative answer )TV picture quality is amazing , YouTube is very fast ( my internet through charter with 30 Mbps), switching between channels is fast , switching to smart and to HDMI to allshare was quick and easy and I'm able to stream video from my computer through wifi to the TV using allshare , video through usb is very good and easyI intent to write a long review to help other who wants to make a decision what to buy and I hope my review will help

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Hussam Kurdi
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for 2 months now and it's perfect the pic quality the sound..and the apps it very useful you don't have to connect a device to your TV to watch Netflix you can do it through the TV

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: klwjrw
Reviews.Content: The TV was as described.  It is easy to set up and has good quality.  The Smart feature was a bit difficult to maneuver through on screen.  We purchased a wireless keyboard to use with the TV which was a great help.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Coco
Reviews.Content: Did a good deal of research prior to my purchase. SAMSUNG brands always seem to have a great picture. Very happy with my selection.easy setup and the internet is fantastic. Recommend purchase a wireless keyboard

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the purchase
Reviews.Author: Seeker "Pavel"
Reviews.Content: Installation was very easy, as well as the Internet hook-up.  Everything works as described. Great TV.  The best value you'll find.

Reviews.Title: More like 4 and half star and simple review
Reviews.Author: Smiles
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is fantastic! It's easy to setup too.Sometimes the apps crash, but not as often that it will drive you nutsThe audio not that great. I'm sure my 720p old Samsung has better audio than than this Tv. It's Probably because it's slim. If you're in decent quite place it shouldn't be a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Anthony Olevano
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a TV for the bedroom.  After spending a lot of time comparing sizes, picture quality, and features I decided on this one mainly for the built-in wifi at a good price.  Picture is just as good as my older Viera (which I love).  So glad I ended up with the built-in wifi for an extra $50.  I use the Netflix app more on this TV than anything.  The picture is almost as good as a Bravia and a lot cheaper  (at least for the 32" model).

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV and have been using it for 1 year and I love it
Reviews.Author: Sathiya Narayanan
Reviews.Content: This TV is great and worth the price.  The HD quality is awesome. The sound is okay. Some apps like you tube hangs at times, however this might be due to the app and not because of the TV.  The setting are easy to install.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: A. SLONSKI
Reviews.Content: Simply put, this TV is AWESOME.  The only thing I wish is had is a swivel stand that the Samsung TV's used to come with.

Reviews.Title: for my mother
Reviews.Author: moxie
Reviews.Content: bought this and an extended warranty for my mother. easy too install and easy for her too use. she now has netflix at the touch of one button

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Barbara Stephens
Reviews.Content: I feel like I'm living in the furture. This tv is indeed smart. With a click of a button I'm streaming tv or on the internet. I love it. It was easy to set up in minutes. The picture is sharp and clear. We put it in the bedroom for night time and early morning viewing. We have Direct TV and it hooked up quickly , came right on.

Reviews.Title: My New TV
Reviews.Author: Tim S.
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with Samsung TV's and this was an upgrade to my old one, it is AMAZING!!! I have yet to discove all the things I can do on it, but its just amazing, sorry I said that already

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: swskyler
Reviews.Content: Not at all a tech gal but this TV is so user friendly. Love the picture n all the extras we have been enjoying.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Richard Van Horn
Reviews.Content: So far it has been great, however, I am still learning how to use it. As my learning curve increases my rating should increase.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED a great purchase
Reviews.Author: Paula Gorton
Reviews.Content: We have experience with a 58" Samsung plasma HDTV before buying this 32" LED version for our dining room.  It is a great set and a fantastic buy, was easy to set up and program, produces a crisp and clear picture, the perfect size for viewing from 5 ft to 8 ft.  Like most all LED sets, viewing from an angle decreases the clarity and brilliance as compared to plasma.  But the blacks on this LED are sharp and motion (ie: NASCAR or golf shots) cause no blurring.  Sound quality and volume are superb.  We haven't learned the set's SMART capabilities yet but have used the wifi connectivity and are very pleased.  I'd recommend this to anyone who is looking for a set to support a medium sized room where viewing distance is no more than 10 ft away.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, tinny sound
Reviews.Author: D. Clippinger "Thumbs McKee"
Reviews.Content: I use a dish and did not upgrade to HD. The first unit had a cracked screen and just one Email got another unit on the third day. It is very easy to set up with your router/wireless system (I'm 64 and not computer savvy) for internet use. Another reviewers numbers for setting the picture worked great..This replaced a Sony CRT and the only disappointment is the sound which is really weak. It does have an optical out on the back for a soundbar so I'm researching that. Make sure you know your full system or you may not be able to connect the soundbar/home theater you have. I've watched movies off the net and it works well although you don't get them in HD. I did a lot of research on features and price before buying and feel I got the best value for the price. I'm patient enough to wait for a good deal on a soundbar/home theater system to improve the sound or I may get used to it.The Samsung site does not give you any compatibility charts for the TV and soundbars.8-29-13 I had trouble find a reasonable cost home theater system and bought four months ago one based on another reviewer's write up of the Sony HT-CT150 which is a great buy and a great sound system. Today I discovered that if I use both hook ups to the TV I can lose the volume control capabilty. I had to disconnect the HDMI cable from the Sony to the TV leaving the digital optical cable as the sole hook up.. The digital optical cord that comes with the Sony is actually better sounding by itself. I had hooked up both for the best connection. The bottom line is Samsung has had some trouble with their HDMI connections to theater systems. So please be aware of that when shopping. I Emailed Samsung while researching systems and they responded they have systems for 3D TV's. Mine is not 3D. Today I would advise the purchase of the TV as a good buy, but would give the caveat that the sound is weak and to shop for sound bars/systems that rely on optical hook ups.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Mary Rulli
Reviews.Content: We have purchased Samsung TV's before and liked the quality.  We were leery about purchasing one on the internet.  Our TV arrived on time, was easy to hook up, but there was our worst fear - a problem with the picture.  It was hard to see at first - it looked like the bottom half of a bull's eye target. Starting at the top of the screen going down were black half circles.  We called Samsung - who answered the phone!  No voice mail hell.  They asked us to take a picture of the screen and email it to them.  I was a little annoyed and they explained that if they could see what was wrong the repairman would have the part with him.  They worked with my schedule and sent a repairman to my house at my convenience.  The repairman came on time - had the right part & fixed the TV.  The customer service from Samsung was Stellar.  As for the TV itself - the audio and picture are very good.  Which rates it a 4 star.  But for the money - it is an excellent buy and is worth 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: its excellent
Reviews.Author: Miguel Pocaterra
Reviews.Content: know i dont even use the laptop anymore, i would like that there's any keyboard accesory i can install to it.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV, a few small annoyances
Reviews.Author: mo_shun
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to go in the bedroom. Since we didn't want to pay for a second DVR box or buy an Apple TV or Roku we went with this one. I have to say the last 2 months with the TV have been great. There have been a few glitches and small annoyances but overall very few complaints.  The glitches are as follows: a few times the TV didn't want to connect to wifi- the simple solution was to turn it off and back on and it works normal again. The TV also adjusts to the brightness in the room which is great but sometimes at an odd daylight hour it adjusts up and down for a good 30 seconds.  The only real complaint is the remote, which could have been redesigned for the smart tv capabilities. However, there are iOS apps you can download to control the TV which is a really cool workaround. So if you're looking to watch Netflix and Hulu on your TV and don't want the extra box sitting on your stand this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: This is a really smart TV,
Reviews.Author: FQRobert
Reviews.Content: Great TV - worked straight out of the box with various players etc. During normal use it always selects the device I want to use - its smarter than me!!

Reviews.Title: One more TV was needed in our home
Reviews.Author: dodydood@nb.sympatico.ca
Reviews.Content: I have 3 other flat screen TV's in our home. I needed another one for my summer home. The previous one that I bought last year was a 40" Samsung wich works as expected so I decided to buy the same brand as it work good

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: excellent product, sound quality is also very good image with the price. connectivity menu very good and very friendly, fulfilled all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Amy NY1
Reviews.Content: Awesome was easy to hook up . What a beautiful viewing screen with high definition at its clearest . Perfect size . Great and timely shipping . Although I have  not received the cables suggested when buying item as a 2 package my cable guy thankfully had them . Don't bother to order those cables it still has not come .

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected and more
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Farruggia "happy innkeeper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my husband and I as a gift.  I was able to install and hook up all of our devices by my self.  We found features that we did not even know were available.  Picture is beautiful and extra features are wonderful.  I just helped a friend buy the same TV and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Bunge
Reviews.Content: I have been happy with all the Samsung Smart TVs I have purchased. The only drawbacks I find is the built in wireless could be stronger and the Web Browser needs a total revamp. I have to use an EOP in order to stream movies from my network because the wireless is not stable enough. I can stream to my wireless laptops no problem. This is an issue with a lot of Wireless TVs from many manufacturers. You might as well stick a needle in your eye than use the built in web browser. Even my bigger Samsung with the keyboard remote is very bad. This model fixed issues they had with indexing DLNA and portable hard drives is seems but I haven't played heavily around with it yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Bob R
Reviews.Content: Love the set. Price was right and easy to setup. Great picture quality. Specs on Amazon said 60mhz but the set was actually 120mhz which is even better. If you have a need/space for a 32" set you can't go wrong with this one!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: J. Link
Reviews.Content: I specifically selected this Samsung model for a bedroom TV because it has the Wi-Fi smart TV feature.  The cost was a bit more, but an excellent feature for doing so.  The setup was relatively easy, the quality quite good.  As a second TV it does not get much use, but a month later I am still delighted.  I usually buy Sony products, but am very pleased with this Samsung unit.  Sony had no comparable model.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG IS THE KING
Reviews.Author: deeply concerned citizen
Reviews.Content: WHAT CAN YOU SAY ABOUT SAMSUNG EXCEPT EXCELLENCE.  I HAVE NEVER SEEN A BETTER PICTURE.  IT'S INCREDIBLY CLEAR AND VIBRANT.  I WOULD SAY LG IS A CLOSE SECOND.  I WOULDN'T BOTHER WITH ANY OTHER  BRANDS.  I HAVE HEARD ABOUT ISOLATED INSTANCES WITH THE TV'S , BUT IT'S NEVER AN ISSUE ACROSS THE BOARD. 5 YEARS FROM NOW, THEY WILL REDUCE THE PRICE OF THE LATEST MODELS: I.E., FULL ARRAY LED, 240HZ REFRESH RATE,  LESS THAN .5 INCH THICKNESS,  6 HDMI INPUTS PLUS A FEW OUTPUTS, ETC. UNTIL THEN, THIS WILL SERVE THE PURPOSE.

Reviews.Title: Great Price and Excellent picture
Reviews.Author: derrick hicks
Reviews.Content: Bought this on Saturday, was Delivered on Tuesday. Was really surprised at how fast it got here. Samsung always delivers. It was simple to set up and get connected to my WI-FI. Picture Quality is great, I paired mine with the New BOSE Solo sound system and its amazing.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing! It's so light and the quality is top-notch. I'm very pleased, and love all the "smart" features. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: OMG!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Patrice Perrier
Reviews.Content: Yes, this tv is smart! so much to learn still but it is awesome and the price was greater than great!I love amazon.com wouldnt want to shop any place else.!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT  AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA+++++++++++++++++++
Reviews.Author: mike warnecke
Reviews.Content: its  the best  i waited 1 year  for  price  to come  downworks  great for a low  wattage power supply on  my pc  for awide screen monitor!!!!i am so happyGOD BLESS!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: scgy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this back in December and I must say I love this TV, I have had zero problems with it, love the smart apps, I use Netflix and Vudu many times a week. Wished I could have gone bigger!

Reviews.Title: Great TV.  Great Buy.
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Perfect addition to my kitchen.Pros: Lots of solid features for the money.  Picture quality, colors and backlighting look great.  Smart TV features are very nice, Netflix, HBO Go, Weather Apps work perfectly over wireless-N network in my house.  There is a lot of bad reviews on Samsung's Smart TV features, however I find it to be great and similar to the competition.Cons: Samsung Smart TV starts slowly and does not offer much for apps.  Youtube's Samsung app is lagging behind other competitors.  Pretty much the same as Roku. Wish the selection was similar to Amazon Apps or Google Play.

Reviews.Title: I love this smart TV
Reviews.Author: Leslie Long
Reviews.Content: It looks small, compared to my LG 32 inch, but it is a true 32 inch. The color seems to be off, but I think we just have no adjusted it properly, I love the options that it has with it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH3000
Reviews.Author: Derek W Stapleton
Reviews.Content: Great TV second Samsung TV  unit purchased. Love Samsung productsRepeat Beach Camera customer! Need I say any more. They are the best to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: RJ
Reviews.Content: What can I say that hasn't been said before. This TV is a great HDTV for the price. The stand is easy to attach to the TV. Set up is really quick and simple including updating the firmware. All together I had it up and running in less then 3 minutes. The only complaints I really have with this TV is that the menus seem to lag a small bit and that there is it seems to have a combined RCA/Component hook up. I would have liked to have both hookups seperately. Those are the only complaints I can level at this TV though.So if you want a good HDTV at a good price then I'd recommend it. My one piece of advice is if you have say some older videogame consoles like a Gamecube, PS2, etc you may want to get a switcher so that you can hook up multiple RCA and component hookups. .

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, easy to use, easy to connect other devices to, and nice remote (it doesn't look like it controls the whole house, it's actually a nice and simple remote).

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Cerrone
Reviews.Content: Withe pretty darn-good hi-def resolution.  Nice job Samsung! I wholeheartedly recommend this product (wish I could have one in every room of the house).

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: RHC86
Reviews.Content: I researched this TV with Consumer Reports and three other sites. I looked at pricing with the military, Best-Buy, Crutchfield and Walmart. Amazon had the right price.The best advantage is that its can tie into your wifi system - few others can.Samsung makes great products.Would I buy it again - MOST definitely.

Reviews.Title: Screen reflects too much light.
Reviews.Author: Nan Andrews
Reviews.Content: Picture is great.  Features (smart tv) are great. The one drawbackis that, for an LED screen, it is much more reflective of light than my SonyBravia.  People sitting at angles are bothered by light reflected from windows and lights

Reviews.Title: Great TV but....
Reviews.Author: Rangan Nandakumar
Reviews.Content: The TV is great and everything works well. The only issues with really bother me are1. On starting up the TV takes a good 3 mins to connect to the wifi network2. Navigating the browser, entering URL addresses and closing windows is extremely painful process - no way to prevent pop-ups too - Samsung has much to do to improve the browser3. Everytime I switch off when watching an online program the TV resets to the normal TV mode instead of opening the window that I left off at. Can imagine why.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Frank Kruszka
Reviews.Content: This TV has it all.  I am so glad I purchased it.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for a 32 inch HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300
Reviews.Author: T K
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased because it is wifi enabled for netflix. It performs well. It is installed near workout machines. unfortunately the volume at maximum is not sufficient to overpower the roar and whine of home Gym equipment. The pictures are clear, installation was snap and it fitted easily into an existing overhead wall bracket. The included Remote control is easy enough to work with. The wifi set up is a no brainer. I deduct a star for the volume. Other reviews of this product had already highlighted the volume issue, so within a couple of weeks I ordered some speakers which sorted out the issues.

Reviews.Title: Rating the product
Reviews.Author: Russell Katanick
Reviews.Content: Over all I am satisfied with the TV. I have noticed that once in a while the picture seems to fluctulate as far as intensity.

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: Deborah W. Lindmark
Reviews.Content: This is a great HDTV, it doesn't swivel at the bass is the thing I would change.  I am using it on a desk in my bedroom.The white glove delivery, that was free at the time, was excellent!

Reviews.Title: Like it, SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: KSA
Reviews.Content: Very very good smart TV, I highly highly recommended. If you are looking for smart tv, this is your best option.I bought it before one month and until now there are no issues.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Gentry
Reviews.Content: Love this tv! Its great and I can connect it to my Ipad!  And I love having the internet on my tv!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Smart TV!
Reviews.Author: SAK "SAK"
Reviews.Content: I am not a big techie so I needed something easy but wanted a SMART TV for the kids although heard sometimes it is more trouble than its worth- but this SMART TV really is smart and the kids know how to use it better than I do!  This TV was the perfect choice! It pretty much self does everything and I had no issues hooking it up at all! I loved it so much that I have the 47" Slim version as well - both work fantastically well - picture, sound quality all excellent - really have no complaints at all...

Reviews.Title: Smart TV is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Sergi Pinol
Reviews.Content: Is like having an AppleTV included in your TV and fully integrated.Direct wifi connection is a great plus! I love it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Samantha Siver
Reviews.Content: Love this set easy to set up and very user friendly Great HD picture. I've only had the set for a week bought with Canopy Protection 5 years for piece of mind great feature offered by Amazon I will update this review if I have any issues. I spent 4 days researching TV's and this one for the features and PRICE could not be beat also free shipping and it arrived 3 days early thank you Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. Denton
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping , easy hook up, I love my new tv..I'm still trying to figure out what all I can do with this tv. It's AWESOME ! :)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful buy!
Reviews.Author: Alex Blumeyer
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!!!! I listen to Pandora and my radio morning show on it.  I love having Netflix and all the apps that are available to download.  I do not have the cable hooked up to it and am debating whether or not I will even get to that part.  This TV is lightweight and very easy to set up.  Definitely worth buying!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-Inch HDTV hits the Mark (32 inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV UN32EH5300)
Reviews.Author: Jacob Petersheim
Reviews.Content: Samsung's 32 inch smart HDTV hits the mark for the money. It delivers exactly as promised: beautiful resolution, efficient smart TV features, and a well designed user interface.I have had this TV for 2 months (and likewise own a 46 inch Samsung smart TV for 3 years). The smart TV features on the 32 inch TV process faster than my 46 inch smart TV (which is 3 years older).The audio quality is very marginal, but such is the case with most televisions (most users  and certainly audiophiles will want external speakers).The user interface is mostly very good, aside from a clunky web browser with the smart TV features (I don't plan to do much web browsing from my TV).The wifi is seamless, works great and was simple to setup.Overall, very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV definitely a smart buy!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Bair "MB"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our bedroom....researched and shopped around everywhere and Amazon offered the best price for the most features. Great picture and surprisingly good sound for a flat screen....but the smart features are what gave this set 5 stars. We use a Roku system on a living room tv, but with the Samsung Smart TV we can stream our favorite channels, connect to the internet,watch tons of movies,etc. without purchasing any other devices!....Thanks Amazon for the heads up on the need of just 1 HDMI cable for about $6 to make the magic happen....Love our new Samsung Smart Tv and love Amazon service and delivery!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Good Second TV
Reviews.Author: wincacher
Reviews.Content: Bought this one to get HD in bedroom.  Excellent smart TV features, great picture quality, poor sound.  The built-in speakers produce a "fuzzy" sound at all settings but solved this with some cheap ($20) computer speakers from Logitech.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: PeggyAnnR "WoW MoM"
Reviews.Content: We love Warehouse deals....bought this as a replacement for an older model Samsung LCD TV used for our little Granddaughters.  Great color. WiFi was a synch to set up, apps work well.  We have a higher end larger 3D Sammy LED which has a faster response time, but for the $$$ this is a great little TV.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Wish it had a HDMI ARC connection but otherwise great image quality.  It is quite easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Replaced my 13 inch bedroom tv used since 1986. Internet is good. Samsung excellent product use app from phone sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Would have given it 5 stars but......
Reviews.Author: Padakis "Padakis"
Reviews.Content: Samsung customer service , well the nicest thing I can say is that it is a challenge. Two seperate days of calls and aprox 8 transfers after waiting long periods of time and my issue is not resolved. I wanted to put $10.00 on the apps credit. (Yes my credit card was fine , after being rejected twice on the website I checked with my credit card company.)  Still my card was not accepted so I tried a different credit card unfortunately with the same result.  I still do not have the app I wanted of the stars but at this point I feel I can live without it.My Amazon app for my video's is not working well. Netflix etc all work after a few seconds.The Amazon app can hang there forever (I waited once for over ten minutes before shutting the tv off). I finially decided to use my xbox to watch the Amazon vids and tv shows. Not really what I had bought a smart tv for but after the fiasco with trying to purchase some app credit I do not feel up to calling Samsung again, and as I said the others that are offered work fine.The tv is clear, great picture and decent sound.I am not sure I would purchase this tv again not because of the quality of the tv but because the app market is small, most of them are so-so also the problem with the customer service.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Claude A. Bloom
Reviews.Content: Arrived on schedule and price was excellent. We bought two. Both units have great pictures and an array of features.

Reviews.Title: Fully met expectations
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Douglass
Reviews.Content: It is a perfect fit for a niche in our kitchen cabinet. Picture and sound quality are superior to 5 year-old hp model it replaced. First Samsung TV we have owned, but we will look at Samsung favorably when we buy one for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tv!!
Reviews.Author: Kaye
Reviews.Content: This tv is for my 'escape room'.  I love the great color and ease of operation.  Our main tv is the same model - just larger.  Good quality and good price!! does it get better/

Reviews.Title: Smart indeed
Reviews.Author: Patricia B Samford
Reviews.Content: My larger Samsung TV downstairs has some difficulties with smart features (or at least I have difficulties.)  The two blu-rays(Samsung) have difficulties connecting with Netflix.  This however is simple and streams effortlessly.  Now I can get my wife to start watching Breaking Bad.  Oh year the screen is high quality no pixelating.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV Quality
Reviews.Author: Vernon P Polidoro
Reviews.Content: Arrived with substantial packaging, in expected new condition, at the time as advertised.Set-up was easy. TV was surprisingly light weight. Once picture settings were set, very good color contrast. Wireless internet access was also fairly easy access for this 'smart' TV. Prior set was a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Gary Keese
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV, easy to set up and operate, good picture.  Internet streams fine.  I was a little nervous about having a TV shipped, but no issues there.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" 1080p TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph Stephens
Reviews.Content: Great TV with internet accessible and great picture. I would recommend to everyone. It did not take any time at all to hook it up.

Reviews.Title: Great Internet TV
Reviews.Author: J. BENDER "Dancer 50"
Reviews.Content: This was the third Samsung TV that I have purchased for our home.  This TV has great picture and good sound for a 32" model.  We love the internet capability.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Miguel Garces
Reviews.Content: this is probably by far the best purchase i have done here on Amazon. this Tv is pretty much everything its described that it does. such a great purchase

Reviews.Title: Little TV - Big Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: PharmGirl825 "Clare R"
Reviews.Content: We've always had Sony TVs...until now.  I've owned this model for 3 months and so far I am extremely pleased by the amazing clarity of the picture and even more pleased by the easy access to Netflix and Hulu.  This has eliminated having to set up a DVD player, for now anyway.  I now own 2 of these TVs and have no regrets. It's Samsung from here on in- sorry Sony.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the value
Reviews.Author: greenapple
Reviews.Content: Once again Amazon has a great price for a quality product.  The product was packaged securely to prevent any damage during the shipping process. The TV showed up on time like always when ordering from Amazon.  If you don't have Prime you are really missing out on something special.

Reviews.Title: Great picture - complex to use
Reviews.Author: DonD
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty savvy with digital picture quality and appreciate the care in this set in getting good color and contrast. That doesn't help when I just want to turn on the show I was watching. Maybe it's this way with all new sets, but it takes several minutes just to get to anything streaming - not on cable.But we're happy with the wireless reception and someday will figure out how to get our computers that are on wireless to stream to this set as well. I'd buy it again, no question.

Reviews.Title: Easy moving Internet TV
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I selected this model because it's "smart": easy gets connected to home network and allows to use many services - even not included originally - online. It works at least as expected.Good choice for bedroom, kitchen, etc. because you need power only.I don't know how it works with other inputs.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ufunni
Reviews.Content: I love this TV all the features work and it was easy to set up with WIFI.  Beautiful picture and much more sound projected than I expected.  Hardly ever use my external sound bar I have attached to it. The ONE thing I hate is the crappy remote.  I have a Samsung tv a few years older and I wish the remote was like it. Where the hell is the favorite channel remote button?  Not to mention for web browsing... you have got to be kidding me!  I need to know of a wireless keyboard that is compatible with this set.  If you know of one, please let me know!Wifi signal is strong too,  My tv is in my bedroom down stairs but my router is upstairs.  For those having issues, maybe they need to change their wifi broadcast channel for  a stronger transmittance. Youtube doesn't play all the videos but it does play some I select  Glad they added Amazon prime for download, because I love my Amazon streaming and I am a prime member.Overall, I love the TV but hate the remote control! Yes, I would buy this HDTV again!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: woody
Reviews.Content: While not a large display, this TV offers a great picture and wifi connection to a selection of video providers as well as the internet.

Reviews.Title: Great television!!
Reviews.Author: Brian Watson "svin tokk"
Reviews.Content: Samsung is really killing the competition now with these quality products.  This TV is so easy to set up and use.  The picture is fantastic with deep black color.  Not even a hint of grey.  Streaming is fast and rarely has any hiccups.  Very satisfied.  This one does not have the hand gesture commands however, because it has no camara.  You have to pay more for that feature.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture and Great Features
Reviews.Author: Nancy L. Crowley
Reviews.Content: There are a number of things we really like about this TV. The picture quality is great and you can view it at pretty extreme angles. We purchased it for use in an RV and we wanted one that could be viewed from various angles. The trim around the TV is narrow which allowed it to fit in the space that we had. We love the ability to access wireless networks so we can use Mazon Prime while on the road.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV.
Reviews.Author: Jake Fantom
Reviews.Content: Just the right size to be unobtrusive in our bedroom. Superb picture, although sound is just so-so. Adjustments with the audio settings help with this somewhat. We have been watching a lot of Netflix lately, and this set has Netflix built-in, along with a number of other apps. The wi-fi reception is excellent. My router is located on another floor, yet Netflix HD plays flawlessly. It also comes with Plex installed, so I can access all my own video and audio files easily from my PC downstairs. I don't have a cable box in the bedroom, so we basically use this TV to play Netflix and files from our own movie library. I highly recommend it for that type of use. One small gripe: it takes the Smart TV section (where the apps are stored) maybe ten seconds to load, no big deal really.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With this TV
Reviews.Author: E. Vincent
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV as a replacement for a slightly larger Samsung HDTV that had stopped working. After a month everything is working great and I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to hook up to the cable TV box as well as the Wi-Fi Internet connection. I thought it would take hours of playing around to get the setting right and it did not take much time at all.It has a great picture and the SmartTV functions and content are fun to explore.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV MONITOR WITH HD PLUS INTERNBET CONNECTIONS.
Reviews.Author: April kid "aprilkid"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital TV and am pleased, it does more thaat I anticipated, I am able to watch my NEFLIX movies without problems and with the new cable monitor in HD the pictures are very clear.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Dip Kharod
Reviews.Content: This is a very good TV with almost all that I wanted from a smart tv. Constructive critisism - Samsung should add a key board on the remote - internet browsing with only remote is not practical.

Reviews.Title: sweet deal
Reviews.Author: alok
Reviews.Content: pros: good wifi ready LAN enabled smart TV with youtube, netflix and such apps, fine picture quality and good soundcons: no PC VGA input so can't hook up to a laptop as an extra display device, pain to type using the remote control.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Gussie
Reviews.Content: We have had our TV for about 3 months now and we love it!  It was very easy to set up and easy to figure out how to use The Hub. (center where all of your apps are shown)  We have had no problems at all with this product.  We also (just for fun) found and app for our smart phones that allows our phone to act as a TV remote!  This is kind of cool because you can type letter in various search boxes etc instead of having to use arrows to move a cursor along a keyboard on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Thomas E Snyder
Reviews.Content: This tv is brilliant.  The picture is amazing, and it is very light and easy to move around.  The apps that come along with it are amazing and enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: So far a great easy to use TV
Reviews.Author: FG
Reviews.Content: SO far this TV seems to work great and was extremely easy to set up.  No issues @ all, its only been a week so will review further in a couple of weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great on this. The form factor is very nice; I like the thin bezel. The sound isn't great, but is not bad; certainly sufficient. Netflix runs great over the wifi on it, and the interface to get to stuff like Netflix is easy to use and intuitive. Finally it was easy to mount to the wall. So, I have no complaints so far. I really like this TV and would recommend it to anyone looking at 32 inch HDTVs.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great value for a feature packed TV.  Have not had it long and I am still adjusting the picture settings but I love the TV.

Reviews.Title: Super TV
Reviews.Author: Roy A. Thornock
Reviews.Content: Best TV I have owned.  Needed a 32-inch TV to fit into a wall unit and this TV works perfectly.  Picture, SMART Tv are great.

Reviews.Title: wife's passy
Reviews.Author: Gammin Junkie
Reviews.Content: She went from a 25 inch CRT to this one. Got HD with Charter cable. I cant pull her away!!

Reviews.Title: My  Samsung
Reviews.Author: Matilda "Garmin Lover"
Reviews.Content: 40" Smart TV is a joy.  I bought it at a great price and I love it. I now have a Smart phone, appliances and a Smart TV all by Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Another Great TV In My House:
Reviews.Author: ROBERT A KALKOWSKI
Reviews.Content: I just got finished installing this one on the wall in my kitchen breakfast nook area.  It's got all of the features I like from my other Samsungs (40" LED SmartHub & 19" LED).  I can now watch my Netflix, while eating my Cheerios/FruitLoops, soup & sandwich or my charbroiled steak & potato.  The 'SmartHub' is the greatest thing; since, sliced bread and/or peanutbutter.  Installation is a snap and tuning set-up is automatic; couldn't be easier.

Reviews.Title: excellent choice
Reviews.Author: David M. "Jubilaire"
Reviews.Content: Chose for picture and smartness.  Not disappointed.  The small size and light weight make it versitle.  Recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV sound is lacking
Reviews.Author: Richard B. Reider
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great, the sound is not up to par with the picture,it may require a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV - Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Jason Anderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV very skeptical of the smart features.  Since installing it I have not connected a cable to it so I could test the smart features.  Overall the smart features are very smooth and work pretty well.  It takes longer than I expected to start the Smart menu, but once in it the menus and text entries are very responsive.  I have been very happy with many of them.  WIFI is seamless.  Sound is OK, not great but good.  It is better than I expected it to be but I use it in a kitchen where sound quality is not quite as critical as it would be in a living room.  Remote is laid out well and works nice.  If you watch the Samsung marketing info about smart TVs, ignore the social media stuff with interactive camera and motion sensing actions.  This TV does not have that (you have to go up in size and model to get it).  I knew that before buying, but when shopping some places never distinguished between smart features on the Samsung models.Cons:  Youtube app does not work with the keyboard I put on the TV.  Not horrible, but not as convenient either.  Web app does not stream many video files (not flash compatible).  This is very disappointing.  Many popular sites with video do not work.  Cannot uninstall some apps that I don't use or plan to use.  The TV itself is very thick for an LED TV.  It seems obvious that Samsung used an older shell to put this TV in.  It doesn't matter where I installed it, but newer models are much thinner.Overall this is a pretty nice TV.  It is not perfect, but the smart functions work pretty well and are pretty convenient for the most part.  I would buy this TV again and would recommend it also.  Picture quality is very good.  I have not played with the phone app to control this much yet.  If the smart features had the web video streaming for different formats I would have gave this 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: L. M. Rhea "harpist"
Reviews.Content: I like this TV.  I would like a little better sound options, but it is not an expensive TV so I might be expecting too much.  I am glad to have it.

Reviews.Title: Everything We Could Have Asked For
Reviews.Author: Kathy&John
Reviews.Content: This Samsung 32 Inch HDTV is everything we could have asked for in a bedroom TV. It is light. It has high quality picture resolution. The Apps allow us to use Netflix, Hulu and HBOGO with ease. This has been the perfect purchase.

Reviews.Title: Looking good
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: Pretty cool television so far, at first when I tried watching cable and movies I was horrified by the poor image. I soon learned that my cable box was not HD, replacing it for a high-def model fixed that. I also realized the poor image from movies was because I was using DVD's (the 480p resolution is stretched out to the 50" screen, making it look bad), so I upgraded my Netflix plan to Blu-ray and it's looking good!The Netflix instant feature has worked well for me and Wii U/ PS3 games look fantastic.In other words, be prepared to upgrade any old devices/media you use to HD to get the best image out of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was not sure it would be big enough but it is and the picture quality is great.  I was able to set it up with ease.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Fidel
Reviews.Content: Very good TV at a reasonable price. The picture quality and sound are great. I especially like the web browsing feature. Can watch streaming video just like a broadcast show.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. Liebert
Reviews.Content: My first SmartTV and I love it.  I changed my cable to basic and dropped the premium channels since I can watch just about anything I like now either from Amazon, Netflix or Hulu.

Reviews.Title: This is a good product
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Mathewson
Reviews.Content: This is a smart TV and it will be even better as time goes on a nd more apps are developed.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Buy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This TV has everything one needs to stream moveis from the internet, customize the audio, and do most anything one can do with a computer!

Reviews.Title: I was very satisfied.
Reviews.Author: AverageJoe
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the television itself.  It had the inputs and outputs I needed.  People have complained about it shutting off randomly.  I haven't had this issue in months of use.  Except when I first used it and forgot to change the eco settings. DERP.  Far as the apps go, smart tvs have a while to go before being good as a tablet or even a phone.  Some work great others crash and burn.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Yunsung Hwang
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our new home, was bit worried about buying expensive electronics online, but the price was the lowest when compared online and offline and it arried promptly& safely, few scratches on the box but nothing serious!we set it up and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Mak
Reviews.Content: Its Picture quality is excellent.Sound is not so good, sound system need little more improvementIt slows down the app use after some use. After clicking on smart browser button it take lot of time to start some time it doesn't start also.Browser options needs enhancement like auto cleanup browser hist etc..

Reviews.Title: tv was great
Reviews.Author: Tom Gavin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a gift. This thing has all the features in one package unlike most other more expensive tv's. My 17 y/o daughter is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price and product
Reviews.Author: Fran
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied . I purchased this product because of the WIFI. It works beautifully.Shipped quickly and arrived in perfect condition.I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Redbox Streaming App using smart hub
Reviews.Author: Norma S "Norma"
Reviews.Content: The TV using the smart hub does stream Redbox.  After a lot of adjusting I was finally able to sign in to Redbox and play a movie.  You must update the firmware with the version that came out on 1/28/13, then install the Redbox app or reinstall if you added prior to updating the firmware.  Entering information like email etc using the remote is frustrating. Redbox at the present is not an improvement over Netflix.  For the money this TV is great.  I used the settings contained in one of the reviews here and they were very good.  Even if you just start with those and tweak some you'll save yourself a lot of time.The smart hub is not user friendly and is slow.  I am sure this will improve with newer models.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the picture and the ability to use the internet straight form the TV itself. I love being able to just click on Netflix or Hulu plus to watch my shows and movies. Also, I can rent or download from Amazon and watch it instantly!

Reviews.Title: GREAT UNIT
Reviews.Author: Billy T.
Reviews.Content: This Samsung TV has met all my expections.  I searched all the ratings prior to purchasing and have found that so many of the positive comments were accurate.  We're really enjoying this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Susan Davis
Reviews.Content: Bought this during Black Friday.  Excellent picture quality.  Easy to set up. I would recommend this product based on the quality and price.

Reviews.Title: Smart Purchase
Reviews.Author: JTerey
Reviews.Content: Well worth the price! I purchased this television for the master bedroom. A Smart TV works for me since i view most shows and movies online via computer rather than through a cable provider. My first go round I received a TV that was damaged during shipping but Amazon promptly sent me a replacement. Love the clear display, availability of online apps for movie and TV watching and even music. I'm considering getting an additional set for my living room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: R. Lowe
Reviews.Content: We have two other Samsung TVs, and this one is certainly a great choice. We have it connected via coax to an attic mounted antenna, and the channels were very easy to set up and the picture is fantastic. The wireless connection to our Apple Time machine router was simple and straightforward and this function works very well. We have used it now for just about one month and, overall, we are extremely happy with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Mangascolorado "mangascolorado"
Reviews.Content: So glad we bought this, this is our first flat-screen TV.  We don't need 3D but want wifi and internet, and this has been perfect.  The only thing that could be better is if the browser supported flashplayer so that we could watch more online content.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Shay
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my daughter for Christmas & she loves it!  She loves old movies & comedys, so she is always finding lots of different things to watch and it is not hooked up to cable.  It has been really fun for her to explore the "smart" aspects of the tv using her laptop.  I personally have never taken the time to play with it but I am always hearing, "I love my TV, Mom".  Since she is happy, I am happy & the TV gets 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: larl2008@hotmail.com
Reviews.Author: Carlos Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the purchase very good recommend the product and a good price. I hope to buy again thanks

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: VinceD
Reviews.Content: I like this TV's Smart Aps.  We didn't want to get tied into renting another high definition box from the cable company at a monthly expense.  With Amazon prime instant video we can access a large number shows and movies.  This is primarily a second TV for us so I hooked up an Xbox to the set along with a Kinect and complete some workouts with the Nike software.  To top things off this TV has a great picture.  When my primary set in the living room goes it will be replaced by another Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Quality TV, but internet not easy to access
Reviews.Author: Northeast reviewer
Reviews.Content: This is a very good TV and it has a convenient to use remote for TV.  However, access to the internet is difficult with the remote.  A keyboard and mouse may be helpful, but I have obtained them for the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Tareg
Reviews.Content: PROS:  Overall good picture quality and absolutely beautiful graphics display from my PS3.  This was my first ever HD TV and I have to say that I cannot go back to my old plasma screen TV.  If you are looking for something for your bedroom or living room this would make a very good Television.CONS:  You might want to invest in a sound-bar if you don't have one.  If you're a gamer like me, you'll want to hear real explosions and gun fire fill your room.  In my opinion this TV cannot handle deep bass as it starts to rattle inside.  The package got out to me here in Micronesia in very poor condition, but held up and had no dents or scratches.Overall, A great TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Myers
Reviews.Content: The TV is wonderful. Picture is clear. Easy to set up and use.I would  like get another one for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Perfect bedroom set
Reviews.Author: edhcook1
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for our Grandson's bedroom for playing games. It arrived promptly and in perfect condition. Grandson reports easy setup and really likes the screen clarity, color reproduction and fast screen refresh for sophisticated games. This set was probably over kill for the purpose at $400 but Grandsons are worthy. We would recommend this set to anyone looking for a very good extra TV.

Reviews.Title: fabulous
Reviews.Author: 1happynow
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my tv!  So cool to be able to bring up netflicks from the tv and so many apps to choose from.I am looking for a sound bar since the sound is not great as many flat screens have this problem. Arrived promptly... was  a breeze for me ( a woman) to set up

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tv
Reviews.Author: sugarmami
Reviews.Content: awesome picture, i love it, my whole family is so happy with it, wonderful features, pandora, youtube, and many more

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: ior
Reviews.Content: Is great product. Have a good finish. Very realistic colors and good sound quality.This TV have a good futures for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: EBlass
Reviews.Content: Bought this for daughter for her room.  She loves it.  Nice clear picture, easy to set up, lots of features.

Reviews.Title: Really Is a Smart TV
Reviews.Author: siddhartha
Reviews.Content: The Smart TV is great, and at a very fair price.  The setup was explained well and straightforward, even the network setup and interface to peripheral devices.  Had it up and running in an hour or so.The picture and sound are fine.  Through the smart hub we can browse the web and play youtube videos and music for free.  Have not tried the pay services yet; may not need to.  I suggest that you use a USB mouse instead of the remote for the on-screen keyboard, it is much faster and easier.  Just plug it in and go.Overall, we are very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Brandon Caballero
Reviews.Content: Couldn't have asked for a better tv, the price was perfect as well. The interface can be clunky but it works well for what it does. It'd be nice to have a small keyboard come with the next version.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price. Picture great, sound quality-ok. Smart Services-Ok
Reviews.Author: DAVID E GOFF
Reviews.Content: All in all I am happy with this TV for my first Smart TV purchase. The picture is great, however sound quality is not the best. The Smart services are very nice, but they seam to do an awful lot of updating. Kind of frustrating when you swtch to Smart TV hub to watch something online and you have to wait for it to update. Hopefully this will slow down once this technology has a little age to it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Anthony McCray
Reviews.Content: It would be a 5 star if it had an additional coaxial input.  Enjoy the advantages of the smart capability.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: felicia brooks
Reviews.Content: If you want to view the picture on the Samsung UN46EH5300 46 inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV in "full screen" (without the black "frame" around the picture) you do lose a little bit of the picture. Sound is better than I expected, but would be much better with a sound system. No complaints though, so very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Internet ready, connects easily, has a great image.  This unit replaced an old CRT tv that weighed about 3x more.  The only drawback is weak reception through an antenna.  I was expecting better sensitivity.

Reviews.Title: Gotta love Samy.
Reviews.Author: Gavin Chooskaul
Reviews.Content: TV showed up fairly fast. Works as advertised. Picture and smart hub are great. Wonderful product for a starter smart TV. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: Nice tv with a great picture. Web browser is clumsy though. I like the rest of the smart tv features.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, sound quality is lacking
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Schade "Nick"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality and brightness of this HDTV are excellent, as are the "smart TV" features.  The only problem is the speakers.  The volume variation is one issue.  Even when watching a single TV show or movie, the TV seems to accentuate the intended volume levels, so that sounds that are supposed to be loud come out very loud, and sounds that are supposed to be low-volume come out inaudible.  Another issue is that the TV makes a humming noise, which I've noticed tends to be loudest when a very bright image is on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Beautiful Picture, Great Features!!
Reviews.Author: AndyT
Reviews.Content: I just wanted say this is an awesome deal on this Samsung LED TV I purchased it awhile back when my current TV started giving me problems. I've never been happier with a TV purchase than I am with this set it has a beautiful picture and really deep blacks, The sound is actually really good for a flatscreen and the Wifi works really great don't pass this one up!

Reviews.Title: Learning Curve
Reviews.Author: Marcey Zaborski
Reviews.Content: I think I will ultimately love it but right now there is the learning curve.  I cannot quite figure out why the picture does not fit on the screen and I was surprised that I have to buy a separate key board.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. Campbell "darwin346"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV for my "technically limited" mother, and she quickly grasped the easy to navigate user interface.  Mom and I would highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!  You Will Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I was at first reluctant to spend $500 on a TV but it is one of  the best electronics decision that I have ever made.  The picture is sharp and accurate.  Samsung has perfected the perfect picture.  I only needed to make one minor picture adjustment for my personal taste.  Having an internet ready TV made my access to Netflix, HBO.go, and Internet browsing extremely easy and enjoyable.  The 3 HDMI and 2 USB ports are extremely useful.  I am so happy that I did not buy a TV with less.  Similar to most TV's the speakers are only good for the evening news.  I highly recommend external speakers that are self-powered, sound bar, home theater system, etc.Great TV, Great Features, Super Sharp and Accurate picture.  HD shows are incredible on this TV.  Buy it you will love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46EH5300 46-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Deserthead
Reviews.Content: Looked for the biggest TV to fill my available space.  This one was on display at WallyWorld along with a hundred others.  I checked Consumer Reports before I shopped and Samsung is usually rated highly.  This TV stood out among the others for the picture quality.  We thought about buying that day, instead we went home and checked with Amazon.  Not only was the TV $250 less (with free shipping) but of course we saved the sales tax!The TV arrived in just a couple days.  The box was kind of beat up.  We told the UPS driver that it could be damaged so he noted same on delivery confirmation.  Upon opening the box and looking closely we found no damage.  We set the TV in its spot and hooked it up.  WOW.  We love it!Pros.. Web surfing in your easy chair. Cons...Sound not the greatest (bought a Bose Solo) what a difference.  Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jason Worden
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is very good, better than expected for 60Hz. Smart TV functions are also good. We stream Pandora & use YouTube with it quite often are rarely encounter any buffering issues. Overall, a great buy if you're looking for a fairly inexpensive Smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful picture
Reviews.Author: utahmnts
Reviews.Content: Our daughter was thrilled. Easy to set up. Picture is strong and the manual was easy to follow. Light weight was a plus.

Reviews.Title: Not so Happy with colors
Reviews.Author: Dalok "Dalok"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Amazon without seeing it in the store.  I find the colors on this set to be very different from my other Samsung LCDs.  I have been continuously playing with the setting but haven't found one that I have liked so far.  My sources have been apple tv, dvd, and digital cable (without converter).  Will try with other sources and update this review.

Reviews.Title: Good TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: TARUN GUPTA
Reviews.Content: This TV has everything that user wants. Good picture quality and nice applications to get content from the internet at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: Sandyp "library person"
Reviews.Content: I love my second Samsung flat screen it is a  great value with lots of  features. Love the smart TV concept.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mary Wickser
Reviews.Content: Great picture and the price was right on! I really like the Smart TV aspect. It is fun to watch.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Easy set, great apps & super picture. Perfect tv for kids bedroom with good sound quality. Set up was completed by 12 year old.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Robert de Myer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a Christmas gift. Tv has a beautiful picture, the Smart TV is a god send. I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: Brad K. Douglas
Reviews.Content: This television is everything I expected it to be.  Wifi setup was simple, general setup was also simple.  The only con I have about this television is the color options, I must say I would say this about any television though.  I think we should be in an age where you didn't have to automatically adjust the color on the set itself.  The preset settings are decent and I don't really have the time to mess with changing it much.  Now, I can't wait for baseball season to use the MLB.TV app that this television comes with!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart Tv
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: It does everything it said it would. Excellent picture, connects wifi to internet. Highly reccomend. excellent price good value high tech

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: It is a good product, the quality of image is very good, the functions facilitate very much the life to one, if it is what they offer

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rick S.
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for a new home gym and think it is great.  The resolution is sharp and the picture is bright and viewable from all angles in a 12 x 12 room.  The room gets bright from sun at certain hours, but the TV is still viewable.  Videos on uTube play exceptionally well (much better than through the DirecTV app), filling the screen with HD video (in most cases) with fast forward and rewind, as well as control from your iPad.  The speaker is weak (consistent with all TV speakers), so we output TV sound to a Zeppelin Air iPod speaker using the digital output on the TV.  The TV was easy to set up and start using and works well either on the wall or tabletop.  Ample connections of various types and lightweight, this TV was perfect for our use and we are exceptionally happy with it.  (I would post a picture but still need to hide the cables.)

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Smashexpert
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV my wife and I bought after getting married. Took a long time in comparing and it went on sale after Thanksgiving (Black Friday) so we jumped on it. It has really amazing picture quality, and being as we are heavy Netflix and Pandora users it works seamlessly to meet those needs. I have it connected to internet by ethernet cable (didn't even try Wi-Fi cause it sits so close to the router) and have had no problems yet. We don't have an antennae yet, so no OTA experience. It has good sound quality and easy integration to use external speakers. Played around a bit with DLNA from my phone, the only problems being on my phone's video settings and resolution sizes. I could not get the "social" settings right, so I don't know how well Facebook, Twitter and Google Talk work. And the list of apps available is pretty long, not many things that I find useful but a good place to start.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Avg. Consumer
Reviews.Content: This TV is easy to set up, the remote is easy to use even for a less than tech-savvy person, and the sound is excellent. Connecting to the Internet was really easy, and the picture is awesome!

Reviews.Title: go samsung
Reviews.Author: shamila sahadeo
Reviews.Content: this product has exceeded my expectations.  but that is after 2 weeks only.  i will write subsequent ratings.  i will definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: bill derry
Reviews.Content: I have had a Samsung tv before and it is great. Still working on figuring it out but it has preinstalled Apps I would like to remove if I learn how. I bought a wireless mouse and keyboard for it. Using the remote for that function sucks.

Reviews.Title: Would not connect to internet through my Linksys.
Reviews.Author: Adrian S. Jones "Fat J"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv so that I could watch netflix in my bedroom. I have another Samsung that I am very happy with and have had zero issues with. It connects to the internet through my Linksys WRT300N router without me ever having had to make any settings changes on the router. This one however, will not. I have tried every setting on the router and television I can think of, and the television will comnect to the router but will not access the internet. I am a network engineer by trade, and believe me, I left no stone unturned. I even went as far as poking around and changing some settings in the service mode of the television. Eventually I had to enable the wireless function on my ISP's modem. This works with no issues. Normally I would blame the router, but as i stated earlier in this review I have another Samsung Smart TV working with it without any problems. I have never had any issues with any other device accessing the internet through this router.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Al Young
Reviews.Content: Wanted a TV for the master bedroom. This one does everything we wanted it to do at a great price. My only issue is the volume control. The voice is not as clear as it could be which results in having to turn up the volume.

Reviews.Title: Good one
Reviews.Author: customer
Reviews.Content: Best brand with all the options we want in a TV. We really like apps and wifi features. Good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Steve Hendricks
Reviews.Content: We looked at a lot of other products of this same size and spec, but finally settled on the Samsung. This TV has lived up to it's very high Consumer Reports rating. Easy to set-up, vivid color and nice sound. And it fit perfectly into the small space we had set aside for in our family room.

Reviews.Title: Very good wifi TV
Reviews.Author: Vinay
Reviews.Content: Very good smart tv easy to connect to Internetplays videos from YouTube directly though some video formats have issues.Totally worth your money and sync it with Samsung s iii you can control your tv thru mobile

Reviews.Title: The Best Smart TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Sumitranandan
Reviews.Content: The features of this TV are amazing. The quality of the picture is really good and the sound system is relatively okay.Various smart apps esp. netflix, crackle are good. Samsung has its own apps like AllShare is good. It has 3 HDMI & 2 USB ports for various usage.The bad part is with Youtube app. I dont like the app it was designed. It has streaming problems (only for youtube) and the playlist wont go to next video automatically and manually operate remote to move to the next video.overall i like this TV verymuch and definitely would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny spent.. Love it!
Reviews.Author: SSHS
Reviews.Content: An ideal TV for the bedroom. Just a slight problem faced is searching programs on the Internet. There is no standard keyboard and the remote is used to type the letters which is quite time consuming and difficult, specially when one has to correct a wrongly typed letter. A sure place to improve to Samsung. Otherwise a good tv and we are happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Timothy Meinken
Reviews.Content: Everything I was looking for in a Big screen. Love the Smart features and the abilty to tie into my Wi-Fi

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: emil soriano
Reviews.Content: This product was the exact size and specs I wanted for our master bedroom.  The picture quality and resolution is very, very good.  Am now I am looking for a speaker which would be compatible to it so that I could more readily enjoy the engineered sound quality.  Any suggestions from you!?  Please let me know various options which I would like to review on-line and then make a decision on to purchase.  Thanks in advance...

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: suzette
Reviews.Content: I had the good fortune to get a great Black Friday deal on the Wednesday before.  So far he TV is great.  Everyday I discover something new I can do with it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: alfred kwaw
Reviews.Content: new & good product and moderate price. I love the wifi.... havnt use it 4 long but i love it

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This TV was better than expected. The picture is  fantastic, the apps are good but the sound quality as a nice surprise. The presets are wonderful and truly different from one another to make for a unique and enjoyable experience.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I love this television. Easy setup gorgeous picture. I couldn't be happier with the choice.  I love all of my Samsung products and this is the best one yet.

Reviews.Title: Nicer than expected
Reviews.Author: ALDO JIMENEZ AGUILAR
Reviews.Content: Samsung will never dissapoint me, and this item was not the exception.I would recommend this item.. just because the overall functionallity, but one aditional benefit is how light it is, I could manage to install it in my wall on my own.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Gabe
Reviews.Content: The tv works great and looks even better. Setting up the wifi was a breeze and after researching for the best picture settings for the tv online, I couldn't be happier. Great product from Samsung

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: dre
Reviews.Content: Picture is clear on this bad boy, not problems what's so ever! I love it, easy to navigate thru the smart features! And pandora is great, so is Netflix!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung. It was easy to connect to the web on my DSL. It hesitates on Amazon Prime and You Tube which I contribute to my Verizon DSL connection. Picture is a little odd to me but as it is used in a bedroom, it is adequate. I would probably pick higher resolution (120 over the 60) if I used it alot and knew how it would look.

Reviews.Title: Happy With Purchase
Reviews.Author: Glenda Beals
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in the stated time frame and in excellent condition. The packaging was outstanding. The measurements were right on which was important for it would fit in an enclosed entertainment center. Very happy with the picture quality and to have a smart TV. We are now enjoying Netflix. Would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Moises Jose
