Reviews.Content: This product is all i wished! the sound and image quality is awesome.... and everything run good, also reading my hard drive. Thanks for give me the opportunity

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed.
Reviews.Author: KIM
Reviews.Content: Not what I expected.  I thought that that this was going to be the TV for me because it was wireless.  To my surprise It dont' hold a connection wirelessly.  With all of the reviews I thought I had found the TV that I was going to be happy with.  I decided to keep it but I am still having problems with connecting wirlessly to my router. It seems to be the only thing that is not connecting to my server.  I have called my internet provider and they said it must to the tv cause I am still connected. So if you can hold a connection this is a good tv otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: CTB
Reviews.Content: Overall, I would rate this TV well especially for the price.  Only issues I am having are getting the picture exactly the way I like it...pre-sets are not great, and I am still working through the various settings getting them to where I like it given different levels of lighting in the room.  Sound quality is not great, but I wasn't expecting it to be as that is a common issue with flat screens.  The SMART functions are easy to navigate but the web and email applications are useless without a conventional mouse and keyboard.  Overall, again quite happy given the price as this is not our primary TV in the house, it is only used periodically.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Chaudhery Mustansar Hussain
Reviews.Content: I really like, very good experience to have it. It is very good addition in my bed room with this smart TV

Reviews.Title: Amazingly easy set up, great picture, sound "meh"
Reviews.Author: in TX
Reviews.Content: Finally broke down and bought a TV for my bedroom as I'm going in for major back surgery and will be in bed for the bulk of Q1 2013.... I like it so far, but I'm going to need a sound bar as the sound is not great.The best part is with the wifi included, I immediately connected to our Verizon FiOS TV, Netflix and HuluPlus without anything extra... I thought I'd need a lot of outlets for plugs, and I so far only need the one. Will need one more when the Blue Ray shows up later today...it can also browse the Internet and such...Much easier to set up than I expected.Will update this post as I get more use out of the machine... So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Samsung delivers a great TV
Reviews.Author: ISB617
Reviews.Content: The set up is very easy. The screen colors are vivid and crisp. The remote is very easy to use. Logging on to the internet and using the apps is a piece of cake. Much better than the LG smart TV I purchased a couple of years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Long
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this TV during the black friday sale, and we absolutely love it.The screen is bright and very sharp when watching movies and even when playing my xbox. I was a little worried about the 60hz refresh rate but I haven't noticed any jumping or skipping at all. I love the brightness feature that will automatically adjust the brightness of the screen depending on the amount of light in the room. It ensures you can always see the picture clearly.I also really enjoy the apps for the TV. When we first set it up, it was a snap to get connected to our wireless internet and everything is still running smoothly. I have even found an app for my Droid that will lets me use my phone as a second remote control for the TV when I am connected to our wireless internet. The majority of the time our TV stays on the Netflix app where we watch tv shows and movies. It has no problems with streaming videos.I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for a new TV.

Reviews.Title: A Great HD Media Hub TV
Reviews.Author: Christopher Scott
Reviews.Content: I bought it primarily for the Ethernet input and built in Smart Hub features. I like watching movies and TV off the internet and Media from my network attached server.The LED back lighting is a plus and the picture is great.The firmware for the Apps I use all perform well.I like this TV so well I bought a 2nd one for my bedroom. Con: I noticed is the price fluctuates dramatically month to month.This I assume this is due to automated competitor price tracking by Amazon.I bought the first TV on Amazon in Oct 2012 for $480.00 and the second in November for $398.00 and now in December I notice it is listed on Amazon for $497.00

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Marsmails
Reviews.Content: The sound quality is great and video is fantastic. The easy setup is always good. Being able to stream Netflix without hassle is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: samsungUN32-inch 60 hz smart TV
Reviews.Author: Laxmi Pampati
Reviews.Content: i ordered it because i wanted to use it as  regular TV as well as straming services from one of the online tv channels. it serves me well but itried to connect it to wireless receiver offered by ATT how ever it didnot work well but i enjoy the picture reception with the streaming services

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Bucky B
Reviews.Content: like the picture and smart features.  it is a little bit slow when it goes into smart mode, but its fairly new technology for tv's so I anticipate that will improve over time.  the small frame allows for a big picture without taking up much space.  It hangs on the wall very easy and doesn't weigh too much.  the audio is just ok - i can tell the down-firing speakers give a different hollow sound and it isn't really improved with any of the adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is excellent. Set up was easy. Wifi connection streams videos from Netflix and Amazon Instant smoothely.  The Smart Hub interface looks nice and easy to navigate through.  There are two very small gripes I do have about this tv. It is a bit too glossy, which reflects lighting from the room more than my other tvs. Second, the screen adjustment option is disabled when you're on Netflix. However, those are two minor complaints. Overall, I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Its worth every penny
Reviews.Author: sandhya
Reviews.Content: I love every thing about this by. the sound quality is amazing, the picture is wow and the smart tv is worth every single penny spent on it. Any tech savvy person, go for it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Blessed
Reviews.Content: There maybe a better TV, but not for the price. Great picture, wi-fi, web browser and the apps work as advertised. The 3.5mm jack works well with a good computer speaker system. The only drawback is the remote for this model does not have a keyboard, but I picked up a wireless keyboard with a touch pad mouse that works perfectly for under $30.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product..
Reviews.Author: Amity
Reviews.Content: I like it.. gives me whatever I asked for from my LED.. The only thing I would have liked better would be a better way to browse/search through the apps that it offers. With the remote, its very slow..

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Worth it
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: Bought the 46" size from Amazon and they delivered it right to my front door which was great but, it took three weeks too arrive, so -1 star because of shipping.Other than shipping, the TV is great. You can stream media right from your PC, phone or almost every device that is connected to your home network to the TV, which is cool and there is absolutely no lags in streaming HD video. But, in case of YouTube 1080 video streaming, I see some lag sometimes which I think is because of my wireless router because when I connect the TV to the LAN, it streams seamlessly from you tube. So, connected to the LAN, no issues whatsoever. Works perfect, totally recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J Jones
Reviews.Content: I ordered three sizes of this TV.  All work great and I saved money on the price AND they tv's were delivered to my door.  Didn't have to worry if the TV's would fit in my car.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Rick Michika
Reviews.Content: I had been searching for a smart TV to replace our old Tube for a bit now.  After searching several places I found this on Amazon for a kill deal.  Some of the other reviews said it has poor picture/sound quality, but I don't see it.  It has the option to amplify the sound output which makes it so I can hear it from across the house, and the picture is just as good as my 42" samsung LCD in our livingroom.  This is a great TV!

Reviews.Title: Excellent experience
Reviews.Author: Diana Solano Lopez "diannasolano"
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome, High quality, perfect sound, and just learning how to us the smart apps, but it looks awesome, it runs youtube, facebook, and other popular social networks.Very happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, I would recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Brian J Williams
Reviews.Content: This TV does all that it claims to do. Very simple to set up, I had it up and working very quickly. There was one problem with the color as the picture had a greenish tint to it, however the Amazon help desk quickly came up with the solution.It found my wifi and I was up and running with Netflix and internet browsing in no time.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Michael P  Minn
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV purchased this TV from Best Buy, which price matches Amazon for $397 in November. This is a great TV for the bedroom. As all Samsung TVs it has a great picture and easy to setup. The longest part of the setup was putting up the wall mount I purchased for this LED TV. The Samsung menu is easy to follow for setup to your wireless.The only con is this is not 3D capable, but for $200 less than the 3D version I'm not complaining. I have a 55" Samsung in my living with 3D, so I didn't see the extra expense for the bedroom. Definelty a great product and worth the investment when its on sale.

Reviews.Title: Streaming demon...
Reviews.Author: Marcos E. Taquechel "Toomuchonline"
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a TV for streaming look no further. This is where the "smart TV" name here came to being. It can stream high quality video from a not so great DSL that can barely get up to 3 Megabits and is not even hardwired. Keep in mind that not all streaming devices are made equal each has it's own secret. This Samsung literally turns your trickling internet reception into a river of high quality video and audio. Amazing. I think this is the best of this TV but there's more. Every other feature is also great and there are plenty or reviews detailing that.  The sound is as bad as any of these flat panel TV's do your self a favor and buy a external sound system you can get great ones for as low as $30

Reviews.Title: The Total Package
Reviews.Author: ConnorAZ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on sale a couple days ago. So far I really like it! I get the best picture when I'm using it for Xbox or watching a DVD. I did a lot of homework on which TV was the best for me and this one was the easy choice. The Smart Hub has been very fun and easy to use. If your going to buy this TV I recommend checking out this YouTube consumer review! This video is what sold me on the TV.[...]

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Karen L. Malin "Cougar64"
Reviews.Content: We are really pleased with the quality of this TV.  I just can't figure out how to use some of the many apps available.  I bought the keyboard  later, and can't get it to work with the TV.  Have to get hold of their help line, but their hours are not 24/7.  There is alot to figure out, and the instruction books are pretty generic and don't give alot of specific information.  Still, we really feel good about our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: John Chuchman "poetman"
Reviews.Content: A wondeful HD TV.  The Picture Quality is Outstanding and the Unit sold at a very attractive Price.  I wish the on-screen keyboard cursor were easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV = smart purchase
Reviews.Author: Jeff D
Reviews.Content: Love this new one....Samsung got it right again, providing a high quality smart Tv at an extremely fair price.  Excellent!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Herbert D. Richards
Reviews.Content: Once again Samsung does it right. I really enjoy my smart tv. I have had no problems at all with my reception.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: William L. Sexauer
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a 26-inch GE LED HDTV, with the thinner frames on the newer models I found I could fit a larger screen into our existing cabinet. It was a tight squeeze and I had to remove the cabinet doors, but that's OK, we never closed them anyway. The picture is great and the sound is OK so we're quite happy with it. Setup was a snap and programming our existing remotes to operate it was easy. It was also easy to connect it to our wireless network, that took maybe two minutes.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I must say I love this tv. It looks nice off and even better on. The picture looks amazing and I have no complaints at all. I have it wall mounted and cannot honestly comment on glare reduction from the sun but my room light doesn't effect the image at all. I use the tv for cable (hd), xbox (again hd) and a dvd player and everything works flawlessly.I have had good success connecting my laptop vaio through hdmi.This is a high class TV for sure.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Andrew B
Reviews.Content: I jumped the Gun with my older 22" Samsung LCD tv. Got it for college, but it was right when LCD was becoming big...Now I LOVE Samsung, and wanted to remain loyal, but they are expensive. But this TV sounded amazing. 32", LED, 1080p... THEN when I read about it, it's also a SmartTV!?? I had to have it!It Does Not Disappoint! Amazing Picture, Slim, Many options. Not To Mention that the base is even angled a little, to fix most glares. And the online streaming aspect of the SmartTV stuff is great. HBO GO, NetFlix. All Work flawlessly on my FiOS WiFi. Speaking of FiOS, I can even watch Live TV via WiFi!!!Overall, GREAT Purchase. So happy.

Reviews.Title: Really Like this TV
Reviews.Author: A. E. Golder "Tech Gadget Freak"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these during the Black Friday Sales, one for my bedroom and one to be mounted above the fireplace in my living room. Both were set up with ease, connected to my wireless network with no issues and the picture quality is very good,colors are vibrant, black levels excellent and the sound quality IMO is pretty good considering the TV is only 3.7" thick.TV is also very energy efficient. I did disable the ECO sensor as it dims the display unnecessarily.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: R. Neer
Reviews.Content: Great apps, easy to set up, picture is fantastic. I'd caution you away from the room light sensor though, it is a bit quirky and dims the picture unnecessarily at times.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 5300
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Lagana
Reviews.Content: Set up easy. Picture and web connection great. Would certainly recommend consideration if this is this is the size TV one wants  Would be an even better value if remote had keyboard. If it did stars would be 5.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Sincera
Reviews.Content: I waited exactly for 3 weeks for this particular tv to arrive. This was back in July, no need to say this set was pretty pricey. A couple months later the cost of this set has reduced by a couple hundred bucks. I am not concerned by this in the least as i have enjoyed my tv set thoroughly during this period of time. This tv is practically a computer and perform most of the entertainment functions flawlessly.CONSAudio is a bit low; could have included better speakersRemote should have came with wireless and designed more like a keyboardMute function should work at all times. As it stands it does not work when your switching between pictures or folders or working in the menu.

Reviews.Title: it's a dang good little model
Reviews.Author: nobody
Reviews.Content: it sort of does what its supposed to do, except it's processor is apparently super weak.  it freezes up often when you ask it to do something extraordinary like search something for the third time.  it's a tv.  not a pc.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Rupak
Reviews.Content: Using it for a month or so. Me and my family are happy with the great features it has. Very easy to use, my kid is very fluent with it. I recommend this product very much.

Reviews.Title: Good second set TV
Reviews.Author: Christophe Maes
Reviews.Content: If you don't want a second AT&T; setup box and all you need is Netflix in the playroom with some limited internet functionality look no further.The main reason for me to buy this i didnt want to install cables and hastle with the cable company to get a second box installed.  It streams Netlfix wirelessly perfectly and with the kid it is a delight to have it in the playroom.Image quality is good and everything lives up to my expectation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !
Reviews.Author: Glynn L. Mathis
Reviews.Content: Exactly as promised!  Great value, and excellent picture and sound - easy to operate. Very satisfied! Would buy another one if I could afford it

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Jack P Leider
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 46" LED, Smart TV has met all of our expectations for quality and value.  A comparison of available features and an in-store comparison of picture quality made it the best choice for us.  The thin profile provides a good, furniture-type look.  Setup was easy and when combined with a cable upgrade to HDTV, we have a great arrangement that we enjoy watching.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jody
Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV. I have never seen a better viewing TV in my life. Works great with my NETFLIX account. I shipped very fast, with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, easy set up, good value
Reviews.Author: Zappa Fan
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen TV (yes, It's about time) and glad I took the time I did to purchase the SAMSUNG.  All around, a great value.  The wi-fi ready feature was a breeze to use, and within ten minutes of getting the TV on it's stand, we were connected.  it could not have been easier.  Picture quality is very good.  Sound is probably the least best feature on the TV, but we're running it through our Harmon Kardon receiver and it's fine.  Clearly, one should an use auxillary sound system like home theatre or sound bar, but otherwise, the TV is really, really nice.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!
Reviews.Author: Ro
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. Good image quality and easy to use. Great sound and good features.Remote control is not so friendly... but the rest is great!

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: Viren
Reviews.Content: Was shipped in time. Customer service was awesome. Will definitely get more electronics from Abt.com and highly recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart 32-inch led tv.
Reviews.Author: rb
Reviews.Content: this is the perfect size tv for a bedroom.picture is clear and sharp with a respectable sound from the stock tv speakers.not quite a concert but more than acceptable.colors are bright and blacks are good.this was a good middle priced tv that so far has worked very well.i have not tried to do anything with the smart part of the set as of now.if i do i'll keep you informed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I love this tv! The wifi feature is the best thing about it. I stream Netflix and other shows directly from my dorm room and it rarely lags. I had originally bought a 43 inch vizio ultra thin tv from Costco but returned it when I came across this tv. $50 more for a smart tv and the ability to surf the web? Worth it! Also, abt electronics matched a lower price and shipped it sooner than expected when I found this a lower price. Koodos to abt electronics.

Reviews.Title: Very good smart TV
Reviews.Author: Madsen
Reviews.Content: Very good  and affordable smart TV. Very Good pictures. Sound is ok. The refreshing rate is not a problem because of the screen size. I would recommand it to other costumers.

Reviews.Title: Smart HDTV in a great form factor at 32"
Reviews.Author: David Martin
Reviews.Content: I am using my Samsung UN32EH5300F as an HDTV & security camera monitor in my home office. The picture of this HDTV is outstanding and the sound from the small speakers is clear unlike most small HDTVs in this size. Given the light weight of this HDTV, I have mounted it on a Humanscale M8 monitor arm with the optional Humanscale 200X200 vesa adaptor plate. It makes for a very versatile installation that can be easily repositioned for other viewing angles.The standard base seems to be poorly designed and could be broken if proper care is not exercised during both installation and every day use.I input analog video from my home security camera system DVR into the composite video input port and set the picture mode to 'movie' and the picture is sharp and clear. My cameras are high resolution (540 lines) Bosch cameras with mechanical IR filters and the displayed imagery both day and night is perfect.I just started using the Smart Apps and the Netflix streaming is very, very good.HDMI input (Dec 2012): connected a new Lenovo desktop PC via the HDMI port. Functionality is exceptional, crisp clear text and smooth YouTube video. As I use this HDTV on a desktop, I haven't experienced any issues with the speakers that may others may experience in a large, open room.Future addition:  I may also add the optional Samsung Skype camera if interest warrants from other family members.I wish this Samsung model had PiP (Picture in Picture) mode where I could watch HDTV with a small live video box for the security camera video or vice-versa. Also, it would be great if one could switch between the active video inputs with a one step action as opposed to using the menus.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Much What We Were Looking For
Reviews.Author: Jeb S Smythe
Reviews.Content: We wanted an HDTV to fit in our master bedroom entertainment center that was high quality and reasonably affordable.  Based on information obtained from Amazon and previous reviews, we purchased this one.  Setup was easy, everything was fairly intuitive, and for some reason I really like the remote.  I only gave it 4 stars due to picture quality - which really is subjective.  Personally, I prefer the picture quality of my other two Toshiba HDTVs; the Samsung is just 'different' than those, much like how people interpret art differently.  My guess is many people would probably prefer the Samsung picture quality over the Toshibas.  It's just a matter of personal preference.

Reviews.Title: Works great, picture
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, easy to use.  I have only had it a couple of days and I love it.  It replaced a vizio TV.

Reviews.Title: 32 samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: dc23
Reviews.Content: its a very quality product. picture is perfect and love the wi fi capabilities. i have a vizio and omg it was so much worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great 'smart' TV
Reviews.Author: Mr
Reviews.Content: I really love this TV. This is my fourth flat screen TV. I did a lot of homework before picking this TV.The sound and picture quality is excellent, I'm using IPTV/U-verse.Setting up the Network/WiFi is also very easy. I used a wireless mouse, its a lot faster then the remote. Have only had it for 3 weeks now but I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: siberian
Reviews.Content: Picture quality and wi-fi reception are great. Samsung allshare does not work unless firewall is open but most wi-fi activities work fine without it. A few good apps but lots of junk too. Smallest wi-fi smart TV and does well. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: This TV does everything right.Great picture,Great internet features,good sound for the amount of space for the speaker.When my big screen dies it will be replaced with a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jerry D Burchett
Reviews.Content: TV has great color, good sound and I really like the narrow border around the screen.  It has features that I will probably never use, who knows.  Coupled with Direct TV it can't get much better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Television
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: TV was very easy to setup ,Took less than 30 minutes to find all stations and my wireless network Color is great for this price TV.Controls simple to use.Perfect for small bedroom Cannot beat Amazon prices and free shipping. This TV is a buy.

Reviews.Title: Was great at 1st
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv in March of 2012. It was so cool at first for all its features and the fact that the picture looked good from any angle.  But, for at least the past year, I've been having wireless network problems that have been getting progressively worse.  Now, it won't connect at all and I know it's not the internet because I can use the Wi-Fi on my cell phone just fine. I've kept up to date on all Samsung's updates too to no avail. Very frustrating and defeats the purpose of having a smart tv

Reviews.Title: Problems within a week
Reviews.Author: HAROLD L AHLBERG
Reviews.Content: We used this TV for almost a week and it had a blue vertical line about 8 inches from the right edge.  It doesn't matter what input we use, but the blue line isn't showing up in the diagnostic image.  Samsung's response was to go through all the same steps I've already gone through to try to diagnose the problem.

Reviews.Title: Don not buy any of Samsung smart tv
Reviews.Author: yilmaz
Reviews.Content: I bougt Samsung Smart tv to surf over internet browser through TVI was frustrated because doesn't support flash player and internet browser always crashing and very slowwireless internet connection always dropping UN46eh5300I can not watch any online movie from the browsersmarthub interface not widely distributed not too much appI advised to my friends to buy lg smart TV and they are happyremote control not useful and I spend money and I bought extra keyboard for the tv

Reviews.Title: Not a mature product
Reviews.Author: Zhengfang Zhu
Reviews.Content: I chose this product because I saw a lot positive reviews and also I trust Samsung brand name. However, this Smart TV turns out to be a bad product. I used the Browser to watch YouTube video the first night, it crashed more than 5 times in just 2 hours, the error message was "The Browser session ended due to the lack of memory or other unknown reason, do you want to restore the session or go to home page". The browser runs extremely slow. It also had problem to show some webpages with heavy Javascripts. The software seems to be buggy. Not recommended to purchase this immature product.

Reviews.Title: Apps, Internet Browser and Typing on Remote Control Suck
Reviews.Author: Rajesh
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item and am going to return it back within 2 days. Hatest thing for me about this TV is YouTube doesn't open and displays nothing. I tried to resolve the issue through online chat and direct call both to 30 Days Free Tech Support and Samsung support agents. All of them gave very useless link and went away. The customer support is the worst ever I saw while purchasing electronics.The second thing is if you want to see any Video or some news through internet browser it never works well. This is the worst TV I have ever bought.Just don't buy it. Rather, I would like to suggest to buy regular LED/LCD/Plasma TV and make them smart by connecting a cheap plug (Less than $100) :-)

Reviews.Title: No HBO Go, Poor Customer Service
Reviews.Author: clevername
Reviews.Content: The TV on its own merits is a beautiful TV.  Nice bright and clear picture and a small frame which doesn't distract from the screen..  My biggest complaint so far is that this model isn't even listed on the Samsung support site or the Samsung app site: [...].  When I wrote customer support to ask why it's not listed, and to see if HBO Go was compatible, they simply wrote back stating that the TV model was too new for them to offer any sort of support.So it seems HBO Go will not be available for this TV, or the TV is 'too new' and just hasn't been enabled yet.  Here's hoping it's the latter.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed. Misleading Information regarding YouTube App
Reviews.Author: Bharath
Reviews.Content: I got smart TV specifically so I can use Netflix and Youtube App in the TV. And I Confirmed that I can do this by reading this line in the description of this TV "Access all your apps and download new ones such as Netflix, Facebook, YouTube, Hulu Plus, and Twitter".When I got the TV I only saw NetFlix and not Youtube. I found 'Link to Youtube' which is a cheap imitation of a app by creating a shortcut to the browser with youtube link. And to make things worse I cant cast videos from my mobile to TV.When I checked with Samsung customer care this is what they said,"The TV's EH5300/FH6200 model produced after Jan. 2014, they could see 'LinkToYoutube' instead of 'Youtube' in Recommended Area. Youtube team in Google does not want to apply IP Closed Caption to Youtube app in X10 Plus chip set model."I'm completely disappointed with this now because I only wanted this TV for watching Web content and went for smart TV instead of TV+ChromeCast. This may have other good features, but I'm disappointed that it doesn't deliver what it promised in the product description.

Reviews.Title: Worst TV I have ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Overly complicated set-up system with a useless manual and a remote that barely works.  The remote only works within a foot of the tv sensor and when you press your desired button 3+ times.  The original default color is very orangey.  Impossible to get decent skin tones and  the focus is blurry. Netlflix works great on every other set in my house, but this one chooses to play Netflix only periodically, and only after it makes me reinstall it, again and again and again.  Then it is hit or miss if it can find Netflix at all.  Need to access Netflix through my ancient play station to get a good connection.  Don't think I will ever buy another Samsung product.  About to contact Amazon to see if I can send this LEMON back.

Reviews.Title: We can not say it is a smart TV
Reviews.Author: Ujjwal
Reviews.Content: 1.The browser is very poor we cannot play anything from internet.2. As we know the difference between smart TV and LED TV is around 100$ I suggest go for LED TV and you can buy any streaming devices (Chromecast, apple TV, ROKU etc) to make your LED TV to SMART TV.3. There is no doubt on Clarity, quality of picture is good.4. The remote is not very user friendly.5. For playing any thing from you adndroid OS you need to buy one more samsung devices like all share play which doesnt make any sense better we can go with chromecast or other streaming devices they all these apps like netflix,dish tv, HBO.

Reviews.Title: I just don't get it...
Reviews.Author: Leo Huber
Reviews.Content: Well i just don't get it..I have got to stop buying tv's based on reviews. I did the same with an LG 47LM7600 and wasn't really happy (the screen is VERY reflective). But I'm an Amazon junky and can't stand the service at Best Buy. For the price and reviews I got a little trigger happy and bought two of these at one time. Mistake. I don't see how people can think the picture quality is good, let alone great. Fact- the picture out the box sucks. Picture image just seems mushy. I thought I had a bad set so opened the other one and the same thing. I've tried all the different settings that others have posted (thank you btw!) but just can't get lines crisp or the colours to look natural. Different strokes for different folks, this tv isn't for me. I'm putting back my older Toshiba LCD. One is going in a rental and the other will make a nice xmas present. Lesson finally learned, I'll drag myself down to a BB, check them out and still buy Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, especially for the money
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: Great for games, movies, as a monitor, TV, etc. I especially love the Smart Hub and how I can load hundreds of movies onto an HDD, plug it into the USB port, and have access to all of them right there through the TV's media player.Great stuff. Would recommend to anyone. I hate, hate seeing people walking away with Emerson garbage TV's when this affordable and quality Samsung is available.

Reviews.Title: Once you get it working, it's great!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: I originally rated this TV 2 stars because, even though the picture quality is good, the "smart" part of the TV would not work. After speaking to several Samsung customer service reps and having them fix it remotely 3 times, it now seems to be functioning without problems.From the mouth of 2 different Samsung people, they just updated their servers recently and thousands of people have been having issues with their TVs connecting to the server. The reps can fix it for you, remotely (via updating your software through their system or something) and it may be a problem for the next couple of weeks. However, they have assured me that in 2 or 3 weeks I should not have any problems connecting to the server and that is when they expect everything to be fully functional again.So if you don't mind that you may have connectivity issues, I say go for it. And if you do mind, but really want this model, then just wait 3 weeks or so and I guess you won't have any problems.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ORIGINAL REVIEW:This whole purchase was an ordeal. First they sent me a tv that had a 12 inch crack on the screen. The box was in perfect condition, so someone had just packaged it severely damaged. Amazon was good about replacing it though, and I got a second tv 2 days later.Setting up the TV:Upon turning it on and setting the date, time, etc. I was prompted to install an update from the Samsung server. I accepted and it updated. All looked good until I tried to go to one of the Smart Hub apps preinstalled on the TV. NONE of them worked. It was essentially saying the TV was not connected to the internet, but when I checked the internet settings on the TV,  they all confirmed that I was indeed connected to the internet.I called the Samsung customer support who was on the phone with me for an HOUR AND A HALF also trying to figure out the problem. She said that even though the TV tells you to update as soon as you turn it on, if you do it, it messes everything up, so you're supposed to ignore it. How we're supposed to know that I have no idea. She took remote access of the TV (which was pretty cool) and tried a bunch of different things, but ultimately ended up installing an Albanian update and then restarting with a United States update to get a clean slate. Finally it worked.I watched Netflix for about half an hour before I went to bed and was satisfied. Until today when I woke up and tried to access it again and received an error message "Network not connected (MODEL_ERROR_BIND). After several attempts at resetting both the router and the TV, I got the same error message and nothing on the Smart Hub would open. I could have still used the TV function if I had cable, but I don't. The only reason I got this TV was to use Netflix, Amazon instant video, and such.I searched the Internet and discovered that this particular error message means that the Samsung servers are currently down. And the Smart Hub will only work when the Samsung servers are fully operational. There is nothing you can do to fix it. You just have to sit and wait patiently for them to fix the servers. And by the looks of things, it could take several days.So if you want to be able to use your Smart TV features any time you want, don't buy this TV. According to other reports, this is at least the 2nd or 3rd time this year that the servers have been down. It's completely unreliable. Now since I don't have cable, I have a TV that can play DVDs from my DVD player and that's about it. It's essentially useless. If you want a Smart TV, I would recommend a different company.

Reviews.Title: solid samsung again
Reviews.Author: penlight
Reviews.Content: I own many samsung monitors and TVs. they have been solid for 5+ years. I have yet to have one break of the 8+ ones I own. They seem to last forever.This one is my newest.- Super light weight- sharp picture and good brightness- very low power usage- smart TV function is very cool (first time trying this)... it can connect to DLNA server (like the free PS3 media server on my computer). It has apps for youtube, hulu, netflix, amazon instant video which work well. note though onscreen keyboard is a pain as you enter one letter at a time. most apps have instant fill so they can guess what you are typing. still somewhat a pain. the web browser has a cursor type mouse controlled with the directional pad. this is even worse for text entry. I find it almost too painful to use. there is a separately sold keyboard that connects with only the browser I hear. browser does have flash though for youtube type video playback.- wifi is decent, but better on my laptop. I recommend using a wired connection if you can, esp for the streaming services.this is perfect as a bedroom or dorm TV.

Reviews.Title: I love smart TV's but this one falls short, here's why:
Reviews.Author: Beth Wright "ZenAmberBliss"
Reviews.Content: I have had a smart TV since they began making them almost a decade ago. I have two Sonia Bravia smart tv's. I had purchased  32' in then loved it so much that I bought a second smaller one for my kitchen. They have been solid and dependable but only 720 resolution. I have been waiting and waiting for Sony to release a new LED version but they haven't or at least they are no-longer priced such that a public health nurse, like me,  can afford. So when this great-priced smart TV was released by Samsung was released, I ran to the store to purchase it.I am mostly disappointed with this Samsung Smart TV.Cons:1. Home-screen icons are set in stone. There is NO customizing and the screen is cluttered with a bunch of icons I never use and would prefer to be able to delete. The huge ones in the middle cannot be changed either.  This matters greatly if you, like me use your smart tv to watch Netflix & Amazon and Youtube shows and don't use cable television.2. It keeps wanting to update almost every time I logon. this would be fine except the tv cannot be used in any manner while it updates.  This matters greatly if you only plan on catching a show in  free time that is not endless. So I started telling it NO to updates and think it should be able to update and at least stream Pandora.. but nope - forget about it.3. Programs / Some bloatware programs /icons cannot be uninstalled or can be (acts like its happening) then when you allow the TV to update it reinstalls the removed programs and each of its respective updates !! really ARRRGH!!!I hopes this helps someone else.visit me at Blissful Bits For a Better LifeMuch love <3,meps,I tried to return it but HHgregg has a very short return window and I missed it by a couple days.  :(

Reviews.Title: Turns off and on by itself - FIXED!
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: I can't watch tv only after 4 months because it is possessed and turns on and off by itself. replace it.  THE TV CAME WITH A WARRANTY STILL FROM THE MANUFACTURER AND THEY CAME AND FIXED IT! GREAT TV!

Reviews.Title: does not have youtube app
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: this tv does not have youtube app but u can watch youtube with web browser just make sure before you order.

Reviews.Title: all in one
Reviews.Author: Tina Kissack
Reviews.Content: it was an easy set up. Great tv for the price. I have not had time to spend much time with it yet. Too soon to say!

Reviews.Title: Smart but not that smart.
Reviews.Author: JustTrustMe
Reviews.Content: The picture is brilliant and does well with the auto brightness.  I just wish getting around in smarthub and settings was a little easier.  Don't get me wrong, all TV's are cursed with this so it's not a direct comparison with a better model it's just I'm impatient waiting for the integration of artificial intelligence.  Looking for a small semismart TV?  Get this one at it's price.

Reviews.Title: Memory issue
Reviews.Author: Vikram Karambelkar
Reviews.Content: The TV shuts down automatically because of the memory issue so you need reboot it. Can this not be fixed by Samsung?

Reviews.Title: check setting of tv before purchasing
Reviews.Author: Marisol Cobos
Reviews.Content: before I purchased I read the reviews and many posted the brightness, contrast, and etc for picture quality and as soon as I got it I set it up and I love the picture quality

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Suck it Vizio! I'm so glad I returned the Vizio 48 inch LED TV for this Samsung. It's night and day better! The picture is clear, the smart TV functions are amazing... even connects to my Plex receiver, Amazon Prime, and my Fios TV without the need of a set top box or even a cable connection. Fios plays over the internet to the Fios TV app and I can get all my channels, DVR shows, etc.I am a fan of Samsung!

Reviews.Title: i'd buy again
Reviews.Author: martha
Reviews.Content: We were the last family in America to go HDTV.  This is a great TV and has a wonderful screen.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality, easy to set up, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Linda W
Reviews.Content: After doing several months of research and reading countless user reviews I decided on this TV and am happy I did.  This smart TV has worked perfectly right out of the box.  Set up was seamless. I turned it on and it prompted me all the way through set up.  It informed me updates were available so I allowed them to install as part of the set up process.  I did not need to adjust any settings. The picture quality, the color, the saturation, everything was perfect.  Connection to my WiFi was simple and streaming from NetFlix was easy and worked well.  Internet access in general is also simple.  The menus are user friendly making it easy to navigate.  The remote control layout/labeling is logical and therefore adds to the appeal of this entire package.  To summarize, this smart TV is so smart that you can sit back and let it figure everything out for you. Simplicity and quality combine to make a great choice. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32inch
Reviews.Author: stevan m garcia
Reviews.Content: Fantastic television. Would highly recommend  this Samsung to anyone. I put it in the bedroom because it is a 32inch

Reviews.Title: Not as good
Reviews.Author: Peter Pich
Reviews.Content: The color is off, no vivid color and dull. This Samsung TV does not live up to its name. I wish I'd purchased other style.

Reviews.Title: “Last browser session ended due to lack of memory or another unkown reason ”
Reviews.Author: judson waldum
Reviews.Content: I purchased a samsung 5300 ledtv. It won’t play. And I can’t watch youtube videos because it doesn’t have flash player. Why would Samsung make such a useless piece of crap TV.. Why would Samsung piss off millions of customers selling critically faulty software/hardware.“Last browser session ended due to lack of memory or another unkown reason ” before my tv crashes. WTF I can’t access the internet and Samsung customer service won’t refund my money.Samsung stole my money and ms-represented its self as a functional internet accessible hdtv product but I can’t access the internet.Do not buy Samsung  .. BE SURE IT HAS FLASH PLAYER THAT CAN FULL ACCESS THE INTERNET. Samsung customer tech said they don't have such a tv. Other HDTV do so research them for your choice. I regret buying this useless tv.

Reviews.Title: Not that smart and no more You Tube
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Not that smart....and limited. First off... no more YouTube on any model after Jan.2014.  According to Samsung it has to do with the lack of CC (closed captions) .  FCC rule.  If you get one that is before 2014 you will get you tube.  It does not exist in the app store of Samsung.  They have an "app" which is a link to you tube, but this is only a link to it via the built in slowwwwwwwwww browser. Good luck. It crashes on HD videos via you tube. Besides, navigation with a remote is a joke. You need to get a mouse and keyboard. The browser is a joke. Remember dial up with a slow computer?  Welcome back.  I have used Amazon app and it is fine.  Pandora is fine. It really does not do much. Less than the tiny Roku which now has You Tube.  You Tube is really great. Lots of helpful information put out by people who know things.  How to fix your dryer...reupholster a couch, bake, .  Three stars is for the quality of picture and price (it would have gotten one had it not been good).  I would rather just have a good picture and get a roku.  Thought it would be good not to have but one device other than the DVD/Blu- ray and sound system.  I don't use Netflix so I cannot comment but have read many times in reviews that there are issues with the app.  Did not purchase this here but at Costco. 2yr warranty for the same money and a 90 day return window.  I will keep this 90 day option on the front burner for sure.

Reviews.Title: No youtube.
Reviews.Author: Anand Narine
Reviews.Content: There is no youtube app available anymore from samsung for this tv. (March 2014). Tried searching the samsung apps on the tv for the youtube app but it is not there anymore for download.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Evelia Martinez
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this smart tv it has just what i need. just right for my room. love the apps

Reviews.Title: This TV is really good!
Reviews.Author: JIN YI KIM
Reviews.Content: Bright and clear screen.I'm a Korean so I quite familiar Samsung.You can searching internet using this TV!I gonna love this TV.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment Samsung
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Monteith "Gary"
Reviews.Content: Smart tv is not so smart.  Too many things to do to use the features.  If I could have returned it I would have but thru box away.Sound quality only fair.  The wall behind the TV hears it good.  Put speakers on front or sides of TV, preferably on front.  Picture quality is no better than much cheaper competitors.  Come on Samsung.  Can I return it in another box?  Or can you send me a box.  I know I will have to pay shipping or does my prime account pay for it.  (under your free shipping deal)

Reviews.Title: LG has better apps
Reviews.Author: H M
Reviews.Content: apps aren't great and all share is buggy and has many device limitations.  The lG smart tv I have does a better job of integrating video sharing across devices and is overall a better value.  only reason I bought samsung was to limit purchase of Products made in China.

Reviews.Title: Comedy of errors....SAMSUNG ----FAIL ON THIS MODEL---
Reviews.Author: amazinghulk "amazinghulk"
Reviews.Content: Rated 5 so more people will read , actually about a 1 or 2.Comedy of errors....Smart part not smart enough to stream video, always get error message ,and a prompt to reload website..Extra slow web response..good connection , bad software or hardwaregood picture , but have ordered a "Roku" to do the smart work..SAMSUNG ----FAIL ON THIS MODEL----

Reviews.Title: GREAT BEDROOM TV FOR NETFLIX USERS!
Reviews.Author: blake roundy
Reviews.Content: me and my wife picked this TV up at best buy because they match amazon prices. it was pretty easy to setup and it walked you through the steps ON SCREEN which was nice. i dont like to read instructions. it has you put in your wifi password and everything. its nice to have thesmart tv button on the remote so from bed, you can turn it on, select the smart tv function, and go to your netflix or other app and open it up. the sound on the tv seems to fill the room quite loudly. i was surprised at how clearly and loud it could get. i dont like the toggle under the tv. this TV does not have regular buttons on the side of the tv like other tvs have. its a toggle underneith.

Reviews.Title: Surprise - no YouTube apps in 2014 sets!
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: The set is okay in most regards, but I had bought it specifically for use with video streaming and not for TV/cable. Onec it arrived and was setting it up, I noticed that I did not have a YouTube app and instead only a 'Link To YouTube' app. After some time online with TechSupport, I learnt that YouTube is no longer supported on older chipset as there is a new rule to support Closed Capltioning on all TVs made from 2014 onwards and Google chose to support this only on newer chipsets on Samsung.. so older generation TVs will have to do with YouTube in Web Browser. Netflix app works by the way.

Reviews.Title: Good TV - Bad Connectivity and Software
Reviews.Author: Alvin C. Allen
Reviews.Content: The connectivity to this TV is quite poor. You need special Samsung HDMI cables with special oversized heads. The HDMI connection with only work with Samsung DVD players, Samsung computers, etc. and will not work for devices using the HDMI cable everyone else in the industry uses. The software is a joke. You have to use the remote to peck out each word and command like you do on say NetFlex or Comcast. On those interfaces of course you are only typing titles and then pressing enter, but when you try to do this with software it becomes so slow that you just give up. Plus the software is really cheap and does not have any apps anyone would ever really use.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV, Black
Reviews.Author: gary feldmann
Reviews.Content: First tv made whining noise between channels and when i turned it off ,recieved 2nd tv does the same thing. I have a 32 inch same brand ,no noise works good. I give up,will see how long it works.

Reviews.Title: not worth the materials it's made from.
Reviews.Author: Samantha contos
Reviews.Content: worst piece of s*** ever to come out of South Korea. Seriously. Sony, out of the box connects to everything sony, this piece of s*** wont connect to anything unless you give someone money in some way for the services.....definitely not a "smart tv"

Reviews.Title: Very Nice But Not Perfect HD TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen Blythe "henfan"
Reviews.Content: This is our first HDTV. After watching HDTV at some friends' and relatives' houses, we were never really that gung-ho about picture quality on their HD-TVs, so we'd held out for a long time. However, our cable company kept moving more analog channels to digital only, so we eventually decided we needed one (our cable company charges an unacceptable $25/mo/tv for converter boxes). We went with this TV because it was reasonably priced and had reasonable features for our desires (we're really not that interested in 3D, for example).When I connected this TV and tuned in an HD signal, I was stunned at the high quality of the picture. It blows away everything we have seen before in other households.  We were totally STUNNED by the high quality of the picture!We had no problems connecting to our Netflix and Amazon Prime accounts through the Samsung "SmartCenter" apps (it's great not to need the extra Roku remote in our living room anymore!), and a Chromecast device (which we also splurged on) also works just fine. Many other apps are available through the SmartCenter, and if they work as well as Netflix and Amazon Prime, then we'll continue to enjoy the SmartCenter.So why only 4 stars?  1) The Samsung SmartCenter interface is a bit buggy. Occasionally, an app won't start up the first time (complete with error code), but has always started up the second time. The interface sometimes won't show anything but one icon (usually the PIP tv signal) ... also fixable through pretending to select something (that you can't see) and then cancelling your selection. On a TV, these are just annoyances that you can get past (it's not a car or a computer, after all). Especially at the price point of this TV.  2) The "virtual" keyboard on the SmartCenter apps is laid out QWERTY style. Probably good with an attached keyboard, but all we have is the remote. While I can type quickly on a QWERTY keyboard, using the remote's resulting "hunt and peck" style is actually a bit convoluted ... perhaps I'll get accustomed to it, but it would be nice to find a way to go to an alphabetized layout (I searched for this, but could not find it).  3) The remote itself ... ugh. All of our family members find the layout unintuitive and often hit buttons we don't intend to press. Again, perhaps something we'll adjust to, but I rather suspect there was very little user interface testing on this thing.  4) The TV shipped with a minimal manual (basically just a "getting started" manual). Since a (related?) manual  is available on-line through the Samsung website, this is not a deal breaker, but it is annoying. Yes, there's "interactive" help available on the TV itself as you navigate to certain points ... but you first have to navigate to those points, which can be a challenge (especially when you are trying to figure something out in the first place). As a result of the lack of printed documentation, I'm still not sure of the (lacking?) capabilities of the TV.  Would I buy this again? Yes. But if you're someone who wants a completely clean, bug free, easy to use UI ... you might want to shell out a little more cash and look elsewhere. For us, it's a TV with fantastic picture quality and other bonuses - essentially more than we expected.

Reviews.Title: More than we bargained for!
Reviews.Author: JMN "Bargain-seeker"
Reviews.Content: Had planned to purchase this TV and figured the price might go down a little during black friday week.  Sure enough, it did, so we finally purchased.  I had high expectations given the excellent reviews and so far it is living up to those.  Great picture quality, Smart TV controls work flawlessly, install & setup was a breeze, mounted easily to the wall, sound is more-than-sufficient for me, etc.  A couple years ago we had moved to a more rural area.  We do not purchase cable TV services, but our antenna would not pick up channels here as it did closer to "town."  We chalked it up to living further out and had planned to purchase additional/stronger/more appropriate equipment to deal with that problem at a later time but just hadn't gotten around to it.  When I set this up I plugged in the coax cable that ran to our antenna just so it wasn't dangling there.  Did a channel scan and couldn't believe my eyes when some channels popped up and came in clearly.  After my husband played around with our antenna, we have been able to get 20+ channels on this thing, whereas we had tried all sorts of things on our other TVs, to no avail (mind you they had worked closer while in town so we knew they were functional.)  This was a a major added bonus to me; so happy we purchased this one!

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Patricia Elaine Addison
Reviews.Content: This is a smart TV with built in apps.  Some features on the remote are no longer offered.  The remote is not user friendly for the TV and difficult to use.  The TV connected seamlessly to my wireless network with no issues however the memory and applications are very very slow, to use.  Reading the news, a simple web task, takes too long and most other built in apps have the same drag and lag.  I have not streamed any movies yet but fear that will be a problem as well.  Tested my wireless network for speed just in case that was the problem...NOT.  The picture quality is just okay, not great, even though many settings are offered to adjust the picture and the sound.  I am disappointed in the product.  I bought a less expensive RCA TV at the same time with a built in DVD player and oh my goodness, the difference is amazing!  Since I have that comparison, I definitely cannot recommend the Samsung Smart TV.  Sorry Samsung...love your products, but this one is a miss.

Reviews.Title: Great for Teens
Reviews.Author: James Barker
Reviews.Content: Boougt this for teenager, loved it. Easy to remove from room if he's in trouble. Samsung stellar products accross the board.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, frustrating software
Reviews.Author: Bruce C
Reviews.Content: As other people have said, the TV is great. What isn't great -- quite frustrating, in fact -- is the software. It keeps signing out of Netflix, requiring logging in almost every time I use the app. That would be annoying with a full keyboard; it's a part-time job with a simple remote control. Samsung says the solution is to keep checking to see if the TV's software can be updated (buried in a menu tree) and updating it if so -- not that they're working diligently on fixing the problem in the first *($&#

Reviews.Title: Decent for sale price
Reviews.Author: B. Van Vliet
Reviews.Content: Decent screen for sale price of $400. 'Smart' TV is very slow and clunky to navigate. Satisfied but not wowed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch smart TV
Reviews.Author: Ginny
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for myself in June 2013 without even knowing what a smart TV was. As electronics go, it is fairly simple to master, and the picture quality is fabulous. With my Amazon Prime membership, I was able to watch streaming video of three seasons of Downton Abbey (before season four begins in January 2014) which is not available on Netflix. I liked this TV so much I bought the same model for my mother for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great features!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Hild
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mom for her birthday.  We've had other means for her to be able to watch Netflix, etc., on her TV, but she was unable to get the others to work.  This TV is great.  Once we got it set up, which was very easy, she's been thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Performance
Reviews.Author: AArun
Reviews.Content: Delivered quickly and intact.Very easy to set up. Did it in 30mins. Easily detects wifi. downloads all the apps automatically.Only problem with the television is that the sound is very low. Dont have a home theatre yet, hence we face that problem.And the channel can only be changed through the Cox remote and so now we have to handle 2 remotes ...one for the volume and smart hub etc and one for channels :( And am sure there is a solution to this one. Cos my earlier tv was working on only the Cox remote. If anyone knows the solution please reply to this comment.All in all I love this TV.

Reviews.Title: damaged television
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am so upset I may make mistakes but my television screen is damaged, there are lines across the screen so that I cannot see any thing clearly and then it went blank. I love shopping at Amazon but I am disappointed with this.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: newtobluray
Reviews.Content: easy set up - nice picture - this is our third one of this same TV (although in 3 different sizes).All are good.

Reviews.Title: Best tv EVER!
Reviews.Author: Swirly
Reviews.Content: Amazing quality, sound is great, and the smart hub works very well! I can watch Netflix or Hulu Plus without a problem. Coolest tv ever!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Sarah J. Stinson "sidesteppr"
Reviews.Content: We love it! We have a build in cabinet that the TV had to fit into.  All other models I could only get a 24" to fit, but because the Samsung is low profile I got their 32" and it just fits and is better viewing for our family room!  The picture and sound are good quality,

Reviews.Title: Awsome product!
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: awesome product with great features and at a low price! I purchased two of them for the kids and they also love them.

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung is a great buy!
Reviews.Author: BJ Fox
Reviews.Content: An absolutely wonderful bedroom TV.  I have now bought 2 for both my sons' bedrooms and they are a great buy.  Be sure to include the ball swivel wall mount and the double shelves for modems with it.  No tax and no shipping charges delivered on time right to my door is always a plus! Even the discount stores on black Friday didn't beat it--especially when you added the wall mount and shelves.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV.
Reviews.Author: Charles Holmes
Reviews.Content: Great price, great picture, terrific features. I resent having to provide more words than I have to say - blah, blah.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV, GREAT PRICE!!!
Reviews.Author: B.C.
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoy this TV!! I use it as a monitor however. I have it mounted right above my desk and it looks great. The picture is great and the area I am allowed to view for my apps is great! Native resolution 1920X1080, and as with all LED TVs that cannot be changed without some sort of degradation in quality. It works fine for me. Games look good. Applications look good. All my TVs are Samsung. Even my phone is Samsung. It's very difficult for me to go with any other brand since I've had great experiences with this one.

Reviews.Title: Simply the best TV
Reviews.Author: L. Matiukas
Reviews.Content: Vizio is cheap - and we have 5 of those of all sizes. Now that they've come out with Smart TVs - that's your best TV for the price. However, if you want to spend some more (not a lot) money, SAMSUNG smart apps TVs are just simply.... The.... Best... Due to it being a more luxury brand, the wifi is already pre-installed and it's faster than cheaper brands with pre-installed wifis (Panasonic you have to buy it separate, even though it's supposed to be a higher end brand too). It offers WPS set up, and that's a sign of newer technologies. The TV chip is much smarter - you don't just get the basic movie/song apps like with Vizio, but you literally get a computer with your TV. It has great color, and with the smallest outside lines I've ever tried, it looks bigger than a comparable TV of same actual size.

Reviews.Title: no regrets!
Reviews.Author: Cecilia
Reviews.Content: Came in three days with free shipping. Set up was quick. The picture quality is amazing and I use the smart remote application on my tablet for convenient typing. The 46  is the perfect size at a price you can't beat.

Reviews.Title: Not so smart TV, even worse customer service
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: If I were rating this TV solely for the picture quality, I'd give it five stars, but I could not get the Smart Hub feature on the Samsung UN40EH5300 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV to work. I read the reviews here and saw others had the same problem, followed advice, looked up fixes in other forums, did all the troubleshooting recommended by Samsung I could do before contacting them, but none of it solved the problem. I had no problem connecting the TV to the internet through wi-fi, but the TV could not connect to the Samsung servers, thus no Smart Hub. The most common error message I got was "ERROR_EXE_001." I live-chatted with a Samsung tech and was directed to manually change the DNS server settings to 8.8.8.8. This didn't help. I power cycled the system (several times). No help. Reset to factory defaults. No help. Verified that my firmware was up to date. No help. Disabled the firewall on my router. No help. Opened a ticket with Samsung giving them details of all the stuff I'd already tried. They suggested I login to the Smart Hub! I had to write again saying that that was my problem, I couldn't login to the Smart Hub. Got another message asking for answers to a series of questions. I supplied the info (including screen shots of the TV) then got a response saying my case had been sent to "tier 2" techs and that they would contact me in a couple days. No one contacted me. After four days (and nearing my 30 days from sale), I sent another message to Samsung, using their reference numbers for all previous correspondence, and received a response that knocked me back to square one, as if they'd never heard of me. The same basic troubleshooting advice. It goes without saying that I was not pleased. I know the TV needed a hardware fix and Samsung should've sent someone out to service it, but I could not get any help from their Customer Service. Will not purchase from Samsung again. By the way, I exchanged this for a VIZIO E420i-A1 42-inch 1080p 120Hz LED Smart HDTV and it connected immediately, all the apps work, didn't have to fiddle with any settings.

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me
Reviews.Author: Jithesh T.
Reviews.Content: I had purchased Samsung UN40EH5300 smart TV almost a month ago. Initially had some buffering problem for the youtube app, but all the other apps worked fine. Yesterday the tv hanged, and was not opening any app saying not connected to internet ("ERROR_MODEL_BIND"). I had 2 laptops and a smartphone connected to internet without any problem, and tried with LAN connection too! Nothing worked. Called up Amazon support who were very helpful in diagnosing and then they forwarded to Samsung tech support who just said the problem is with internet provider! I decided to return the Samsung TV. Looking for a reliable VFM TV now. Any suggestions are welcome.

Reviews.Title: Quite impressive!
Reviews.Author: Boomtastic "I'm the dude!"
Reviews.Content: Overall this TV is very nice. It has a lot of excellent features that you will enjoy, such as robust sound and crisp picture quality. It offers just enough connections for the average home user (but not enough for the audiophile), so those that need an extra HDMI input to run another device like a PS3 will be happy. You can play videos, music and show pictures right off of USB thumb drives, or it will look for media servers on your network (Plex included) and stream them. Viewing from all angles is excellent, as is the sound quality. Of course, with everything there are some downfalls. Getting it to connect to the internet was a challenge. My DNS settings needed to be manually changed to Google's (8.8.8.8) but afterwards things went smoothly. The access to apps - especially the web access - is slow because you are using the remote, but keep in mind this is a TV and not a PC. I haven't connected a USB keyboard to the TV yet. Hopefully that will correct a few things, but honestly like I said it's a TV. I bought it to watch not access things. It is nice to be able to switch to the SmartTV and get the weather or radio on demand. These perks you might enjoy as well as I do. In short, if you're looking for a great TV to add in a bedroom or small room, this one works well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Dr. Barbara Sue Lamb
Reviews.Content: The TV works very well. I am happy with it. There is no delay when changing channels with the remote control.

Reviews.Title: best tv
Reviews.Author: Jerelynn Griffin
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, i watch everything on it. I would def recommend this tv. It was very a very resonable to get

Reviews.Title: It's great but...
Reviews.Author: Deon
Reviews.Content: The visual display gets blurry sometimes and then you "the person watching the smarttv" loose interest in the tv show or movie. It's a nice smarttv but it's needs a focus resolution where you can change it. I tried changing it but the resolution is unavailable on the smarttv, I can only change the picture display, such as movie, natural, standards and class.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Cody K
Reviews.Content: This TV is the best TV for the price hands down. I can't tell you why people complain about how hard it is to get the picture quality looking good. It takes less than 2 minutes. The picture is amazing the sound is incredible and the smart features are perfect (as long as your Internet connection isn't bad) I would definitely recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Slob the man
Reviews.Content: Love this tv! Great addition to tha crib. Ladies love it too so it helps in that department. Peace out

Reviews.Title: 2nd Samsung Tv we've had. Liked them both.
Reviews.Author: M. Miller
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, easy to use. Only giving 4 stars because we use both tvs strictly for Netflix and dvds, not for actual broadcast or cable tv, so I don't know what the reception is like. Online and dv connected with the hdmi cable have been uniformly good. Color is good, size is right for my living room, menus are intuitive. My other Samsung flatscreen is 3 years old and it has always done exactly what we wanted, so when the last hold-out tube tv finally died the Samsung was the only one I looked at seriously.

Reviews.Title: very pleased with both tv's
Reviews.Author: Eleanor Krysinel "constant reader"
Reviews.Content: I have not fully investigated my tv, my husband uses his constantly and thus far we are very happy with them

Reviews.Title: Great smart HDTV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Miller
Reviews.Content: Got this for a bedroom TV and couldn't be happier.  With Samsung's smart TV capabilities and great picture, it's an all around perfect package!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Zamry
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived way before expected, and was in very good condition. I was amazed how light-weight it was! I am enjoying it every day.  Totally recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tv
Reviews.Author: Edilberto Vazquez
Reviews.Content: This a great tv especially because of the built inn wi-fi in the tv. I love using this tv and its a great product.

Reviews.Title: Not looking for wall-to-wall TV ?
Reviews.Author: Kyle D. Wagnon
Reviews.Content: For those people that don't care about 3d and/or have a smaller viewing space, this 32" TV is perfect. With it's crystal clear picture , 120 hz clear motion rate and WI-FI capability it provides everything you need. It is easy to set up and operate and the built-in apps such as Netflix work seamlessly for a great viewing experience.We love it!

Reviews.Title: Happy, Happy happy !
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Pelletier "silly me"
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews good and bad, I decided to buy it. I am completely happy with my Samsung. Sorry I waited so long in my decision !

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Bought this model and have never been happier using it. My very first tv and would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: It is like I dreamed.
Reviews.Author: ROSANA
Reviews.Content: It is like I dreamed. It is the size and the performance I required and it is very beautiful, it is just for me.

Reviews.Title: Great TV tons of options
Reviews.Author: Gloria Manole
Reviews.Content: Still can't believe I got a smart wifi TV for this cheap. Samsung TV's are the best. Can watch movies from  USB drive. Wifi was easy to setup and is fast. Get all the apps of a roku box with no extra charge. Great TV

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Alyssa
Reviews.Content: Love it! It was exactly what I wanted for a tv and for a great price! Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: dcmom
Reviews.Content: This tv was all that I expected and I am quite satisfied.  I did not run into any set up issues or anything. Only had to readjust the display settings. I am enjoying netflix and listening to amazon cloud. No complaints so far.

Reviews.Title: older model
Reviews.Author: DW "Texas"
Reviews.Content: This is an early stage smart tv from Samsung.  It gets the job done but seems slow loading apps and the picture is good.  You certainly get what you pay for in this case but I bought it for a low use room without any cable boxes so we watch HBO and Netflix on this tv.  It is definitely worth the price for a 50" smart tv by Samsung

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew McInnes
Reviews.Content: We have old fashioned (yet digital) antenna TV (yes, I know.... shocking it still exists), but the set-up found and locked in all the channels that the signal picks up!TV is not Edge Lit instead it Back Lit with full array of LED and hence the color contrast really brings the HD shows to life with black levels which are as good as any Plasma TV without any clouding at edges.

Reviews.Title: Best price
Reviews.Author: Kmhooker "Kathleen"
Reviews.Content: $75 less than stores. Free delivery right into my living room. No struggle to get it in or out of my SUV or up the steps. Really love the Smart TVHave enjoyed many free movies. Need to follow the fitness program more. Not difficult to set up. (even for a old lady like me)Glad I purchased it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: watchmegrow
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it I have three smart tv's and this is the best one by far I would recommend this to anybody

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Cynthia B. Gurwitch
Reviews.Content: Perfect fit for our intended use. In the bedroom,and providing  an excellent picture. Took us a long time to choose the best Tv and we found it.

Reviews.Title: I wish the "Smart" part of it was as good as the picture
Reviews.Author: DimskyYansky "DimskyYansky"
Reviews.Content: If you think this TV will replace your laptop, don't waste your money. Get a dumb TV and connect through the HDMI port. When they call these TVs SMART, it's like saying my three year old is smart, but you want him to be College smart. This technology is far from being smart. It has potential, but right now. Button controls need improvements, Youtube streams are either pumping video or the sound at times - It is not watchable. The only reason I gave it 2 starts was for the picture quality. I'd buy Samsung, but NOTHING of smart type - not for a while. My next one is dumb one!I'll call Sumsung support to see why streams are broken, but really disappointed with this buy. If it were my PC, I'd be buying RAM for it.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: best tv i ever had, works great and my 3 yr old luvs it. he gets to see his favorites shows on youtube  n movies on netflix. good picture quality, the sound is pretty good too.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Looks Great and works as advertised.Easy set-up.  The only down side is that it does not support older DVD component or older TVO.  We have been going to get a Blu-ray DVD anyway so no real problem.  I would Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for children
Reviews.Author: KingalstorkTrish
Reviews.Content: I actually purchased two of these televisions brand new from best buy, for my two and 6 year old.  I got them during black Friday and the price was half what they are selling for now! I love the LED picture.  I have them hooked up to HDMI but even when they weren't I prefer the LED picture vs LCD or plasma...great picture, and I love samsung products!

Reviews.Title: Sound quality could be better
Reviews.Author: Vishnu Prasad
Reviews.Content: Dialogue volume goes low at times and becomes difficult to hear.Picture quality is awesome. Useful Internet apps. But painful searching videos in the app, keyboard support to be improved.

Reviews.Title: No 3d
Reviews.Author: Ken Searles
Reviews.Content: This tv does not do 3d like the samsung material said it should, however this tv rocks. IT is a great price, super crisp image even with motion and games. I love the Smarthub and internet ready stuff. IT has apps and does every movie service I can think of. I even found a few that I dont use that I will look into.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300
Reviews.Author: Todd Thune
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome for the money.  It's super easy to hookup and paired up with our network at home easy. I would give it 5 stars but the only thing is the shipping.  The TV comes in the box just like to got it from a store and put it in your car.  However it did not arrive here from someones personal car it arrived by UPS the box was quite banged up with some tears in the box.  I'm hoping that nothing has happened to it during shipping that will show up later.  But for now its working great and could not be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV
Reviews.Author: PattiB
Reviews.Content: This is replacing our older Samsung and boy is it fannnntastic.  Clarity is just excellent, sound is not so bad, but we did have a bar speaker so that helped quite a bit.  Set up was as easy as ABC. Loved the idea that it will start and shut down your Bluray after insert & disc removal.  Too much good stuff here, wouldn't have room to list it all.  Buy it and you'll love it! The only downside is that this Smart TV is so much smarter than we are.  Oh well that's technology for you.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Beautiful Colors - Great App Selection: including Amazon Instant Video, Netflix & Plex
Reviews.Author: T. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a Solid High Quality Television.  The picture is amazing, the colors are real and vivid.  Blacks and whites are very important on HDTVs, and several times with the lights down, and a show goes to black between commercials, I've had to turn to my wife and ask her if she turned it off, then the commercial starts.I bought this TV on Black Friday, and it was the best quality by far in the $600 price range.The other reason for buying this TV instead of the series 6 TVs is that the App selection from Samsung is better for this TV.  I run a Plex server in my home, and the Plex App is available on this TV, it allows me to seamlessly access my entire library of digital media directly through my TV and Remote.  Other Apps I've used are the Amazon Instant Video & Netflix Apps.  There are more available like Pandora, Hulu Plus, MLB, ESPN Scorecenter, and more.Cons: The biggest problem is the sound, the TV is so thin that the built-in speakers just don't get very loud.  Soon I'll be investing in a sound bar.  A couple of times the TV has shut itself off, but I wonder if its because my neighbors have a Samsung, and the remote signal some how passed through both of our windows.  It hasn't happened for a while, I would not call it a regular issue.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy!
Reviews.Author: Connor
Reviews.Content: I've owned other Samsung LED televisions prior to purchasing this model and have been somewhat dissatisfied with their performance. The last one I owned was purchased in 2004, and it quickly developed large dark spots across the screen in areas where it had come into contact with sunlight from my windows. It was so bothersome that on certain programs it was so dark you couldn't even see the picture at all in the most affected areas. Not to mention, after watching a show on any news channel, the network logo would burn into the screen and would stay there for several days. Needless to say, I had sworn off buying Samsung televisions after that. However, after a friend had purchased this tv; I was impressed with the quality, which was a vast improvement from the Samsung television that I owned. As my tv deteriorated further I began to research new LED TVs online, and due to the fact that I had seen this tv in use personally I settled on the Samsung UN32EH5300 1080p 32in 60 Hz LED HDTV. I have been extremely satisfied with this purchase; compared to my previous tv, it's like night and day.
