No issues with sunlight damaging the picture and no issues with channel logos burning into the screen after only 30 mins of television! Overall, I love this tv, 10/10. Although my old tv had picture in picture- which I did sometimes use for videogames or sporting events. Coupled with the other issues I had with the old tv, I am much more satisfied with the current one. Excellent purchase, SMART TV is a plus. Definitely a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: PICTURE QUALITY IS LACKING
Reviews.Author: jim chemelli
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV based on the reviews it got on Amazons site.  Well let me tell you the picture is horrible.  Especially with fast action such as football games any sports venue for that matter even regular programs.  The easiest way I can explain it is picture this it's a very hot day and your walking down a road and as you look at the heat rising from the asphalt you see a blurry sight through the heat.  Well that's how the faces look during a football game.  Gave me a headache while trying to watch a game. I think it might be called motion blur. I tried to make adjustments to the picture per technician from Samsung to no avail. The refresh rate for this TV is 60hz I was told by a crutchfield salesman that a 120hz rate is better so I sent this TV back and am trying a 120hz refresh rated TV. LG 42LS570042" 1080p LED-LCD HDTV with Wi-Fi®  Which was only $50.00 more.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40EH5300 LED
Reviews.Author: D. Boxdorfer "Dencocon"
Reviews.Content: Very good TV. No trouble fine tuning because i didn't have to. I am not a television addict so I don't care about the minute nuances that no one will see so I had no trouble getting a great picture right out of the box. Connected it to my wireless router within about 10 minutes. It is great to be able to watch netflix and a few of the other subscription movie channels right from the TV without having yet another blackbox on the TV stand. The built in wireless adapter works very good. Have been using to watch the weather in the morning before I leave for the morning milk route and a show or 2 at night before I go to sleep and all is good. I also have a high end 52" Samsung plasma in the a/v room. Watching movies and sports on the plasma is incredible. I am very satisfied with the variety of Samsung devices I have. Highly recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Ingar T. Tobye
Reviews.Content: This. Is my 5th Samsung tv. All are working after several years of use.  None have had problems. Samsung has continued to improve the technology to make hook up and use increasingly simple. Picture quality is excellent, though I may not be the best judge. I am not the critic that others may be.

Reviews.Title: warning no ARC on this tv!
Reviews.Author: Philip Tomaskovic "philt56"
Reviews.Content: I just bought the Samsung HW-E350 soundbar expecting to use  ARC so I can switch my hdmi inputs on the tv and send a digital audio signal (for surround) to the soundbar (which has no optical input and only 1 hdmi input).Doesn't work!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: II purchased this tv based on another samsung 50 inch we like a lot.  I wanted  a smaller Tv for an extra bedroom. I was concerned about prior reviews saying TV turns off.  This TV works just fine and has great picture quality. It does not turn off. We have it wall mounted and the 32 inch size is perfect. The SMART part with all the movie features Internet are a plus.  I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
Reviews.Author: Ashish Rastogi
Reviews.Content: Well, the television works just fine. The biggest reason I bought this was because of the ability to stream movies online on Amazon, Netflix, Hulu etc. I had a Bravia earlier and loved it. So I thought this Samsung TV comes at a better price and will work just fine.But their SMART HUB service sucks. It is dependent on Samsung Servers which are down MOST of the time. The TV shows a Network error, however the real problem is with their servers. If you need more proof, check the Samsung Support facebook page or search for "Error_Model_Bind" on google. You will know the story. So you can never stream content when their servers are down. And their customer service is really bad. Frustrated!Not recommended for those who want uninterrupted streaming content. Go for Sony Bravia instead!

Reviews.Title: Better hope it ships crack free
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: TV looks okay, besides the enormous crack on the screen. Unfortunately, I picked it up on a Black Friday deal and they won't replace the TV because they are "out of stock." In reality, it is in stock, but they don't want to offer me the same deal. This is the worst experience I have had with Amazon in over 5 years.

Reviews.Title: Kept Rebooting and then Shutting Off
Reviews.Author: C. J. Capwell
Reviews.Content: The Samsung TV kept rebooting and then shutting off, then you couldn't turn it back on. I changed all the TV settings, so there was no shut off features initiated and it didn't matter. After 15 minutes it would reboot. Then after one or more of these 15 minute intervals, then it would shut off and you couldn't turn it back on until the next day. Completely worthless TV. I returned it and got a completely different brand TV. I didn't want to try another Samsung, after reading the reviews on this website, I saw that many others have had the same complaint.

Reviews.Title: Arrived today, Returned it Today
Reviews.Author: Chuck "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: I read other reviews about this model but was hoping I wouldn't experience the same issue.  Out of the box, set the TV up in my bedroom, and the TV kept turning "off" on its own!  Called Samsung and I'd have to take it about 15 miles to a repair shop (under warranty).  Since many others on here stated they had this constant "turns itself OFF" flaw with this model, I'm returning it via UPS tomorrow.If there is good news, the picture looked great and Amazon.com handles returns quickly via this website.UPDATE AUGUST, 2013:  I ordered another via Amazon's refurbished/returned models and this one works great.  Picture quality is clear and I used other's settings mentioned on here for the picture adjustments.  I would recommend this model now.

Reviews.Title: Not 120Hz
Reviews.Author: Adriel Irons
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware!  Though this TV is listed as being 120Hz, it is actually 60Hz.  Samsung has labeled it as "120 Clear Motion Rate (CMR)", which is probably the source of the confusion.  I purchased this TV looking for a good deal on a Samsung, seeing as they typically have great panels.  After receiving the set and setting it up, I quickly noticed that the motion wasn't as smooth as my Vizio 120Hz set.  A little bit of internet research (along with the fact that the TV doesn't say 120Hz anywhere on the box, or on Samsung's website) led me to the knowledge that Amazon has this TV mislabeled.  I returned the TV, and requested that the labeling be fixed.  The picture quality is great otherwise, but it's frustrating having to return an otherwise great product due to a labeling error.  Bad form Amazon...

Reviews.Title: TV broke down fast
Reviews.Author: Hyun Kim
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on June 24, 2013, but it broke down on me in Nov. 2013.  I only used it for 5 months.  It seems the return policy is only good for one month.

Reviews.Title: Samsung "Customer Service" is no help, so you are on your own
Reviews.Author: Joan Denver
Reviews.Content: Had a couple of problems with this TV and called Samsung for help.  I asked for a replacement for a defective POWER CORD and was sent - by VERY SLOW POST a remote control.  When I called to have THAT replaced, I was told I had to wait another 2 weeks.  The Closed Captioning didn't work.  I was told that if the program I was watching didn't have CC, I wouldn't get it.  Really?  Gosh.  According to the TV, ZERO programs on television in 2013 had Closed captioning.  That info was given to me by a supervisor.  Another "Customer Service" rep told me it was up the cable company to activate the CC capabilities.  Really?  After several phone calls over a couple of days, I decided to cut my losses and return the SAMSUNG for another brand.  ANY OTHER BRAND.  IF Samsung had reliable Customer Service, I probably would have kept it, but when you have to deal with people who are less knowledgeable than I am (and as far as electronics go, I am in about 3rd grade), well, it's time to cut my losses.  I'd recommend you not waste your time either.  Get another brand.

Reviews.Title: Best I can say is it has a good screen
Reviews.Author: D. Lewis
Reviews.Content: If all it was was a monitor, or even a non-"smart" TV, it would be okay - though over-priced for that.  But the "smart" part leaves much to be desired.Others have mentioned the clunky interface.  Let me say very clunky.  Compared to my Windows Media Center PC, it's awful.  It's frequently slow to load - like 1990's slow.  Early 1990's with a bunch of bloatware and spyware.  Finding things is insane.  I have yet to find a global search.  Even the searches I found are lacking.  For example, I looked for the TV series, "Arrow".  Found it and a brief description.  But could not find what channel or when it would be on.  Watching Youtube videos is also terrible - it hangs up frequently.  I think this may be due to the fact that it keeps dropping my network connection.  Thought it might just be wifi, so I ran a cable to it.  Nah - it dropped just as frequently.  It's nice that it can see my PC, though that was a pain to set up, but sorting through my avi collection is impossible.  It ignores my folder so I have to painfully scroll through hundreds of files to get to the one I want.  And, again, no search that I could find.Overall, I'd say the hardware is decent - sound isn't bad, though I'm not an audiophile.  But the software is so awful that I can't give it more than 1 star.  Very disappointed with Samsung in this - I normally love their products.  Also disappointed with the reviews on Amazon: I mean, come on, guys - how can so many of you put up with this horrible interface?  I guess you must just not know any better.  Go buy a TV card (Hauppage is good) and try Windows Media Center.  I'm not a Microsoft fan, but it's in another league from Samsung's software here.Last thing I'd like to say is: I wish I could throw Linux on the TV.  That would improve things immensely.  Maybe someday someone will post the howto.UPDATE: Samsung has steadily released updates and I must report things have improved a bit.  I still don't care for it, but it's faster, doesn't drop the network quite as often, and the interface for searching through avis on my PC has improved to a usable state.  Adding a second star.UPDATE 2: Samsung has continued to improve things to the point that I am now willing to give this TV 4 stars.  It no longer drops the network at all, I can easily find the avi's on my PC and it plays them reliably, and the Youtube extension has improved a lot as well.  I'm selling my TV on craigslist because I'm moving but I now like the TV well enough that I wish I could keep it.

Reviews.Title: It's as Smart as they get
Reviews.Author: Ian E. Lynch
Reviews.Content: See i am an Apple person but until they come with their Smart TV THIS IS THE NEXT BEST OUT THERE.Bought mine here in Jamaica, the 40 inch version, great quality I use my iPhone as a remote control and keyboard. It accesses my DLNA server and plays its contents seamlessly. 3 HDMI is ok, but 4 would have been nice. Also the ability to edit the inputs, I cant enter Apple TV , instead I must use IPVTV.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Product of the Highest Quality
Reviews.Author: California Stockholder
Reviews.Content: I cannot give enough praise to Samsung for the quality and ease of connection for this unit.  The price is better than the warehouse clubs.  This truly is a "smart" TV.

Reviews.Title: Television is broken and requires service after two months.
Reviews.Author: Michael Gregorovic
Reviews.Content: This television was working for two months but it recently started to power cycle. It was a gift for my mother and now it has become my problem. All this television does now is turn ON then OFF continuously until the power cable is removed from the wall. I am glad this television is still under warranty otherwise I'd be paying too much money to fix it. A television shouldn't fail in such a short period of time so I am very disappointed with samsung and will most likely never consider buying samsungs garbage ever again.

Reviews.Title: Annoying---BEYOND ANNOYING!
Reviews.Author: Byzantine
Reviews.Content: I have come to really hate this television.  It's constantly "updating" and yet each time it does this the apps function worse than they did before.  Netflix constantly says it can't play the title I want to watch.  After clicking play about three times it does play the show.  However, if I hit pause or stop, I have to go through the same rigmarole again.  It's irritating beyond words.  I know it's not Netflix as I can watch Netflix with my iPad or computer without problems.  It's only on this television that the app refuses to function properly.  Sadly, I can't return this as it's been too long but maybe I can help someone else.  I bought this TV for the apps.  I don't have cable or satellite.  I stream everything via Netflix or Amazon Prime.  Both apps have issues but only on this TV.  I wouldn't buy it again and I wouldn't recommend it either.UPDATE:I hate this television even more.  It's now been updating for over an hour.  Again, updates don't fix any problems.  I have a sneaking suspicion that updates are only done to add more "buy me" apps.  It's a horrible television for the price.  Save yourself a huge headache.  If you stream most of your television via Netflix, Amazon Prime, or Hulu, get a regular TV and a Roku.  You'll save money and hassle.  After this beyond irritating product I will no longer buy any Samsung product.  Ever.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!! only showing a blue screen after 2 days
Reviews.Author: sheadine
Reviews.Content: Do not Purchase this television. I am from Trinidad and Tobago and I bought this television as my birthday gift to myself, in no time the television stopped working. It was well packed but it's defective. I spend $774.05 Trinidad money to clear it, so it can enter my country. Now it doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Pure Junk - Netflix and Amazon Video on Demand dont work!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Wagner
Reviews.Content: Netflix and Amazon dont work less than 1 month after buying this so called Smart TV.  Spent hours on the phone with Samsung and got nowhere.  The only thing they said was wait a week for a possible update that should fix the problem.  Thanks a lot Samsung.  Do not buy this TV if you want a Smart TV.  Its plagued with problems.  If you don't believe me, go and Google "Samsung Smart TV cannot play title at this time".  Now I'm going to have to go out and buy a Roku player.

Reviews.Title: Worked for less than 24hrs!
Reviews.Author: luke choice
Reviews.Content: Got it all set up and working the first night. Came to turn it on the next day and it wouldnt work. Simply a red blinking standby light. Now i have to wait another week for someone to come out and service it.

Reviews.Title: Only works until right after warranty is out... 1 year, 2 months. Dead
Reviews.Author: lily
Reviews.Content: I used to love Samsung and their customer service, until my last purchase.  I purchased the TV through Amazon, and was told that the warranty would be up after 1 year.  During the year, I barely used the tv, probably about twice a week at most, and right after the 1-year mark of date of purchase, the TV just stopped working.  I'm not sure if Samsung is making faulty products, or if Amazon is selling a product knowing that it has issues, but after doing extensive research on the SmartTv, I've learned that the problem that I'm having with my tv is a recurring issue, yet there are no callbacks, or service to fix it.  Horrible customer service, horrible product, I am quite unhappy with this product.

Reviews.Title: sound and blank channel problems
Reviews.Author: G. Reza Namdar
Reviews.Content: The sound system on this TV is horrible! You can barely hear the voices at mid-range. You have to turn the sound up super-high to hear voices. Also, it has been impossible to delete blank channels. Any advice on these two problems is appreciated!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE gift shoppers!
Reviews.Author: erika kar
Reviews.Content: I can't really rate the TV accurately yet, as it is a Christmas gift. But I gave it 5 stars to start out with because it is soooo light.However, I wanted to write a review  to warn people buying this for  gift.It arrives in the Samsung box showing EXACTLY what it is, and not in an Amazon box.So, the FedEx guy came and of course my kids were home from school and answered the door. Surprise ruined.So, BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 50 inch smart tv
Reviews.Author: Shannon C. Sloan
Reviews.Content: Bought it Friday, had it 10am Monday. Had free shipping to boot.Fantastic picture and excellent sound. played blue ray today and watched live football at night.Followed the suggestions on previous reviews and have to say that for a low price, this tv FAR exceeded our expectations.Ready to go for Super Bowl for under $600 and Internet is good too with many helpful apps.........THANX AMAZON, YOU NEVER DISAPPOINT

Reviews.Title: Incredible product!!!
Reviews.Author: Steven reyes
Reviews.Content: This product is very durable. I have a year with it and the picture is still amazing. Though it becomes sluggish with time.

Reviews.Title: NOT A GOOD TV
Reviews.Author: Harish
Reviews.Content: This TV has multiple performance issues when we connect to internet via smart hub.most of the times TV hungs and stops at black screen

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: JessicaNiccole  Glennon
Reviews.Content: It's an alright TV. Has great sound and great features. Not so great picture quality, though. There is a way to alter the settings to improve that, but...when you fix that...if you want to watch a DVD, the picture quality will simply SUCK. There doesn't seem to be a happy medium.

Reviews.Title: Unit is OK / I Like it. Not as good as the Sony it replaced
Reviews.Author: STEF "Sam"
Reviews.Content: I had to give away a very nice 40" Sony LCD that was 120Hz. The display on that unit was extremely sharp. I was thinking since this was LED technology and a number of years newer, it would have at least a nice display. This isn't the case. I did follow some of the recommended settings and tweaked things a bit... This has improved image quality (I'm not receiving a true HD signal from COMCAST, so this might be part of the reason the display doesn't thrill... With the Sony, I was using DirectTV.Update: my COMCAST DVR tunes a range of stations that are not in HD (720), and a range that are. Neither are in 1080p. Tuning my DVR to a broadcast in 720... the display looks much much nicer. User error.Anyway, the black level is not uniform across screen. First unit I received had obvious defect in screen fabrication. Two dark spots in the middle of the screen where the backlight was not uniform. The SMART aspect of the TV? Jury is out with me. I'm greatly dismayed the keyboard (I'm using the Logitech K400 - works some places but not in NetFlix nor YouTube, nor Amazon Instant Video) integration is so poor. Oh how using a remote to cursor over a keyboard gets very old, very fast. Samsung should fix this. I don't find the quality of the SMART Apps up to expectations because of this.Update: the web-browser on the TV is acceptable for most things. The keyboard works very nicely in that app, but there is an annoying pop-up keyboard one can use with the remote. Wish that could be shut off.Many settings are ghosted. Like the online manual? I think they needed to use the memory for apps or for a firmware update. Honestly, it seems like it's just not been fully productized...Wish it had RCA audio out instead of a small connector.

Reviews.Title: Picture dims
Reviews.Author: Gun Hansteen
Reviews.Content: At first the picture is sharp and bright, but after awhile it fades to a fairly dim visage, hard to see .

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival, unacceptable service response
Reviews.Author: Dennis Boulais
Reviews.Content: 1.) Poor packaging2.) Poor ServiceTV would not turn on (looked like the outside package had been opened)..  The local Service Center has quoted more than 1 week to send a service person to look at the TV.  That's too long for a Southern New England service call. They also did not say how long a replacement might take.  I love my previous Samsung TV's. This one is not starting out so well. It would not be a huge problem, if I had not recommended this TV, based on my previous experience with the brand and the specifications,  to my mother  This hassle leaves me looking like a fool, for suggesting she buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Power Cycling Problem
Reviews.Author: Isle Royalite "C. Kidd"
Reviews.Content: Power cycling began occurring after about 1 month of ownership.  It must be a big issue for Samsung as there was a separate guide category in the Troubleshooting section on their site as well as in the manual. I followed the instructions from Samsung exactly, even changing the location in the house, etc.  Shut-off and on still occurred every five minutes.  The set is under warranty and I was advised online to send it in for servicing.  Unfortunately I didn't save the box (a first for me) so had to pay not only for shipping to return to NJ from WA State but also for UPS packaging, doubling the cost.  The price on Amazon was good but I wonder if some lemons might have been unloaded for online shoppers.  I'm rating this as one-star only because the picture is/was beautiful.  I'll revise upward only if a perfect machine with no glitches is returned from Samsung.  Buyer beware and save the box!  Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: TV is the worst I've bought
Reviews.Author: LUZ M VALENCIA
Reviews.Content: the colors are very poor especially when viewed from one side not front.download internet apps has been an unsolved problem

Reviews.Title: Poor web browser
Reviews.Author: Fnu Tejinder "TJ"
Reviews.Content: The apps work fine, no problem at all. I did not like the Web Explorer though. The remote which comes along with the TV is not good enough to type on the web explorer. Samsung promotes $100 additional remote which can be used to browse the web more effectively. If you just need a good led tv with built in wifi this tv is good. But if you are looking to browse just as you do in your laptop better for alternate options ( like connecting pc via hdmi or use logitech revue which has keyboard for browsing).

Reviews.Title: WOST EXPERIENCE EVERRRR
Reviews.Author: Rashilda A. Storm "Nurse Extraordanaire"
Reviews.Content: This is my 1st time I'm writing a review. I'm so disappointed especially since I was anticipating my 1st HD/Smart TV experience to be be so rewarding. I staked this TV out online and waited for an affordable price over Black friday weekend and made my purchase. We missed the 1st delivery day, no one was home to receive product. The 2nd day my father stayed in all day awaiting the package which he thankfully received today. Was so excited when I came home and saw the box, and my parents waited until I was home to begin assembling. We opened our the box size was perfect, screen intact just what we were hoping to see.Old tv was removed, cable box was disconnected and  we slowly and carefully assembled our product. It was a family affair mom was looking on Dad and I were working together and we set up our first HDTV. The joy/anticipation ended here, when we turned on our NEW TV a huge white blotch was seen on the screen with cracks around. (No Biggie I thought I'll request another)THIS IS WHERE MY NIGHT CHANGED. There was no option to replace item only refund. No problem I thought, must be a mistake I will call representative. Got a representative on the phone was informed of the same option (how convenient). All I wanted was for Amazon to pick up item and send new TV when in stock, conveniently they're unable to do so. SAMSUNG was contacted and they flat out refused to send new tv as this damage isn't covered in THEIR  warranty (SO SAMSUNG WHAT THE HELL DO YOU COVER IN YOUR ONE YEAR WARRANTY) Now they're gonna contact the company I purchased external warranty through to see my options, who knows what I'll hear then. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. I have a Samsung phone but after this horrible customer service experience feel like going over to APPLE. I'm that angry this will be my last product from them.EXCELLENT SERVICE FROM THE SMART TV LEADER (as it states on the box). SHAME ON SAMSUNG SHAME ON YOU AMAZON!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after 5 days
Reviews.Author: Got2surf
Reviews.Content: After 5 days the screen went black with the sound still working - not good! Called Samsung, and while they were nice they could not get it working on the phone. They offered to send out a repair person to fix it (they should have offered to replace it) but could not say how long it would take and/or if they would have to order parts to fix it. I sent it back to Amazon (the greatest return policy ever!) and got a Sony tv to replace the Samsung. The Sony TV is great I love it.

Reviews.Title: A not so smart "Smart TV"
Reviews.Author: Tallmark
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung with the "Smart" option figuring that it would be more convenient then using a separate streaming device.  Boy was i wrong.  The internet interface and performance is much worse than my Roku box.  It takes me about a minute from the time I turn the set on for the TV to connect to the internet and then search for the last show I was watching on Netflix.  Roku returns you the location of the show you were last viewing and connects within a couple of seconds.  The top level application panel spreads the icons across the screen, with lots of blank space, forcing you to scroll to multiple screens to reach a small number of channels, further increasing the time and effort to find what you are looking for.  The Samsung hub allows me to view 10 channels on a 40" screen which is a third less than the 15 channels I can see with my Roku on an old 22" analog TV set.  This reminds me of a Microsoft product where spreading out information over a large area with plenty of wasted blank space is a well developed art form.The second concern I have relates to the very weak speakers.  A the top volume setting I had trouble hearing and understanding some of the quieter conversations.On the positive side the color rendition was excellent right out of the box and I found the set up to be very easy.

Reviews.Title: Okay TV... but buyer beware.
Reviews.Author: Scooper
Reviews.Content: This TV is a good product and worked well.... until a couple months after we bought it when it began power-cycling (repeatedly turning on and off).  A quick google search revealed that this is a known issue with Samsung products.  Now we began the odyssey of trying to deal with customer service and get this fixed.

Reviews.Title: TV crashed hard after three weeks
Reviews.Author: Ronnie B.
Reviews.Content: Just as we were trying to get used to the filmy sharpness of the picture, and the lousy flesh tones most of the time, the TV had the good manners to self-destruct in an irretrievable manner.  The video display spontaneously went all splotchy in wild colors, the menus could not be navigated, and in minutes even the audio went away.  A call to Costco (sorry Amazon) concierge service led to a Samsung customer service person who tried for an hour to get the TV functioning, but no dice.  She wanted to send a service person to our home in twelve days to see about fixing it, and that is when we were so very happy that we bought the TV at Costco!  It went back to the store today for full credit, and we came home with a new Vizio M401i-A3.  It was literally plug-and-play, internet wireless connection and all, and we're all set with a MUCH better picture than the Samsung TV.  Now, we're hoping the Vizio will last longer than the Samsung!  In our case, the Samsung was a worthless piece of junk and I have lost confidence in their products.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Product
Reviews.Author: aNA
Reviews.Content: This TV worked for about two weeks and then the trouble started! It just keeps shutting down and restarting. We tried to change the eco settings etc. and still the same problem.We contacted support and they were most useless to say the least.Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Great cord cutter TV
Reviews.Author: VaroomVaroom
Reviews.Content: My daughter recommended this TV after she noticed the price dropped below Black Friday prices. We were looking for a new TV with a digital tuner in it as we've recently cut the cord with cable TV after reading: Simple Guide to Over-the-Air Free TV. We weren't sure we'd need or want a smart TV, but now that we have it, we're using it a lot.This TV arrived quickly via Prime and was easy to setup. Wifi connected immediately and the Smart Hub was easy to understand - which I needed it to be!  We had one issue with Netflix not connecting, but found out from our daughter that we needed to set the clock manually versus automatically (some syncing issue...) to get it to work. Once we did that - it did.The picture is great - nice colors and sharp picture. The 46" size is very good, but coming from a huge 80" projection style TV we were worried we'd not like it. The picture is so much better, we don't feel like we lost much.The apps open a little bit slowly, but everything works. I would buy another one in a heart beat and recommend them if you're looking for a smart TV in the 40-50" range.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Nabys
Reviews.Content: I will buy again from this merchant. Further, and very important. Think Green, Please protect animals and plants, recycle everything you can, no littering and use it enough to completely finish any product. Transmit this message to others.Compraré nuevamente en este negocio.  adicionalmente, Piensa Verde, por favor protege a los animales y las plantas, recicla todo lo que puedas, no echar basura, usa todo hasta el final, transmite este mensaje a otros.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Deal Queen :-)
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  It works very well and has good sound and clarity.  The only problem is when you have to wait for it to update when you turn it to the Smart TV options.

Reviews.Title: TV Looked Great Until I Plugged IT In
Reviews.Author: Jessica Zumwalt
Reviews.Content: After taking it out of the box an assembling the base, which was fairly easy, we plugged it in. The TV was broke and is currently in the process of being returned to Amazon after I paid $240.40 to have it shipped back. I do not own a Truck so I had to ask a friend to help me as well. This Item was not available for free pick up service or return shipping. The savings of about $60 is not worth all this hassle in my opinion. I still need a TV and now have to wait for a refund and my shipping cost to be refunded, I called and Dwayne with customer support said it would be, hopefully!

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: pedro
Reviews.Content: Received the Samsung 5300 and have spent over an hour working on a web browser issue myself and then another hour online with tech support trying to resolve and then they referred me to a call in line which i will have to deal with in the coming days...Day 2 working on this issue , have spent over an hour on the phone as they tell me someone needs to perform a remote access on the tv to correct the issue.,, had to call 3 times today and now on hold for a rep, originally the wait time was 20 minutes ,, now as sitting here waiting the wait time has been updated to over 30 minutes ... to be continued.....

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Hozhe24
Reviews.Content: A great Product of Samsung , a new smart technology that i ike it and I recommend it to everybody and that enjoy  this new way to watching tv!!

Reviews.Title: gave out after 1.5 years!
Reviews.Author: Hayley
Reviews.Content: We bought this a year and a half ago, and almost to the day, whatever connects to the internet for Netflix, Amazon Prime and other pay services has gone out.  My husband has reset everything in the house to no avail.  Guess it's time to order a Roku box.I've had tons of trouble getting it to connect since buying it.  I had a little routine of unplugging the TV, the relay box, modem, etc. to get Netflix to connect.  For what we paid for this stupid TV, you'd think it would last more than 18 months.Buy a regular TV and Roku box or other blueray player.  Don't waste your money on this stupid TV.

Reviews.Title: This TV was sent to me broken.  Not damaged in shipping, but broken.
Reviews.Author: Beth Yount
Reviews.Content: I really want to give them No stars!  I guess I should have known that this TV at this price was too good to be true.  I received the TV and immediately found a piece of the case broken off.  Then, I tried to turn it on and it wouldn't stay on for more than 2 or 3 minutes.  I looked up the troubleshooting guide in the manual and did what it said (turn off the Eco features)  this was hard to do when the TV kept turning off; thwarting my efforts, but finally I finished all the manual said to do for a TV that turned itself off....then it still kept going off.  After a few days of this, I decided it must be broken and sent it back.  Thank God I bought it on amazon....

Reviews.Title: Not the best for sports
Reviews.Author: J. Powell
Reviews.Content: I bought this, not as a my every day TV, but I do like to watch sports.I don't delve into the specs of the whys and whats usually, but when I can see a clear differenceLet me tell you something.  Size does matter.  And this is at least one instance when smaller is better than bigger.I got better screen performance from my 2 year old...smaller Samnsung, than I did with this. (at least for sports)I Just watched an NHL playoff game on this thing, and stop action shots, like the players in the penalty box, or the announcers...look WONDERFUL...but the ice action...the players look just a leeeetale bit fuzzy.They don't look that way on my Plasma or my LCD...so  maybe mhz speed needs to be considered, if this is what you watch mostly.I gave this 3 stars because it has so many smart TV features.  Most importantly wireless, for all the apps like netflix, etc.Easy set up, and it's light weight.Overall, a VERY ok TV, but really just a break even at this price point.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: mimithree
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, great picture and color, whats not to love. My daughter and I set it up in just a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Bob Beckemeyer
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes great TV's. I have several Samsung's and have had a good experience with all.TV shipping was great.

Reviews.Title: TV good even in dented box.
Reviews.Author: Kevin K
Reviews.Content: I have installed the TV, haven't watched anything on it yet or played with it at all. Looks good. I was unsure about it as the box had a significant crush in on the one corner, looks like it was dropped hard on one corner. UPS driver seemed to care less about it when I pointed it out to him. But all looked good on TV so hope it holds out. I have used many other samsung TVs in my rental cottages ( over 10) and have never had any problems with samsung

Reviews.Title: Quality product
Reviews.Author: dvictor
Reviews.Content: Really wanted this size for the bedroom and was surprised at the quality of the picture.  Bright clear and a pleasure to watch. Samsung apps are a little slow but a few are really useful (I like the sports app). Wi fi works great and the smart hub apps are fast and well designed. I have had the TV for several months and I have no complaints.Best value in 40 inch smart TV.

Reviews.Title: A great unit, but...
Reviews.Author: alan asnen
Reviews.Content: I wish two things:1) I wish they would make speakers on these new televisions that didn't make you wish you had more speakers;2) I wish they would upgrade the upgradable software in the smart tv's they made last year to work as nicely as the upgradable software in the smart tv's they're making this year. It makes me wonder what will happen to this year's upgradable softwarenwhen next year's tv's are manufactured...

Reviews.Title: UN32EH5300 smart tv
Reviews.Author: James Taylor
Reviews.Content: Would definetely buy another one.  Lacks a little in volume.  Great TV. and definitely the way to go. Very happy overall.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jody
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this TV except the audio. I have adjusted it as suggested and it works adequately, but often the background music over rides the dialog.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: ryan garvey
Reviews.Content: two years later and no issues, I bought this tv strictly just to use the netflix and I really cant complain. Samsung periodically does updates on Sunday nights which will keep you from using the smart apps.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Sam Wade
Reviews.Content: As in many things from Amazon they get dropped or the boxes torn in shipping.  It is a good tv and I have one other one in my house so I knew what I was getting.  Samsung is a very good brand for the money.

Reviews.Title: 50" Samsung flat screen LED tv
Reviews.Author: wendell toland
Reviews.Content: this is a great television. picture quality and reception with a digital antenna is awesome. I highly  recommend the Samsung 50" LED tv.

Reviews.Title: samsung smart tv not so smart
Reviews.Author: danielle gonzales
Reviews.Content: Not impressed starting to have issues it figures! It doesn't turn on at times and trying to browse the web is a nightmare and its very hard to figure out

Reviews.Title: It came late and damaged!!!!!
Reviews.Author: shanha D. Martinez
Reviews.Content: This itme came days late and with a big crack/whole in it at the back i had to ask for a discount on it and i wasn't for warned about the damage also i wasn't for warned that it would be a delay i had to take time off of work to retreive it, inspite so far it is working ok!!!

Reviews.Title: SmartTV feature not that great
Reviews.Author: buzzybee
Reviews.Content: We use the TV for our cable. I've tried using the Smart apps and what not. Don't work as well as it may seem.YouTube gets out of sync every 30 seconds. It's not because of internet connection. We have the ethernet cable connected right to the TV and it still does the glitches. Controls are annoying. To type is very annoying. There's no letter keyboard so it's annoying to go on Facebook to type or even go search on Netflix. It may work with a wireless keyboard though. Haven't tried yet.As a regular TV itself works good. Clarity is well especially on HD channels.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Michael Maroney
Reviews.Content: Does everything you want.great picture. Good sound. You'll need a small keyboard to use the internet. Overall a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Poor out of the box experience.
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from Costco.  The picture quality seems fine for the price, but none of the smart tv features were working out of the box despite connecting to the internet (which the TV verified and even downloaded software updates) .  The menus and software on the TV are very poor and dated.  I had to work with tech support to jump through a bunch of hoops involving changing the country code (I bought the tv in the USA and I live in the USA).  Anyways, now that it is all set up its good but terrible out of the box experience.  Basically, everything you expect from Samsung.  Decent tech, horrible interface.

Reviews.Title: Missing parts
Reviews.Author: Colleen Walter
Reviews.Content: I can't tell if the tv is great or not.  The product I recieved is missing the 8 tiny screws that render it useless unless I buy a wall stand (not an option as I rent and they want no screws in the walls)  So incredibly disappointed that I spent a small fortune on a product I can't use.  Even more frustrated my only option is to return the whole tv for 8 screws.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: LEO58
Reviews.Content: First I would like to say extremely easy to set up, With in 5 min The  Satellite (direcTV)  and internet  and all updates where done and I was watching TV and was checking my email. The Picture is great under all condition Dark room and bright room apps simple to set up I would recommend to all looking for a smart TV at a great price :)))))

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Daniel Bischoff
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I had some Amazon credit from Christmas time. It works great, the display looks good no matter what I'm watching and there are enough HDMI ports for me. Sometimes the sound can be a little off, but even without a sound bar or speaker set up the display is plenty loud.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, terrible sound quality
Reviews.Author: Margaret G.
Reviews.Content: While the picture is quite good, and all of the Smart TV functions are working just fine, the sound is terrible.  I watch a lot of dramas, and I often cannot figure out what the characters are saying.  Very disappointing!

Reviews.Title: Very good w/ minor flaws
Reviews.Author: Marcus A. Toft
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy this TV but some features are still a bit clunky. Trying to browse the internet is difficult because you have to use the remote to type each letter - I'm sure this is something that will improve as the technology advances. I think it's also a minor flaw compared to all the good things this TV has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Quality built in!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jim Altpeter
Reviews.Content: Samsung is the best quality tv build today. Replacing my current 46 inch Samsung with this fifty inch Smart TV

Reviews.Title: NOT REALLY 32"
Reviews.Author: P. D. Mclaughlin
Reviews.Content: I failed to research this thoroughly, and I'm sorry to say I'm now stuck with a much small TV than I thought I was getting.  Amazon listed the actual dimensions but I didn't read them.  So before you order this, measure the space where you plan to put it.  The screen quality is very good and has a few alternate settings to choose from.  What I hate about it is the remote.  The up, down and select buttons are so close together that I often hit the wrong one and then lose whatever I've worked on for so long to find.  The Apps aren't even close to the Android Google or Apple Apps, the news (CNBC) App is great if you love FOX News or other conservative networks, but I don't and so it's not for me.  It's very time-consuming to use the keypad to find things, and I haven't found if there's a way I can connect my keyboard because it would make things much easier.  So far, it's just O.K., and I wouldn't buy it again if I knew then what I know now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Olivia Maric
Reviews.Content: I love this TV and this price. You cannot get this anywhere else. The picture is nice, the size is great, I barely, if never, use the SmartTV aspect of it as I do not have the router connected to it, as I connect my laptop to the TV and the router is too far away, so I can only comment on picture quality and it is awesome. Love it.

Reviews.Title: This is a good smart tv
Reviews.Author: Pam B
Reviews.Content: I have two of these now (one 40 and one 32), and I love that we can watch Netflix, hulu plus, amazon prime, and listen to music on the amazon cloud player with no other devices hanging off the tv.  I've been skeptical of smart tv but have to say this one has the bugs worked out (knock on wood of course).  Picture is great. Sound is good too.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: George Tizzano
Reviews.Content: Samsung TV is great! Connections were easy to do and contrast and sound are outstanding! Timer settings should be less than 30 minutes otherwise okay. George, Florida

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Lillian
Reviews.Content: The tv itself is awesome except for the keyboard on the smart tv part it's a headache to type on, but other than that the size, color, and sound are great. What was awful was the fact that we had to wait for a second one to get here because that first one got smashed while in transition to our house. The whole screen was completely smashed in and we had to wait so long for that one to come after we had paid for the next day shipping. All in all it two about 2 1/2 weeks for everything to get here, then they tried to tell us that we had to pay to get it shipped back, um no, they ended up sending a pre-paid label. Other than the issues with shipping, the tv is awesome!

Reviews.Title: got my items switched around
Reviews.Author: Rosemary S Tufts
Reviews.Content: this is the review for the monitor. the monitor has my review for the tv. I am enjoying how my new monitor compliments my video card. didn't realize what my card could do with my old monitor. the quality, as usual for most of Samsung's products, is more than adequate. the price through Amazom was very appreciated, as usual.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase of my life so far!
Reviews.Author: Miguel Vilanova
Reviews.Content: Its everything i expected, a big tv with several different type of ports and an amazingly beautiful resolution. All for an amazing price too.

Reviews.Title: Good tv, but as always, there's room for improvement
Reviews.Author: Daniella
Reviews.Content: The picture quality and speakers work quite well on this tv, but the Smart HUB isn't quite up to speed. I have no problems with netflix, hulu plus, or amazon video, but the internet browser constantly crashes stating that there's not enough memory. Also, the smart hub updates itself quite frequently which can be annoying. I'm also annoyed that you can't use the free versions of hulu or spotify. You need a paid account to access those apps on this device.As for the price, if you want a tv that can stream content, you're gonna have to pay more for that tv or supplement a non-smart tv with a ps4, roku, etc. Either way, it's more money. It's ultimately a matter of preference. That being said, if you get this tv, I highly recommend purchasing a wireless keyboard to operate the Smart HUB. The remote is absolutely horrible.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture & Sound!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Grandmother Librarian"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the product and price!  Enjoying all the perks of owning a Smart TV.  Thank you Samsung and thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV Review
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize this wasn't the latest release from Samsung, but we can chalk that up to my lack of research.  Otherwise great for what we were looking for and couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: samsung 40 inch
Reviews.Author: harriett granger
Reviews.Content: im very pleased and happy with my new tv. thank you so much......im gonna enjoy my nascar  in hd bye

Reviews.Title: Great TV great price.
Reviews.Author: elizabeth syrek
Reviews.Content: Very happy once it came. We ordered it on cyber mon and didn't recieve TV til the end of Jan. Our order got cancelled once. We had to reorder. Had problems with customer service through Amazon. It was supposed to be a Xmas gift for our son and we thought we had ordered it in plenty of time. Got charged for shipping when it was supposed to be free. Will not order big ticket item again.would not get anything from Datavision again. Usually happy with Amazon but not this time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, NETFLIX SUCKS.
Reviews.Author: Cameron Conner "-Cameron Conner"
Reviews.Content: The tv is awesome. Inexpensive, good size, excellent picture, good inputs, etc. However, every time I go to netflix I have to type in my login details again. Based on what I've seen, Samsung KNOWS about this problem, and hasn't fixed it in years.Sigh.

Reviews.Title: Stop Reading This Review and Buy It
Reviews.Author: Jonathan J. Innerarity
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a 46" 1080p, Smart TV with:• Internet capability (wireless, 802.11 a/g/n)• NetFlix, YouTube, Facebook and a ton of other downloadable apps• USB mouse and keyboard support• USB external hard drive support• Great Sound (get the Cyber Acoustics Subwoofer Satellite System - CA-3602a to go with this TV for even better sound!)• Excellent picture quality (deep blacks, sharp colors, no detectable bleeding)• Lots of HDMI, RCA / Component, Ethernet RJ-45 and a boatload of other connectors• Best in class for the price...then stop reading this review and BUY THIS. JUST DO IT.NOW.I should tell you however that if you have more money to spend, there's a newer version of this TV available. Search for model number UN46F5500 - also on Amazon. It's more expensive, but for a perfectly good reason. Either way, you can't lose with this one.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, it does all I want it to do with ease. simple to set up and simple to use, switch from regular TV to Smart with one click. The picture is very clear with great color and contrast, all in all a very good buy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Luís
Reviews.Content: The tv remote for browsing the web is annoying, should buy a remote keyboard compatible with the smart tv, but is an excellent TV!

Reviews.Title: Good TV not so great smartness
Reviews.Author: Kenneth R Gates
Reviews.Content: The TV picture quality and contrast is outstanding, typical samsung quality.  The built in smart hub is just ok.  It seems to run apps fine and you have a fairly wide selection though nothing like the google app store for variety, but the major apps seem to be there (Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Instant video, Plex, etc).  The apps that stream video seem to work fine but one big thing missing is a youtube app, instead you get a shortcut on the desktop to the youtube website.  This is kind of ok except the built in browser leaves a lot to be desired, and the youtube web page does not seem to support pairing to a mobile device like the app would.  The processor seems to really struggle to run the browser and pretty much any website with flash will crash the browser.  Using the remote to navigate the browsers onscreen keyboard is incredibly tedious so instead just buy a cheap wireless logitech mouse and plug in the nano adapter to the usb port.  The mouse installs itself automatically and makes using the onscreen keyboard fast and easy.  Overall very happy with the tv, the extra $40 for the smart hub is worth it for the app capability, if you really want to browse the web on it you probably should just connect it to a pc.

Reviews.Title: Good performer
Reviews.Author: Eric Oxelson
Reviews.Content: Has done all I have asked.  Menu choices are not all obvious, but simple to use when figured out.Had the strange experience, for me, of seeing that I was using someone else's Netflix account.  Netflix helped me figure out how to  sign out and then to sign myself on.  The previous owner must have not done that before returning set. I was able to see recent items viewed and recommendation for other selections.  I also found a Samsung App account of someone else on the set.  That was easy to sign out of.  I might have been tempted to use the other person's account, but I have no interest in it at this time.  I have seen no other tracks of other folks hiding in the on board browser, and do not expect trouble, but it was a surprise to find any.  I wonder how many people used the TV before I got it.  Maybe it was in a store and people were checking things out and the set did not clean itself as we are told they do in hotels and motels when one signs off the internet.

Reviews.Title: Review of Samsung UN46EH5300 46 Inch television
Reviews.Author: Herman R. White
Reviews.Content: The television is great and everything I expected.  It took a little time to get picture adjustments set to my satisfaction.  Delivery was made within timeframes posted.  I would recommend this set to others.

Reviews.Title: Substantial Limitations
Reviews.Author: Technician Ted
Reviews.Content: The display looks very good for most program material.  However, even with disabling all automatic background lighting options this TV has some very annoying characteristics.  In an outdoor night scene with a house with light coming through the windows and a car driving up, the backlighting increases to increase the brightness of the car headlights as they come into view. This results in the lights in the windows of the house to brighten also, a very obvious error in realistic scene reproduction.  Backlighting of the whole screen results from changes in overall scene brightness and if you are accessing the menu or program directory, they will vary drastically in brightness following the average brightness of the scene.The web browser is very limited and is unstable, crashes frequently.Product support is at this point impossible to obtain.  After calling Samsung and the support person answering not able to answer any questions about the product transferred me to a recording that asked me to hang up and call back at another time.  I never did get my problems addressed.This is the only "Smart TV" I've ever owned so I don't have anything to compare it to. I would suggest that the label "Smart TV" is a misnomer.

Reviews.Title: Two thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Widowmaker
Reviews.Content: Really happy with this purchase. Has excellent sound and picture quality. Smart TV features are nice as well. Tried my hardest to beat Amazon's price but no one was close. Amazon rocks!

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: David A. Foley "March Hare"
Reviews.Content: Great picture and "smart"  we get to watch a number of programs with out the nagging commercial interruptions that seem to eat up 20 minutes of an hours show. .

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart TV 5300
Reviews.Author: Steve Titelman
Reviews.Content: at first I was unhappy with the picture so why did a few adjustments but all in all I am pleased with the quality in the picture of course I would have love for God the one above it 120 rich maybe I will then their future but all in all a great buy good picture

Reviews.Title: Help. How wide it this tv?
Reviews.Author: Lisa Keith
Reviews.Content: One part of this page says 48" and lower down it says 41.7".  My entertainment center will only hold the 42".  What is the real width of this tv?  The exact from end to end!  Can someone he me please?

Reviews.Title: Some features are disabled
Reviews.Author: Steven La Rocque
Reviews.Content: The PIP feature is disabled, this was one of the factors considered in purchasing this Television. Additionally, due to my location - outside the US -some features are not available, therefore the full benefits are not realised. The audio and video jacks/ports at the back is limited and other systems cannot be connected.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Brian Lange.
Reviews.Content: This is actually my first flat screen TV ever.  Seems surprising, but consider the fact that for the past 10+ years I have had a projector setup, so this is a "step down" as my current living situation only allows for a bit of space.  That being said, I am still very pleased with this.The picture quality is very good, the colors are quite vivid, the blacks are strong.I have this hooked up to a receiver, BD player, and Apple TV.  There was no issue harmonizing all the devices, especially with a Universal Remote.  There is space for three HDMI ports in the back, I only need to utilize one of them as I mentioned my AV receiver does the rest.  I will not talk about the sound quality as I only did a basic plug-and-play while setting up.  Now that my AV unit is in, that is what I use for the sound.There seem to be a lot of features for use with wireless.  The wireless was extremely easy to setup and actually picks up more signals than my desktop, which is surprising.  Very simple process to set that up, but this feature I also do not use since I have Apple TV.It is not that heavy, so it will be fairly easy for weak people to pick it up and set it where they want (as long as you aren't wall mounting, I just used the stand)Really, no complaints.  A good buy at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV isn't
Reviews.Author: R. Krause
Reviews.Content: Our previous TV set up was a 37 inch Samsung hooked up to a  computer.  It worked very well but with the new Smart TV I was hoping to be able to eliminate the computer.  We use it mostly for watching Netflix and also web browsing. Unfortunately, the number of apps available for the TV is very limited and the web browser is terrible.  There's a Hulu plus app on the TV but the web browser couldn't handle using the hulu website.  Switching between apps is laborious and I'll never use most of the apps installed.  This just doesn't live up to my expectations.I no longer use the "Smart" functions;  instead, I have gone back to hooking this up to a computer and using it as a large computer monitor.  This was definitely not worth the extra money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Myrna Lee Brooks
Reviews.Content: I boughtb this TV for my grandson for Christmas along with the X-BOX ONE.  His TV was really small.  This is an Amazon best-seller and was recommended by Consumer Reports.  He loves it.

Reviews.Title: It's not a very good tv.
Reviews.Author: E. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This Sumsung TV is outdated. I have a lot of difficulty getting online. It's very slow. I regret the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Judith Jones
Reviews.Content: Love this Smarty Pants TV.  We were able to get our Netflix and Amazon accounts set up in minutes.  Easy to operate even for us non geeks!  Love all the extra stuff like the fitness (like yoga) app.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not great
Reviews.Author: esther
Reviews.Content: Got tv week before christmas 2013, have had it less than a month... Size is good for my bedroom, picture quality is smooth, the TV looks like it's tilted a bit forward when sitting on the mantel on top of dresser, won't straighten but only noticeable if looking at it from sideways. TV takes a while to load up once turned on, to go to home screen, about 30 seconds the most so far. Each time is different. TV will sometimes exit out of online browsing randomly. Roommate has same exact tv, but no errors to his.

Reviews.Title: NICE UPGRADE
Reviews.Author: Jenni
Reviews.Content: COLOR SEEMS A BIT OFF AT TIME AND SO DOES THE SOUND BUT I LOVE IT! it's a great upgrade from my old huge tube TV. next time I will get it bigger (lol)

Reviews.Title: It does what it's supposed to
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: So far it works well with our wifi and we get to watch Breaking Bad and other mindless tripe! I gave it 4 stars because "Loving" a TV seems to be going just a little too far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Abdallah
Reviews.Content: great tv, clear resolution , have  a lot of Apps to install , comes with Netflix , hulu and Amazon stream as OOTB

Reviews.Title: Samsung "Smart T.V."
Reviews.Author: Bootleg "Bootleg "That's right!""
Reviews.Content: This t.v. and the price are AWESOME! A bargain like no other. Great picture, great size, and an even greater price! This t.v. was such a bargain, I wish I needed another one... I would buy it!

Reviews.Title: Short and sweet
Reviews.Author: ARoskelley
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to share my LOVE for my Samsung 40-inch 1080p 60hzHDTV.  I was in the market for an upgrade and on a budget so I decided upon this TV.  Now that I have had it for 3months I would say that it is money well spent and why did it take me such a long time to make the move.Great Job Samsung!

Reviews.Title: samsung tv  UN40EH55300 40- inch 1080 60Hz HDtv
Reviews.Author: Richard Angel ( Cur 31659 )
Reviews.Content: This TV  will not recognize my  IP address 192.168.01.06 when a open Netflix .What can I do .Richard Angel

Reviews.Title: A SmartTV that isn't.
Reviews.Author: Darrell Williams
Reviews.Content: SmartTV option won't connect to the internet.  Somehow, that's my fault,  not samsung.  The picture is better using manual adjustments, but you can't save the settings.  I won't buy another Samsung TV.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: John Zdunczyk
Reviews.Content: It quit working after the third time I had turned it on. I definitely Expected more than that from Samsung in terms of quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Richard Martinez
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I thought that the 60 Hz would provide a good enough picture for me. I don't ask for much, I don't need a 70 inch tv and 3,000 mega pixels.  But I loved this tv so much, I bought a 40 inch 120 Hz and what a world of a difference.  The 32 inch is great for 99% of your viewing pleasure but if you want to watch sports, I recommend at least 120 Hz.  We live and learn.

Reviews.Title: can't go wrong with this product.
Reviews.Author: Barrister
Reviews.Content: This tv is great.  Fits perfectly on my bedroom wall.  Internet/wifi ready.  Netflix now. Great value. Its the 3rd Samsung flat screen that we have bought.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Phyllis D. Jones
Reviews.Content: This is my first Samsung television and I really like it. Easy to install with nice picture. Will purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: quiso
Reviews.Content: Perfect nothing more than deliver problem tv is a early Xmas present I will reference many people to get one

Reviews.Title: happy camper!
Reviews.Author: charles w dame
Reviews.Content: good transaction no problems great tv, would buy another.good price . what more could you wanttv 's are like a box of chocolates you never know what you will get.  [gump]]

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: L. A. Kelley
Reviews.Content: I love many features of this TV. However, I find it difficult to navigate sometimes. Also, whenever my wireless goes down, I have to reinstall it,reentering my security code on their very clumsy keyboard. It should be saved.I have also been unable to get subtitles for Netflix movies. The Search feature doesn't work very well.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: kelly smiecinski
Reviews.Content: Great price and I read a lot of good reviews about this Samsung tv.  Bought as a gift so HAvent got to test it out yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV and a Unbeatable Price
Reviews.Author: E. Garbutt "ELG"
Reviews.Content: It killed me to give Samsung my business as I prefer to buy American-made products, but unfortunately there aren't any American-made products in the TV market that I could find. Having said that, this TV has been absolutely great for the price.Pros:We love the app features such as Netflix, HBO to GO and Hulu etc.Competitive priceOverall the picture is good but the TV needs all the picture settings "tuned" as described in the other reviews before it looks goodCons:Made in Korea by SamsungPicture, in particular color, needs tweaking for various broadcast and movie formatsCan't use WiFi Direct with iOS

Reviews.Title: excellent overall
Reviews.Author: Anup D'cruze
Reviews.Content: iam using this television in india so its cuming in blackwhite so wht would u prefer me to do n should i use a convertor n which one should it be

Reviews.Title: Best TV I ever bought
Reviews.Author: cleo
Reviews.Content: The TV came on time no damage didn't have any issue connecting to my WiFi network updated firmware quickly picture is fantastic with a little tweaking I suggest using Disney wow blueray disc also use the natural picture mode u won't be disappointed and if anybody want to know if they have a Samsung panel just make sure your TV is in standby then press mute 182 power and look under type if the letter A comes after 40 u have a Samsung panel so inconclusion this a great deal of a TV I call it a steel

Reviews.Title: led tv
Reviews.Author: daber-6768
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with picture quality and apps, set up was very easy to configure. Netflix and other downloads are an easy set up in this tv.

Reviews.Title: Not an exclusive bargain.
Reviews.Author: Johahn
Reviews.Content: Great buy because Samsung quality is excellent however I saw this same model elsewhere for the similar price so not an exceptional bargan.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tv, once you figure out how to use it.  The apps are very easy to download and use.  However, the browser is somewhat tricky.  If you can't figure it out, go to YOUTUBE, there are videos posted with demonstrations.  Picture and sound are great.  Assembly and set up was very simple.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value.
Reviews.Author: Jim Moresi
Reviews.Content: We just love everything about this TV so far, except the need to set up a Samsung account to do things we already have an account for...  Picture very good, light-weight, setup really easy.

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer service- inferior materials
Reviews.Author: s12ms "s12ms"
Reviews.Content: Poor Quality MaterialsThe tv arrived on time but the box was quite damaged, actually took pictures while opening package for proof in case  tv was damaged. While turning the tv on the pivoting wall mount the cable connection snapped right off of the back of the tv, not sure if this was due to shipping damage or extremely poor quality of the cable connector built in to the tv. Called about repair or warranty and it isn't covered and will cost $290.00 to repair. 40 years owning tv's and I have never had the cable connector snap off of a tv set and yes 3 tv's in my home are on a pivotal wall mount. Metal is extremely thin attaching  connector to inside of tv; hard to believe it is that fragile and not defective which is why I feel this repair should be covered.

Reviews.Title: Good TV + Netflix + wireless
Reviews.Author: ButterflyGuy
Reviews.Content: I'm very much impressed with my new 40" TV. I'm using it in a place I don't have cable, but the OTA signal is good. Also having the ability to connect to Netflix, YouTube and Pandora is super. I can also plug in a thumb drive and watch mp4 movies or listen to audio or a slide show. It does have an audio out port so you can listen with headphones if needed.There are a number of features I haven't tried out yet - like adding a USB wireless mouse and keyboard + a number of other features which I probalby won't even use.The sound is pretty good for a smaller TV and you can adjust the color to your preference.Note - it did turn off and reboot one time - not sure why that happened.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: My World "GBJCC"
Reviews.Content: Great product for the value. But unfortunately, the price has come down a lot. You can now buy this a Costco for around $300+. I like the fact that this little tv includes a browser app. Very useful to use for browsing the internet, especially when a laptop is not around to use. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: five stars says it all.
Reviews.Author: Phillip Phelts
Reviews.Content: A five star response should not require any additional response. Five stars means that the product met all of my expectations.

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: nice tv for the price. picture is clear and it is nice for the price on amazon for sure 'merica

Reviews.Title: good TV but not very smart
Reviews.Author: Doc "Doc"
Reviews.Content: Great for a TV but I am very disappointed with its "smart" abilities. It does not support screen mirroring with the Galaxy S4 and it is not very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: alsome
Reviews.Author: isaiah
Reviews.Content: Love this tv I buy this other part for the baby of the tv but loove it that alot. I been love for a big tv any way. N I find the one I whated...

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: john r.salewski
Reviews.Content: I like this TV because its differint from my other TV  so far i've had no problem with it. thankyou

Reviews.Title: A Smart Purchase of a Smart TV
Reviews.Author: PACKWINE
Reviews.Content: This TV set has all the latest smart TV features we can expect.  A great value.Samsung makes quality products.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. Enrico
Reviews.Content: Really love the look and workings of this unit. Easy setup and great picture. I would recommend this TV as a good purchase for the money

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: meysam
Reviews.Content: I purchased it one month ago, I do not have problem in this period. although, I hesitated to buy vizio or samsung

Reviews.Title: cant be beat
Reviews.Author: elddap
Reviews.Content: This Tv is a replacement for $1,000 Samsung that got hit by lightning.  The picture quality is just as good,The on line smart feature a joy,  The only downside is the stand, it does not swivle, a small price to pay fora TV at half the price of my 4 yr old Tv.My $100 surge protector fried in the on position

Reviews.Title: Sony look out...
Reviews.Author: Stephen Bagiatis Jr. "Hodgieb"
Reviews.Content: I am a Sony man... love the quality.  But the price is higher than Samsung.  I was looking for a 32 inch tv for the beadroom and this beauty (and a SMART TV) was half as much as the Sony.  We love it.  Samsung makes a nice 1080 tv for half the price.  It is NOT as sharp as my Sony, but it is a super tv for "other" rooms in the house.  We are very happy with the quality.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Della
Reviews.Content: This is easy to set up and personalize. The quality and price make this a great bargain.  I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Quality and value!
Reviews.Author: Big L
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV. Samsung is the best value out there! I now have 3 Samsung TVs, 32", 46" & 55" and all of them are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with lots of Web Functionality
Reviews.Author: tvman
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the bedroom.  For the first week I used the Smart TV functions only and the TV has great functionality with that.  The wifi pickup is great and there is hardly any waiting on Netflix HD content.I didn't care for the dynamic mode but the movie mode with detail at 100% is pleasing to my eye.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Rhodes
Reviews.Content: I own many Samsung products and this one did not disappoint. I is everything we thought it would be. We simply love it!

Reviews.Title: Everything I Expected!
Reviews.Author: Joan Hardman
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived way before expected, and was in very good condition.  I was amazed how light-weight it was!  I am enjoying it every day.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Reader
Reviews.Content: This TV has brilliant colors, easy to use remote, and sufficient volume.  The quality is great even in 720p broadcasts.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32" 1080p led tv
Reviews.Author: F. Daher
Reviews.Content: Very nice product, delivers an excellent picture. Not very difficult to set up. Am very happy with it's performance, recommended.

Reviews.Title: A great product!
Reviews.Author: William R. Hopcraft
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Great sound.  Set up and running in ten minutes without an engineering degree.  I strongly recommend this TV!

Reviews.Title: Can watch movies in bed
Reviews.Author: Barbara A Finley
Reviews.Content: With the smart feature can record and watch movies in the comfort of my new bed.  Very enjoyable and very clear.

Reviews.Title: Great product that anticipates users needs
Reviews.Author: Mixed Nuts
Reviews.Content: Worked great right out of the box, and has lots of great features that were not expected. Samsung seems to be ahead of the pack in understanding the consumer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: C. Holmes
Reviews.Content: We have a 55" ES6500 in the living room and wanted a larger set of the bedroom.  Given the similarity between the TV's the calibration portion was simple and the interface is extremely familiar.  This is a great TV for the price we paid (~$800) and we are very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Raymond E. Kobeski "RayK"
Reviews.Content: Granted I just connected the tv but, it's by far the best tv I've ever had.  I have a decent sized bedroom and the sound quality is rich and clear.  Connecting to wifi was a snap, auto tuning was a snap.  I've never been a fan of Samsung products but, I'll be buying another one.  Color/picture/sound, just wow.  I love it and the price is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Great features but didnt work long
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: We received the TV very fast which is normal for amazon prime and for about 3 weeks it worked fine; then all of the sudden it started to turn itself off. It would do it every minute or so no matter how long it had been on for so i don't think it was getting hot and shutting down. I went online to amazon and put the request in which they offered me my money back, trade for something else, or replace the TV. I chose to replace the TV because we really liked it and for $356 i felt it was a great deal; same TV at Walmart was like $500 plus i don't like supporting Walmart for anything!!Over all it was a good experience and my hat is off to Amazon for how well they treat customers and how easy they make the buying and returning experience when needed.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: ktr
Reviews.Content: This tv is amazing.  I love the samsung apps.  this tv has a great picture and was very easy to mount.  no problems at all.  great picture.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear
Reviews.Author: cjbc
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv.  I use it primarily for hulu, Netflix and skype in my basement.  I also purchased the skype camera for the TV and have been very happy with the whole system.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG DELIVERS!
Reviews.Author: R. BRYANT "RO"
Reviews.Content: I AM A SAMSUNG FAN AND THEY ONCE AGAIN MADE ME HAPPY. GREAT PICTURE! MANY OPTIONS AND AMAZON PACKED AND DELIVERED IN A TIMELY MANNER! VERY PLEASED WITH PURCHASE?

Reviews.Title: GREAT SET
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth S. Fox
Reviews.Content: Great set. Easy to set up, the built in WiFi is a big plus! The only downside is the sound, not great, but it is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected.
Reviews.Author: SH
Reviews.Content: The picture on this unit is very nice right out of the box with no settings adjustment. Not a huge fan of LED but was pleasantly surprised. Kids play Wii and watch movies on this in their room and love it. Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Quaker2012
Reviews.Content: TV is very user friendly and has all the lates programs. Load a wireless keyboard & mouse and it defaults and you are able to use social media. One of the best pictures for a set this size and I've looked at all brands. Compatible to LG

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Much better than Vizio Smart TV's.
Reviews.Author: J. Walker
Reviews.Content: I bought this mostly for the "smart" part of it. Before buying this model, I tried a Vizeo in about the sme price range and the same size, but the smart tv interface was poorly designed and very limited...and very slow. This Samsung TV is a much, much better tv in every way! The picture is great, the user interface is easy and attractive, and the it offers much more smart-tv functionality. Occasionally it will get stuck at the end of a movie or show on Netflix, but not often. I spent a lot of time researching for a smaller TV about this size, and really don't think there's a better 32 inch TV out there in this price range (I bought it for about $350 on sale).

Reviews.Title: It's a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Kazap "Steeler Fan"
Reviews.Content: You don't really need a review from me the last 4 TVs I bought were versions of this unit..All are dependable, all are a pleasure to watch

Reviews.Title: What a great buy!
Reviews.Author: Natasha Chernavska
Reviews.Content: At first I was hesitant. I needed a TV for my bedroom and wasn't sure if I should buy a small TV (32") for my bedroom or put the one I have (40") in my bedroom and buy a larger size TV for my living room. On one hand, why not buy a bigger TV, on another hand, I could buy a $350 TV right away, and with a bigger one I would have to wait. SO I decided I didn't wanna wait and bought a 32" TV for my bedroom.My other TV is a Samsung, too, and I LOVE the quality. I love everything about it. It's easy to operate, it has 2 USB ports, and my external drive works perfectly with it. It reads and plays all my movies fine, and I like it that it properly displays that file system om my external drive.I don't have cable, so I use it only for watching movies. It can be used to browse internet, but I am not interested in doing that, I would rather use a laptop. I had no problems connecting it to my WiFi, and there is no delay in displaying. I am a Prime Amazon member, so now I can watch HD movies for free! What a treat!My only suggestion is that I could set up the view of my interactive screen, cause it has lots of stuff (kids, fitness, whatever) that I don't need, and there is no way to customize it. Also, what I am not sure I like, I would like to have an option for TV to start where I turned it off. Since I don't have cable, and, frankly, mostly use my TV to watch movies on Amazon (or movies from my external drive), I am kind of annoyed that it always starts trying to find signal and displaying white noise. Then I have to load an interactive panel, once again, navigate to Amazon app, wait for it to load. What would be nice is to turn the TV on and just have my Amazon app already loaded.Also, an on-board DVD player would definitely help with this model, but I am just being picky here. I am really enjoying the TV, it's a wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Novakowski
Reviews.Content: I want to give this TV 5 stars because it really is fantastic BUT I just can't. When I first hooked the TV up and attempted to configure it to my wifi, I had some serious issues and had to call Samsung directly. After several attempts I finally got it hooked up and Samsung's customer services was great. Then, the SmartHub stopped working (it said there was no network connection) even though my wifi was perfectly fine. I had to call Samsung again and they had to ship the update for the TV on a USB drive to me so that it would reconnect to the internet. I still have not received the USB, so I am a bit frustrated that I cannot use the Smart feature of the TV. Overall, I would recommend it and am looking to buy a 32 in for my bedroom. I just hope I have no more technical problems after this!

Reviews.Title: goooddd
Reviews.Author: henryguez18
Reviews.Content: I really recommend to buy this if you are looking quality, price, and durability. The price is fantastic and the quality is second to none.

Reviews.Title: terrific tv
Reviews.Author: hilary
Reviews.Content: easy to set up; delightful to watch; sound quality satisfactory.apps have updated and continue to do so.great buy... you'll enjoy it!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tv
Reviews.Author: Chadwick G. Goldberg "Chad"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the purchase. The tv proves and excellent picture, and was price relatively well given how well it performs.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
