Reviews.Content: This TV does not have a headphone jack on the television.Major deficiency. My wife wants to return the TV because of this defect

Reviews.Title: D.O.A.
Reviews.Author: Burns O. Bailey "Bob B."
Reviews.Content: Arrived with box in good condition but after spending all the time to mount on the wall it was damaged and did not work.....total waste of my time!

Reviews.Title: Google: Samsung has poor Quality Control before buying!
Reviews.Author: Thomas C.
Reviews.Content: My Samsung TV quit working just after 1 year.  The Web shows a class action suit for faulty capacitors over a number of years.  Since my particular model was not on their list of models, the customer service rep said I am on my own. Do yourself a favor and search: Samsung Quality Control. So, faulty capacitors, bad power supplies, or whatever is wrong with mine, I would stay far away from Samsung.  $1200 and it will not last 2 years.  Your better off at rent a center.I've read that Panasonic has much better quality control.  Stay away from Samsung, I wish I did.

Reviews.Title: NOT ACTUALLY A 120HZ TV
Reviews.Author: KENT E.
Reviews.Content: SAMSUNG IS LISTING THIS AS A 120HZ TV, WHEN ACTUALLY ITS A 60 HZ. THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISEMENT! ITS ONE THING TO STATE 120 CLEAR MOTION RATE, BUT TO SAY ITS 120HZ IS QUITE THE DIFFERENCE.

Reviews.Title: WATCH OUT FOR MISSING PARTS
Reviews.Author: Robert Irr
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV on amazon and it was missing the guide stand (the part the connects the TV panel to the base).  Very disappointed with this experience.. think twice before you order on Amazon.  There is a good chance the product you buy does not include all of the parts that it should.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Alan Rowoth
Reviews.Content: This is an extraordinarily STUPID tv. Their apps are crap. Practically every time I go to Netflix, I need to reinput all my login information. I have a USB keyboard attached to the set, but most of the apps don't recognize it. Tonight when I went to open Netflix, it opened Youtube instead. Yes, it's a TV, but don't waste your money on apps that don't work. Buy a TV that admits that it's stupid and use the Apple TV box instead to stream your content. No more Samsung products for me.

Reviews.Title: Detective tv
Reviews.Author: Lee Smith
Reviews.Content: I got the tv to find out a pixel was detective.Had to repackage it and return it.Not very happy.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK! WASTE OF MONEY & TIME!!
Reviews.Author: Marcus Young
Reviews.Content: never could get the wifi features to work. It will waste hours of your time making you think its connecting or its something wrong with your service until one day in the far future you realize samsung just made a piece of junk which amazon wont let you return because you didnt meet their precious "window".... screw this tv and and amazon!

Reviews.Title: Total CRAP
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Was on chat with Samsung for over an hour and they finally admitted the Smart Hub has issues and they can't fix it. NetFlix is NOT accessible through Samsungs Smart Hub. BUy something else. This is NOT a Smart TV!. Total JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Will never buy a TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Tan
Reviews.Content: We brought this tv from amazon. When we unpacked it, the screen was fully damaged..So we had to return it... We thought it would be simple... But no..it was NOT. We got the new tv which was not damaged but the returning process for old tv was really a pain. Its been a month still the damaged tv has not been picked up by the UPS people.When we talk with the amazon customer service they say that the UPS driver will havw the return label and when we talk with ups driver they say we have not got the return label from amazon. This is being going around since past 15 days. Amazon people have created 3 return labels but everytime UPS people come and ask for return label which we dont have.We still have the damaged tv which the UPS people refuse to pick up...The UPS people say its between you and amazon...and refuse to help. The Amazon customer service does nothing except saying 'they will pick it up dont worry'Everytime I talk with a new lady at amazon customer service and she cant do anything about it except giving us a hope that UPS will pick up(damaged tv).We even got an email from amazon stating that if we dont return the damaged tv before the said date they will charge us 480$. Now what should one really do if the ups or amazon people dont co-operate or co-ordinate?I have nothing against the product which we brought, we love our TV. But we will think twice before buying anything from amazon.

Reviews.Title: smart tv???
Reviews.Author: edward choi
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a smart tv.  but instead nothing for the online stuff works.  when i check connection to the internet, it says that it's connected but internet, app or any other smart tv function does not work.

Reviews.Title: Never buy used electronics
Reviews.Author: Burton Bullard
Reviews.Content: Got this tv from amazons warehouse deals in like new condition. All they did was send me someone else's malfunctioning tv. Picture would flash and fade in color and brightness, something that would have need easy to pick up has someone plugged it in. I sent it back and to add insult to injury they charged me a $110 restocking fee on their broken tv. I feel sorry for the next sucker that gets shipped this tv. Can only imagine how many times a day this happens. I replaced with a new Lg that works great. Don't be fooled by warehouse deals big waste of everyone's time. And bad for Samsung too because I will never consider another Samsung as a result of my last experience. The only reason I didn't rate zero stars is it wouldn't let me.

Reviews.Title: First disappointment with Samsung
Reviews.Author: larrylw
Reviews.Content: No DVI or VGA port for computer input.Requires hdmi to DVI adapterPicture quality disappointing.Not good for computer monitor

Reviews.Title: had to return it because dead pictel in center of screen
Reviews.Author: EDWARD DEANE
Reviews.Content: when package arrived the box was broken in many places and theier was a hole in box and tv had a dead pixel and spend many many hours on phone and decided to return item

Reviews.Title: Hdmi ports go bad on Samsung tvs.  Stay away or expect to pay a lot for repair
Reviews.Author: JAM
Reviews.Content: In summary - don't buy Samsung led TVs unless you want to pay hundreds of dollars in repairs.At first my TV picture would go blank intermittently and this was right after I bought my TV. Samsung support (which btw is horrible) said that this was normal and maybe fixed in the future.  Ok  I said I'd live with it but asked them to put this in my record in case I have problems in the future.  Well you betcha I have problems. All HDMI ports don't work. Worst when I called support again to record the issue they give me a repair ticket number and a phone number to call. The repair firm had no record of the ticket and when I called back Samsung to find out what's up, there was no record of the repair ticket number.  The rep didn't enter the info!I think Samsung deliberately creates a circular maze of support incompetence to make you give up.So buy Sony instead - mine is 7 years old and works great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Paul Ruiz
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz Smart LED HDTV (Black) arrived not working . Amazon was notified as soon as my Granddaughter opened it and tried to get it working . It was sent back and a Samsung UN40EH5300 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV, Black was bought and worked right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture but NO SLINGBOX capability
Reviews.Author: Preston E. Peckham "Preston EPS"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV at BJ's and used the suggested video settings in several reviews. Awful picture out of the box but outstanding picture after adjustments. I purchased this for my vacation home to view my Slingbox through my internet connection but after doing all the setup procedures I went to connect to my Slingbox only to get a notice saying Slingbox will not work with this browser. I packed it up and returned it to BJ's for a full refund after explaining the problem to them. I could have attached a laptop to the TV to view my Slingbox but I already have that capability and just wanted to use one source. As I said, the picture is awesome and I didn't have any problem with the sound. One other problem was concerning using the remote control for searching the web. I did use a wireless mouse and keyboard but since the USB input is on the back of the TV I could not utilize that function from my couch. I hope this makes sense to potential buyers and prevents them from making the same mistake. If and when Sling does make their product work with the smart TVs I will certainly purchase again. I would have purchased this smart TV from Amazon but I wanted to set it up that day.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy Samsung Unless You're a Networking Guru
Reviews.Author: R. Beltz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV at Wal-Mart at a very good price. Being my first HDTV I was looking forward to how far TV has advanced since I bought my last tube TV about 10 years ago.Setup for TV, VCR player and DVD player was fairly easy. TV picture quality was pretty good. Then I ran into serious issues when trying to connect to my AT&T; U-verse network. I went through the Samsung menus and it said I was connected. When I tried to bring up something on Smart Hub it said I was not connected. I worked with an AT&T; engineer on this and he stated that the Internet was full of complaints like this with Samsung Smart TVs.I notified Samsung support and they sent me a 15-step process to get the wireless network to work the way it should! Does anyone really expect a new Samsung customer to go through a 15-step process to connect to the Internet? Why wasn't the TV checked and tested thoroughly and the software/firmware updated properly before it was shipped to the store? Being a retired computer and business professional, I would NEVER expect ANY customer to have to go through this laborious process to get a new TV working properly.This is the first HDTV I have ever bought and I am almost 65 years old! I have previously owned many TVs: A Sony Triniton (25 yrs), Panasonic (Still using after 15 yrs) Toshiba (Sill have after 10 yrs) and JVC (Sold in 2009) and I NEVER had ANY trouble with any of them from Day 1.This Samsung TV experience has left a very bad taste in my mouth. I returned the TV to Wal-Mart for a refund. Next time I will look for LG, Panasonic or Sony. Samsung never again!

Reviews.Title: sheety tv
Reviews.Author: Mohammed Zafar
Reviews.Content: the tv is ok, nice picture, good sound, but tv wifi conection is so poor, it is smart tv but it dose'nt have a key board remort, this tv cost me $650 and it dos'nt have pc conection. s***y tv i ever seen!

Reviews.Title: Great TV...
Reviews.Author: anguillian
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, however I should have gotten a bigger size.  I thought for my Small Apartment, this size would be fine, however a 40" would have been better.

Reviews.Title: 3 hdmi ?
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: Where is this 3rd hdmi I keep hearing about ? I only see 2 on mine, unless its cleverly stashed away somewhere, I only seem to have 2 on mine.

Reviews.Title: Gee Whiz stuff
Reviews.Author: Tinslinger
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice TV. The WiFi connection lets you do just about anything you could do on a computer from the comfort of your bed or easy chair. There are a few shortcomings as far as features. The picture could be better. We have a 50" plasma 1080p and the picture on the Samsung is not as good, but is still far better than the 19" old style TV it replaced. There is an on timer, but doesn't seem to be an alarm.  So since we have satellite TV, the timer will turn on the TV but that doesn't do much good without a TV show with volume to wake you. Also, there is no DVD player like our old TV had. I suppose that is because I guess I can watch movies from Netflix  or satellite TV so I don't need a DVD player, but I would have liked to have one.Overall, this is definitely an upgrade from our old TV. The setup and operation is easy enough and we are so far very satisfied with this TV.

Reviews.Title: NEVER ORDER TV'S FROM AMAZON ONLINE!!
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: I received this TV with a broken screen, when I filled for a return the next TV I received was a similar model and not the intended one. The second replacement was also damaged with a screen! I spent a month receiving and returning to damaged TV's only to just buy one from Best Buy... Thanks but No Thanks I guess!

Reviews.Title: TV RETURNED
Reviews.Author: Edward Bauer
Reviews.Content: IT WAS BROKEN, SCREEN AND CABLE CONNECTION. Bad experence foe me.Could not recamend anyone. product was returned and not inspected before sent out again.

Reviews.Title: It still doesn't work!
Reviews.Author: kristine agardi
Reviews.Content: The latest reason it doesn't work is the samsung server is full.  Tv won't connect to internet.  That has been the reason for over a week.

Reviews.Title: TV has a good picture but that's about it honestly!
Reviews.Author: Adam hammer
Reviews.Content: TV has a good picture but that's about it honestly, Samsung phone support is as about as bad as apples if that's even possible. I couldn't access my hotmail.com e mail messages at all ( I can get into the account and see my mail then when I click on individual messages nothing happens) when I call Samsung they say this is a know issue in this 2012 model and nothing they can do about it. The first phone call I placed to a Samsung helpless desk tech I asked him to do remote support into my TV to resolve an issue I am having with it. He then states that all of the  people in that dept that does that type of thing are in a meeting and not available to do that right know( this is during normal business hours and he still will not transfer me) I demand to speak to a manager then he transfers me to a 2nd level support tech. OK so 2nd phone call I waited for 25 minutes for the dept that does remote support( they must not have enough people to do this and/or just had allot of layoffs) after this I am disconnected after the battery on my cell phone goes dead. 3rd phone call to their helpless  desk I have a question about plex media server, I get a dude in  Indian this time he refuses to answer my question and said that application is not supported. 4th time I am chatting with someone with Samsung IM I ask them to go ahead and setup a call back for 3 days from now. They refuse so after this I pack up the TV and send back to amazon since I can't even get any one to help me connect a DVD player to the receiver that's connected to the TV. will go down to best buy and get a TV from them when I have the time next week,  finally if you are going to be setting up a media server to go along with this TV on your PC it can be very buggy honestly, just a heads up. Other wise enjoy and good luck with Samsung's tech support! you will need it.

Reviews.Title: SmartTV...not quite don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Ulices
Reviews.Content: This TV is barely a 'smartTV.' None of the main apps like Youtube and Netflix work with Keyboard Support despite what another reviewer said about the 40" inch version having keyboard support, maybe it works for the 40" but 32" keyboard functionality is none existent. The browser is the only place the keyboard works but the browser crashes often and if you go to youtube on the browser your video resolution is limited for some reason, clicking on the resolution button through the smarthub browser does not show the same high resolution you would be normally allowed to choose from using your computer browser. Oddly the best resolution is only available on the included YouTube app but searching for videos is frustrating using the virtual keyboard (non qwerty), after one time picking a letter at a time you are going to regret purchasing this 'smartTV.' Really a dudTV, picture quality is great but you can get the same picture quality on other non SmartTVS at lower prices too. I highly recommend you stay away from this SmartTV. Just search/google for 'Samsung smartTV keyboard not working' and read the feedback, it's not an isolated issue, it's really a functionality or lack of, not at all what I expected from Samsung...very disappointing product.

Reviews.Title: SmartHub is not worth the frustration
Reviews.Author: Mohammed Amin
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV last year. I have no complaints with the quality of the picture extra. The thing that drives me to write this review is the smart hub. I use the smart hub mostly to watch Netflix and the amount of issues I had to deal with has led me to buy a new streaming device for this TV. The issues that I have with SmartHub are1. I have to enter my account information every few days.2. I have to connect to my wireless network every few months.3. Once I connect to Netflix I have to dismiss an error on average 5 times before I can watch anything.4. Finally the most frustrating thing, the whole TV restarts in the middle of watching a movie on Netflix.The problem is further exacerbated by the fact that I dont have to do any of this any of the time for my Roku Player. I am a software engineer by profession and i know what is going to happen if I call Samsung, I will be sent from Samsung to Netflix to my ISP. Bottomline, I dont have a problem getting Netflix to work with any other device excepts Samsung, so I think Samsung must be doing something wrong. Don't buy this TV for the SmartHub.

Reviews.Title: Not Smart TV
Reviews.Author: dissatissfied
Reviews.Content: The Picture is fine but that is all. every timei got to use the computer part of this TV i find something else wrong with it. Let see, The PIP only has two sizes,  the largest bein too small to see. many places when you try to type or place curser with the mouse the screen jumps off from where you are.  it wont let you place the curser between words even as i am typing this. you tube app and facebook app are complete crap. no features and crashes due to crappy memory. most of apps are worthless. i deleted all i could.yenom dna emit ym the OS keeps locking up constantly even after reset and OS update. OS obviously too big for processor, Whoever made these programs and os should be fired from Samsung.  they need to scrap everrything and start over, This TV is junk. the browser is only good for reading. willnot open more than one browser at a time without crashing. do not buy these "dumb" tv's they are nothing but junk. slow to turn on slow when using smart part which you pay for. Why would Samsung put such cr

Reviews.Title: Shocked & Appalled
Reviews.Author: jwtravel
Reviews.Content: Everything was working great until about 4 hours after the first plug-in, then the screen went blank and all we get is the flicker of the red light. "Re-boot" does nothing, can't get any picture, menu, NOTHING. Took longer to get room ready and set up the TV than the time we got to use it. Now we will have to take it back, maybe even ship it to the manufacturer; the onus will be on us. Be careful with review ratings - the average might be really high but always check out the outlying low rankings to see what happened. Sometimes, it's just a customer venting when the product didn't meet their expectations. In this case, the low rankings were folks with the same issue - the television simply stops working for no rhyme or reason. Loved our first Samsung 3 years ago but this experience means that I'll be looking for another brand. When I think about all the science behind the electronic components in this product and all of the calculations that are performed for product reliability and failure rates, I have placed all electronics companies on a ZERO TOLERANCE policy; one screw-up and you are DONE.

Reviews.Title: It was "dead on arrival"
Reviews.Author: rwbtelecomguy
Reviews.Content: This is 3 Samsung failure in a short period of time!!!!!!  Very poor performance!!! bad bad bad bad bad bad

Reviews.Title: Looks great, works wonderfully
Reviews.Author: Mr. Jean-Claude Perelman
Reviews.Content: This product arrived in the time frame indicated.  The picture is sharp and vibrant, and the sound clear. Over all it has performed wonderfully and it was easy to set up.  I have not tried to connect it to a network, so I can not comment on it's SMART TV applications, hence the reason for the four stars.  Overall, to date, I am very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: What a piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Seeker
Reviews.Content: Samsung have put too many features into their TV, none of which work to any degree of responsiveness that can satisfy a User. Very slow response, menus that don't function as promised, and endless waiting for updates  (probably as they scroll through all functionality when a simple restriction to limited review would suffice). Why doesn't Samsung realize that TV engineers should not write User Interface software.I see the logic of what they are trying to do but the execution is pathetic. The result is User frustration of trying to do what takes forever to execute. Total disappointment that makes the upgrade to HDTV highly questionable. Surely some other TV maker can do better.

Reviews.Title: extremely disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Took a chance and ordered this on black friday instead or going to a store and buying one. The box arrived damaged and the tv is cracked and completely unusable. After filing a complaint and talking to a representative on the phone for an hour the only option is a refund of my money.After being  a Amazon prime customer for years I am completely blown away. Amazon will not stand by their black friday deals and deliver the item. It is now $300 more than the black friday price. As much as I have loved Amazon in the past it looks like you can not trust them for large electronics.

Reviews.Title: TV SIDE BODY BROKEN. function  a little..
Reviews.Author: NARZIEV JASUR
Reviews.Content: I got this TV but also Wi fi does not work function a little .. and the most unexpected was this TV side body broken here is a look I posted photos.I did not expect such a terrible service from you. before I ordered and received the goods at the time and was pleased. even now don `t know what to say

Reviews.Title: Incompatible with Mac
Reviews.Author: Discriminatrix
Reviews.Content: I bought a Samsung Smart TV in October 2012. Twice now it has suddenly stopped detecting my wireless network, meaning it couldn't access Netflix, HBO Go...the fun stuff. Turns out that both times it needed a firmware update.NB: Samsung does not post or send any alert when that's about to happen.I went through 3 chat sessions to get the new firmware downloaded. But couldn't get TV to "see" it on the flash drive.Called tech support who said the firmware can only be updated via PC. I have a Mac. They suggested I "borrow a friend's" PC.Oh yes they did.Obviously this is due to a) legal issues with Samsung & Apple and b) Samsung's utter idiocy.So much for "smart."

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Edwin Zayas
Reviews.Content: it wasnt  what I expected.I cannt connect to my laptop,yes is very much.awesome.bye now bye bye bye dont bother me writing more

Reviews.Title: not native 1080p, color too Neon, No Netflix, and tracking built in tracking for Advertisment.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: only 3.5 stars b/c on my computer it will not give me native 1080p as it is a 40" and not 42";  also color adjustment is needed which I cannot seem to get right,  Neon colors either look 'washed' or 'overly bright';  adjusting this for natural tones makes the flesh tones too natural or too red.  Not sure if its me or the TV.It will not keep in memory the last "input" you had so you must choose your input every time.After the latest firmware update I no longer get Netflix sound or Amazon video.  A call to amazon has not yet solved this.Samsung also wants to track your habits and advertise to you if you wish to use their Smart console.

Reviews.Title: pos
Reviews.Author: robert clamage
Reviews.Content: Wow.  Owned for a few months, finallt got around to smart, not really.  Clunky, crappy, slow....and reboots due to "lack of memory" or whatever often.  And I can't get outlook to display messages in the reading pane.

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: Mary Rix
Reviews.Content: Samsung LED-LCD Smart HDTV have come a long way now in 2012. Samsung's SMART software is the dealbreaker in the market which has it all including AllShare which allows all format of files to be played including .MKVs, .AVIs, .WMVs, .MPGs, .VOBs, .FLVs etc and also plays videos, pictures from all kinds of input hardware like USB Flash Drive, HDMI and also wirelessly from the Windows/Mac laptops. This TV however has missed out on 16 Pin S-video input. Navigating the Web Browser is a bit of a sore with the Remote but with a wireless keyboard/mouse it works like a breeze. Apart from that the available apps have an awesome colection including default/in-built YouTube, NetFlix, Pandora, Amazon Instant Video, Hulu Plus - not to mention the Skype, Vudu HD Movies, Red Karaoke etc. The TV is just overrated, not as good as I expected.

Reviews.Title: The greatest television ever made!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Pamerleau
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a television with time travel capabilities, this is the one!  Not only was I able to get this television to 88mph without a problem, I was able to travel without affecting our world at all!  Don't mind the cyborgs, they've always been here.

Reviews.Title: Dont Buy this Smart Tv!!!!
Reviews.Author: md176
Reviews.Content: We bought this Smart TV with a excitement of all the features that this tv has like web browser,Netflix,Youtube and many more. With in one day after receiving this product we started getting error while accessing SMART HUB. Even though we were connected to WIFI or wireless network it started throwing different errors like ERROR_CODE_01,ERROR_MODEL_BINd and many more.To add to this the web browser does not support many sites and is no good but you can use it just to read.Every time when we power off or switch on this tv the different error it used to throw for smart hub. WE have decided to return this TV and have already processed it.I request each one of you to think twice before buying this product and not get attracted to all the feature this tv has which of no use at all.........My opinion for this TV is "DONT BUY THIS SMART HUB IT SUCS".Regardsmd176

Reviews.Title: Product arrived damaged.
Reviews.Author: Stanley E. Skopit
Reviews.Content: Why doesn't your company pack this type of product in more secure packing so that it would arrive without damage?

Reviews.Title: Smart tv
Reviews.Author: L in Miss
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tv that would pick up wifi and thats why I bought this. I got the 32" and was suprized it wasnt bigger, but thats not anybodys fault. Great tv.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great; sound not so great
Reviews.Author: Ann, Littleton, CO
Reviews.Content: Update 12/22/2013 -- It finally arrived in a U-Haul truck.  The only thing (I believe) that saved it was that it was in the original box not repackaged in the brown box.  I know someone mentioned that they did not like that, but I believe it saves this type merchandise.  ON TO THE TV.I can't speak to the setup because I had a young man who knows this stuff set it up for me and then show us how to change settings if we needed to.  The picture is just great, we timed it yesterday during a football game against the non HD TV in the other room and it's 8 seconds ahead.  Have not tried the "smart TV" stuff because I need to wait until the roommate is gone.  He has not use for movies.  The price during the black Friday sale was terrific.  The sound is not as good as the Toshiba of the same size we have in another room, but I bought a sound bar and cleared that problem right up.  I would recommend the TV but not FedX.Suppliers should advise what carrier they are going to use.  Who knows what might happen if I ever see it.  Amazon shippers should indicate which carrier they are going to use.  USP has been here every day this week.  equipped for cold weather, but delivering!!  FedX says the weather is to bad to deliver.  Said TV has been on the truck for 3 days, I live in a highly developed metro area.  This is my third FedX delivery that has gone bad, t(three for three) they are days late with damaged merchandise.  If am smart I will return unopened. I believe the number of people who received damaged merchandise found their shipper was FedX.

Reviews.Title: Wrong item sent
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The outside box was of different (Model Samsung UN40EH5300 40-Inch 1080p LED HDTV, Color Black) compared to actual tv. The model inside was Samsung UN40EH5000F). If the right product was sent then I would be happy may be.

Reviews.Title: Not smart at all
Reviews.Author: MiddleNy
Reviews.Content: Just less than two months, the Netflix is not working any more,  it is always connecting, you can't shot it down with remote, just like frozen computer.  the browser is really not smart,dispointed.

Reviews.Title: From the ladygeek
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: If I would have known what peripherals that didn't work with this TV,  I never would have purchased it.  Tech support is about the worst I've ever seen and I know because  I've done tech support for years (Samsung is worse than Micro$oft if that is even possible).  There are no compatible keyboards if you want to browse the web with this.  Essentially, if you want to use a keyboard, you'll have to buy the 60" because that's the only model that is supported.  Wireless works ok - not a lot of problems there.I also purchased a Samsung tab2 and have had similar experiences.  Next one that I'm buying is not going to be a Samsung product - it will be the Apple I-pad mini when it starts shipping.

Reviews.Title: not a great image
Reviews.Author: bernaldo dominguez
Reviews.Content: the colors are not sharp over all I don't like the tv I thought it was going to be great but is just an over priced junk

Reviews.Title: hi amazon!
Reviews.Author: Maryann Lee
Reviews.Content: Am enjoying the smart tv very much. Wish I had bought a larger screen though. This new technology is challenging to the everyday brain.

Reviews.Title: me vino dañado
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: este producto vino partido la pantalla, exijo que me devuelvan el producto por uno bueno por que la pantalla por dentro vino partida

Reviews.Title: SUCKS
Reviews.Author: vania haischer
Reviews.Content: I gave this product 1 year, thinking that I may be able to figured out how to use this product, thinking may be I was missing something.  Oh NO!  I was missing something, Samsung missing a lot of things:  1. Amazon app does not work at all 2. Web browser does not work well at all even when I go to amazon.com (it cannot load the movie I rented from Amazon after paying to watch the movie)  3. Television does not have enough "Power" to run internet shows such as Bloomberg, Ed Show, or Rachel Maddow 4. Television said that the television does not have enough memory to watch things on the internet.Meanwhile, I paid and bought this TV because of these things advertised on it.  PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS TV BECAUSE YOU ARE ONLY GOING TO WASTE YOUR MONEY.

Reviews.Title: not Smart. .stupid
Reviews.Author: disappointed
Reviews.Content: Not compatible with wireless keyboard marketed by Samsung. Not loaded with Adobe flash player needed to make it"smart" and useful and the operating system and browser combination is obsolete (linux 32 bit, safari)

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Had to send this back.  I had not read the description carefully, and the "used" was there, but I didn't see it.  Could not get it to connect to the internet, even after two service calls.

Reviews.Title: CAN NOT USE IT IN  AUSTRALIA
Reviews.Author: Hongyi Jiang
Reviews.Content: it‘s a NTSC tv, not compatible for PAL signal. I CAN NOT USE IT IN  AUSTRALIA. The amazon is selling this TV to the rest of the world, you should notice this compatible issue clearly in your product description on your website，not every customer know about this problem. I shouldn't get the blame.  It’s my first time buying big screen TV from amazon for all my  flatmates  but we wait for a week and end up losting $80 with a big disappointment. That was a very BAD customer experience.

Reviews.Title: Dammage TV can not be exchanged
Reviews.Author: Mr. Ed
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV with the Black Friday sales and it arrived with a shattered screen.  Amazon does not allow me to exchange the item since it is no longer on sale so I am being forced to go else where to buy this item and I have to go through the pain of returning it without an exchange.  The TV may be a good TV - I don't know but Amazon service is TERRIBLE!

Reviews.Title: Received SHATTERED
Reviews.Author: Donna W.
Reviews.Content: Ordered this on cyber Monday, to give to my son for Christmas, when we opened the box, how disappointing to find the screen all shattered!!! after spending over an hour and half on the phone with customer service, whom said they would refund our money but sorry we have no more in stock......OH GREAT!.....so I go look on the website.....there are 6 in stock!!! Really Amazon!!!! how disappointing that the customer service rep lied.......this will def play a part in me ordering anything again!!! Thanks Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: TV has design flaw
Reviews.Author: Socrates "shoe buff"
Reviews.Content: The TV leans back noticeably on the stand. I noticed this even after exchanging my initial purchase. Samsung customer service could not resolve this.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV review - UN40EH5300 40 inch
Reviews.Author: Piyush Kulshrestha
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is very good. Remote is still old traditional remote. Very hard to type using this remote.I like the LG TV remotes.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I HOPED FOR IN QUALITY
Reviews.Author: SUNNY SYL
Reviews.Content: THE TV TURNS ON BY ITSELF AFTER BEING SHUT OFF.NOT HAPPY ABOUT THIS AND CAN'T RATE IT WELL BECAUSE OF THIS.  CONTACTING SHIPPER AND AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46EH5300
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I got the Samsung 46EH5300 TV few days back after selling my Sony Google TV just to get the bigger size. Now i really regret of my action. If your planning for Smart TV then this is not your choice. First to handle this remote is frustating.Specification says it has full web browser but the real problem is it cant stream the videos for more than 10 mins coz of the memory capacity of the TVSound of this TV is very less audible, its not even to the standards. Its very lowThe YouTube  App when you search for some videos and play the video from the list it will play only that video and it will not play the next video in the list you have to play manually to play the next.Defitnely this cant beat Sony Google TV.

Reviews.Title: this tv doses not work in Australia
Reviews.Author: Reginald J.
Reviews.Content: I will never buy this Samsung TV again all buy anything from themThey didn't tell us it dose not work in AustraliaBefore we got itAll its good for is the rubbish tipYou think they would of told us now I have to buy a new t

Reviews.Title: Arrive broken
Reviews.Author: mcinda35
Reviews.Content: Package arrive undamaged.  I set up the TV, turned it on and the screen was damaged and would not work.Returning for credit.  Otherwise, had the tv been in excellent condition, it would have been an extraordinary tv.

Reviews.Title: Netflix and Amazon Instant Video App is not working. DONT Buy
Reviews.Author: BJ
Reviews.Content: Netflix and Amazon Instant Video App is not working. And noone has a clue what is wrong. I contacted Amazon Instant Video, Netflix and Samsung Supports and none has a solution. It seems that the app has some code issue and their development teams are working on it, it seems. But right now, indefinitely there is not solution. Issue started 1-2 weeks ago.

Reviews.Title: This "Smart TV" is not working propperly
Reviews.Author: Diego D.
Reviews.Content: The TV does not work, shut down and I can not re-ignite.A few months ago a problem that is off and on alone.Today he did not want more light.I need to exchange it for one that works.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: I have not received the TV yet but have been reading great reviews everywhere about it. Its the size that i was looking for, smart TV cant get much better then that for the price. I bought the TV MUCH MUCH cheaper one day before black Friday, and i was a little curious about how much would it be on that day.... and surprise!!! i was actually $170 MORE that what i paid... so that was good for me i guess.Now something really disappointing is not even about the TV, is about amazonprime... "wanted shipped on Saturday 26"..... hell yeah! so i signed up for it!!! and guess what after i do that... i didn't shipped until Saturday and the "Estimated shipping date is DECEMBER 4th....WTF????? if i sign up on the thing COMMIT TO THE OFFER, THAT'S WHY I CANCEL THE PROGRAM BEFORE THEY STIFF ME WITH $79 BUCKS

Reviews.Title: keyboard
Reviews.Author: Rick7425
Reviews.Content: I did not receive my "free samsung keyboard" which was part of the purchase deal; I also had to return the tv for a swap-poor quality control by samsung.

Reviews.Title: The TV screen is totally shattered!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shuqiong Gong
Reviews.Content: I was extremely disappointed when I found out that the TV screen is totally shattered after I turned it on. What kind of shipping is this????? Just replaced another order, and hope the next one would not be damaged! Again, VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Box and TV came damaged
Reviews.Author: xyz
Reviews.Content: We are very disappointed with the TV. As the box and TV came damaged. We were very excited to open our first smarttv. But was very disappointed after opening it.

Reviews.Title: TV was damaged with a broken screen
Reviews.Author: SAUL PINTO
Reviews.Content: the Samsung UN32EH5300 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LED Smart HDTV (Black).purchased in the order 111-9171650-8537854.was received at the address 8417 NW 68TH ST MIAMI, FLORIDA 33166-2639. but the TV was damaged with a broken screen.I demand the TV replaced. for bad service on their part.the tv came with the broken screen. for bad service delivery.I demand the replacement of the product and send it to the address 8417 NW 68TH ST again MIAMI, FLORIDA 33166-2639

Reviews.Title: NOT FUNCTIONING
Reviews.Author: rv
Reviews.Content: When we opened the item it is fine.  It is not checked somewhere down the road.  The picture is coming in black and white only.  I tried with various options included profesional help.  It did not functioning properly

Reviews.Title: Arrived Smashed
Reviews.Author: Rb
Reviews.Content: Not sure how good the tv is because we never had a chance to even plug it in!  As soon as we took it out of the box...it went right back in and was shipped back... screen was completely smashed!!!  you would think they could manage to ship something like this without smashing the screen.  Then we have to order a new one because they won't ship a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Incorrect advertising
Reviews.Author: Jersey Louie
Reviews.Content: I bought a 1080 p TV and was unhappy withe picture quality.  Customer service told that I need a box to get 1080 after I complained.  Otherwise its only 720p.  TV has been returned

Reviews.Title: amazon really messed up lasr order, will give them one one try
Reviews.Author: Cindy P.
Reviews.Content: Was told tv had not shipped and was cancelled at my request. This after waiting 3 days after order date. With in the hour of my phone cancellation a truck showed up with the tv. Refused, bestbuy matched price and had it in stock and i had bought it an hour before the late delivery.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Alexander B. Tegov
Reviews.Content: Total waste of time. TV described with minor scratch on frame = hole the size of a golf ball. Stand does not install property (tv acts like a bobblehead), 8inch x 3cm dead pixels and laggy software. This was definitely dropped by the old owner and they are trying to sell to someone else as slightly used.

Reviews.Title: No universal remote?????
Reviews.Author: Steve K
Reviews.Content: I can't believe that this TV doesn't come with a universal remote to control the cable box and other accessories.  I know that this is a lower-end item for Samsung, but it still costs several hundred dollars.  This was a really stingy move on their part.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Tassaint Jocelyn
Reviews.Content: That was awesome though you didn't send it with some accessories but I still wait on you to do that please. The thing s I don't have cable to use my blue ray.

Reviews.Title: It's Cute!
Reviews.Author: Ebenezer Akomeah
Reviews.Content: It is just fantastic. The TV virtually satisfies all my entertainment needs. I bought it because I was told it could allow me to watch YouTube on my TV, and that's what exactly it has been doing. I will therefore recommend Samsung Smart TV to everybody. My only regret is the inches I chose. I think 55" or bigger would been much more preferable. Maybe Amazon.com might consider giving me 70% discount to buy a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Order
Reviews.Author: Khaleel M.
Reviews.Content: I ordered two smart tvs but one of the tv was a regular led. It was a gift for my child's teacher and I was a bit embarrassed.

Reviews.Title: It's dumb, not smart.
Reviews.Author: Geog272
Reviews.Content: We call it the dumb TV.It has a pandora app, youtube app, and netflix app that work well, but it is murderously slow to type anything with the remote. We just end up watching on our computers because it is so much easier.  I guess you really need to buy a keyboard for it.  It has a hulu app but will only let you use it if you have a paid hulu account (you can't watch the free hulu stuff on it).  It has a web browser, but it won't play the free videos you find on pbs.org or comedycentral.org -- I guess it is flash incompatible or something.  It doesn't have a built in DVD drive, so you have to connect it to one or to your computer. Basically, it is pretty useless unless you want to subscribe to a bunch of stuff like netflix and hulu, want to purchase an external keyboard and want to purchase an external DVD drive or connector for your computer.  It's almost as if it were designed specifically in order to make you purchase more stuff to make it work!

Reviews.Title: If you spend more than 5 bucks on a 60hz TV you're spending too much
Reviews.Author: Ryan Mathews
Reviews.Content: You're going to hate this TV the second you watch sports or anything with motion.  A 60hz TV is 5+ years old technology and is a disaster with current cable carriers.

Reviews.Title: It's perfect for a smart TV
Reviews.Author: Nader Ezzeeddine
Reviews.Content: I had few problems with Netflix but then I figured out that was from my internet provider preventing the TV to connect to netflix, so once I resolved the problem I am very happy with that TV. But Samsung never could help me to resolve the problem so I had to hire a specialist to make me connect Internet to Google using 0000 code and then the problem has been resolved

Reviews.Title: Gift Wrapping service at Amazon SUCKS!!
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I have no idea how this product is, This is a rant about how HORRIBLE Amazon gift wrapping is. $3.95 and I know several 4 year olds that could have done a better job. HOW HORRIBLE. if I could post a photo I would. you would not believe how horriblle. I am dropping my amazon score at least a whole point just for this. If I had had this sent directly to the reciepent I would be so ashamed!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Smart TV with Smart Content: Experience the next generation of our groundbreaking Smart TVs, with full web browsers, all-new content services and much more.
The realistic detail of Full HD images invites you to enjoy a viewing experience that redefines reality.
Smart Hub: Connect to new content, apps and much more.
With built-in Wi-Fi , no additional equipment is needed to connect with an existing wireless router in your home network and start accessing Samsung Apps or other Smart TV features.
Eco Sensor: Eco light sensor measures the intensity of the room's light and automatically calibrates the brightness of the image on the screen.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN46EH5300 46-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (2013 Model)
